Please take off your shoes when you go into the apartment and leave your shoes on the shoe rack by the entrance  ◉ You must request for late checkout upon check-in  ◉ You must request in advanced if you need to leave your luggages in the apartment after check-out  ◉ Please Switch OFF the A/C, lights, heater, fan in your room (and common area if no one is there) before leaving the apartment  ◉ Keep the common area (living room, kitchen/kitchen island, bathroom, hallway) CLEAR of your personal belongings overnight  ◉ Lock the apartment/room door at ALL times (we are not responsible for lost items) ◉ There would be a $50 charge for lost keys ◉ The light of the electric fireplace is always on, so you may leave it on ◉ Smoking indoor is not permitted unless otherwise instructed  ◉ Maximum occupancy per room is only for party of 2. No unexpected guests are allowed without 24 hours notice and approval ◉ When you just got

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about:
Originally from Hong Kong. An aspired child psychiatrist just graduated from Columbia University. I am currently working as a medical interpreter at Mount Sinai hospitals, and doing research at the New York Psychiatric Institute, while preparing for the Medical College Admission Test in a few months. 

I have been living in the city for 3 years, and I am enjoying every moment here. I like to travel the world and being around different people; and I love food/cooking, the sun, outdoor activities, jazz, my Ducati Monster and beer.

reviews.comments: Eugene was a great host and prompt with communications. His place is clean and conveniently located waking distance to 2 subway stations. Three flight of stairs are not an easy task if you have a heavy luggage and a fan is a must for these summer nights. I'm sure I found a new friend on Eugene.

Eugene was welcoming and gracious.  He was very reliable and helpful in orienting me to the apartment and the neighborhood.  The room was simple and reasonably priced; the location was perfect for attending a conference at Columbia.  Many thanks, Eugene!
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
it's a good place to stay
Room and apartment were very nice and clean, and hosts were extremely relaxed, welcoming and helpful.
Thanks for your welcome! we love this place so much. it's good location ,clean and warmest host ever!!

I never meet Eugene,  Randy was our go to guy. He was very nice, helpful and overall that really contributed to our stay. If you don't mind sharing space, bathroom, etc, and want to spend alot of time at museums, central park, etc. Certainly consider this apartment.

Had a great stay at Eugenes place. The flat is lovely and the flat is super cozy yet spacious. Public transport is nearby (116th and 125th) which makes it easy and fast to go downtown. The area has many nice options for food and bars and the flat is just next to Columbia. I never met Eugene personally but he has been very responsive, helpful and checked in regularly. His flatmate Julian has been the best and was helpful at all times and recommended some great spots to go to in nyc. Would definitely recommend this place and go there again any time!

Eugene's place was an excellent place to stay. I was in NYC for a course at Columbia University. It was an easy walk from the apartment to the university. It has so many different restaurants around to try and it is super close to transportation. Eugene answered all my questions quickly and with grade advice. I had an excellent stay!

The room was super cosy, nice and clean. The whole apartment is very interesting and very very clean. The location was great too, very close to the city center and metro. Brunch places in the neighborhood were nice too. Eugene is such a great host! Not only that he makes sure that you don't need anything, but also he gives a lot of great recommendations for super nice places in New York. I am very grateful that we met him and stayed at his place, it felt like you are visiting a really good friend! Thanks for everything! :)

My two children (18 and 21) had a great stay at Eugene's place. They found the apartment clean, comfortable and within easy walking distance to the nearest subway - with only a short subway ride to the centre of Manhattan it was in an excellent location. Eugene was very kind and ready to help in any way he could as well as being interesting and easy to chat to. Would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in New York.

Staying at Eugene's apartment was a great experience. The apartment is located in a very good area near Columbia University, easily connected to the rest of Manhattan. The room was spacious, comfortable and very clean. Also, the living room and kitchen were nice spacious spaces. Eugene is very friendly and helpful. Definitely I recommend the apartment and I would stay again in my future trips to New York

Nice quiet neighbourhood. I didn't get to meet Eugene but from the way he communicated with me throughout my stay, I can tell he's a very cool person, very helpful too. I felt at home staying here, not to mention safe. The closest subway to my knowledge is 125 st. It's a 10 mins walk, something you might want to think about if you have heavy luggage. Otherwise, it's a nice walk, passing through shops and parks. Bed is very comfortable, very quiet bedroom, and relatively spacious too. Love this place.

My friends and I stayed at Eugene's apartment for a week, and we all like it! It is a quiet, convenient and cozy house that I'd like to recommend. In addition, Eugene and Edmond are very responsible and friendly.Great experience!
Hôte très sympa et prévenant. Appartement propre spacieux et bien placé. Je recommande !

Great place near Columbia. Eugene was very friendly, and the room was clean and spacious. 

Was familiar with the area so this wasn't an issue for us but if you're not familiar with NYC, be aware it can take anywhere from 25-50 minutes to get downtown on the subway.

房東是一個超nice的人,把大家都當作朋友一樣,整個家也佈置的很溫馨,最喜歡的空間是客廳,一整天賴在沙發上享受陽光真的好舒服｡而且房東懂的語言很多,完全不用擔心溝通方面有問題
而且還有廚房可以使用,也可以認識其他房客,大家都是一家人的感覺很好❤️
離兩個站走路不用十分鐘,附近的哥倫比亞大學也很美呦!
nice place!

Me and my girlfriend enjoyed very much to stay in your airbnb, specially with your tips for restaurants in the area.
The apartment is very cozy, kitchen and living room amazing. The bedroom is also very good, incredible bed/sheets.
The only attention pint is that there's only one bathroom in the apt. We didn't had any particular problems with it, but one could be surprised with a line to use the bathroom.

Eugene is fantastic.  From the first message to the arrival and throughout the stay Eugene was present and available...but not overwhelming or demanding.  He set clear expectations for both of us and followed through 100%.  I highly recommend Eugene's place.  Very fine host.  Thanks Eugene.

Eugene’s is a great host, he will help you with everything, and he’s always looking for his guest to feel like home. Excellent place, very clean, and with a nice location.  For sure I would pass by the next time I’m in the city.
Good location, 10 minutes walk to subway station. Cozy and clean room.
The apartment is cozy and the room is clean  and has a comfortable bed. Eugene is always in communication, he is very kind!

Eugene is by far the best Airbnb host I have ever met. And I’ve met many. Most don’t live up to theIr listing’s expectations. Eugene surpassed all expectations. He went above and beyond to make sure I made it to his apartment and even arranged for his co-host Edmond to help carry my luggage up to the unit. Both hosts are so kind and personable. For the first time I felt like my hosts genuinely cared about me and my contentment. It was truly refreshing to spend time with them!

The bed in room 1 was very comfy and the sheets were so soft. The room was very tidy and had a raised desk with a matching IKEA stool. In addition to the breakfast-in-bed tray, there’s a hairdryer, full length mirror, and a bit of closet space and hangers. Because I was in town for dissertation research, the setup was absolutely ideal. 

The location is removed from the chaos of Midtown, but is only about 20-30 minutes away via subway (that is, when the trains aren’t delayed; NYC public transit’s fault entirely). Morningside Park is nearby—perfect for getting in a morning walk or run.

If I could live here, I would. If I could rate 10 stars, I would. I WILL and back!
房子干净整洁,生活用品齐全,附近有超市,厨房设备齐全超出我们预期｡多谢!

Really good ppl, good location. Good room.. 
I love my staying there... Eugene is really helpful.. and always be there when you need anything ... the location is good really close to couple of subway lines... lovely staying .. will consider to stay there again ...
Very good people and place!
Clean and well kept place. Room is tidy and tastefully done and is very comfortable. Would highly recommend it!
离哥伦比亚大学很近,拜访朋友很方便｡房间安静舒适,书架上有各类图书供消遣｡

I enjoyed staying at Eugene’s place. The location was perfect, since I was visiting my daughter at Barnard. The cozy but contemporary apartment reminded me of my student days because Eugene, his roommate and the other guest would come and go and hang out in the kitchen and living room. Comfortable, clean bedroom. Try Maxx Cafe around the corner, as well as the little basement bakery a couple doors west of the apartment.

The stay was superb from all aspects.
1. Location is very convenient. It is within 10min of walking distance to 125th st sub stations, yes both of them with train 1 and ABCD. A and D are the express trains that only stops once between the nearest station and times square.
There are groceries 3min walk away. Italian, Chinese, and Sushi restaurants are right at the corner of the block as well. Oh, it takes 10-30min for most food deliveries to get to your door after ordering. There are uber drivers all over Manhattan ready for delivery. Oh, if you are here for the music school auditions.. Needless to say, you are literally living next to the school. 
2. The apartment is clean and spacious. It is a newly renovated historical building. Our room is just as the pictures shown on airbnb. Shower, heater and etc. are working in great conditions so no need to worry about those.(well, considering the price, you might wonder) Oh, two bathrooms with showers come in handy. Never had to wait for anyone to use one when needed.
3. Laundry experience is beyond my expectations. Actually unlocked a whole new world for me as I used to do my own laundry living in Vancouver. The laundried clothes are usually just thrown into my clean cloth basket except for those that have to be hanged dry. But here in New York, they can pick up/delivery at your door. And they fold your clothes for you! Neat.
All for a very reasonable price.
4. Eugene's hospitality is just another bonus on top of all the above experiences. Very responsible and friendly host. 
Overall 11/10. Would definitely return if ever getting a chance to revisit NYC.

再用中文简介下好咯, 本人加拿大留学毕业后在温哥华工作. 此行和老婆一起来纽约玩, 整体感觉非常好.
房东Eugene人很好, 有什么事情都可以商量询问. 房间所处地理位置不能算曼哈顿最繁华的地段但绝对是交通生活非常便利. 具体来熟悉了地铁线路就知道了. 房间内也很干净, 设施齐全住着很舒服. 洗衣服比想象中要方便得多, 也很便宜. 另外房东也是年轻人, 在这里住的时间内, 也有很多留学生以及五湖四海的访客, 大家都很聊得来, 晚上一起小聚畅谈也非常开心. 你也可以跟Eugene约好晚上一起体验纽约的留学生夜生活~~ (当然不能保证, 看具体他的安排咯.. 我在住期间另一个室友表示很high)
希望有机会回来纽约玩. 下次还会来这里的. 完全的满分. 有兴趣可以自己看下上半部分英文的翻译咯 更细节些 总之纽约之旅来这里你值得拥有.
Euegene's place is awesome! Cool atmosphere, spaced rooms, great kitchen, and Eugene himself who's always more than happy to help about anything!
Eugene is a very kind and generous host, and his place is very clean and conveniently located.
Had a great stay! Place is clean and luxurious and in a great location!

ﾍﾞｯﾄﾞの心地がよく､清潔感があり､とてもよい部屋でした｡Eugeneにはとても親切でﾌﾚﾝﾄﾞﾘｰな対応をしていただきました｡
部屋の音漏れが少し気になりましたが､値段以上のお部屋でした｡
Excelente lugar, excelente anfitrión. Si volvemos a Nueva York, repetiremos con Eugene.

Being at Eugene's place was a real pleasure! 
Comunication with him was very easy and the appartment is very confortable. We spent some time at the appartment cooking and resting. It is a very good place to recover from NYC speed.
Ubication is very good and well connected to move all over the city. 

If we would go back to NYC for sure we would repeat!
Eugene was super accommodating. He let me check in early as the previous person had left early. He was extremely responsive. The space was clean. About a 5-10 minute walk from the Subway.
Eugene’s apartment is amazing! Very good location, close to Public transport. Eugene is very kind and welcoming. Me and my sister had the best time!

El departamento es hermoso y super completo! Aunque no nos cruzamos mucho con Eugene, nos enviaba msj para ver si necesitábamos algo. La zona es segura (por nuestra experiencia) y hay negocios a buen precio, tanto de ropa como comida. Está muy cerca de 5 líneas de subte, pudimos recorrer toda la ciudad de esta forma.

Really nice place, good location at about 7min from the metro stop. Very neat,clean and cosy place. Eugene is a great host and he indeed deserves the superhost label! Very helpful and flexible, quick responder and friendly. I would recommend this place for anyone looking for smth affordable and not too far from midtown Manhattan.

Eugene was such a great host you cannot ask for more!  He was not only responsive, but easy to communicate & thoughtfulness: understand what we need.   Besides the location is very convenient to restaurant, market & subway or bus station.  Moreover, the place is very clean & nice - just across a park, so we had a wonderful time to stay there - highly recommend!
Great place! Stay was very comfortable and location was good. Would recommend!

This is my very first Airbnb experience and not sure what to expect. Eugene was such a wonderful host- helpful, quick to respond, easy to communicate, and very helpful and accommodating. The location is concerned too—close to Columbia University, Riverside Church, and food. I’d definitely be happy to come back.  Thank you Eugene for everything!
Amazing place. Cannot recommend enough.

Eugene’s place is clean, quiet and in a good location - there’s Subway stations very close by. 

Eugene is a great host, extremely helpful, especially when it came to making sure my friend and I arrived in alright and could find the place once we were in Manhattan. Gave us great directions and useful information regarding transfer links. 

Thoroughly enjoyed staying at Eugene’s place and would reccomend.
Really nice house. Eugene is really kind and answers immediately to text messages. Highly recommend :)
Would recommend Eugene’s place! On the outskirts of Manhattan, but close subway access! Enjoyed our stay here and the hospitality!
Super grosse Wohnung, grosse Küche, Aufenthaltsort grandio, bequemes Bett, schönnes Bad. Mit der Metro ist man schnell überall.
房东是一个干净勤快的小伙子,非常nice,有礼貌,厨艺出色,家里时常保持清洁,给我们非常棒的建议,也很乐意提供帮助｡特别要赞一下厨房,各样设施一应俱全,比我家里的厨房还要出色,在他家可以满足我们的中国胃｡超市就在附近,地铁也很方便,下次来纽约还会选他家,强烈推荐!
Very responsive and accommodating host.  Great place to stay if you're visiting Columbia!  One thing to note is that there is only one bathroom but it is kept very clean.
房东超级nice,把房子打扫的很干净,可以一起愉快的聊天,还很会煮饭哦!房子的布局和结构也很令人满意,保证私人空间不被打扰的情况下,还可以很好的和房主､其他房客进行互动!房源所在的位置附近交通也很方便,出行可以选择搭乘地铁或者Ube,附近也有一些餐厅､超市､ATM等,生活很方便!很赞的房源!
Fantastic place. Clean, hospitable, great location

Someone else mentioned that staying with Eugene was like visiting an old friend--definitely true, the superhost title is well-deserved! The place was as described and Eugene was always willing to offer tips/suggestions for local food places and ways to get around. As someone who was new to NYC it was extremely appreciated, and the location was perfect for getting to Teacher's College easily.
Eugene is really friendly and organized. His apartment is very cool and he will go out of his way to make your stay as enjoyable as possible.
It was a very clean and nice-looking Apt and the location is pretty good. The host was very handsome and nice.  Great experience!
the room is very clean and very quick response from the host .
Great place, great location
Comfortable, well located and managed by a very accommodating host. We would stay here again!
Very comfortable room, space is exactly as advertised. Well located close to Columbia and bus/subway. Plenty of places to eat or get coffee nearby. Eugene is a kind host.
great hospitality, quiet, clean room, and a 10 min walk to campus.
Excellent stay. Room was spacious and very clean and comfortable. Fast wifi. Great location, easily accessible to downtown.

Eugene was ever so accommodating and responsive to my messages and questions. The apartment has such a stylish vibe and warm feeling - very clean too. Perfect location by the lovely Morningside Park, simple to walk to Central Park, and easy to get on the subway to get into Midtown. Thought the little directional labels in the kitchen and bathroom as well as the nightlights on the bedroom doors were nice touches. The cat is insanely adorable. Our stay here really made our time in NYC perfect.

Eugene’s place is so much better that i thought! Great location, close to subway, Columbia and Riverside Park. The apartment has a great design, very nice living and bed is so comfortable! Best of all, Eugene is a great host! Really nice person!
這裡是一個很舒適又安全的社區,離地鐵站都大約5分鐘的路程,附近有超市跟餐廳,生活機能很足夠｡鄰近哥倫比亞大學,所以很有書香氣息,謝謝Eugene還帶我們去參觀了一下哥大,後來我們常常喜歡散步經過校區去別地方,享受校園氣息｡另外還有很舒適的河濱公園,很適合在紐約繁忙的節奏下擁有緩慢的休閒空間,整體來說我覺得這裡非常棒!
Cool place. Was my first time doing a shared Airbnb so wasn’t sure how it would play out but it was good!

Eugene’s place is exactly as he described it . It a nice small room suitable for maximum of two ppl with a shared bathroom.  Loved the cat :P . 5-7 min. walk from the metro station. Communication with Eugene was exceptional. He replied to all the queries and tried to help in every possible way he could.

Eugene es un amor , la casa limpia y calentita , la cama es súper cómoda y las sabanas un gusto muy agradable , igual q las fotos todo  , la ubicación inmejorable.... si tenemos q volver a New York seguro volvemos aquí .. muy recomendable!!!
Eugene’s place was just perfect . Super clean and super stylish. And he was very prompt with his communication. Will definitely be coming back.

I strongly recommend Eugene’s place. I enjoyed my stay. It was very easy to communicate with him—he is very understanding.

I will definitely consider staying again during my next trip!

Eugene is a very nice host, he and his Friends made us feel welcome from the first moment. There is a friendly atmosphere, Eugene is very considerate and helpful and has many useful hints and precise directions.
Excelente atención por el anfitrión !! Seguro el lugar muy cómodo !! El único inconveniente fue la escalera para subir con la valija !!el resto todo muy bien todo ordenado !! Recomendable
Eugene's apartment is very nice and is close to subway stations and several facilities.
We had a great time staying with Eugene, he's a seasoned host and his apartment offers a great kitchen and shared space. Totter the cat is super friendly.

能有会讲中文的房东实在是太棒了,而且还是很帅的小哥哥!还有漂亮小姐姐和可爱的喵!还带着去了哥大图书馆,真是非常感谢!
楼下超市餐馆一应俱全,距离地铁站也很近!真的是非常棒!

name: Cozy, Convenient 1 Bed Apartment!!! UWS Manhattan
summary: The apartment is located in the heart of Manhattan, super convenient, great neighborhood. 5 minutes to 66th St. subway station (No. 1), 8 mins to 72nd St. station (No. 1, 2, 3), and 8 mins to Columbus Circle station (No. 1, A, B, C, D). Crosstown buses are downstairs. Numerous restaurants, shops, and markets in the area. Very close to Central Park, Hudson River, Lincoln Center, Columbus Circle. Time Square and 5th Ave., less than 20 mins away. It is good for couple, businessmen, and family.
space: You will have the entire apartment for yourself, no one to share with. However, I have personal stuff in the apartment, so please do not open any closets and drawers. The big white wardrobe in the bedroom is for your use.

notes: Please go through all photos and read all descriptions. This is not a huge or luxury apartment, but definitely a cozy and comfortable apartment to stay in this central location of Manhattan. The overall size of the apartment is about 300 square feet. I always try my best to prepare for my guests wholeheartedly and provide necessary help, however if you expect a hotel-level service or standard, this might not be the most ideal place for you. Thank you!
access: Please feel free to use all areas as you will have the entire apartment yourself during your stay, no one to share with.  This is my apartment and I love to host people and provide a nice "home" for my guests' trip. However, because I live here as well but just travel often, there will be some of my stuff stored in the apartment, so please do not open any closets or drawers, the big white wardrobe in the bedroom is for your use.
interaction: For most of the time, I won't be here during your visits, but would be easily reached by email/call/text/messages and would love help. I always prepare the apartment well before you arrival, and sometimes also ask my friend who lives nearby to provide help when needed.
house_rules: - Please make sure you have saw all photos/read all description before your booking.  - Please keep the apartment clean and tidy. - This is my apartment and there will be my stuff in it. Please do not open any closets or cabinets. The big white wardrobe in the bedroom will be for you to use.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: I am a pianist and have been studying at The Juilliard School, Yale University, and Johns Hopkins University. I love to travel to concerts/music festivals around the world and enjoy to meet new friends and experience different cultures. I also love to welcome you to stay in my lovely apartments each in one of the best neighborhoods in New York and Baltimore, hope you may enjoy these two cities as much as I do!

reviews.comments: Prearrival she informed me that her friend would have key. They were both excellent at communication. I locked key in dooor and immediate reply and solution was in process. I would stay again.
Our text communications were mostly polite.
The location was convenient, but I found the apartment too small and felt very confined.
Place is clean and quiet. Relatively small. Yang was very responsive and very easy to work with. Would definitely stay again
Had a great stay, very convenient location as described yet very quite apartment, appearance as posted.  Yang was easy to communicate with and very accommodating.  No complaints

Host was welcoming and communicative. Two room apartment had one room unavailable (baby grand piano), main room contains double bed, kitchenette, 1 chair, tiny table, covered storage allowing 2 1/2 foot wide corridor from kitchenette to bath. Host made almost no accommodation for guests.  Double bed had 1 sheet, 1 cover, but extremely uncomfortable mattress that prevented sleep. Bathroom had tiny soap bars (from motels), shower curtain had a rip. Very low value for the price.
Yang's place is a great value--it's not big, but well kept up & the location is excellent; less than 10 minutes from subway & Lincoln Center.

Yang's place was very quiet and academic, its location is perfect too, I stayed with my family there and we wanted to go to Lincoln Center to watch a show, and it was only a 2-minute walk! I was a little worried about the mattress because of the previous review, but I decided to give it a try, it turns out that the mattress was comfortable enough to have a sound sleep, so I would definitely come back again!

Yang's apartment was wonderful! It was in a great location, we felt safe, and it was quiet. We highly recommend people to stay here. She was great at communicating with us and made she everything was fine. The next time we come here, we'll definitely stay at her place again!
Great place for a single traveler for a quick night or two. Location is good. Typical NYC apartment.

I had a fantastic stay at Yang's place.  It's as described, and fit all my needs for a quick business trip.  Great wi-fi, clean, and equipped with all the basic necessities.  Yang is a terrific host as well, very communicative and helpful with check-in/check-out.  Will definitely stay there again! Thank you Yang!
Very convenient place to stay for tourists as a 1st time visiting Manhattan. Also the C/P is high

Yang was very accommodating and answered questions quickly.  About a ten minute walk away from the nearest subway station.  The photos are very accurate and illustrate how small New York apartments are, no surprises here.
Very nice host. Well-located place if your looking for a quick bed (someone else’s bed) to crash on. Felt safe.
Great location, very helpful host.

Yang was an excellent host. Despite my luggage got damaged at the airport and we made the check in 1 hour later than disgussed, Yang's mother has taken care of us, helped and gave us a warm welcome. We hightly recommend her nice place for safety stay in NYC.

L'appartamento è piccolo ma molto confortevole e dotato di tutti i servizi necessari per una bella vacanza. L'ubicazione è perfetta, la metro è vicina, si può tranquillamaente arrivare a piedi a Time Square.
Yang è stata molto disponibile ed i tempi di risposta alle nostre domande sono stati quasi immediati, ci è venuta incontro anche nell'orario di check out, perfetta!

Yang's place was awesome! It's conveniently located and has all the things you need to make your stay comfortable! She was quick to respond, and even accommodated a slightly early check-in to drop off bags! We even had the pleasure of meeting her mom, who was so sweet and welcoming! 

The apartment is just as it says, cozy and convenient! It was exactly what I expected, and made for an amazing home base for my first trip to NYC! I would definitely recommend it!
Yang´s apartment has a great location and she is really fact answering to any question or issue you may have.

I really enjoyed my stay at Yang’s place. The place is well located and clean. Yang responded really quickly to all my messages. She was really flexible with my check-out time, since I had a late flight and did not want to wait at the airport for a too long time. I would definitely stay here again. Thanks Yang!

What a bargain! The location is perfect, central to great restaurants and activities, close to the subway and walkable to so many other areas. One thing we appreciated was the neighborhood was pretty quiet, which is wonderful after a long day of sightseeing. The apartment is cozy as stated, but for a trip when you are out for the day it’s just right. It has everything you need. Communication with Yang is so prompt! We really appreciated that. Yang’s mother was delightful as we checked in and out. I would highly recommend and would stay here again.
El departamento tiene una ubicación fascinante, tranquilo, cerca del subway, markets, etc. Muy buen servicio el que otorgan, todo siempre limpio. Totalmente recomendable!

We had a great time staying at Yang's. It's a great location - very close to Central Park, subway stations, and Lincoln Center (and not too far from Times Square/Broadway theaters). Well-kept cozy apartment, the a/c worked well, and Yang was very responsive and friendly in email interactions.
非常愉悦的曼哈顿之行,交通生活非常便捷

Lovely place. A little bit bigger than a hotel room. Very clean apartment and quiet neighborhood. Bed in the living room could have been a little more comfortable. Everything looked the same as the pictures. There are some wonderful grocery stores near by. Not too far from the subway or bus if you don’t mind walking about 10 minutes. Yang was always quick to respond and very helpful. Her mother made check in really easy. An all around great place to stay in NYC!

My girlfriend and I stayed in New York for a 7 day vacation. Yang was extremely accomodating to us. It is in a great location with about a 15 minute walk to time square and other sites and attractions. If I was to book another trip there, I would message Yang again and book her place as it had everything we needed. The picutres also dont do the appartment justice. It is actually much bigger and can comfortably fit 3 people no problem! All-in-all... 5 stars!
We had a great stay in Yang’s place - it’s convenient to get to many places in town and it was perfect for a weekend’s vacation. Thanks!
Yang's place was really nice! A bit of a walk from the subway but clean and nice. It's very hard to find a place in Manhattan as cheap as Yang's, and the Midtown location is nice and central.
This place is a great place to stay enjoyed my Labor Day weekend here .

name: Spacious Sunny Bedroom near JMZ Subways
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. This brand-new renovated space has all the comforts of home with 2 full (shared) bathrooms, lockable private room, fully-stocked kitchen, and is only a 15 minute subway ride to downtown Manhattan
space: Welcome to Brooklyn! For rent is a lovely and private bedroom in the second floor of a recently renovated townhouse. You will have access to two full bathrooms, wifi throughout, and use of the stainless steel kitchen.  The bed is brand-new and is a memory foam Queen bed; super comfortable! The room also contains a small dresser, lamp, and plenty of closet space. The house is located a 3 minute walk to the Myrtle Ave stop on the J/M lines which will whisk you to Manhattan in 3 stops. It gets great sunlight and is on a quiet street.  Nearby are many shops, delis, restaurants, and transportation. It is a very hot, up-and-coming area of Brooklyn, so more artsy and creative types are moving in everyday. This apartment has been renovated from top to bottom and it is practically brand-new.  My calendar is always up-to-date. Contact me to get a reservation started. I hope you enjoy your stay in NYC!

neighborhood_overview: So many cute shops and delis nearby. Coffee house down the block. Great juice and deli place near the subway. And Williamsburg, with all its awesome restaurants and bars, is just a short bus ride or walk away, about one mile west -- can't beat the location!
transit: I am as close to the subway as you can get, without the awful subway noise. The J train runs express during rush hour, and the M will take you straight to midtown / near Times Square / Union Square. If you want to visit Williamsburg, we're just a short Uber ride away (about $8). In warmer months, we also have CitiBike stations nearby so you can easily bike there or even into Manhattan via the Williamsburg Bridge.
access: This apartment is a 4-bedroom, 2 full bathroom space. The other 3 bedrooms are rented out to international young professionals and students, some here for several months at a time. They are all very respectful and quiet people. We have a lovely backyard space with lots of seating and string lights. There's also a washer and dryer in the basement (coin operated). We have a cleaner come 2-3x per week to clean the common areas (kitchen, bathrooms, and living room) to ensure a clean space. However, we do ask everyone to clean up after themselves and leave the space as they found it, as it is a shared space.
interaction: I prefer to be a hands-off host but am always available if you need anything. Happy to provide any recommendations nearby. I live on the floor downstairs from this apartment and often hang out in the large backyard area, which you're also more than welcome to use!

Entrepreneur and tech enthusiast raised in Queens, NY. Lover of nature, biking, DIY projects, and whole foods. Positive vibes :) 

When I travel I hope to see glimpses of new beauty in new places. 

As a host I'm pretty hands off, though I'm always available if you need suggestions on things to do or where to catch a bite to eat. My places have everything you need; just bring your clothes. 

Welcome!

host.host_about:
I have lived and worked at many places around the world and nothing enhance my experience more than a comfortable home away from home; somewhere I can work, study, relax and recharge. This is why I aim to make my place a clean, safe, comfortable and convenient home for you. 

You can expect arrive to a clean, well maintained and equipped accommodation, where you can settle in right away. 

My accommodations are strategically located at heart of the city; it is minutes to major transportation like MTR and buses stations, shops, restaurants and supermarkets etc., which makes living and commuting so much more effortless. 

My accommodations are fairly new and have mostly been under long term rental, hence the relatively few reviews; however, you can see more guests experience with other accommodations that I have.

reviews.comments: Located in the heart of Mongkok, extremely convenient. Jack was very nice and prompt with his responses. Would recommend you to stay here, if you are looking for a economical spot in HK.

I really like this place it's cosy clean and has all the things you need around the neighbourhood, including being very close to Mongkok MTR which makes commuting really convenient. Jack is also a really helpful host who will go out of the way to ensure your stay is comfortable. Definitely recommend this room and Jack's services!

Jack was a fantastic host! The place was great, cleaned regularly, and if I ever had a question or concern Jack would reply in mere minutes! He was hospitable, friendly, and made a genuine effort to make you feel welcome. Everything was efficient and made transitioning to Hong Kong a lot easier. Highly recommend having him as your next host!

Jack’s place is perfect. Not spacious as most HK rooms but contains everything you may need. The room is clean and new.
The location is perfect for shopping lovers. It is at the centre of Mongkok, a few steps to mall, food and MTR. However, totally avoid the noise of the street.
The flat is fully equipped with cooking, washing and drying facilities.
Very good living experience.

host.host_about: Venha descobrir as maravilhas do Rio de Janeiro; suas praias, bares, restaurantes e famosos pontos turísticos. Estamos bem localizados, no bairro do Leme, juntinho a famosa praia de Copacabana, perto de tudo que você precisa para aproveitar ao máximo sua visita ao Rio. No Le House você vai encontrar conforto, segurança, ótimos serviços, com equipe bem informada, falando seu idioma. Temos cozinha aberta diariamente e um  completo café da manhã incluso em nossas diárias. Faça uma reserva! Seja a trabalho ou lazer, venha se hospedar com a gente, fazer novos amigos e tornar sua viagem ao Rio, um experiência inesquecível!

A conseiller
Fomos muito bem recebidos e com certeza voltaremos mais vezes, a localização é ótima, o ambiente é tranquilo e os funcionários são atenciosos.

Ótimo lugar. Você se sente em casa mesmo! Além de bem proximo à praia, nas proximidades tem todo tipo de comércio. Mas o que eu mais gostei foi a socialidade no hostel.... Tem espaços comuns (sala e cozinha) que proporciona e impulsiona as pessoas a conversarem e se conhecerem. Além disso, atencioso e seu filho são super atenciosos e educados. Voltarei mais vezes com certeza
Ótimo local. Muito bem localizado. Anfitriões comunicativos. Sem dúvida voltaremos mais vezes.

house_rules: 大廈內設有24小時保安 住客24小時都可辦理入住手續(24 hr Check-in)  禁止吸煙,並保持環境清新,單位門外設吸煙區(露天) 請勿在床上飲食,若弄污床上用品將收取400港元清潔費 請於晚上11時後保持安靜,以提供寧靜的睡眠環境 房間有空調 洗头水沐浴露有 牙刷牙膏有 拖鞋自備 (有即棄酒店拖鞋備用) 毛巾自帶 (新毛巾hk$20/條) 風筒可借用(按金hk$100) 熨斗可借用(按金hk$100) 洗衣+乾衣 hk$60/7磅 房有轉換插頭 前枱位置可寄存行李(免費) 我們是遊客賓館,只限持海外護照, 旅遊証件的外籍人士(連入境記錄章及於批准逗留時限內)或港澳通行证登記入住｡ 請珍惜用電 空調及熱水器請勿長開 空調不可長時間開動,  有需要時我們會要求客人於某段時間內关上空調一段短時間 如房間沒有人請關掉空調  沖完涼或沒有人在房中請關掉熱水器 - 24hrs reception service - No eating on the bed, cleaning fees is at hk$400 and up.  - No smoking in all rooms and all indoor. Smoking area is available outside of flat entrance with open area. - Please be quite after 11pm - hk$100 refundable deposit for hairdryer - hk$100 refundable deposit for iron + ironboard - no free towel; hk$20 for new towel available at reception - bring your own slippers, disposable hotel slippers is available for free.  - We offer the same day luggage storage for free. - Overnight Luggage storage is hk$10-30 per pc per night, depends on size and availability. - we provide shampoo

Experience Hongkong style, what we eat, how we work, how we live, and how we have fun!!

name: Room in penthouse with 2 terraces
space: Hi chic@s, I rent a spare room of approx. 10m2 with own access to a large terrace with an outdoor shower. It has a single bed, a desk, a large and a small shelf and wardrobe with 2 doors. The flat is a very sunny penthouse with 2 terraces and access to the roof top terrace and its spectacular views. Fully furnished and equipped it has ADSL wifi, air conditioning, heating, cleaning service 2 times a week!! :) It is just 2 minutes away from the metro station Parallel, green and purple lines, as well as a few meteres away from Bicing and Montjuic. To Las Ramblas it takes just 10 minutes walking. There is a lift and community services. I am German-Italian of 30 years, living in Barcelona for several years. Apart from studying and working I like to have fun and have a good vibe in the house. For more details, please send a message.

reviews.comments:
Hola Everybody
I'm maximo ,I lived here in Barcelona for 1 weeks totally and she more taked care of me than my mom!! Although She was on her vacations ,always call me to check my comfortable and check how the house's going on.
  One of the ingredients that make my trip so wonderful is This room ,everything was cleanly orginazable and available to use.Furthermore,The view of the city is the thing i love most.You can stay at the terrace so look around and you'll crash wish Sagrada Familia and The beach.
I can't find greater word more than Fantastic!!
i'm very lucky of knowing this site and talking with Simona,Trust me and you will have the great time!!

I had an amazing time at Simona's place, she is the best host a visitor can ask for. The apartment is bright and spacious, the terraces are massive, I even had my own terrace. She was very caring, helped me with everything, and must say we've become friends over my 8 days there. If you want to get the full experience in Barcelona, don't hesitate to book one of her rooms. She is simply awesome, and the apartment is just off La Rambla. I will definitely go back to visit her! Highly recommend it to anybody.

Simona is a very nice host. The room nice, bright, loved breakfast on the terrace. The room is quiet. A few minutes walk from La Ramblas and the harbor. I spent 5 days in Barcelona enjoyed every minute of it. Thank you Simona,
Vivien

Grâce à l'accueil de Simona, je me suis sentie directement à l'aise chez elle.  Elle est disponible et prévenante. Tout est exactement comme sur les photos. J'ai adoré ma chambre individuelle avec "MA" terrasse où je pouvais aller m'installer pour déjeuner ou simplement lire: vraiment un super plus! Facilement accessible depuis l'aéroport et/ou du centre, le quartier est calme et tranquille avec des magasins à 2 pas. La cuisine est accessible, une planche dans le frigo, la machine à lessiver (que des points positifs)... J'y retournerai, ça c'est sûr ;-)
je vous recommande vivement cet endroit

Simona una gran anfitriona,siempre dispuesta y respetuosa.
Respecto a la casa,mejor que en las fotos,con una terraza muy amplia y soleada.
La zona es genial,con todo cerca y a la vez muy tranquila.
Muy recomendable,no dudaría en volver!

J'ai eu une magnifique expérience chez Simona. La vue de la terrasse est splendide et m'aura vraiment marqué. L'appartement en lui même est grand, décoré avec un goût très sûr. Situé au tout dernier étage, le calme qui y règne tranche avec l'animation du quartier. Quartier qui au demeurant est tres cosmopolite, vivant et proche de tout ce qu'il y a de plus agréable dans Barcelone.  Enfin Simona a été un hôte particulièrement sympathique.  Elle m'a bcp conseillé sur des endroits géniaux de Barcelone impossible à connaître pour qui ne réside pas sur place.  Grazzie mille

Gorgeous apartment, amazing location, terrific view from the terrace. Friendly and easy going host. I could often find Simona in the living room working which was very useful when I had questions and not so good when I wanted to use the only dinner table. The description of the room wasn’t accurate, because I found not 2 girls renting a room but a couple renting two rooms and I felt the apartment was crowded. It was noisy at night due to the active lifestyle of the apartment’s dwellers.

I stayed with Simona for a week and had the most fantastic experience! She was so welcoming and hospitable, and the apartment is gorgeous. Simona was always making sure I had everything I needed, provided me with a map, phrase book, pointing out great bars and shopping districts.
Staying with her made my trip so much more enjoyable!

This is a great place! The location is fantastic - within walking distance of the Ramblas - and the apartment was clean and as advertised (and the balcony over looking poble sec is a wonderful thing to wake up to!). Simona is a very warm-hearted, knowledgeable, attentive host who is very easy to get along with; she definitely made my stay in Barcelona more enjoyable. She is very familiar with the city and gave me great restaurant recommendations and suggestions for possible day trips. She was always available if I had any questions or concerns, and kept me abreast of any changes. I will definitely stay here again the next time I am in Barcelona!  If you are considering a few places, look no further! This is a great apartment with a fantastic host! Thanks, Simona!
Charming and well located flat. Very kind host, unfortunately I was very much in and out however I was made to feel very welcome.

I loved staying at Simona's! She is just awesome, and the place is very well located and comfortable. It's very close to a metro station, and the Barcelona metro is easy to use. But it's also not a long walk to many major attractions. The neighbourhood had good restaurants and bars, and Simona gives great recommendations too, and might even take you out. She is so helpful and trustworthy and just really a gentle soul. I would absolutely stay here again. When I was staying there, a couple was renting another room, so it was really fun making friends with them and Simona. It's a very active house, so if really quiet and private is what you're looking for, this probably isn't it. But if you'd like a great experience with locals and other travellers, definitely book with Simona!

The house is great, clean and really well located (5 minutes walking to the Rambla), with an amazing terrace where you can have breakfast. Simona is perfect, easy going and always available to help. She is smiling and nice at any time, but also give you 100% of your privacy if you want it. Grazie Simona!! Hope to see you again :)

Simona's apartment is in a perfect location in the city centre. It's a 15 minute walk to the beach and less than 10 minutes to La Ramblas. The facilities are so good, a solid power shower and a really great living area and kitchen. There's also a nice terrace outside the room I stayed in, perfect for a morning coffee. I can't fault the place. Joe, Ireland.

Simona, her boyfriend Ben and her friend Caterina were marvelous hosts. Simona wasn't in Barcelona when I arrived, but Ben kindly waited at her apartment to let me in, even though I arrived over an hour delayed. The room I rented is small and a bit hot, but Simona provides a sturdy fan and the room is quite nice. The terrace is beautiful. While I did not interact much with Ben, he was very pleasant, and Simona and Caterina are vivacious and fun-loving people. Caterina took me to one of the "barrio" or neighborhood parties, and Simona both offered to take me out with her friends and gave me great suggestions for restaurants.
The host canceled this reservation 5 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

First time in Barcelona and so happy that my host was Simona. 
She was so friendly, warming, caring that I had a feeling she's my friend for years! The room is so cute, the terrace and view so beautiful that you just wish to stay there for hours! Much prettier than on the photo...
Most of the time I've spend sightseeing Barcelona and one night Simona and her friend Caterina took me out and we had so much fun! She was always there to help me and give me tips about the metro or places in that magic town.
And my last night we spend on the beautiful terrace, had great conversation while drinking vine - and I felt like home thanks to her.
One thing is for sure - she became a friend of mine and I'll keep on coming back to her charming, warm place!
Barcelona & Simona - see you soon and thanks for everything!
Simona is truly the most welcoming host I have had using airbnb! Her place is great. The location is very close to the metro and the room was exactly like the pictures. The terrace is great!
Good overall experience with airbnb.
un esperienza meravigliosa con una grande Host. Disponibile, carina, sempre pronta a dare informazioni e consigli. La suggerisco a chiunque.

The best location, magical terrace and very good vibes penthouse for a authentic Barcelona experience!

Highly recomended

Fantastic location and surrounding and amazing host! Very clean! 
Thanks Simona

I enjoyed staying at Simona's place very much. She welcomed me warmly and gave me usefull information about the city. The appartment is really nice and everything was perfectly clean. I also liked the location very much. I would always stay there again.
War alles wie geplant alles super gelaufen
The accommodation corresponded 100% to the discription. Nice reception, valuable advice including city maps and really beautiful area.

Simona is one of the friendliest people I've ever met, and ever the gracious host! The room was absolutely lovely, and definitely perfect for one person traveling. The view from the balcony was also astounding. I'd recommend this room to anyone looking for a great place to stay in Barcelona.

Simona was a great host. She had a lot of helpful tips for things to do and places to see. The flat was comfortable and I had access to the kitchen if I wanted to make something. The best part was the private entrance to the terrace where you had a nice view of the neighborhood skyline. Also, the location is great. I would stay here again.

Simona's home was wonderful! Great location with a fabulous back deck. Very friendly neighborhood with easy walking access all around the city. While Simona was not able to be there during my stay, she was very accommodating and made sure I was comfortable and was able to talk when/if I needed her!
Simona was an absolutely wonderful hostess, as open and caring as any can be.

Simonas place was perfect. I really enjoyed staying there.
She is a very warm, open and friendly person and made me feel home.
Even my booking was super short notice, everything worked out very well.
The location is perfect, the room nice and the terrasse lovely. The whole place has a very homy and comfortable flair. I would definitly like to go back.

I'm very happy with the stay. I got informed well about everything nessesary. The flat was lovely bright and clean. As described access to the big terrass and very great location, close to the center but also the area itself has lots of cozy local cafes etc. I would recommend Simonas flat.

My favorite stay so far, great location, fantastic terrace and friendly (Hidden by Airbnb) . Simone even invited me to join dinner with her friends and she is a fantastic cook! :) Going to stay there again :)

Simona was very friendly and welcoming, her flat is even nicer than in the pictures, room was comfortable and clean, and terrace is also lovely. 

The location is perfect, walking distance from main attractions, restaurants, bars.... In general a great place to stay if you are looking for a real Barcelona experience :)

Me gusto su sobre ático, las fotografías no le hacen justicia, ella siempre fue muy amable y me dio muy buenos consejos de que hacer y a donde ir.

Sin duda alguna volveria a ir.

Beautiful apartment. Very comfortable room and extremely clean. 
Simona made me feel right at home from the start. Such an amazing person! Also very knowledgeable about the city and will give you advice on whatever your preferred activities are. The apt is close to everything and in a perfect location. 
I definitely recommend this gem!

Simona and her place are both amazing! Such a cozy little nest, and that terrace off the room is to die for. Everything was clean and cheerfully decorated, and meeting Simona herself felt just like seeing an old friend. She really took her time to make recommendations around the city. When I mentioned I was thinking about getting a massage after tweaking my back and ankle, she arranged for an appointment with a friend (a professional, obvs) at a great rate. I also found the location very convenient- the neighborhood was interesting and charming, with a ton of delicious food options nearby, and was a quick trot down to La Rambla. I'd stay with Simona again in a heartbeat.

I simply loved staying with Simona! The apartment is really easy to find, conveniently located and looks exactly as it does in the photos. Simona is an excellent host, very welcoming and really knowledgable about the city. You will not find a better place to stay in Barcelona for this price. I highly recommend staying here if you visit Barcelona.

Hey there!

My stay at Simona's was simply magnificent.
It was easy to find the flat, the neighbourhood is great, and close to everything without being crowded by silly tourists.
From the moment I said hello to Simona, and got the introduction to the flat, and an amazing amount of information and recommendations to what to do on my stay, it felt like I was a roommate and not an airbnb guest. Simona is simply great, open, sociable, helpful, openminded and overall the best host you can find by a longshot in my experience, only good things to say.

When it comes to the flat itself (I lived in the single room), it's great, it has a chill vibe to it, great terrace, great view, very clean, artistic deciration, and everything worked as it should, again there is not a bad thing to say. It felt luxurious for the price, and I would recommend Simona and her flat, so if you are considering to stay, consider no more, and click that "Book now" button.

It goes without saying that you will get the perfect Barcelona experience from this location, best host ever, and overall lovely flat.

10/10 would book again, again and again :-D 

- Henrik (From Denmark)

Simona is a wonderful host. From the very beginning I had a feeling that I am staying at my friend's home. We didn't have much time to talk (I was always somewhere in the city) but when we met each other she tried her best to give me any information and help concerning my stay. Thank you! I hope to come back:)

I would highly recommend this place when visiting Barcelona. It is an ideal location for anyone who wants close accessibility to the Ramblas/Placa de Catalunya, and El Raval/Gothic quarters, yet still be able to enjoy the local life here in Barcelona.  As well, it is very well situated near the metro and bus station. Simona as a host is very warm and welcoming making both her place and Barcelona a great place to vacation.

I spend 3 nights at Simonas apartament and I will definitely come back! Simona is such a nice and helpful host, what made my stay really amazing. The room and especially the huge terrace with a great view over the city were incredible. The total flat is really clean, nice decorated and really great located! 
Simona, thank you for the great time!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

으음, 첫 날 메트로를 타고 예정시간보단 늦게 도착했습니다 짬짬히 변경 메세지를 했습니다 
시설과 룰 설명을 하는데 친절하긴 한데 숨을 몰아쉬며 피곤해하더군요...
다른 룰이 또 있냐 물었더니 문단속만 잘하면 된다더군요

다음날 아침, 드럼세탁기를 쓰려는데
호스트가 아직 깨어있지 않은 관계로
사용방법을 몰라 임의대로 사용했는데
깨어나서 보고는 잘못된 버튼 누르고 사용했는지
"넌 모든 전자기기를 내게 묻지 않고는 사용할 수 없다"라고 두세번 언성 높여말하고는 화를 내더군요........이게 무슨

좀 더 좋게 말할수도 있었을텐데
제가 무슨 이사람 자식도 아니고(...)
이때부터 기분이 상했는데, 컵을 씻고 있으려니 또 주방세제 썼는지 안 썼는지 체크하더군요....

여기서 끝나지 않고 마지막밤에 피곤해
저녁 6시쯤 돌아와 한숨 자고 분수쇼를 보러
돌아왔더니, 호스트가 남자친구와 크게 음악을 틀어두고 시끄럽게 있더군요 인기척을 했더니 미안하다며 볼륨 줄이겠다더니 그대로였고 그 남자친구는 하루종일 팬티바람였습니다
마냥 편하진 않지요.. 
여러모로 불쾌했던 관계로 바르셀로나에서의 기억이 반은 나빠요 별 두 개도 아깝습니다
내가 왜 돈 쓰면서 이런델 묵었는지.........

비추합니다

Logement conforme à la description et très bien placé. Simona n'était pas là pendant mon séjour mais tout a été fait pour m'accueillir au mieux. 
Super séjour. Rendez-vous une prochaine fois pour pouvoir se rencontrer !

Sehr schönes Zimmer mit Terrasse und tollem Blick über Barcelona in super Lage, das meiste ist zu Fuß erreichbar und zwei Metro-Linien sorgen dafür, dass man auch schnell in den entfernteren Ecken der Stadt ist. 
Simona ist eine sehr herzliche Gastgeberin, bei der man sich einfach wohlfühlt. :-)

A unique apartment positioned in a convenient location. The place has so much character and feels very bright and airy. The rooftop terrace is a joy to have breakfast on in the morning with an awesome sunrise and sunset to take in. There are plenty of shops and cafes within walking distance and a gym right round the corner. Simone is a very attentive and helpful host who you feel instantly comfortable around.

I spent 2 weeks at Simona's apartment and had a great time throughout my entire stay. The communication was perfect from the moment I booked the room. Simona called me to make sure I had all the information I needed and to confirm the time of my arrival (which was quite late). However, she welcomed me warmly, showed me around the apartment and gave me advice on grocery shopping (there is a good supermarket 100 meters away), sightseeing and so forth. 
The apartment was always very clean and the atmosphere friendly. I had my personal shelves in the kitchen as well as in the fridge and was always able to use  a the kitchen. It's definitely possible to chat to Simona when she is around but if you prefer your privacy you can close your door and no-one will bother you. 
A big plus is the access to a private corner of the terrace from the room itself. It's sunny there in morning which is just perfect for having breakfast outside.
Also, the apartment is in walking distance to the centre (10 min) as well as the beach (30 min) or if you prefer, it's just a short metro ride away.
Overall, I was more than happy with my choice and would recommend Simona's apartment 100%!

Stayed in the single room which has direct access to the most amazing rooftop terrace. Perfect for morning coffee, and sunset drinks. Simona was such a great host and gave me great food and wine recommendations. Great neighbourhood close to Apolo nightclub and lots of great local tapas joints. Super close walk to Metro. A wonderful week in Barcelona was made better by staying here. Highly recommend this room for solo travellers. Apartment also has a double room with access to its own private terrace.

Simona's apartment is a dreamy bohemian bungalow. I very much enjoyed sitting with a glass of wine or coffee on the terrace overlooking the Barcelona sky. Every night there was a beautiful sunset. Simona was the perfect host. She gave me a list of great live music venues and we even went out together one night! She was communicative and such a joy to talk to! I will definitely return.
Excellent terrace! Excellent location. Very clean.  Simona is a great host.

Simona was wonderful to stay with and I would come back again. This was my first real experience with Airbnb and it exceeded my expectations. She was so accommodating, helped me with transportation, directions, and top places to see or go. She wasn't home the day I flew in but she even made special plans for her friend to meet me at the metro to walk me to her flat! I had a wonderful time and a lot of that was due to Simona and her place.
My first Airbnb experience and it was great. It was nice with a good view of the city from the balcony. Simona was very nice and you could come and go as you pleased.

Top Lage, super Erreichbarkeit mit der Metro, ich hab mich auch als allein reisende Frau immer sicher gefühlt. Saubere und wohnliche Unterkunft, tolles Bad. Sehr freundliche Gastgeberin, die mit Tipps und Rat immer zur Seite stand. Habe mich sehr wohl gefühlt.

Eine Wohnung in perfekter Lage mit einer sehr sympathischen und herzlichen Gastgeberin. 
Das Zimmer war für eine Person ausreichend und mit allen wichtigen Dingen ausgestattet. Besonders gefallen hat mir der eigene Terrassenbereich  der direkt vom Zimmer aus zugänglich war.

Ich habe den Aufenthalt bei Simona sehr genossen. Die Wohnung ist super gut gelegen, nur wenige Meter von der Metro-Station "El Paral-el" entfernt. Besonders gefallen hat mir der direkte Zugang zur chilligen Dachterrasse von meinem Zimmer aus. Simona selbst war in der Zeit meines Aufenthalts leider nicht anwesend, sie war aber trotzdem jederzeit für mich erreichbar, was ich sehr zu schätzen wusste.

Simona's place is really unique. You get your own space on a terrace that over looks the city, it's so beautiful especially at sunset. Simona is really friendly and gives you a map and run down of the whole city. She was very helpful helping me figure out all the places I should go. Really cool apartment, I highly recommend!

I genuinely enjoyed staying at Simona’s place. The kitchen has everything you need and the supermarket is just a few steps away. It’s also very close to the metro station AND the funicular up to Montjuic, a beautiful park. Simona is a great host and is super friendly. The terrace is where I enjoyed coffee everyday.
very open and humane host yet respectful of the guest's privacy
All the other reviews were accurate...I had a great experience staying with Simona.

name: Chambre privée dans joli logement typique Montréal
summary: Chambre de taille correcte dans un grand et joli logement typiquement montréalais, habité par 2 couples dans la trentaine.  Nous proposons une chambre sans fenêtre avec une grande penderie.  Le logement est proche d' épiceries, station de métro Beaubien (2 minutes à pieds) et de bus, dépanneurs, restaurants, bars, magasins, parcs Laurier et Jarry, marché Jean Talon (10 minutes à pieds), Plaza St-Hubert. Vous apprécierez le logement pour le quartier, la luminosité, les hôtes, le confort.

reviews.comments: Place was really easy to find from the highway and super close to the metro station. Apartment is big and spacious, clean - very minimalist. Hosts were very nice and easy to get in contact with.

name: Beautiful Beach Hale 3bed/2bath, steps to beach
summary: Lovely 3 bedroom beach home, steps to the exquisite white sands of Waimanalo beach. Lush, lovely fenced yard, coconut trees and tropical flowers to enjoy. Large, fully equipped kitchen and dining bar. 2 bathrooms - master bath has large jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  Large dining room and living room.  Outdoor lanai,  gorgeous mountain views from bedrooms. Washer, dryer, carport, gated drive. Boogie boards, cooler, beach chairs and towels.  Tax ID W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
description: Lovely 3 bedroom beach home, steps to the exquisite white sands of Waimanalo beach. Lush, lovely fenced yard, coconut trees and tropical flowers to enjoy. Large, fully equipped kitchen and dining bar. 2 bathrooms - master bath has large jacuzzi tub and separate shower.  Large dining room and living room.  Outdoor lanai,  gorgeous mountain views from bedrooms. Washer, dryer, carport, gated drive. Boogie boards, cooler, beach chairs and towels.  Tax ID W (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) I am available by phone, text and email and I live just around the corner. Please let me know what you need to have a five-star stay. At the end of the block there is a co-op market, fabulous healthy food restaurant, and a McDonald’s. About 10 blocks away there is a 7-Eleven, Café, a small market and two other casual restaurants. We highly recommend getting a rental car. We do have great bus service on the island, but having a car gives the most flexibility and ease.  We are half hours drive from the airpo
neighborhood_overview: At the end of the block there is a co-op market, fabulous healthy food restaurant, and a McDonald’s. About 10 blocks away there is a 7-Eleven, Café, a small market and two other casual restaurants.
notes: The property is fenced and gated, please keep the gates closed when not in use. This is a residential neighborhood, the neighbors are not on vacation. Quiet time after 9 PM before 8 AM. Feel free to use Beach chairs, boogie boards, Cooler, and Beach toys. Please rinse sand off before storing.  There is an outdoor shower and available, please rinse out sand before showering inside. There is a washer and dryer and clothes line available for your use. Please shake sand from towels and clothes before laundering.
transit: We highly recommend getting a rental car. We do have great bus service on the island, but having a car gives the most flexibility and ease.  We are half hours drive from the airport, Pearl Harbor, and Waikiki.  There is great swimming snorkeling and body boarding here in Waimanalo, as well as Sea life Park and Chief’s luau. Sometimes the conditions are perfect for stand up paddle boarding, beginning surfing, and kayaking.
interaction: I am available by phone, text and email and I live just around the corner. Please let me know what you need to have a five-star stay.
house_rules: No unregistered guests without prior approval. Please rinse off sand in outdoor shower before showering indoors.  Please keep gates closed when not in use.  Residential neighborhood - quiet hours 9pm to 8am.  Please let me know if you need anything to make your stay fabulous!

host.host_about: I'm from Waimanalo, Hawai'i and love animals, children and travel. As a Superhost, I also am a great guest and will take good care of your home.

reviews.comments:
Conveniently located 30 seconds walking distance from the ocean! A few minute walk to an awesome healthy/vegan cafe!! Kitchen is well equipped! We ran out of coffee, so it was nice to have a McDonald's in walking distance. 

Very quiet and relaxing neighborhood. The entrance gate is also nice for privacy/security. This home has a modern (and large) kitchen. The ceilings are high vaulted. Ceiling fans and stand fan is very helpful during those hot days!

Loved the big, open concept kitchen, living and dining room. Master is very spacious and kitchen well equipped. The space is all on one level, and opens to the lanais and front yard, which was great for the young kids in our group. And of course the beach is only a few hundred yards away and is awesome!

Karin was a great host, she met us at check-in and was very friendly and kind. The house was beautiful, equipped with everything, and right by the beach. I would definitely recommend staying here for a nice and relaxing vacation!
Beautiful home in a great location. Just steps away from one of the most beautiful beaches in Hawaii!

Awesome location- was closer to the beach than I expected. The beach was family friendly but enough surf to keep us entertained. The house was clean and comfortable and perfect for our family of four. Karin was super easy to deal with and check in and out was a breeze. We can’t wait to come back.

The location can't be beat. Just a few steps away from a beach with clear water and white sands that's practically empty. The house is much bigger than the photos give it credit for. We had a great stay and Karin was very accommodating. Would definitely recommend.
앞의 바닷가도 너무 멋있고 집 분위기도 너무 좋았습니다. 바다 물놀이 도구도 많이 비치되어 있고, 모든 것이 완벽했습니다.감사합니다.

This is a wonderful home that gave our family an amazing get away.  While we are from Hawaii, escaping to waimanalo and the kalama beach house allowed us to spend the quality time with each other and our Children home from college.  The HUGE backyard was a favorite of our 5 year old son and we spent tons of time playing catch and running around.  The beach is a wonderful beach and gave us plenty of room for morning walks.  Mahalo for the instant responses and kind hospitality.  We will definitely return!!!

The perfect quiet location steps to the beach. A bit tight for a group of 6, but we enjoyed spending time in the front yard so much! Great communication and easy check-in/check-out. We used the kitchen a good deal. This is an easy house to feel right at home. Would definitely stay there again!

This house is charming and so close to an amazingly quiet beach. It fit a family of 5 very easily. The landscape was beautiful and peaceful to wake up to ocean sounds and birds that love the many trees in the yard. Would definitely stay here again.

The pictures do not do this place justice! We stayed here for my brother's wedding which was happening around 20 minutes away. We wanted to be further from the hustle and bustle and this was the perfect spot. My brother's wife is from the island and they spent most of their time coming to the beach that we were able to walk just steps to cause it's her favorite. As for the (Website hidden by Airbnb) spacious, quite and the grounds are beautiful. We utilized the full kitchen with cooking breakfasts every morning before walking to the beach. Loved being able to utilize the chairs, cooler, boogie boards and towels. Made it that much more fun. Wonderful stay!
Location is perfect. Quiet street, gated lawn for privacy but most important a 60-second walk to the beach!  Very responsive to all questions. A great host.

This location can not be beat! This beach house is literally steps from the nicest beach in Oahu. Even on a Sunday the beach is still very private compared to the mayhem in Waikiki. We will definitely go back again. Our host Karen was very attentive to our needs and even brought some of her horses down so my 8 year old could visit them. Such a nice touch!!

name: Excellent for the Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro
summary: Meu espaço é próximo ao Engenhão, metrô, Linha Amarela (20 min da Barra da Tijuca). Ao lado do Norte Shopping, perto de restaurantes, cinema, teatro. Você vai amar meu espaço por causa de a cama confortável, a área externa e o ambiente. Meu espaço é bom para famílias (com ou sem crianças).

name: Oceanfront Paradise Condo in Lahaina Towne
summary: Do you need a well-deserved break? Come experience our little piece of Hawaiian paradise! Our beautiful, recently-renovated oceanfront condo has everything you need for a perfect vacation in Lahaina, Maui. Right on the ocean, you can fall asleep listening to the sound of the waves, and awaken to see marine life, the island of Lanai and sailboats moored offshore.  Just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more.
space: This gorgeous condo features:  Fully-equipped custom kitchen with new refrigerator and microwave Spacious bedroom with new furniture, an energy efficient ceiling fan, new blackout shades and a king size bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Roomy bathroom with ample counter and storage space as well as a large tiled walk-in shower Comfortable living room with an energy efficient ceiling fan, new Averte window shades, a sizable couch and a queen size murphy bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Furnished lanai with new ceramic tile, a new railing and new sunshade All new luxury Coretec flooring throughout High speed wireless internet The most incredible ocean views in all of Maui Our fourth floor condo overlooks a lovely, heated pool which is just steps from the ocean, where you can snorkel and experience sea life at its best. Surrounding the pool are chaise lounges for relaxing in the sun, tables with umbrellas and chairs, and gas barbecues with picnic tables for dining outdoors by the w
description: Do you need a well-deserved break? Come experience our little piece of Hawaiian paradise! Our beautiful, recently-renovated oceanfront condo has everything you need for a perfect vacation in Lahaina, Maui. Right on the ocean, you can fall asleep listening to the sound of the waves, and awaken to see marine life, the island of Lanai and sailboats moored offshore.  Just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more. This gorgeous condo features:  Fully-equipped custom kitchen with new refrigerator and microwave Spacious bedroom with new furniture, an energy efficient ceiling fan, new blackout shades and a king size bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Roomy bathroom with ample counter and storage space as well as a large tiled walk-in shower Comfortable living room with an energy efficient ceiling fan, new Averte window shades, a sizable couch and a queen size murphy bed with Tempurpedic mattress topper Furnished
neighborhood_overview: Ideally situated just north of Lahaina town, the condo is within walking distance of a multitude of shops, restaurants, art galleries and more. The Cannery Mall is a 5 minute walk away, featuring Safeway, Longs, several shops and a food court. Just across the street from the mall is the highly acclaimed Old Lahaina Luau, and some of the best dining in West Maui. Stroll a few minutes past the Cannery Mall to Baby Beach for swimming and sunning. You won’t find a better location than this!
transit: Car rentals or shuttle service from Kahului Airport (OGG) Taxis galore all along Front Street Local buses pick up in front of Safeway and transport you anywhere on the island
access: Entire condo Outdoor Pool, BBQ and Gardens Free parking Free high-speed wireless internet
interaction: Always available by telephone, text or email On-island Management Company  ChasenRainbows
house_rules: - Rental rules and regulations will be emailed to prospective guests to be signed upon acceptance of terms.

host.host_about:
Aloha,
I love to do yoga, sail, kayak, walk and travel.  I have two gorgeous granddaughters who live in Vienna, Austria.  They love to visit our place in Lahaina. I have another grandchild on the way in San Francisco.
Though I am currently on a quest to see the world, my travels always bring me back to Maui, which is truly Paradise!
Kerry

reviews.comments: The condo was lovely and exactly as described. The location is unbeatable. Kerry made sure that checkin/checkout was very straightforward and made us feel very welcome.

Kerry's place was perfect for us! We loved the incredible ocean view, the pool for our 4 yr old (and us!), and the quiet community. From the condo, you can walk to to the beach, the grocery store, and a few restaurants. Downtown Lahaina is about one mile south. We appreciated the boogie boards, pool noodles, and beach chairs. Loved having the washer and drier in the unit, too. Very comfortable, convenient, and lovely! Kerry's place is a gem!

Kerry was a WONDERFUL host. She consistently responded to each message quickly and left us with everything we needed. Her condo is adorable, comfortable, clean, and well equiped.  We felt very lucky to have the opportunity to stay in such a beautiful place in paradise. Kerry's condo is literally right on the ocean! The sound of the waves, the sea turtles, the boats, island views, stars at night are just a  few things we enjoyed while staying in her Lahaina condo. We had everything we needed to relax and create wonderful memories in Maui!! 

Mahalo Kerry for sharing your place in paradise with us! We would love to return in the future and will recommend your condo to our loved ones!
Perfect Place in Lahaina, everything in walking distance, beautiful condo, well furnished, safe place, exciting view

Ideal location for the single female traveler!

I didn't even rent a car, took an economical shuttle (Robert's) from the airport and used the city bus (a couple blocks away) to get to other parts of the island. Max $4/day for unlimited bus rides and no parking hassles what-so-ever!  (Read reviews for car rental at OGG and you'll find another great reason for going car-free! Not recommended, however, if you wish to do inner island sight-seeing such as Haleakala or Road to Hana.) There is parking under the building.

Safeway is 2 blocks away and fabulous Baby Beach is a 10 minute walk. BTW, Baby Beach is spectacular. Easily the clearest water I've ever snorkeled in. Swim between circular coral outcroppings to see tropical fish and sea turtles. At low tide, wade out hundreds of yards and the water is not even waist high.  Kaanapali Beach - miles of sand, waves and tiki bars is just a half hour walk north or 12 minute bus ride. Easy to get to Black Rock for more superior snorkeling.

Comfortable Murphy bed in the living room lets you sleep to gentle breezes and the sound of the ocean. Nice (and very clean) pool area overlooking the ocean is the perfect spot to see sea turtles feeding at dawn and dusk. Very helpful manager on site who will take you out snorkeling, if you just ask.

Every appliance and amenity you need for a relaxing vacation.  Can't wait to go back!

An outstanding place to enjoy Maui! Spacious comfortable condo with a pool and an amazing waterfront view— including sea turtles, if you’re lucky. Located close to Lahaina town shops and restaurants, as well as Baby Beach. We got around easily  without a car. Would stay here again any time.

The condo is right on the water with ocean view everyday; all day. Honu(turtles) say good morning from balcony, almost every day. The beds are comfortable. The ice maker is perfect. Kitchen is fully functional. The ocean breeze all night is refreshing. No AC though. The distance to Old Lahaina is perfect! We went for breakfast, lunch and dinner without any problem. The washer and dryer helped to dry out our wet towels. I loved looking at Lanai every morning too as was my honeymooners island. Easy ferry over to Lanai too. Perfect for family of 3-4. Place perfect for sunsets too.
Great location,close to everything. Highly recommend. The pool is a bonus. My family had great time there.
Great views, great location to everything. Very cute condo. You’ll love the sound of the waves.

Thank you Kerry your place was fantastic! The location was great the amenities were wonderful and the view was unbeatable. Absolutely will stay here again when we come back to Maui! Cannot thank you enough!
What a great place! The view is amazing. We spent our days watching the sea turtles, dolphins and lots of whales. You are practically on the water-probably one of the best views on the island.

name: Penthouse Sands of Kahana Sandy Swimmable Beach
summary: Price includes nightly rate & 14.42% tax.  Our fully remodeled 9th floor Penthouse unit offers the most amazing views.  The entire front of the condo is windows offering you a fantastic view of beautiful Pacific Ocean, Molokai & Lana'i.  Perfect location for watching beautiful sunsets, see our resident sea turtles & an excellent place for spotting whales during the whale migration season. This spacious two level 3 bedroom and 3 full bath Penthouse unit has over 2,050 sq ft of living space w/ AC.
space: **Less than 4 nights available as fill in dates, send inquiry with dates** Overview of our Fantastic Amenities: 9th Floor Penthouse 2,050 square feet 3 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms      2 lanais Sleeping for 9  (base price for 8, additional $25 per night for 9th person)Fully remodeled throughout A/C in EVERY room & individually controlled -Washer & Dryer in unit -Beach Chairs, Boogie Boards, Cooler, Beach Towels & Misc.
