Beach Toys -Kitchen Extras Includes:   *Blender *Juicer   *Rice Cooker *Toast
neighborhood_overview: Want to golf, go 5 minutes in either direction to reach premier golf courses.  Looking to go shopping?  The quaint town of Lahaina is just 10 minutes away or Kaanapali is 5 minutes away which has the famed Whalers Village.
notes: Sands of Kahana is located in a great location to take day trips or play golf.  We are within walking distance to a couple restaurants (Miso Phat, Dollies, Maui Brewery and McDonalds)  coffee house, 2 convenience stores, a dive shop  and bank.  We also have an onsite restaurant overlooking the pool and beach.
transit: There is plenty of parking at the unit.  Or if you don't wish to rent a car, there is a public bus stop in front of the unit and the front desk is able to provide you with a bus schedule.
access: Whole condo and all of the outdoor amenities that Sands of Kahana has available.  This includes the 2 pools, spa, tennis courts, basketball courts, beach volleyball and 2 gyms.
interaction: As your host I will be available via phone for any questions or concerns.  I am always happy to answer any questions or give assistance prior to your arrival.
house_rules: Resort fee of $75 collected by front desk at time of check in.  One time fee. - Rates are for 6 guests.  An additional $25 per night per person for up to 2 more guests. - Resort Quiet Hours 10:00 p.m. - 8:00 a.m. - No smoking on the lanai or in unit per Hawaii state law

host.host_about: My husband and I are Real Estate Investors.  We enjoy traveling and no matter where we go, we always find ourselves looking at properties.  Since we still have school age children I have found that a beach vacation is usually the most enjoyable for everyone.  Living on the West Coast, Hawaii continued to be a place that we would return to time and time again.

reviews.comments:
We have just returned from a fabulous holiday at Cynthia's condo on Maui. Everything was fantastic. From the moment we booked Cynthia could not have been more helpful with everything and was always ready and willing to answer all of our queries. Cynthia provided us with an extensive list of recommendations for our stay on Maui and we were not disappointed. The condo is located in a quiet but convenient neighbourhood and close to many amenities. We found the condo extremely spacious and it accommodated our party of 3 adults and two teenaged children with no problem at all. Cynthia's condo is the penthouse and is set right on the beach so we were treated to gorgeous Hawaiian sunsets every night, as well as being able to see turtles and whales from our balcony. The condo is beautifully presented and very well equipped - we could not have asked for anything more for our nine day stay. 
Mahalo Cynthia
The location was great and the view was incredible! You are right on the beach and it is a great place for families with kids. Highly recommend staying here!

This place was beyond my expectations. There were no hidden surprises. Knew exactly what to expect, and Cynthia was always there to answer any quesions. The view is spectacular. Beautiful location. I highly recommend this place.
Very nice location with good beach. Penthouse is nice sized and comfortable. Amenities are good. Location is very good with close proximity to Lahaina and Kapalua.

If you want a one-stop, stress-free vacation, in a beautiful location with all the amenities you need....this is it!  We lucked out with perfect weather too.  Cynthia provides basic amenities, pool towels, bookie boards, snorkeling gear, and the comfort of being in a cozy home.  It was really easy to run up to the Condo for my 9-month old nap times or a quick snack, without being too separated from the family.  The onsite pools, restaurant and of course restaurant/bar became our home bases for the week.  Miso Phat Sushi (across the street) and Maui Brewing were awesome near-by/within walking distance restaurants.  My family and I can't stop bragging about our trip and what a wonderful family/group set-up this Condo is!  We recommend renting a car due to the distance from the airport, but the Condo/Resort has onsite parking.

Such a beautiful location in Paradise! The amazing balconies provided us with gathering spots for our morning coffee to watch the whales and gorgeous sunsets each evening. During our week long stay, we decided to visit Costco, the local fish market and the farmers market and ate 4 dinners in the condo.  The kitchen has everything you need, and the barbques downstairs were perfect for grilling.  Cynthia left us plenty of information for dining in the vicinity, so we had 3 nice dinners out. The guide she sent us before our visit was very informative and helped us to plan our outings while in Maui. Cynthia also checked in with us during our visit, making sure we had everything we needed. We are already planning a return visit to #391 at the Sands of Kahana in the near future!

We had such a great time at Cynthia's condo.  Everything was sparkling clean. The check in and check out were seamless.  We loved that the condo came with some beach gear for our use (snorkels, boogie boards, water shoes...).  The views from the balconies are outstanding.  There is a nice and swimmable beach right downstairs, as well as a volleyball court and a casual restaurant. Great location with easy access to beach rentals, groceries, and anything else you might need during your stay.  Cynthia was very quick to respond to any questions we had. Loved the place! Would definitely stay again.

This place was incredible. From the views to the thoughtfulness in everything in the condo. While climbing nine flights of stairs during an unexpected elevator renovation (that ends in May!) does not sound fun, it was actually not bad at all for the adults in our party, as well as the 3 sub-8 year old children, and allowed us to think we were earning all the delicious calories we ate and drank.

I cannot rave enough about the amenities that are incredibly family friendly, including a full sized high chair, travel crib, toddler (and big kid) friendly toys for both indoors and at the beach. Cynthia is very quick to respond to communication and is clear as to what she can provide as a host, as well as her expectation of guests. She was as incredible as her Kahana home was and we'd highly recommend this place for anyone, including those with small children.
This place is amazing. We will be back!

What an amazing place to stay with a spectacular view!! The beach out front is awesome and we saw turtles daily! Cynthia was great with communication and making our stay feel just like home. Hope to stay here again!!
Fantastic unit. Amazing sunsets.

Enjoyed our stay very much! The condo was clean, spacious and with all the amenities of a home away from home. Cynthia was very responsive, even checking up on us when the tropical storm warnings went out. Thankfully, the storm didn’t dampen our stay. Enjoyed many beautiful Maui sunsets from the home!

The place has amazing ocean views!!! Cynthia provided beach chairs, gears, and toys for the kids. The entire condo is well organized and our family had such a great time. Appreciate all the little touches you provided for your guests. Will definitely stay there again when we return on Maui! :)

This condo was very spacious.  We had eight people (ages 5-85) and there was plenty of space for everyone.  Cynthia was readily accessible if we needed anything.  The view from the lanai was breathtaking and we watched whales every morning.  The condo was stocked with plenty of snorkel gear, boogie boards, beach chairs, sand toys for the kids, board games, puzzles, etc.  The kitchen had plenty of pots, pans, dishes, utensils, etc.  Thanks for the great stay!
Very clean. Cleanest Airbnb we have stayed at. Beautiful home and beautiful view of the sunset from the apartment. Loved that they had binoculars to see the whales jumping out in the distance.

If you are wanting a beautiful place right on the beach when you visit Kaanapali with your family , then this is the place for you ! Gorgeous full ocean view from the large deck ,large spacious rooms, super clean, lots of extras and great communication with Cynthia! We came here with our 3 adult kids and their spouses and loved everything about this place .. well stocked kitchen , lots of towels, beach toys (boogie boards were a hit ) comfortable beds ..and then there is outside !  Beautiful clean beach right outfront, nice pool and grounds , very helpful staff and amenities close by ... we watched whales and turtles right from our beach and deck, amazing !! This condo made our trip to Maui a real treat ..chose Cynthia's condo , you will not be disappointed !!

I cannot say enough good things about this condo. There was more than enough space for my friends and I to spread out. Each room was beautifully decorated. the bathrooms we're impeccably remodeled, I even took inspiration pictures! Cynthia thought of everything to make this a home away from home. AC was in every room, but with the trade winds, we never needed it. Don't hesitate, book this place now!!!

name: Entire Spacious Artist Apartment
summary: The apartment is spacious with lots of light, it's filled with my own art and it has a very warm creative energy. My home is  is close to Rite Aids, Starbucks, Chipotle, just a few blocks away from the 1, A and C Trains (You can be in Times Square in 25 mins) Several cheap places where to get groceries around the area. Good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.  You will have the entire apartment to yourself.   I hope you love it as much as I and my friends do!
space: Cozy and luminous apartment in Washington Heights. The area is very safe and only 25 minutes to times square. The A C and 1 trains are nearby and you have tons of places where you can get food and anything you might need. If you want more people to stay just let me know. We can arrange that... the place is big so it can be fixed with air mattresses.

If I am not available in person I can be contacted by phone or email. My
neighborhood_overview: Washington heights. Very family oriented, it's so quiet that you feel like you're on top of a mountain alone... except for Fridays when they play music until 12 at night.
notes: The apartment is on the 4th floor and it's a walk up.
transit: An uber pool anywhere can be 15-20 bucks, you have many trains that you can take you basically anywhere.
access: You have access to the whole space. I leave some drawers available for you to use.
interaction: If I am not available in person I can be contacted by phone or email. My assistant Nicholas is also in the city in case  you need him.
house_rules: - 4th floor walk up

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
Marco was great in communicating with us and welcoming us into his home.  He was great with accommodating our last minute needs. Once we arrived we asked for an air mattress, which he had available and provided for us.  He checked in periodically during our stay to make sure we didn't need anything further.  In short, he was the perfect host.

The apartment is fun, funky, and eclectic, and filled with his personal artwork, giving it a very one of a kind experience.  Loved the sun drenched dining area during the day.  Perfect place to enjoy a cup of coffee in the morning, or in my case work on my laptop all day.  And as a bonus the apartment is close to the subway station serving both the A express and the #1 local trains, making most locations in Midtown and lower in Manhattan very accessible. 

We would happily stay here again.

I had a great time staying at Marco's! Staying in Washington Heights was a really big plus too, the area had tons of good food and the people were welcoming. As far as the apartment it was everything I expected including art decked throughout the entire place. Marco was great at getting back to me really quickly which was awesome, made thing go smooth. I might have to return, thanks Marco!
It's a really cool place to stay! Subway is just few blocks away, nice room and good vibes. Love it

Without doubt this was one of my finest experiences ever travelling abroad and so much praise thanks and gratitude to Marco for his kindness his warmth and welcoming of me to his apartment which oozes artistry character and an eclectic atmosphere. The area is a walk away from the  subway and bus services making anywhere you desire a breeze to get to within minutes, and also a walk away to the  multitude of eateries cafes and the many stores . The neighborhood is colorful vibrant alive and scents new York charm and personality . Marco was the perfect host and is an amazing person  who takes immense pride in all  presentation and appearance of his  artist studio style Manhattan apartment was nothing less than spectacular!
If anyone is seeking a true new York experience then this is the ultimate experience . 
Marco from the bottom of my heart I can't thank you enough and look fwd to returning ....Soon !

Marco is very nice and response really fast. Place was very clean and has unique character. Only one thing we didn't like was it was on 5th floor (we had very heavy 2 carrier...but my husband carries all so I can't complain ~^^). we thought the area was not that safe but it was very safe. I was walking around until 1am but no issue at all. Also we found really great restaurant on Broadway. I think there are some good ones on Broadway. Try anchor wine bar. Was super good. Next time we come back, we will bring small carrier~~^^
I went there with my wife and we got enjoyed a unique New York experience thanks to Marco's flat. I'd definitely recommend it for people looking for something unusual and fun.
The apartment unfortunately smelled of urine
awesome location, super reaponsice host. great apartment and ameneties!
Marco's apartment was wonderful! It was close to the metro and close to a lot of delicious food! Marco was very helpful! I would definitely come back to this place.

Great lodging choice for those wanting to stay in Washington heights.  Both the 163rd street and 167 subways are close by. That helps a lot to navigate the west side and central west side of manhattan.  The apartment was super quiet allowing for a restful sleep.  Happy to  recommend this place!

name: Bed & Breakfast - Near the Maracanã
summary: My space is close to Saens Peña Square, Tijuca Mall, Metro Station, Maracana and Maracanãzinho. We are very close to the banks, major bus lines, pharmacies, supermarkets and gastronomic center of the Tijuca. I am available to talk about transportation, locations, local culture, leisure and anything more that you need.
space: The apartment is well decorated and comfortable. I appreciate the comfort and cleanliness of the same, so that way the environment is always nice to everyone. Room with double bed box, closet, fan, AC and blackout curtains. Living room with sofa, cable TV and wireless internet. Equipped kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, filtered water and utensils. Service area with washing machine and clothes line. The building is old, well preserved and has a lift.
description: My space is close to Saens Peña Square, Tijuca Mall, Metro Station, Maracana and Maracanãzinho. We are very close to the banks, major bus lines, pharmacies, supermarkets and gastronomic center of the Tijuca. I am available to talk about transportation, locations, local culture, leisure and anything more that you need. The apartment is well decorated and comfortable. I appreciate the comfort and cleanliness of the same, so that way the environment is always nice to everyone. Room with double bed box, closet, fan, AC and blackout curtains. Living room with sofa, cable TV and wireless internet. Equipped kitchen with refrigerator, microwave, filtered water and utensils. Service area with washing machine and clothes line. The building is old, well preserved and has a lift. Our guests can be free to use the living room, kitchen and laundry facilities. We remember that the bathroom of the house is the exclusive for guests. I will Always be available, 100% of the time to help you.  Even when i
neighborhood_overview: The Tijuca is one of the most affordable neighborhood that you could stay !!! It's close to everything! Both the City Centre as of the south zone beaches. Access to anywhere in the city is done preferably by metro, which is two blocks away.
notes: Exclusivamente no mês de agosto, a gatinha da minha neta ficará hospedada aqui. Porém a mesma ficará restrita a área do meu quarto, não tendo contato com os hóspedes.
transit: 15 minute walk to the Maracana and Maracanãzinho; 05 Minutes from the Metro Line 01 (red line - South Zone); 05 minutes of the main bus lines; Easy access for those coming from the airports and bus stations.
access: Our guests can be free to use the living room, kitchen and laundry facilities. We remember that the bathroom of the house is the exclusive for guests.
interaction: I will Always be available, 100% of the time to help you.  Even when i'm working. I Work from 8am to 18pm. But the guest can contact me during this period via messages and phone calls (as you prefer). And the guest can come and go any time he want and having complete freedom in the use of the apartment.
house_rules: - Respeitar a lei da silencio (22h); - Não fumar ou fazer uso de bebidas alcoolicas nas dependencias do apartamento; - Favor desligar as luzes e ar condicionado ao sair; -Não é permitido convidar pessoas para passar a noite. Caso deseje a reserva da outra pessoa deve ser efetuada previamente; - Se sujar, limpe; - Aproveite a cidade e divirta-se.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about: Obrigada você é muito gentil. Forte abraço.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Foi uma experiência muito boa. Pude ficar seguro e com conforto no Rio de Janeiro. O local é muito próximo ao Metrô, o que facilitou a locomoção pela cidade. O apartamento é igual as fotos. A anfitrião foi muito responsável, atenciosa e simpática, com certeza eu indicaria pra quem for visitar o RJ!

Conceição foi muita atenciosa e disponível, ficamos muito à vontade em sua casa ; que diga-se de passagem é um charme em decoração. O quarto e banheiro são ótimos e muito limpos.O apt fica muito próximo ao metrô e de fácil acesso! Ficamos com uma chave do apt durante nossa estadia! Deixamos o carro em um estacionamento muito próximo por 35 reais o dia! Voltaremos com certeza
A localização é excelente. Achei tudo ótimo, a Conceição é uma querida e muito organizada. Indico e com certeza se houver outra oportunidade, voltarei.

A dona Conceição se mostrou muito atenciosa e solicita, desde o nosso primeiro contato, nos deu informações precisas sobre transporte e alimentação. O apartamento é ótimo, com uma localização privilegiada, o quarto que ficamos estava muito limpo e organizado, a cama extremamente gostosa e aconchegante. Super recomendo!
A Conceição é muito simpática, me ajudou muito durante minha hospedagem. O local fica muito perto de metro, e a zona é segura.

PRA MIM FOI BEM TRANQUILO, FOI SOBMEDIDA.
NAO MUITO CARO, PERTO DE TUDO, (DIGO, BAIRRO COMERCIA).TAXI NA PORTA, MUITO AMIGO POR SINAL.
ENFIM, NADA A RECLAMAR.
EU INDICO.

I highly appreciate that my host took an extra effort on language barriers thanks for the resources of technology ( (Hidden by Airbnb) translator) that were able to communicate. 

Home is super clean and thr breakfast is great. A super duper host that makes you feel comforatble being in their home

Foi tudo perfeito. Conceição é uma ótima anfitriã e cuida muito bem de seu espaço, que é aconchegante e prático. A região onde está localizado o apartamento é movimentada e repleta de estabelecimentos comerciais que ficam abertos até a noite, bem como pontos de acesso ao transporte público.

Adorei a experiência da Airbnb. Conceição é  uma anfitriã muito gentil e acolhedora. Casa linda e confortável. Lugar muito bem localizado. Próximo do Maracanã e fácil  acesso para outros lugares da cidade. Recomendo!
Excelente estadia. Obrigada novamente, Conceição!

The room/condo is great, and Mrs. Conceicao is an amazing woman, very professional, hospitable and friendly. It was a privilege to be hosted by her.  Look forward to staying there more times in the future.

Foi uma experiência excelente! O quarto é exatamente como descrito, muito confortável e supre as necessidades de quem vai passar alguns dias no Rio de Janeiro. A Conceição é uma ótima anfitriã, muito solícita, hospitaleira, gentil, de bom papo, auxiliando no que for preciso. 
Espero voltar numa próxima oportunidade. Recomendo este local a todos!

Pessoa discreta e muito simpatica. Local limpo, organizado e me deixou bem a vontade. Quarto com cama de casal, armario e ar condicionado.Apto no centro comercial completo. Bairro relativamente tranquilo a noite. Boa segurança. Bairro de classe media. Voltarei com certeza !!
A Conceição me tecebeu muito bem, apartamento limpo, bem localizado, confirtavel, alem do cafe da manha na cia dela, recheado de boas histórias!

Um apartamento muito aconchegante, próximo ao metrô, bares e restaurantes. A anfitriã é uma excelente pessoa, atenciosa e aberta a conversas. Fiquei pouco tempo mas gostei muito da experiência. Recomendo!!!

Conceição is a really helpful and kind lady, she helped us with what we needed, gave us advice on where to go and what to bear in mind when traveling and exploring Rio de Janeiro. It was a pleasant stay, the place is close to the metro station, restaurants and stores and an alley with flower stores. 
The breakfast at her place is nice, great opportunity to talk and exchange life experiences :) 
We really enjoyed staying at her place and would stay there again!

Conceição fue atenta con nosotras y siempre dispuesta a darnos instrucciones sobre la ciudad. 
Su departamento es lindo, siempre limpio y ubicado en una zona de clase media con muchos puestos a su alrededor, lo que lo hacen seguro (siempre hay gente por ahí).
Lo mejor es que está a menos de 200m del metro, y con este se llegan a las playas en 30 minutos
O apartamento da Conceição tem uma ótima localização, é limpo e muito organizado. Além disso, ela é bastante solicita.

Fique cinco dias na casa da Dona Conceição e foi ótimo! A localização é boa, próximo a mercado, shopping, lanchonetes, ponto de ônibus e metrô. O apartamento é limpo e bem organizado. A dona Conceição pode parecer meio brava no início mas é uma querida! Sempre preocupada com o meu conforto e me fazendo sentir a vontade! Adorei a estadia e recomendo!
A estádia foi ótima, tudo muito limpo e organizado. Conceição é uma ótima pessoa e nos tratou super bem.

A Conceição é uma excelente anfitriã. Muito comunicativa, simpática e sempre disposta a ajudar. O apartamento é muito gostoso, limpo e aconchegante. Ótima localização, próximo ao metrô, shopping, bares e bastante seguro.
Fomos muito bem recebidos e com certeza voltaremos.
Excelente departamento, nos sentimos muy cómodos estando aquí y la señora Concepcion un amor de persona :)
Tivemos uma boa estadia.
A Conceição é como uma mãe! Me deixou a vontade além de ser super comunicativa e de bom coração! Como boa carioca da gema, tem dicas ótimas de turismo. O apto é lindo, super caprichoso. Recomento mt
Muito satisfeito

Só posso falar o melhor de Dona Conceição, uma pessoa incrível, uma anfitriã da melhor qualidade, extremamente educada, cuidadosa, uma mãezona, sem falar que o apartamento é muito lindo.
Mega recomendo.
Bom, vou ser muito sucinto, se eu pudesse, EU MORARIA com a Conceição, pessoa da melhor qualidade, me apaixonei, ganhei uma super amiga.
A dona Conceição é bem acolhedora, calorosa e receptiva. Eu e meu namorado nos sentimos em casa. A ducha do banheiro é maravilhosa. Pontos extras para esse item, principalmente após um dia de praia.

Dona Conceição é uma ótima anfitriã. Trocamos muitas ideias e experiências e sua sabedoria e objetividade são bastante admiráveis. O apto é um pouco quente, mas no verão do Rio é impossível não ser e, de qualquer forma o quarto tem o ar que funciona muito bem. Fizemos algumas refeições juntas e Dona Conceição sempre fazia questão de complementar meu prato com alguma coisa (ela faz uma abobrinha deliciosa na frigideira). Senti a cama um pouco incômoda, mas nada demais. O quarto e o banheiro têm espaços bons e atendem muito bem uma pessoa para alguns dias.
Dona Conceicao é uma pessoa excelente, o quarto bem arrumadinho, e um banheiro só para o hóspede.
房子是给朋友订的,订了两天我朋友只住了一天｡房东很好,就是我朋友说有 (Hidden by Airbnb) 咬她
Bairro central.

Foi tudo perfeito. As fotos e as informações estão de acordo com o anúncio, consegui me comunicar com a Conceição sempre que precisei, fui tratada super bem, o quarto é confortável, a  casa limpa e organizada. Recomendo a estadia no ap da Conceição. O benefício supera o custo.
Ambiente agradavel!!! Otima localizacão!!!

Concepción es una persona muy preparada para recibir y dejar felices y contentos a sus huéspedes tanto en la preparación que tiene en su modo de ser y de actuar cultura un apartamento bonito y moderno encantador así como lo decía ya lo aconsejo muchísimo para las personas que quieran venir a Río de Janeiro tiene televisión tiene wi-fi tiene todo y es súper amable y atenta hasta el todos los puntos que se puedan decir le doy un 15 sobre 10 Muchas gracias Concepción
Oi, Conceição. Quero agradecer a sua excelente hospitalidade. Tudo perfeito!

A localização é maravilhosa!  e o apartamento tão bonito quanto nas fotos,  só indico como sugestão  ter no anúncio a informação de que o banheiro fica localizado na cozinha, um pouco distante do quarto, e quem sabe ser disponibilizado uma chave do quarto para o hóspede. No restante não tenho o que falar,  conversei bastante com a Conceição,  que me deu indicações precisas para eu me locomover pelo bairro e fico na torcida para que Deus ilumine muito o seu coração e traga a aprovação do seu neto.  Obrigada pela hospitalidade querida!
ótimo lugar e ótima anfitriã
Malhavilhosa! Uma senhorinha de bem com a vida, hospedagem confortável e limpa. Dona Conceição faz também um café muito bom, com certeza vale a pena se hospedar lá.
não tenho nada do que reclamar, foi  ótima experiência, TD estava perfeito! Dona Conceição é um amor.

name: Charming bedroom in the heart of Leblon
summary: Beautiful bedroom at Leblon Beach block, comfortable with bath and bed linen, very cozy. Private bathroom. Quick access to internet Wi-Fi, cable TV, air conditioning, double bed. Next to the best restaurants, bars, theatres, shopping malls and supermarkets.
space: Beach block, high quality bed and bath linen. Easy access to restaurants, bars, cafes, theaters, shopping, and juices shop. Sleeps comfortably 2 people.

A cozinha será disponibilizada para refeições como lanches e café da manhã somente. Teremos o maior prazer em recebê-los em nossa casa.

host.host_location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.host_about:
Viajar enriquece a alma e ilumina o coração!
Pessoa com predisposição a felicidade, amo a natureza, arte, animais,adoro interagir com as pessoas. Procuro trata-lás com respeito e carinho! Tendo como base o bom senso. Amo viajar!!! Procuro ser uma boa hóspede como também uma excelente anfitriã.

reviews.comments: Incrivel recepcao ! E otima limpeza ! A anfitria eh muito simpatica e agradavel! Vc fica separado do apartamento e tem toda a liberdade como se estivesse alugado nao so um quarto em um apartamento e sim um apartamento so para vc! Obrigada pela recepcao!

500 palavras não são nada perto do que é necessário para descrever o quão incrível foi ficar no Rio nessa visita. Confesso que estava com receio de utilizar o AirBnB por não saber como a pessoa que nos receberia seria, mas a Vanessa foi capaz de tornar essa experiência mais do que incrível... Isso pq fui para assistir os jogos nas Olimpíadas. Ela é uma pessoa extremamente educada, atenciosa, cuidadosa, divertida e receptiva. Uma anfitriã assim acho difícil ter igual! Elevou tão alto o nível de hospitalidade que tenho receio de pegar outro AirBnB e ficar frustrado por não ser (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltarei e recomendarei! Muito obrigado!!!
Adorei a temporada na casa da Vanessa. Ela é super prestativa! Ótima localização e limpeza impecável!!

O ponto é excelente, perto de tudo de melhor do Leblon e da praia. A anfitriã procura te receber da melhor maneira possível e te ajudar no que for preciso.Muito atenciosa e gentil e procurando te deixar bem a vontade. Local de fácil acesso e bem seguro.
Very nice roon, absolutely clean and with total privacy. Vanessa takes care of every details and also, she's very helpful with cool tips of places to go
The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Casa Alegre Happy House
summary: The house is located in the area of "Foz do Douro", that is, in the area where the Douro River meets the Atlantic Ocean... So from here you can easily reach the city centre (by tram or bus) and the beaches (by foot) of the Atlantic Ocean. The suite offers one private bathroom and private terrace in a fine-looking area, hope you like it. the breakfast is not included but a stylish and functional kitchenette with dishwasher, dishes, refrigerator, and all you need is available for you to cook.
space: Olá! Esta casa está localizada na Foz do Douro, onde o rio Douro encontra o Oceano Atlântico. Assim, a partir daqui é muito fácil alcançar o centro da cidade (de elétrico ou autocarro) ou as praias (a pé).  Na suite (que pode ver nas fotos) oferecemos uma casa de banho privada (com duche), terraço privado e kitchenette para preparar as suas refeições. A casa está localizada numa área muito bonita e tradicional da cidade do Porto.

reviews.comments: The host canceled my reservation 42 days before arrival.

both the location and hosts were wonderful. the rooftop balcony has an amazing view of the ocean which was nice to sun in and enjoy breakfast which sonia prepared. the apartment was comfortable and clean. they were extremely helpful and accommodating and i'd highly recommend staying in this part of the city!

The downstairs studio apartment was perfect for 1 person, with its own patio space outside.  And easy walk down to the beach at Foz, a small nearby store with everything you need, and bigger stores a 5-10 minute walk away.

The people living at casa alegre are wonderful and very nice. I stayed in the downstairs flat with Kitchen and and small bathroom. The flat is mostly clean and it is so pretty! The bus stop ist just around the corner and the ocean is only a few minutes walk away. It was nice staying there! The flat in the downstairs area has no door just some kind of paravent.

Hi, I'm Patrick, from Dublin, Ireland. I have just returned from 4 days in this beautiful home. It was my first Airbnb, and the experience exceeded my expectations. I refer to the high standard of accommodation in this handsome house on a narrow cobbled street. I also refer to the warmth and hospitality of my hosts. I was included in the household and also felt I was given my own private space too; best  of both worlds.
 I would recommend this home place to others. Treat  this home respectfully and you will likewise be treated warmly and respectfully too.
 
Thank you to my hosts, Anabela, Sonia and Casear.(sorry if, I've mis-spelt any names!)
 
Patrick

Je voulais remercier Sonia, pour la chambre mais aussi, Anabela et Caesar pour nous avoir accueilli. Notre hôtesse Anabela, nous donne envie de découvrir sa ville et son histoire.
La chambre est tout à fait correct et possède suffisamment de place pour 2 personnes, avec un patio très agréable. Située du coté des plages mais accès très rapide pour le centre-ville.
Porto est une ville à découvrir.

Nous remercions encore Sonia et Anabela et peut-être à une prochaine fois :).

Amazing week in Porto ! 

This appartment is just what every travellers is looking for : cosy, walking distance from the sea, buses facilities, nice area ... perfect ! 

Thank you to Sonia for all the help we received before we come. You've been really reactive to my questions and your tourist advices were most appreciated :) Too bad we didn't get to see you. Next time for sure ;) 

And Anabela, dear Anabela ! This week just felt like home ! You were so kind and we've spent very nice moments with you. Sorry we forgot the keys, they're on the way and you should have them by monday (I hope so!) 

Our favourites places: 
- Casa aberta : best croissants ever, and nice "shop" (try the Gingerbread tea!) 
- Casa Mariquinhas: the best place if you want to hear Fado (booking is necessary) 
- The Peter's, on the port, they do great mojitos 
- The Tram (restaurant) where we tried our first Francesinha
- The Library Lello & Irmao, every fan of Harry Potter has to go Inside
And I could go on like that a long time ^^ 

Thanks for everything 
We will be back ;-)

Julie & Sébastien

Everything was perfect for me: the situation close to place i had to be, this quarter in Porto is so cute, calm, the hosts were so nice (I met Annabella), the room, the patio, the decoration are really beautifull. I have a negative point, is that there's no door at the room, it's disagreeable when you go o sleep before them, or if you're need somme intimity if you're in couple.

Eventhough, I recommand this place!! : )
We have a wonderful stay, it's a small all in one room but decorated very nicely! Anabela was very helpful!

De verhuurder zelf was op studiereis maar haar plaatsvervangster, Anabela, was een hartelijke en gastvrije dame, die het ons graag naar de zin maakte. Wij werden getrakteerd op lekkernijen als wijn en fruit en kregen goede informatie over de omgeving.
Wij mochten zelfs gebruik maken van haar inpandige garage en zij stond fietsen en een windscherm voor het strand ter beschikking. 
Het appartement ligt in een oud Portugese wijk met smalle authentieke straatjes en  is handig gelegen dichtbij het goedkope openbaar vervoer naar het centrum van Porto (ca. 30 minuten) Het strand en de prachtige boulevard is op loopafstand.
Het appartement is niet hypermodern, maar voldeed aan onze eisen. Er was een leuke patio met druivenranken, een kitchenette, een douche en een prima bed. De wifi-verbinding was uitstekend.

Kortom een aanrader voor mensen die een strandvakantie en een bezoek aan de stad Porto willen combineren!
logement entier fonctionnel  rien ne manque  en plus  petites attentions de la maîtresse  de maison

We had a nice stay. The hosts are very nice and quick to respond. The place is as described, a downstairs studio with a usable kitchen and bathroom as well as a terrace. We found some thoughtful touches like chocolate and wine made us feel welcomed. Only thing is the noisy plumbing sometimes.

Sonia wasn’t there but the woman upstairs, anabela, was really sweet. A bottle of red wine and cherry sweets were there for us on the table as we arrived. The garden doesn’t have any sun this time of year but it was still nice to able to go outside and sit at the garden table. Porto was amazing! We would love to go back. And for me foz was the best place to be because the city centre can be quite busy. And so easy to reach. 

Thanks sonia and anabela!
Un studio clair, assez spacieux, agréablement décoré et meublé, donnant sur un petit patio lumineux. Le quartier est calme et pittoresque, l'accueil plus que sympathique. Je recommande à 100% !

This is by far the nicest and most thoughtfully designed airbnb I have ever stayed at. I am an experienced traveler and I can say with confidence that this place is truly exceptional, with  an amazing outdoor space, and wonderful artistic touches throughout. It was a pleasure to stay there, and the hosts were generous and very helpful during my visit to Foz. Wonderful!

Logement très calme et agréable dans un ancien quartier de pêcheurs très bien localisé : à deux pas du front de mer et à 30 minutes en bus du centre ville. Une vraie respiration. L'espace du studio est bien aménagé. Seul souci, il est en contre-bas de l'immeuble, donc en cas de météo pluvieuse : forte odeur d'humidité. L'accueil d'Anabela était très appréciable. Merci beaucoup pour ce petit tour de repérage en voiture qui nous a permis d'avoir une vision globale du quartier et les infos pratiques en quelques minutes. Très bonne communication avec Sonia par messagerie.

name: Perfect Apartment at Lapa, the bohemian region
summary: My apartment suits very well with couple, business travalers and families (with children). Some tourist attractions around the apartment: Rua do Lavradio, Cinelândia, Lapa Neighborhood, Sambodromo, Santa Tereza and Rio Downtown.  You will sure love the region because It is a very well located building, very central, and walk distance to subway station very close (Carioca) and is connected with the beaches through a large option of buses.  The building is very quiet .
space: Ofrecemos comodidad para hasta cuarto huespedes.  Una cama doble en el cuarto (con aire acondicionado) y un sofa-cama para otros dos huespedes en la sala.  Una cocina equipada con microondas, estufa eletrica (1 boca), mini nevera y todos los utensilios le da la posibilidad de cocinar y preparar pequenas meriendas en el apartamento.
description: My apartment suits very well with couple, business travalers and families (with children). Some tourist attractions around the apartment: Rua do Lavradio, Cinelândia, Lapa Neighborhood, Sambodromo, Santa Tereza and Rio Downtown.  You will sure love the region because It is a very well located building, very central, and walk distance to subway station very close (Carioca) and is connected with the beaches through a large option of buses.  The building is very quiet .

host.host_about: Silencioso apartamento amplamente arejado e com sol da manhã.  Área total de 40m² que acomoda 4 pessoas confortavelmente.  Dispõe de quarto, sala, cozinha e banheiro.  Cem por cento mobiliado com móveis Italínea (armários e escritório), frigobar, cooktop, microondas, depurador de ar, chuveiro, box com vidro temperado, mesa para quatro pessoas, sofá cama, cama de casal, ar condicionado, TV e escritório. Utensílios de cozinha e limpeza disponíveis além de roupa de cama, mesa e banho.  Prédio com serviço de lavanderia e portaria 24h. Estacionamento 24h pago (não incluso) a menos de 200 metros do apartamento.  Embaixada Americana a 15minutos a pé do apartamento e atrações turísticas como Sambódromo e Maracanã a menos de 20minutos de metrô. No coração da Lapa, o apartamento fica localizado próximo às principais atrações noturnas da região além de contar com um ponto final de ônibus que oferece linhas para Copacabana, Ipanema, Botafogo e Leblon. Além do mais, com 10 minutos de caminhada você chega na Estação Carioca de Metrô que te da acesso as demais regiões do Rio de Janeiro. Wifi grátis.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments: Anfitriã super bacana. Marilda sua gentileza e hospitalidade foram fundamentais. Muito agradecido por tudo. Os funcionários do prédio foram atenciosos e gentis, o aparatamento estava bem limpo e dentro do que estava descrito. Não temos do que reclamar e, se Deus permitir, em breve estaremos de volta.

The stay in this appartment was very comfortable, the flat was clean and we have found everything what we needed. The communication was perfect, even with doorman who does not speak any English :) The only little negative point was late check-in, so we needed to pay extra money if we wanted to come at early afternoon. But we knew it in advance, so everything was fully clear.

You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood, the ambiance, medium sized room (big enough to do yoga comfortably) . My place is good for solo adventurers, business travelers, and furry friends (pets).

It is usually never a problem since they work a lot but you will need to lightly coordinate with them.  - My roomate has a little dog named Sam! - We have Apple TV, A/C and a full kitchen you are more than welcome to use (provide your own groceries please)  - This neighborhood rocks.

No local, há estacionamento. O anfitrião estará disponível para ajudar os hóspedes. O local é bem servido por transporte público e totalmente acessível para táxi e Uber.

name: TPC - Antero Quental Residence - Amalia Apartment
summary: Set in a traditional centenary building, with Portuguese tiles, this second floor apartment, with one bedroom, offers a balcony with views of the back garden, right in the heart of Porto .  With an extremely good location, we provide our guests an excellent local staying in the center of Porto. Portugal Tourism number: 31508/AL
space: Near the Church of Lapa, right in the heart of Porto, it was completely renovated in 2016, respecting the original features and its history.  The property includes 7 modern furnished and fully equipped apartments. It has an unusual layout and modern furnishings, providing comfort for our guests. The bedroom has a double bed and the living area has one sofa bed, a dining table and a flat-screen cable TV. The bathroom comes with a shower and there is also an equipped kitchen with a washing machine.  All units include a fully equipped kitchen with Fridge, freezer, oven, stove, coffee machine, microwave, crockery and cutlery. The apartment also comes equipped with WIFI. Linen and towels are also provided. Please keep in mind that this is a second floor with no elevator.

All units include a fully equipped kitchen with Fridge, freezer, oven, stove, coffee machine, microwave, crockery and cutlery. The apartment also comes equipped with W
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood of Lapa is charming and ideal for those looking to stay overnight or live very close to the historical city center but also in a quiet place near the authentic side of Porto. In the center, near the metro station, at only 15 minutes walk from downtown but far from the prices, crowds and nocturnal confusion of the “Porto movida”, there are still some old ladies who go to church, the young, anxious and smiling or the grandfathers with their berets in the local cafes. Its most important era began with the construction of the Church of Lapa. Rococo and neoclassical building, the Church of Our Lady of Lapa began to be built in 1756 and finished in 1863. Beginning only with a Church, were added a College Seminary, a cemetery, and later, at the beginning of the twentieth century, a hospital. Inside the church, the pipe organ is one of its most impressive pieces, but one of the main attractions of the church is the heart of King Pedro IV, who, since 1837, has been inside an al
notes: Also I would like to inform that Portuguese immigration services, SEF, require that all non-portuguese guests fill a form with some personal details such as passport number, nationality, etc.. This form will be sent through a certified program or given to you on the check in.
transit: With a local supermarket just in the other side of the street, bakeries, restaurants, shops, and cafés can be found within walking distance. Located 20 minutes walk from Avenida dos Aliados and Torre dos Clérigos and 25 minutes from the Bolhao City Market.  It is nearby Faria Guimarães Metro Station, just a 5 minute walk away (400m), with easy access to all places of interest in Porto. Estádio do Dragão / F.C.Porto Stadium - 2,8 km (13 min de carro/ 13 min by car)  Aeroporto/Airport - 13 km (20 min de carro, 28 min de metro - linha E/ 20 min by car, 28 min by Metro - line E)
access: Guests have access to all the facilities of the apartments and a shared outdoor space where can sit and relax while enjoying the sun after their experience in Porto. Although there is street parking, at check in, you can request access to a nearby private parking (+/- 400m) with a 50% discount. (€ 7.5 / 24h). Guests staying more than 3 nights receive a free towel and linen change service. This service has to be requested upon check-in.
interaction: When you arrive you will be met by The Porto Concierge service that will receive you for check-in and share with you tips about where to find special places to eat, visit and have fun. The Porto Concierge Service will be 24/7 available for you during all your stay.

host.host_about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

reviews.comments:
Super appartement 
Très bien situé 
Très bon séjour
L'appartement est bien situé, rénové il y a peu et fonctionnel. Facile d'accéder aux principaux sites depuis celui-ci, quartier calme. Accueil sympathique et efficace.

DESASTROSA. Desde luego NUNCA repetiría una estancia en este apartamento. Reservamos un apartamento para 3 personas pero con capacidad máxima para 4 y una vez aquí solo teníamos ropa de cama y toallas para 2 personas, alegando que la reserva era para 1 huésped, (cabe destacar que el día de la reserva mandamos un (Hidden by Airbnb) para confirmar los datos, mensaje que no fue contestado por el apartamento). Nos dijeron que si queríamos ropa de cama y toallas tendríamos que pagar 20€ y serían llevadas al apartamento en 30minutos. Una vez pagado y dado el retraso con el que se nos entregaron las llaves (no debían esperar que en un fin de semana de Agosto hubiese gente porque el motivo del atraso fue exceso de entradas) decidimos dejar de perder el tiempo y dar una vuelta, esperando, tal y como dijo el chico que entregó las llaves que nos hubiesen llevado todo lo que faltaba a nuestra vuelta. Evidentemente esto no fue así , mandamos otro (Hidden by Airbnb) quejándonos de la situación, mensaje del que aún hoy esperamos respuesta. Por otro lado, la referencia céntrica del apartamento no es real, se encuentra en un barrio bastante cutre de la ciudad y para llegar al centro se debe caminar unos 30 minutos. Por último, con respecto al mensaje, probablemente automático, en el que te dicen que te darán toda la información que necesites a cerca de Oporto es otra falsa. Nosotros solicitamos información sobre un parking donde guardar el coche y el chico que vino no tuvo ni media idea de como indicarnos. La única reseña de Oporto que nos dio fue la de un buen restaurante que no apareció. En conclusión , creo que el comportamiento del apartamento ha sido INADMISIBLE y LAMENTABLE pues lo único que ha hecho ha sido robarnos 20€. HORRIBLE. We would never repit our visit to this apartment. We had booked one apartment for 3 people in one apartment witch maximun capacity was for 4 people and when we arrived , we only had towels and bed clothes for 2 people. The gay that gave as the keys told as that we made the reservation for 1 person and that if we wanted to have extra clothes we had to pay 20€. Althought we had sent a (Hidden by Airbnb) with the characteristics of our booked and they never answered it, we decided to pay and stopped loosing our time. We were going to have a walk around the city and someone would bring us what we paid. When we arrived in the night none had brought us the clothes and we sent them another (Hidden by Airbnb) with no answer. On the other hand, the apartment is a little bit far for city center, no in the heart of the city as they describe. At last but not least, the person who gives the keys has no idea of simple things like where to find a Car Park near the apartment. He only tourist información he gave us was The...

Appartement propre et cosy, similaire aux photos. 
Si jamais le wifi ne fonctionne pas, n'hésitez pas à débrancher et rebrancher le plug dans l'appartement (il fonctionne très bien dans les escaliers, un peu moins dans l'appartement)

Nous avons eu le plaisir de partager ce petit nid à 3 lors de notre séjour à Porto. L'appartement est ultra fonctionnel, propre, le petit balcon est superbe. Nous avons été accueillis comme de vrais clients d'hôtel... Je recommande sans hésiter.
Beautiful flat in the great area.

L'appartamento è esattamente come descritto, molto pulito ed accogliente. 
L'unico svantaggio della cosa è forse la gestione che essendo fatta da un'agenzia perde un po di autenticità, una delle cose che apprezzo di più di airbnb è un proprietario disponibile e che ha anche tempo di condividere qualche parola con i suoi host. 
In questo caso la gestione è sicuramente precisa ma molto frettolosa, molto più simile a quella di un ostello o di un hotel.  Nonostante questo consiglio l'appartamento!!

Annabela tres sympathique et accueillante avec de gentilles attentions pour notre arrivee. Tres bon emplacement pour nous car rue facile pour stationner et coeur de Porto a 20 min a pied. Quartier tres accueillant.
El apartamento está tal cual se ve en las fotos.

name: Cozy Room at TKL MTR
summary: 我的房源靠近優美的景色､公園､餐廳和餐飲､市中心｡因為舒適的床､廚房､溫馨,您一定會愛上我的房源｡我的房源適合情侶､獨自旅行的冒險家､商務旅行者｡
space: -This listing is the master bedroom of my 2 bedrooms 1 bathroom apartment. You will share the apartment with me. - Clean and big bathroom with tub. Kitchen is in decent size (by Hong Kong standard!:)) and you are welcomed to cook by yourself. Just remember to clean them afterwards. - Large living room. - Very high speed wireless internet. - 15 minutes walk to Junk Bay (Don't mislead by the name, it is a clean ,clear and beautiful bay)

Just remember to clean them afterwards. - Large living room. - Very high speed wireless internet. - 15 minutes walk to Junk Bay (Don't mislead by the name, it is a clean ,clear and beautiful bay) -You can access the common areas: i.e. bathroom ,living room and kitchen. And these areas are shared with me. -Free Gym is in the estate. 1 mins walk downstairs. Free access but please let me know in advance if you need it since it requires my ID to enter. - Paid Snooker, Badminton, Swimming Pool are also in the estate. All are less than 3 mins walk. I will give full privacy to my guest by default but I will be very happy to help and talk with guests when I am needed.  I can speak f
neighborhood_overview: -MTR: 8 minutes walk to Tiu Keng Leng MTR station. Half hour or less to Central , Admiralty, Wanchai ,Causeway Bay and Tsim Sha Tsui station. -Airport: 90 mins direct airport express bus route E22A (24 HK$) or 63 mins by MTR(71 HK$). - Never crowded and noisy. My neighborhood is one of only a few neighborhoods in Hong Kong that you don't see crowded peoples and heavy traffic on the roads.
notes: -The neighborhood can be a bit humid during the rainy season and winter in Hong Kong. Since this apartment is close to the shore, certain level of humidity is expected during such time. However there is dehumidifier in the room so this should not be a big concern unless you are sensitive to humidity. -Like most of other apartments in Hong Kong, balcony is always a luxury and is not included in this listing.
transit: Direct airport express bus to Hong Kong international airport. Easy access to MTR (subway system of Hong Kong)
access: -You can access the common areas: i.e. bathroom ,living room and kitchen. And these areas are shared with me. -Free Gym is in the estate. 1 mins walk downstairs. Free access but please let me know in advance if you need it since it requires my ID to enter. - Paid Snooker, Badminton, Swimming Pool are also in the estate. All are less than 3 mins walk.
interaction: I will give full privacy to my guest by default but I will be very happy to help and talk with guests when I am needed.  I can speak fluent Mandarin, English and Cantonese and I am a warm-hearted person willing to answer any question you may have at my best effort.

host.host_about:
Originally from China.Now working and living in Hong Kong. Enjoy climbing, hiking and travelling around the world. Speak fluent English and Cantonese, native Mandarin speaker.
I am a easygoing and humorous person to get along with. The experience of traveling around world has equiped me with a cross culture perspective and the personality easy to making friends.
I am more than happy to share with you about cultures and my living experience in Hong Kong and other major cities of China.

address.street: Hong Kong, New Territories, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
First of all, I would give Will a thumb up, who is very considerable and easygoing. He gave me clear instruction to find the location of his house even including the bus to take. 
The next thing is the location. It's in Sai Kung, so its near to some scenic spots like Wong Tai Sin Temple, the seaside park and HK Heritage Museum in Shatin.
And then the community. It's near the mtr, the gate is just the entrance to mtr. And it's safe, thanks to the guards, outsiders have no access to get in. The infrustructure is good and there are some entertainment facilities for the kids too.
Finally it comes to the apartment. You can just find it home there, yeah a sweet home, from the window you can have a sea view. The power adapter is available.
That's it, it's a place where you would like to live for a second time.

This surely is one of the best place to stay in HK. Full value for money. You get to stay at the sea front with a sea view from your room window. Location and apartment is great. Nicely kept, clean, tidy and with all the amenities you require as a traveller are already there (e.g. Room heater when outside temperature gets freezing cold). Not very far from Tie Keng Lang (TKL) MTR (subway) station. About 5 to 7 mins walk. Room partner Ning was very friendly and helpful. Also the Ocean shore apartments seem to be great society very well maintained, spotlessly clean and tidy. I will definitely miss my first ever stay in Hong Kong at this residence.

Will was an excellent host, who provided impeccable service. He picked me up at at the MRT station at the agreed time. He also helped me with some personal questions I had around the public transportation in HK. Furthermore he is a very sociable person and I enjoyed the conversation with him a lot. I will definitely stay again at his place when going back to HK.
Thanks for Will and roommate served a very good place and I sleep very warm and comfortable, hope next time I can stay longer.
a nice place for transfer, nice host.

I enjoyed staying in Will's apartment.  He met me at the MTR station to take me to the apartment, which is less than a 10-minute walk.
The room is quite small (as anticipated and as might b e expected in Hong Kong), but since I was by myself I was able to manage satisfactorily.
At the apartment, I could use the bathroom, kitchen and living room, which was convenient as I needed to work for part of the time.  I felt at home there.
On a future visit to Hong Kong, I would return to Will's apartment if available.

name: Stylish apartment A in city center
space: Luxury stylish apartment in the city center, in València Street, between Paseo de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya. Only 7min walking from Plaza Catalunya and las Ramblas. BEDLINENS and towels included. An extra terrace door isolates acusticly the apartment from the street, all  perfect for having a wonderful time in Barcelona. Well situated in a old century house, with high ceilings, approximately 3mts and moldings in all the rooms, typical of Eixample Neighborhood, The apartment has one comfty bedroom and one bathroom, and also one sofa-Bed that makes the apartment up to 4 people. the bedroom is situated in the corner of the house and it is really luminous with 2 balconies. The Stylish large bathroom has 3 big translucent windows that lets pass the light, but not possible to see from the outdoor. The apartment has a typical Gallery where you can have your Breakfast while you are looking at Valencia st and Paseo de Gracia just on the corner. Open kitchen with everything that you could need
description: Luxury stylish apartment in the city center, in València Street, between Paseo de Gracia and Rambla Catalunya. Only 7min walking from Plaza Catalunya and las Ramblas. BEDLINENS and towels included. An extra terrace door isolates acusticly the apartment from the street, all  perfect for having a wonderful time in Barcelona. Well situated in a old century house, with high ceilings, approximately 3mts and moldings in all the rooms, typical of Eixample Neighborhood, The apartment has one comfty bedroom and one bathroom, and also one sofa-Bed that makes the apartment up to 4 people. the bedroom is situated in the corner of the house and it is really luminous with 2 balconies. The Stylish large bathroom has 3 big translucent windows that lets pass the light, but not possible to see from the outdoor. The apartment has a typical Gallery where you can have your Breakfast while you are looking at Valencia st and Paseo de Gracia just on the corner. Open kitchen with everything that you could need
notes: Guests aged 17 and over are required to pay a small fee to stay in short term rental apartment in any area of Barcelona, That is the Tourist Tax, and price is 2.50€ per person per night(up to 7 nights) that will have to be paid at your arrival.
house_rules: NON SMOKING APARTMENT

host.host_about:
Currently I live between Barcelona and NYC, but I have been living in Barcelona since I was born. Except 2012 and 2014 that lived in Montreal (Canada) looking for new experiences.

I like travelling, learn about different cultures, wildlife...

As you can see on my profile I rent 7 apartments in Barcelona, and one lovely duplex in les cases d'Alcanar (costa Daurada)

I Would like to help people with questions about Barcelona, please don't hesitate to contact with any questions or doubts.

reviews.comments: This apartment is perfect for everybody who wants to feel the spirit of Barcelona! I liked everything: location ( nearby shops, restaurants, metro, and my favorite buildings of Gaudi); interior( stylish, new, clean, cosy); working of Antonio ( benevolently,quickly, with patience and understanding. I certainly  recommend this apartment to my friends and will stay there again with pleasure.

Our stay in Antonio's apartment was incredible! It is in an amazing location just off Passeig de Gracia, the main shopping street of Barcelona. We could walk quite easily to the Gothic Quarter and Las Rablas, but it's also a minute walk to one of the main metro stations  and where you can also catch a train directly to the airport.  Also, despite it being busy we weren't disturbed by the noise on the street. Especially if you close the bedroom doors while you sleep.

The actual apartment is beautiful! It has very classic decor with enormous high ceilings and a well equipped kitchen. It's a new apartment so everything is brand new from the TV to the shower and having a dishwasher was so handy. Not to mention the air conditioner throughout the whole apartment was great to put on after having a sweaty day walking and exploring the city. There was also a nespresso machine which was great, and the store was so nearby we could just walk 20 metres to go and buy more coffee pods.

There is also a beautiful area off the living room which has glass walls and is nice to sit in and watch the people of Barcelona walking around.  There are also 2 balconies off the main bedroom which was nice to get fresh air and watch the action of the street below. 

The sofabed was very comfortable and we had it set up as a bed the whole time we were there and the apartment was still spacious, unlike other apartments I've stayed in where the sofabed takes up the whole living room. The actual bed in the bedroom was ridiculously comfortable, it was amazing.

Antonio and Roberto were so friendly and helpful! When we arrived Antonio met us and gave us a map of the city and also explained how to get around, what sights we should see and where to get delicious local tapas. One of the restaurants he recommended, Cataluna, served us the most delicious tapas of our entire month in Spain. We went back there 3 times!  

This is an amazing apartment, an incredible location to explore the city and with 4 people we were so comfortable and there was more than enough room for us. Thank you Antonio and Roberto!

This apartment is the perfect place to have a wonderful stay in Barcelona. The neighborhood is fantastic to enjoy the city, the flat is beautifully decorated, comfortable and extremely clean. We had a very nice welcome, Antonio wasn't there but Roberto explained us everything we need to know to get around. We loved this apartment and we'll definitely come back!

This is the ideal apartment from which to explore Barcelona. It is very centrally located, close to shopping, transportation, tourist sites, and plenty of restaurants and bars. The apartment is modern, clean, and very stylish. It felt like staying in a beautiful boutique hotel. Antonio was a perfect host - worked around our schedules and always available by email/phone.
We will be back!

The apartment is exactly as it appears and described - beautiful and in a great location. We (3 three adults) absolutely loved our stay in this apartment - especially the enclosed balcony! And Antonio was an excellent host. He was very kind, helpful and responsive. We can't wait until our next trip back to Barcelona!
I had a great time (Email hidden by Airbnb) munication, check in and checkout were all very easy. The location is amazing! I loved shower and the bed was incredibly comfortable.

The apartment was perfect, very modern, spotlessly clean and centrally located. Easy to get in touch with Antonio, provided us with good information and even had red wine and fresh flowers for my wife's birthday in the apartment! yes, we would pick the same place for our next visit!

We stayed in this apartment at the end of September for four nights.  The apartment is well located, close to the Metro and around the corner from Casa Batllo.  Lots of restaurants in this lively neighborhood.

Apartment is well equiped.  We were very comfortable and enjoyed our morning coffee on the enclosed balcony.  

Pros:  Location, elevator, high ceilings, luxurious bathroom, comfortable bed, bright; nice kitchen with dishwasher, microwave, Nespresso, fridge, stove, washing machine; nice living room, balconies, clean, across the street from a good market.  Tasteful throughout.  Antonio is a wonderful host.  Very responsive, helpful, and patient.

Cons:  Traffic noise may keep you awake if you're early to bed.

Acabamos de regresar de Barcelona después de siete días en el apartamento de Antonio. Perfecto apartamento! Simplemente nuevo, muy agradable, limpio y espacioso. Exactamente lo mismo que en las fotos! Siempre que tenga que hablar con Antonio antes y durante nuestra estancia tuvimos una respuesta casi inmediata a los correos electrónicos. La ubicación es espectacular, muy cerca de la estación de tren del metro de Paseo de Gracia, mercados y restaurantes en los alrededores. No tengo ninguna queja. Seguramente voy a indicar a los demás y cuando volvamos a Barcelona vamos a estar allí de nuevo. ¡Gracias!

The apartment and it's host were very pleasant. The place was situated in a prime location and it's beautiful. The place is really clean as well. The only fault I found was the street noise. For those who are sensitive to noise when they're trying to sleep, consider that this apartment is on the 2nd floor of a fairly busy street.

A lovely "stylish" secure apartment in the heart of Barcelona which was even better than the photos. Great location between high end shops and the bustling La Rambla and easy walking to restaurants, cafes, supermarkets and attractions. Antonio was the perfect host who was almost begging for complaints so that he could make improvements. We have no complaints and would recommend this apartment to family and friends and will definitely stay here the next time we visit Barcelona.  Thanks Antonia.

We had a wonderful stay at this apartment! Antonio was very communicative both before we arrived and during our stay, and met us right when we arrived from the airport with no delays to check-in.  

The apartment is in a lovely renovated building on a charming side street and is on the 1st floor above street level. Beautifully renovated with modern decoration. Upscale & sleek with a modern kitchen and lovely bathroom, the apartment is spacious with huge old-world high ceilings and a bay windowed enclosed porch that faces the street. The bedroom has huge windows that can be opened up as well. Up-scale linens and a very comfortable bed.

The location was perfect. Walkable to nearly everywhere you would like to see with a metro-nearby. There are many locals in this area which makes for great dining options nearby and less touristy stores, etc. It is a beautiful 15 minute walk to both the Born and the Gothic district. 

Again- Antonio was a wonderful host giving us recommendations on some local favorites and helpful in every way. 

Next visit- we will certainly stay here again.

This appartment is even more beautiful and spacious as the pictures show. It is on the Principal floor, which, on these Eixample buildings, was the noble floor. You will not believe the height of the ceilings and the fantastic refurbished doors and ceilings. Everything is in perfect order and clean. The veranda is a great place to enjoy a glass of wine and read and it brings a fantastic light to the whole space. We were there end of November and the heating worked well with the exception of the bathroom where the small heating equipment for towels was insufficient to warm the room, although we kept it on, it was always cold.
Maribel welcomed us, she was there when we arrived and was both nice and useful. Antonio came to introduce himself a few days later and make sure everything was allright. They're great.
This was our seventh visit to Barcelona and for us, that Eixample neighborood is ideal. The Rambla de Catalunya is on one corner. You will find lots of restaurants and terraces there and shops. Passeig de Gracia is on the other corner, lots of restaurants there as well and high end boutiques. You can walk from the apartment to all major attractions and interesting neighboroods of this marvelous city.
There is a great gym called DIRseven on the small passatge Domingo, less than 100 meters from the entrance of the building, where you can either pay everytime you go or take a month subscription (we did, being there for 2 weeks, it was worth it). They have an outdoor pool if you go in the summer and an indoor one as well and offer spa treatments.
The only downside to the apartment was for us an important one: the noise at night kept us from sleeping as well as we needed. Valencia is a four-lane street, very busy from 6am til 11pm as it is used to reach one the main artery of the city, the Diagonal. The bedroom has one window on Valencia and even if we closed the outside and inside shutters, the noise from the traffic was terribly loud. And drivers here honk their horns a lot! The other bedroom window is on the small Passatge Domingo which looks quiet but becomes animated and very noisy at 1am on weekends. There is a bar, the Hyde, and partygoers go outside to smoke and hang outside. On weekends, we were awake at 6am because people were screaming, laughing, banging on the trash bins. Earplugs didn't do it. The windows really need more isolation to make this place absolutely perfect because everthing else was.

We stayed at this apartment for the second time and we remained as happy with our stay as the first time. The apartment as i have already written is lovely, well furnished, neat, extremely well located and stylishly designed. It is situated in the beautiful building with beautiful front access door. The apartment is even better than it appears at the photos. It is the nicest place to stay in Barcelona.

El departamento esta muy bien ubicado en zona Paseo de Gracia, tiene todo el equipamiento nuevo y confortable para una matrimonio con 2 hijas, un balcon cerrado muy lindo y la atencion de Antonio y Roberto es muy buena, brindando un muy buen servicio. 
Hemos pasado una semana excelente. Recomendable

La casa é STUPENDA!! Bellissima! Più bella che nelle foto! Il quartiere é meraviglioso, tranquillo ma pieno di negozi e ristoranti.
L'appartamento é nuovo, rifinito nei dettagli, con ogni confort! Il palazzo é superbo. 
Antonio e Roberto sono stati gentili e disponibili.
Ho conosciuto di persona solo Roberto che ci ha aspettato la sera fino a tardi, ci ha consigliato un ristorante ottimo e ci ha fornito i codici per internet e la cartina della città. Inoltre é stato disponibile a farci fare il check out poco prima della partenza.
Spero di tornarci presto perché la casa merita davvero.
Grazie Antonio e Roberto!
Alla prossima ...
;-)
Giada

Antonio and Roberto were grate hosts.

Apartment is very clean, modern, full equipped. 

Location is perfect. It is in the middle of shopping area. Garage is across the street. Gym and spa is around the corner. Grocery and metro station are 100m away. 

Strongly recommend.

Nuestra experiencia con Antonio Noguera fue excelente. El apartamento es hermoso, muy cómodo, muy surtido y está excelentemente ubicado. La ubicación es perfecta y el barrio precioso. El anfitrión, socio de Antonio, Robert, nos brindó su ayuda para todo lo que necesitamos con muchísima disposición y amabilidad.

This is an outstanding apartment in a superb location. Roberto met us at the apartment and gave us the tour. He was extremely helpful and friendly. The apartment is well appointed with an extremely comfortable bed. While the bedroom faces a busy road it is well insulated and only a small bit of noise can be heard just like in any city centre apartment or hotel. I am a light sleeper and I slept well. There's lots of space in here and a beautiful bathroom. The kitchen had all you would need for your stay. There is a stunning enclosed balcony that we spent a lot of time in reading and watching the world go by.
The location is second to none in the Eixample area between Passeig de Gracia and the Rambla De Catalunya. Plenty to see and do in the area. We walked to the Sagrada Familia from here. Could not recommend this apartment highly enough. Thank you Antonio and Roberto.

Antonio and Roberto are perfect hosts. The apartment is even better in real then on the foto's!. There is a very comfortable bed and a sleeping sofa. The apartment is very good located. We had a very good time.

The apartment is a in a perfect location and looks exactly like the photos. Roberto and Antonio were extremely helpful leading up to the trip and during the trip. We would recommend this apartment for others and would return!

Antonio and his associate Roberto were wonderful hosts! Roberto who met us on check-in gave us useful tips on places to eat and things to do. The apartment was very beautiful and well-manicured with modern fittings in a 100-year-old building. It was spacious and well located right in the heart of passieg de gracia within walking distance to all the main attractions in Barcelona. We truly enjoyed our stay and would definitely stay at this apartments again when we are in Barcelona...

My family and I had a wonderful 4 nights stay at this apartment. We didn't get the chance to meet Antonio, however his colleague Maribel welcomed us when we arrived and was very helpful and friendly. She gave us a guide on how to discover Barcelona. Roberto, his other colleague came to meet us a few days after and showed us their new apartment, on the same floor which is currently under renovation. The apartment where we stayed is fully equipped and very beautiful with high ceilings and beautifully designed tiles. The location is perfect as it is situated in the centre. La Rambla as well as Passeig De Gracia are within walking distance. We slept well during the night as the windows are soundproof. Wll definitely recommend this apartment to my friends, Would love to stay at this apartment again when I visit Barcelona again in the future. Thank you Antonio, Roberto and Maribel for your great hospitality.

We stayed at the apartement for three nights. It  was very beautiful, clean and perfectly located close to ceveral shopping and dining spots. The high ceilings, the beatiful stone and wooden floors, the big bathroom and the cute balconies were magnificent. 
The key exchange with Antonio's business partner went smoothly and he told us about a popular place around the corner where we had spectacular tapas.
I would definitely come again!

The perfect mix of modern and modernist in a Barcelona apartment. Wonderful host, super easy check in/out, THE best location, comfortable beds, strong air conditioning, perfectly clean, beautiful and bright. We will absolutely come back to the apartment next time visit and heartily recommend to friends.

Was met by Roberto, (Antonio's partner) who was extremely helpful, allowing us early entry to the apartment as we had come in by cruise ship to the port early in the morning. Roberto also provided maps and suggestions for local restaurants and grocery shopping. The apartment is as shown in the pictures, spacious and well presented. The location was excellent. We walked everywhere but it was also close to the metro if you want to catch the train. It is only a short 10-15 minute walk to Placa de Catalunya and a 20-25 minute walk to La Sagrada Familia. One of the best features of the apartment is the sun-room where we sat to have our morning coffee and watch Barcelona awake to start the day. The apartment was well equipped with everything you needed for a comfortable stay. The only downside was the lack of tea, coffee, milk and other start up items. We had to go out to the supermarket to stock up. OK when arriving in the day but not convenient if arriving at night. Recommend this apartment to anyone looking for a hotel alternative in Barcelona.

Fantastic location in Barcelona.  The apartment itself was new and beautiful, we really enjoyed our stay.  Communication with Antonio was great we didn't have any issues.  We would definitely stay here again.
Thanks again!
Nice apartment, easy to find, excellent location !! Will definitely use the apartment next time I'm in BCN

The four of us had a lovely stay in this apartment. It was close to everything, combined with great architecture and street life right outside the door. A really nice place to stay for a true Barcelona experience! The hostesses were also really helpful.

Well-equipped, modern, spacious and tastefully designed, our apartment in Barcelona is almost like our dream home. We have stayed in quite a few Airbnb apartments around the world, and this is our best experience so far. The location in the middle of Passeig de Gracia is also perfect for us to explore the city. It is so comfortable and everything feels just right.  This is indeed our home away from home. If you are looking for a place to stay in Barcelona, we will recommend this stylish apartment without any hesitation.

We stayed in the house 3 nights and it was wonderful. The house is beautiful with its high ceilings and very comfortable also. It has all the amenities from wi fi to air condition. The location is perfect for moving around the city. The owners were also very kind and helpful. To sum up, we would gladly stay again there. Alex

Nous avons été très bien accueilli. Le logement correspond tout à fait à la description, présentation soignée, décoration sympa, très bel appartement. On s'y sent bien... La literie est également très confortable.
L'appartement est idéalement situé lorsque l'on aime faire du shopping, passeig de Gracia et Rambla de Catalunya sont à 2 pas. 
A recommander...

The apartment was even better in reality: airy, bright, spacious rooms with beautiful high ceilings. It is finished to a very high standard with great attention to detail, tastefully decorated and spotlessly clean. The bathroom is delightful and the shower works very well. The enclosed balcony off the sitting room is the perfect spot for breakfast whilst watching the city go by.  The bedroom's french doors are double glazed, making it very quiet.  All the common areas are very clean and tidy as well, and the building has a lift. 

Communication with the host was perfect. Antonio confirmed the reservation promptly and was always available to answer any queries by email. In Barcelona we were met by his business partner, Roberto, who was very friendly and professional. He showed us the apartment and explaied how everything worked. Roberto was incredibly kind and accommodating (keeping our cases in his office for a few hours as we had a late flight), and also very punctual! 

And last but not least, the location is superb! This area of the Eixample is very smart indeed, yet relaxed and welcoming. It is easy to walk to many points of interest in the city - it is only a 10-15 minutes walk to Plaza Catalunya (where the airport bus stops) - and the area is also well served by public transport. There are both posh boutiques and local shops, including a bakery less than a block away on Rambla de Catalunya and a small convenience store down the pedestrian street.  The apartment is only a few minutes walk from Gaudi's Casa Batllo and La Pedrera (great for setting off early to avoid the queues), as well as from Fundacio Tapies and design mecca Vinçon. 

I highly recommend this apartment.

We were met by Roberto (Antonio's business partner) who was waiting for us as we arrived. The apartment is in a great part of town, just off the Paseo de Gracia, it couldn't be more central. 
Very easy to get about, shops and restaurants all very close by. 
Roberto was very welcoming and gave us some great advice on getting around, places to eat and helped us get our bearings.
It was my first time in Barcelona, I loved it and will certainly be coming back.
The apartment was a great base to explore this amazing city from and Roberto's willingness to help us at any hour was hugely appreciated.
Couldn't recommend higher.

What a perfect experience. We were warmly greeted, totally set up and couldn't have picked a better location to have stayed. The space was spotless, the bed is comfortable, the bedroom is quite and can be made super dark... even when the whole space is so open and bright. It was a perfect stay.

Estupendo apartamento lleno de luz, limpísimo y muy bien ubicado perfecto para 2 personas.
Nos ha encantado la experiencia, gracias Roberto y Antonio!

Fantastic apartment in a great part of Barcelona which I would thoroughly recommend!  Great communication following our booking and Roberto was fantastic on arrival. We were given early access as well as an evening check-out to accommodate our flight times. The apartment itself is clean, spacious and modern in a lovely traditional building. 4 of us stayed for the weekend with more than enough space for all of us. Many nice restaurants and cool bars within easy walking distance. Thank you for a great weekend.
Great APT!! Location was perfect. Host Roberto was very kind. If I have another chance to visit Barcelona, I'll stay this APT again!
Host was very welcoming.  Location was very central.  The apartment was clean, bright, lovely.  thank you!

Nous avons passé un superbe week-end dans cet appartement. La terrasse est vraiment charmante et malgré la rue passante le bruit reste très modéré grâce au double vitrage. Je recommande vivement. Ps: hôte très agréable et disponible
