Antonio and Robert took great care of us. They went way above expectation to accommodate our schedule. Our stay has been wonderful. Thank you!
Great apartment, lots of natural light, great location. Will definitely come back again.

Eine tolle Wohnung. Meine Freundin und ich haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Tolle Lage, alles sauber und super schick. Antonio war nicht da, aber dafür hat sich Roberto um alles gekümmert. Er hat uns super Restaurant Tips gegeben und alles hat perfekt geklappt. Ich würde sofort wieder dieses Appartment buchen. Vielen Dank!

Book this apartment!  It is beautiful and in a fantastic location. Very  spacious and looks exactly like the pictures.  Roberto, Antonio's business partner, was so helpful and wonderful.  He gave us insider knowledge of the city, a map and lots of tips.

Great place to stay. Love the location, accessible to everything. Stylish, comfortable apartment. Beautiful French doors, great view of the street. Host was very accommodating. The maid service during our stay likewise helpful. Would highly recommend.

I spent 5 days with 3 friends and we had a great time! The location is perfect (5min walking distance to the city center, 20 min to Parc Guell and 30 min to Miro Foundation) and the appartment was simply lovely! Recently renovated with a mix modernity and catalan architecture, Antonio's flat is exactly what we needed! High ceiling, lot of light through the patio, very comfortable sofa bed (if you are more than 2), exceptionally clean and convenient bathroom... And Roberto (Antonio's business partner) was very friendly and always available when needed. I will definitly stay there next time and highly recommend it!

We really recommend this apartment. Antonio was out of town so his friend Roberto welcomed us timely at arrival. He was very kind and generous in sharing recommendations and telling us where to eat and what to see.
We stayed for three nights with our kids sleeping in the living room sofa-bed. The flat is very bright, modern and central. Close to everything and nice shopping and eating nearby.
A top place! We're coming back!

Bright, immaculate, spacious, high ceilinged apartment in the most fashionable area of Barcelona. One block from Chanel, Dior, Gucci - and Gaudi! Two minutes from subway and airport train. Large, well fitted bathroom - mind the shower, which does spray water. Modern kitchen area, plenty of storage and a really firm, comfortable bed. Quadruple glazing keeps the bedroom quiet, despite the street noise. Antonio's colleague Roberto was a pleasure to deal with - prompt, respectful and very helpful. Two superlative tapas meals at nearby La Flauta. Book this property with complete confidence.
Fantastic apartment in the heart of Barcelona. Highly recommended!

My husband and I recently spent 6 nights at this very nicely-appointed, conveniently located apartment in the Eixample district. Roberto was welcoming and a very responsive host. We really appreciated his directions, advice and accessibility. The apartment itself is as described online and by other reviewers - elegant interior, modern, clean, functional with a lovely and sunny breakfast terrace overlooking the street. The Ikea bed was comfortable, the bathroom was great and the kitchen had everything one might need for a short stay. We also took advantage of the Nespresso machine (purchased the coffee from the Nespresso store around the corner).  Our only reservation was our own experience with street noise: The double paned doors helped to muffle the noise from traffic, however did nothing to lessen the noise from people partying loudly on the street right below the apartment. Just a word of caution of you or your family members are light sleepers.

This is a lovely, spacious, and well-appointed apartment in a very nice neighborhood -- just a short walk away from Gaudi's Casa Battló and Casa Mila.

You could not ask for a more gracious and welcoming host than Roberto, the apartment manager. When checking us in, he took time to make sure we were familiar with all of the must-see sites in Barcelona, and to recommend wonderful places to eat and drink in the area. On more than one occasion, he went out of his way to assist us with reservations and other travel-related inconveniences that were really not his concern because they had nothing to do with the apartment.

My wife and I really hope to have the opportunity to stay here again!

Had a great stay at Antonio's apartment in Barcelona. The apartment is beautiful, with high ceilings, all the original mouldings and details, but fully renovated with a modern, sophisticated feel. Location couldn't be better. Antonio's business partner Roberto met us at check-in, and sat down with us and took the time to point out the location of the apartment in regard to all the main sights, plus local amenities  and restaurants , which we really appreciated.  The only drawback of the apartment is on the weekend a local bar that runs til 6 am gets people contracting outside and their voices can be heard despite the thick double windows that have been installed. However, with ear plugs, we slept well, and again, it's only on the weekend. Would still return here on my next visit to Barcelona, which I hope will be soon!

Antonio's apartment is the perfect place to stay if you are visiting Barcelona. It is located in the middle of two very prominent areas - Placa Catalunya and Passeig de Gracia. The metro station is close by, Diagonal, is close by. There is a small supermarket close by. My friend arrived separately by flight and Antonio arranged for a car pick up for her from the airport. It was his sister-in-law who was most helpful in sharing local information with my friend. Antonio's business partner, Roberto, was very helpful and shared local information, maps etc. He also arranged for a taxi to take us to the airport when we were leaving. 

The apartment is exactly the way it is in the photographs. It is stylish with high ceilings, which gives it a lot of space. There is one bedroom and a sofa cum bed in the living room so the three of us were quite comfortable. The building has a lift so don't worry about carrying those bags up the stairs! We would most definitely recommend that you stay here.

This is a beautiful newly remodeled apartment with everything need to enjoy a comfortable stay in beautiful Barcelona. The neighborhood is great with awesome cafes and restaurants just steps away. Walking distance to Sagrada Familia , Gothic district and other key point. Also the Metro is around the corner to reach the beach or other farther places.
Antonio and Roberto are great hosts. We arrived over an hour late but the patiently waited for us and explain everything about the unit and the neighborhood. Thanks!

Antonio and Roberto were warm and most helpful hosts - both giving us lots of very helpful advice about both the apartment, moving and eating around Barcelona and transport solutions. The apartment is a beautiful fully air-conditioned period apartment which has been renovated to a very high standard of fittings and appliances. Large rooms, high ceilings, plenty of light, high leve; of security. elevator and a position midway between two of Barcelona's finest boulevards - Passeig De Gracia and Rambla de Catalunya - made it a gem to stay. Best Airbnb apartment by far on our current trip. We will be back!

We had a pleasant stay at the apartment! roberto met us when we arrived and was very helpful and kind! He gave us a map to help us which we appreciate so much and recommended restaurants and showed us the Supermarket! The apartment was super nice! Bathroom is huge and the place clean! I would highly recommend! :) place is also the best location for us! Thanks again roberto for your kind accommodation! We would love to come back!

I cannot say enough nice things about this apartment. The apartment itself is stunning and luxurious with a ton of amenities and situated in a great neighborhood. Antonio & Roberto were very easy to communicate with. Upon check-in Roberto made us a great map of the city that we used throughout our stay.  I felt that I got alot of value for the price and would absolutely rent this listing again next time we come to Barcelona.
Grant and friendly service and well located. Couldn't have asked for more.

The Appartment was just Fabolous! Perfect Location, beautiful decoration, modern but touch of old... just th perfect stay for Barcelona. Antonio was super nice, accommodating at all times... The Doorman was also great. All Plus Plus Plus...Thank you

We were given a warm welcome and some very helpful advice regarding our visit. The apartment is just as pictured, light, spacious - with lovely high ceilings and a very comfortable bed.  It is located very close to a metro station and is a direct 25 min train journey from the airport. There is even a beautiful Gaudi building practically on the doorstep - it was exactly what we were hoping for.

My husband and I recently stayed in this fabulous apartment in Barcelona. We had fantastic communication with Antonio before we arrived and then Roberto once we got to the apartment. Roberto gave us great recommendations of places to visit and eat.
The apartment is gorgeous, beautifully decorated with lots of natural light and very quiet and spacious. It is also the perfect location for getting around Barcelona. We loved it and would highly recommend staying here.

Antonio was fantastic in the booking process and was always very quick to reply and get back to me on anything I was unsure of. We were met by Roberto on our arrival - he was brilliant, gave us maps, recommended restaurants and was so helpful - nothing was too much trouble for either of them, so friendly and helpful. 

The apartment was absolutely beautiful, huge, incredible location and spotless! we honestly couldn't fault it. We had such a great stay and would highly recommend it to anyone and hope to return one day.

It is located just one block from the train station which is ideal.

Fantastic apartment and fantastic hosts - thank you for a brilliant stay.

Roberto met us at the apartment and had everything ready for us upon arrival. He even gave us a map with great food and sites recommendations and tips! Very kind of him and very helpful! The apartment itself was AMAZING. The perfect location, very clean, and very comfortable. My mother and I had the best time in Barcelona thanks to Antonio and Roberto. Thank you!!

Four of us stayed in this apartment for three nights and it was fantastic. Roberto was brilliant in welcoming us and giving us ideas of what to do and how to get around Barcelona.

The apartment is large and beautiful and has an excellent central cooling system which was perfect for the hot weather we had.  There is a bedroom and a large couch that opens out into a bed. The bathroom and kitchen were also excellent, and the washing machine and drying rack were very useful.

The apartment is in a fantastic location, close to Passeig de Gracia train station and it seemed to be in a very central spot for all of the places we wanted to visit.

Roberto also allowed us to store our luggage for the afternoon as our flight was in the evening. This was greatly appreciated.  We would definitely stay here again.

We had a wonderful experience! The flat was amazing and in a great part of town. Antonio was quick to respond to all our questions and even helped out when the hair dryer broke! A fabulous stay in beautiful Barcelona!

Impecable !! Antonio excelente anfitrión. La ubicación es la mejor !
Apartamento súper agradable, diseñado, limpio, cómodo. Volvería a elegirlo. Lo recomiendo.

We are a family of 4 and are very particular of where we stay. The listing is exactly as outlined.

The apartment is beautiful and very centrally located in a great neighbourhood, close to all amenities.  It is very clean, secure and has all the comforts of home.  There is a concierge during the day who is kind and helpful.  

While parking is available next to the apartment, I recommend using the parking garage offered by the hosts as it is easy to drive in and out of, as well as park; it is less than a 5 minute walk away and is very secure.

Prior to our stay we worked with Antonio who was always very responsive.  On the day of arrival and throughout our stay we were greeted and dealt with Maribel who was lovely and very attentive to all our needs.

We would definitely stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

First and foremost, my wife and i would like to say,” Bravo, to Roberto the host and the Apartment was simply magnificent! This is a truly wonderful experience.

Prior to the stay we worked with the host and was really excited to meeting them as they are really very helpful. Upon reaching Barcelona airport, Rosa was at the airport and give us first hand of the warm hospitality of Catalonia people. When we reached the apartment we were greeted and attended very attentively by the host and Rosa, to ensure everything is in place and put us really at ease! 

Roberto was very responsive to our needs, for example when i seek help from him as of where do i get the European plug to charge my handphone and ironing board for my wife wedding gown, he responded swiftly at the door and solved our problem immediately! 

The apartment was truly beautiful and incredibly located in the safe and centralised neighbourhood at Barcelona.
It is very clean and has all the amenities that we need. The concierge is a very kind and friendly man as well. It is also just 1 single block away from the Metro station, and the location of the apartment is so brilliant that it is actually walking distance to most of the places in Barcelona. We honesty could not fault it at all. Fantastic huge apartment and hosts. 

On top of that, as my wife and i reached the apartment very early in the morning where the apartment are still being clean, Antonio and Rosa sat down with us and giving us excellent ideas as of where to go in Barcelona during our stay there. My wife and i in the process not only has the most romantic wedding that we could ever imagine there in Barcelona, but also the best and unforgettable times in Barcelona.

Gracias Roberto, Rosa and Antonio~ We will definitely come back to stay again!

Antonio's apartment was perfect. My two friends and I had a wonderful stay for two nights. Antonio couldn't be there to greet us but was very helpful via email and his business partner Roberto went out of his way to make our stay easy. The apartment is gorgeous and in a wonderful location. I'd absolutely stay again.

What a great apartment to stay in Barcelona! My boyfriend and I stayed for 4 nights and it was such a nice place to come back to after a long day out in the city. Roberto was very helpful in meeting us when we arrived and explaining to us all the information and giving us some helpful tips. He was also able to call us a cab for very early in the morning to go to the airport. 

Apartment was very clean and beautifully set up and designed. Situated in a very central location but still on a quiet enough street. Great experience overall!

The apartment is as described -  beautiful and comfortable. It is in one of the best locations in Barcelona - l'eixample district.  Roberto and Antonio were excellent hosts.  I would stay here again in a heartbeat.

This apartment was perfect! The hosts were more than welcoming and helpful than we could imagine! The listing was on point and the apartment was one I would pick out for myself if I were to live in Barcelona! Gorgeous and spacious inside and perfectly located in the city to walk to everything! Close to great shopping, sightseeing and yummy restaurants!   I highly suggest this place!

Antonio helped us to feel welcome from the moment we inquired about booking the apartment. Although he was away when we arrived, his partner, Roberto, welcomed us warmly and gave us a detailed review of the apartment location as well as places of interest around Barcelona. He also had suggestions for restaurants and other cultural and historical information.

Roberto arranged for us to be picked up at the airport by his sister-in-law who was a delight herself. We liked her so much that we arranged with her to drop us off and pick us up at the railway station on our way back to Barcelona from an excursion out of town and to take us to the airport for our trip home.

The apartment was exactly as advertised. It was located perfectly in an active but very nice part of town with extremely easy access to multiple lines of the Metro. This made it possible for us to get around the entire city without difficulty. We felt perfectly safe everywhere.

The apartment was spotlessly clean and well-appointed. The bathroom and kitchen were modern and well-appointed. We had access to an enclosed balcony with lots of sun. The beds were comfortable with good reading lights. There were enough shutters and doors to block out light and sound as desired.

We would return with enthusiasm to this apartment for another stay.

Antonio's apt is terrific and just as advertised.  Easy arrival with Roberto, who was very personable, helpful and spoke English really well.  The apt is convenient to all parts of the city and has a feeling of simple elegance.  If we have a chance to return to Barcelona, we'd love to stay in this apt!

This apartment is so beautiful! The photos almost don't do it justice. The location is really great, we were able to walk to many of the sites and could easily catch a taxi when we didn't feel like walking. The hosts were very welcoming and the communication was easy and efficient. The only potential issue is that the gorgeous floor to ceiling windows don't provide much insulation from the street noise, so my husband and I used a white noise app at night and slept like babies.
Super! Alles perfekt. Wunderbare Wohnung. Ich freue mich schon auf das nächste Mal.

가장 오래 머무르는곳이라 가장많이 걱정했는데  걱정과 달리 정말 만족스러운 숙소였습니다
위치는 그라시아 거리쪽
걸어서 5분안에 샤넬 루이비통이 있어요 ㅋㅋ
정말 쇼핑하기도 좋고 교통의 중심이라고 해도 될정도로 편안하게 관광한것 같아요
쇼파베드를 써야해서 걱정했는데
걱정과 달리 너무 편안하게 쉬었다 왔어요
내 주변사람이 간다면 추천해주고 싶습니다
다시 바르셀로나에 간다면
Antonio숙소에 다시갈꺼예요^^
감사합니다 즐거운 가족여행이 되었어요♥

This is a perfect place to stay! Location is excellent just a few steps away from Passeig de Gracia, and very close to metro stations and Casa Batllo. The apartment itself is beautiful, very clean, spacious and homey. The hosts, Antonio and Roberto are very attentive and responsive as well. Roberto provided us with very useful information and he's ready to assist us anytime of the day! 

Would love to stay here again if one day I come back to Barcelona. Highly recommended!!

We haven't met Antonio, but there was Roberto who waited for us and explained everything, gave a map and pointed his recommendations of places to eat and visit. Not far from apartment in walking distance there is Egyptian museum which we found interesting. everything was great and we enjoyed our stay. Thank you!

We were greeted by Roberto who was very friendly and helpful. The apartment is in a great location, one block from Gaudi's Casa Battlo and the main shopping street Paseig de Gracia. The apartment is really spacious, with high ceilings, two balconies and a sunroom. Had a great time here and will definitely be back!
Stayed in Antonio's apartment last year as well and absolutely loved it!! Would highly recommend it!!
Awesome place. Location is great just next to Casa Batollo and subway station. The apartment is very new and clean. Thanks!

Apartamento perfecto para pasar unos días en Barcelona. A unos metros del Passeig de Gràcia y de los principales edificios modernistas de la ciudad. 
El apartamento es amplio y muy luminoso con unos techos altísimos y unos detalles que mantienen el espíritu modernista de la construcción original. No le falta ningún detalle y tiene todo lo necesario para sentirse como en casa.
Roberto nos puso todas las facilidades para que nuestra estancia fuera lo mejor posible.

Antonio and his partner Robert were amazing hosts. They helped me as much as they could and they were very patient with my changing arrival times all time. The flat is just AMAZING, a jewel in the best location of Barcelona. Everything perfectly clean and modern. A real modernist experience in Paseo de Gracia area! I will repeat, definetly.

The apt was in excellent location, very convenient to go around. We had some issues with the hot water during the stay, but the hosts responded quickly to the problem. 5 stars to the two hosts and location, 4.5 stars to the apt itself, and 3 stars to the hot water system, there's just no enough hot water for more than two quick showers. But if the problem is fixed, don't hesitate to book this one.
Antonio and Roberto were great!  They were prompt to answer any questions, and we loved the apartment.  It's beautiful.  I sou;d recommend renting this place.  Thanks again.

De verhuurder had alles picobello in orde gemaakt voor ons. Roberto wachtte ons op bij de deur en legde ons uit hoe alles functioneerde in het appartement. Gaf ons zijn telefoonnummer dat we altijd mochten bellen. We hebben het verschillende malen laten schoonmaken, kregen dan ook nieuwe lakens + handdoeken.
Erg mooi appartement. Prima locatie en erg gastvrij.

Pasamos unos dias espectaculares en Barcelona. El apartamento esta super bien ubicado y el servicio y hospitalidad de Antonio y toda la gente que trabaja en el edificio es maravillosa.
Ademas el apartamento tiene muy buenas dimensiones, luz y comodidades, sumado a todo lo necesario para pasar unas vacaciones relajado!!!
Muchas gracias por la hospitalidad y esperamos regresar pronto!!

this was actually the first airbnb i've stayed in - and i couldn't have asked for a better experience. everything was super smooth, antonio set up a very easy entry and departure, and his place was very clean and livable. i would definitely recommend it to others!
Great flat and great host.

Description was very accurate; we loved the apartment!  Roberto (Antonio was away) was there to meet us and was very helpful and accommodating. Location is great, near to the metro, which we did use but from here you can easily walk to many of the main attractions of Barcelona.

I stayed in Antonio's apartment during my first trip to Barcelona and it was wonderful. Antonio wasn't available but his partner Roberto was there to greet us at the apartment, he was very nice and even gave us a map and tips on places to go around the area. Their office is directly across from the apartment so Roberto let us store our luggage while they cleaned our room. The location is also excellent and pretty much in the center of everything and in walking distance to most places. Overall, I had a wonderful time and I highly recommend Antonio's apartment.

Antonio's apartment was perfect for three! We stayed in Barcelona for a week and the apartment was a lovely and convenient stay. Very spacious and modern with all the necessary amenities. The location is very central and close walking distance to multiple metro stops. Antonio's friend, Roberto, was very helpful in providing a map and explaining all the metro lines when I arrived. I would definitely stay in Antonio's apartment again and highly recommend it to anyone who is visiting Barcelona!

Imagine everything you want for an holiday house: in Antonio's apartment you'll find it.
Simply perfect.
Thanks a lot
Simona

This was our first Airbnb experience and it was truly wonderful. Antonio and his partner Roberto were great hosts and arranged transport from the hotel for us including a carseat for my child. The apartment is immaculate, clean, stylish and exceptionally located. This neighborhood is really central and annoyingly touristy. Tons of local families strolling around and amazing restaurants. I would stay here again or in any other of Antonio's listings without hesitation.

Antonio estaba fuera de la ciudad y nos recibio Robert, excelente anfitrion! Nos presento la ciudad y nos dio muchos consejos sobre que hacer y que no en Barcelona.
El departamento es tal y como se ve en las fotos, muy lindo y espacioso. Esta muy bien ubicado, cerca de estaciones de metro y bus. Si bien se trata de una zona con mucho movimiento, dentro del departamento resulta silencioso ya que cuenta con ventanas dobles.
Definitivamente recomendable!
Beautiful apartment in the best location possible. Would highly recommend it to anyone!

Very Nice apartment, very close to everything (walking distance). There was everything needed - we only missed toilet paper. 

Antonio is very flexible and friendly, easy to communicate with and available when needed.
Superbe appartement!

We did not meet Antonio on our arrival , Roberto arranged for our check in instead. He was kind and helpful, gave us all the details that we needed. Brief us on the location and whereabouts of supermarket, metro and attractions etc. The house is a wonderful place, noises were not a problem for us, the beds and amenities in the house is suffice for our short stay in Barcelona. The metro is only a short walk away, roughly 5 minutes. There's also plenty of restaurants around the apartment. Would definitely recommend it to anyone who's looking at his place.

Our flight was delayed, Antonio's colleague was very flexible to reschedule the check in time, very much appreciated. We had a very good introduction, with very good traveling guide and restaurant recommendation. The room was super clean and extremely nice, exactly as shown on the picture. The location is fantastic, very convenient to walk to everywhere. We definitely had a very very good time there! Thank you!
Sehr sympathisch und sehr sauber. So macht Airbnb Spass. Jederzeit sehr gerne wieder.

Roberto, el socio de Antonio, quien fue quien nos recibi. Nos trato de maravillas! Nos explico con un mapa la zona, nos recomendo restaurants super buenos. La ubicacion increible!! A metros de paseo da Gracia y de casa Battlo. La zona super exclusiva y el departmento soñado, de primer nivel. El recibimiento de diez y muy agradable. Lo súper recomiendo y volveríamos sin dudas!
Host was so very friendly and spent the time to provide us with Barcelona top tips that proved most useful. Beautiful apartment, very centrally located, would most definitely recommend.

To make it short: great place in a great City - many thanks also to Roberto, who managed the flat and made it really convenient for us to check in and out. Would definitively book this flat again, if we ever come back to Barcelona.

El apartamento es precioso, muy espacioso. Un ejemplo excelente de arquitectura modernista en una localización espectacular, en el Ensanche y muy cerca de Gracia. Estaba impecable. Es un poco ruidoso, pero eso es más culpa del tráfico que del apartamento. El wifi es apenas razonable

This is a gem of an apartment. It is perfectly located to easily get to all the main sites of interest. Antonio and his business partner Roberto could not have made us more welcome. We were met at the apartment  following a series of text and email message to make sure we knew where we were going. The apartment is brilliant. Very clean and well appointed with large rooms high ceilings and many period features. Very quite air conditioning makes the temperature perfect. We spent 3 nights in Barcelona to celebrate a birthday. Its a wonderful city and this apartment was the perfect base and represented excellent value for money. I highly recommend it

Thank you Roberto for making our stay so simple. The apartment was clean, airy, in a great location, and exactly as pictured, even better. The bathroom was great with a combination rain and hand held shower. The kitchen was handy, and lounge and bedroom very comfortable. There were double glazed windows and shutters to keep street noise (everywhere in the city) to a minimum and the room nice and dark. A very enjoyable stay.

Roberto met us as planned,even calling us at Sants on our way in. The apartment was as described ,even more spacious and very well equipped. Well located and quiet. One minor problem had Roberto on the phone immediately and at the door shortly afterwards .Very clean and stylish. Would definitely recommend .

This apartment is perfect in a perfect location. Close to three metro stations with a gym, atm, Cafe and shops all nearby. Windows are double glazed so street noise is reduced and it was nice to have breakfast in the sunshine of the bay window. Also good to wash clothes. Comprehensive briefing from hosts on arrival on the apartment and how to get to major attractions. Highly recommended!
We had a great time in Antonio's apt. Great location and interior. We will definitely have this place in mind when we get back to Barcelona next time. Thanks!

Met at the apartment by Maribel even though our flight was late.  Location is absolutely fantastic and the apartment stylish and spacious.  Bed super comfortable and the sofa bed big enough for my two sons to share.  Maybe a bit more toilet paper and some soap / milk on arrival would enhance, but overall wouldn't hesitate to recommend.

Antonio messaged me before my trip to give me details and to offer transport help. The check-in process was very smooth, Maribel met us outside the apartment building. The apartment itself was rather clean, and looks like the photos. Everything was furnished to a high standard, and we had a very pleasant stay. The towels and beds were great, and we had a good rest each night. The location is superb, just off Passeig de Gracia. I would definitely recommend this place!

Beautiful apartment, very spacious, well appointed kitchen, clean restroom, nice linens, lovely sun room, very secure and in the heart of the city. Just a few minutes walking to get to shopping, restaurants, and the Metro. Nice welcome to the apartment and an easy exit when leaving. There is a bit of noise from the street as other renters mentioned but the unit is in the heart of the city, its just traffic. If you close the windows and the shutters in the bedroom it is not a problem. The location of this unit is great. This is just such a pretty apartment there were times we just wanted to stay in and relax on the comfy couch.

Such a big beautiful apartment in such a perfect location is so rare. We loved every minute from being greeted as we stepped out of our taxi from the airport to being farewelled as we stepped into our taxi to the airport (pre-booked by our hosts). Antonio was away on his honeymoon so Maribel & Roberto were our hosts: they were marvellous and very helpful. We tried every suggested cafe and restaurant and were not disappointed.
We cannot recommend Antinio's apartment more highly.

We loved staying at Antonio's.  The location is in an upscale, trendy neighborhood with plenty of shopping, restaurants, and sight seeing within walking distance.

The apartment is spacious for a one bedroom (plus living room), very clean and modern. It even has a washer machine to wash your clothes which is helpful for a longer trip.  We also enjoyed the sunroom for a glass of wine before we went to dinner. 

I'd definitely recommend this place for a couple or single person traveling.

This apartment at the centre of Barcelona was beautiful and spotless, exactly as the photos showed and what we were looking for. We were only here for one night which everyone said was a shame, as it was perfectly located as well. The bathroom was beautiful and beds (including sofa bed) were comfortable. Antonio's business partner Roberto was very very helpful, and was waiting for us in front of the apartment when we arrived. He even recommended the restaurant Cervecería Catalana around the corner where we ended up going three times over two days as it was so good! Would definitely stay here again when we visit next time.
Really enjoyed our stay in Barcelona. The apartment was centrally located, modern, and clean. Antonio also has the place kitted out with all essentials. Highly recommended

Antonio was out of town and we met with Roberto his business partner. Roberto was extremely helpful and gave us a map and recommendations of things to do in the city. The location is excellent. You can walk  everywhere or take the metro. When I come back to Barcelona I would definitely stay here again.

We were really satisfied with the Antonio's awesome accommodation in Spain for our honeymoon. His partner, Roberto and other friend helped us to get there easily and they are punctual, communication were perfect. 
It was modern, spacious and clean. The rooms status was the exactly same as his explanation with photos. Bed was very comfortable! 
Also, the location was one of the best strengths of this apartment. It only takes 10 mins to get plaza de Catalunya on foot and you can see Gaudi's casa batllo everyday once you start to walk through the street. 
Thanks a lot Antonio and Roberto. wish you a good luck
Gracias!

Très bel appartement , hyper bien situé à côté de passeig de Gràcia !  Le lit et le canapé sont confortable ! Un peu impersonnel mais très bien pour quelques jours ! Roberto est très sympathique et sait bien indiquer les endroits important de la ville et est très présent en cas de besoin !

This Airbnb was perfect for our stay in Barcelona. It was in a great location, in the center of the city. Everything was in walking distance and it was easy to get to all the restaurants/bars and popular attractions without any difficulty. The apartment was spacious, clean, and well equipped and just absolutely beautiful and perfect. Antonio's business partner Roberto was there to greet us and was extremely helpful and gave us maps and tips and recommendations for our stay there. Would highly recommend!!
Great apartment and very gracious host. There are plans to make the place even better. Highly recommended.

Very nice apartment with terrace and clean furnitures. Terrific location near Grancia street but have to walk a while to Catalunya plaza. The apartment much is better than the photos on airbnb. Like to visit again when we visit to Barcelona!

The most beautiful apartment I have ever been to, the photos certainly do not do this place justice! Very safe and secure (three doors + door man) everything you would ever need to move straight in. The location is great, and our host was very kind to sit down with us and go through the must-do's in Barcelona, and where he recommended us to eat. We will be back here in a heart-beat.

Antonio's apartment was the perfect sanctuary for us as we enjoyed a fantastic weekend in Barcelona. The description of the apartment was very accurate - it is clean, with great lighting and is in a top location. Roberto was there promptly to greet us and give us a rundown of the apartment and the surrounding area. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.
Spacious, clean and modern apartment, would recommend.

El apartamento es muy bonito, está decorado con buen gusto y todo está nuevo. La zona es estupenda. Nos recibió Robert, socio de Antonio, y nos explicó lo más importante para visitar en Barcelona sobre un mapa que nos dió. Resolvió todas nuestras dudas y además nos permitió hacer el checkin más tarde de lo establecido, lo cual nos vino fenomenal teniendo en cuenta la hora de nuestro viaje de vuelta. Lo recomiendo sin duda.

Appartement conforme aux photos! Au Top! Super emplacement ... proche des boutiques, restaurants, bars, métro ... 
super séjour 
Merci
Everything is just GOOD and the location is in center and near to tourism place. Highly recommend

Roberto met us at the apartment. this place is gorgeous and smartly designed, with minimum fuss but maximum comfort. Well located for the metro and walking to the plaza Catalunya takes 10 mins. The bed was extremely comfy and huge, and the apartment is very secure. Thank you for a wonderful weekend!!!

It was great experience at Antonio's place. Easy & fast to communicate with him :-)

Nicest deco & clean house ever! (but it was little too dry when heater was on during cold winter times)

Other than that everything was perfect!

Definitely recommend this place!

The apartment was a fantastic location to see the sights and bar hop in the evening.
The hosts were really flexible with our check out and helping us out by storing our luggage.
Great advice in nearby bars too, a must is the la catalana for the most delicious tapas and atmosphere.

Antonio and Roberto were the perfect hosts; very fast to respond to all our queries and endlessly generous and kind.  After a disastrous, diverted flight they very kindly stayed up to welcome us at a stupid hour of the morning and were total gentlemen about the whole thing!  Their property is beautiful and in a great location.  It had everything we needed and was spotlessly clean.  The bed was very comfy and the apartment is beautifully decorated.  It is very close to many 'must see' tourist attractions but also has great local places to enjoy authentic Catalan food and the atmosphere of the city.  We highly recommend this apartment and our hosts!
If you love Gaudi, you will love the location of this apartment!

What a stunning apartment; perfect location for shopping & dining, loved the high ceilings, flooring and ornaments, good atmosphere, spaciousness, great bed and beautiful bathroom. We visit Barcelona regularly and normally the apartments are very small compared to this one. Roberto is a great host. We would definitely recommend this apartment!! Best regards, 

Stephanie and Rene
Beautiful and convenient apartment, professional and helpful hosts.

The apartement is in a perfect location, in a very nice area, not to overgrouded with tourist. We found execellent restaurants nearby. Felt comfortable in the apartment, it was clean and spacey. We really could recommnd it.
Great host and great location. We enjoyed our stay here very much and would stay here again.
Unbelievable place!! I'll absolutely be coming back for my next trip to Bcn. Thank you for the hospitality and the beautiful home!

Location location location! Antonio and Roberto's place is exactly as described and right next to the major street Passeig de gracia in Barcelona and within walking distance of many major sights. The apartment itself is beautiful, clean and suited our needs perfectly. The kitchen is fully stocked and the flat also includes a washing which was nice. For coffee drinkers, there is a nespresso maker in the apt and a nespresso shop a few blocks down where you can buy a sleeve for 4 euro. Very centrally located, and Roberto gives excellent food recommendations. You won't regret staying here!

I am so in love with this apartment, the interior is amazing the floor the walls just everything! You have enough space it is clean and you just feel comfortable. The location of the apartment is great, everything you need is in walking distance and if not you can easily take the public transports to all spots. Antonio was not in BCN when we stayed there but we were in close contact before our trip. Roberto his business partner was very helpful with his advices during our stay.
Thank you very much, we really enjoyed our stay and will come back again.

El departamento está ubicado en un edificio hermoso y de categoría  en la zona del Exaimple. La ubicación es increíble. Tal como se ve en las fotos, el departamento está impecable. Estuvimos un mes y teníamos  todo lo que se necesita, aún en una estancia larga como la nuestra. Es muy luminoso, amplio y está puesto con muy buen gusto. La cama es super cómoda. La atención fue siempre rápida y eficiente. Volveremos sin duda y lo recomendamos

Die Schlüsselübergabe war perfekt und wurden sehr nett empfangen.Wir waren schon sehr früh angekommen und mussten nur 1/2Std. warten, bis dass die Wohnung fertig war!
Bei einem Cortado in einem der vielen Café 's in der Nähe kein Problem
Wir kamen dann in eine super schöne Wohnung mit einer toll funktionierenden Klimaanlage!
Ein Rückzugsort für die heißen Mittagsstunden!
Die Lage war perfekt für Sightseeing und Shopping !!!
Zu unsere Überraschung durften wir am Abreisetag die Wohnung noch nutzen!

Wir kommen sehr gerne wieder
Departamento muy lindo y cómodo. Muy buena ubicación y la mejor predisposición de las personas con las que uno trata.
Nice apartment in a great location. Antonio was responsive when booking & Roberto showed great hospitality when we arrived. Really enjoyed our stay.

We adored our stay in this apartment! It was absolutely stunning and possibly even more gorgeous in person than in pictures. The location was excellent, the bed was comfortable and the apartment was quiet and dark for sleeping. As well, the bathroom was beautiful! Antonio's colleague met us upon arrival and was friendly, helpful and available if we needed anything. We only wish we could have stayed longer!
Excellent apartment - super central, lovely high ceilings, close to everything and really comfortable bed! Would absolutely recommend this place!

This is our first trip to Barcelona, and we are very lucky I found Antonio’s place. 

The location of the apartment is perfect, in the central, walkable distance to almost everywhere. It is very clean, very good value for its price. Additionally communication went very smoothly with Antonio. There are several top review restaurants nearby as well, we really enjoyed our stay. If we comeback, we definitely going to chose this place again!

Location, Location, and Location!!!!! Right in between Casa Batlo and Mila and very accessible to the metro. Antonio's friend met up with us and took the time to explain the apartment in detail as well as some key points of interests in the city. The sun room is a fantastic amenity with large windows..perfect to start the day and wind down. Thanks for a wonderful stay, Antonio!

Our stay in Antonio's apartment was absolutely perfect.  The apartment was immensely safe and secure and check-in was seamless and very informative. The location cannot be beat, it was central and walkable to all the city's hotspots and transit. We found the apartment to be beautiful, serene and luxurious. The bed was like sleeping on a cloud and the light in the apartment was lovely. We absolutely recommend this stylish apartment for the perfect stay in Barcelona.

Fantastic location -would be hard to beat! The apartment is exactly like the pictures and very stylish as well as comfortable and clean. We were really grateful for the tapas place suggestion -it was wonderful and just round the corner. There are plenty of really good places for breakfast nearby and taxis everywhere so no need to book one. We had a wonderful stay and hope to return soon.

Antonio is a great host, we mainly had contact with his partner Roberto. He recommended us great restaurants off the besten track and was friendly and helpful at all time. The flat is simply stunning, highly recommendable!
Perfect, perfect perfect. It was our best Airbnb ever. Antonio and Roberto were extremely nice and welcoming. Very helpful in every situation, easy to communicate with. I highly recommend.
Overall it was a perfect location for our first visit to Barcelona and will definitely be coming back again! Close to shops and restaurants and walking distance to incredible locations.

What a wonderful Airbnb experience! Antonio and Roberto were super responsive and upon landing in Barcelona Roberto was really great at coordinating with us. The location couldn't be more perfect. My friend and I loved being able to walk and shop around the neighborhood but if we wanted to go to another area of Barcelona, many bus stops and metro stops were around us. The apartment building is currently under construction so there was loud noise all day but it wasn't an issue at all in the early morning and late at night (we were out during the day anyway!). I have told all my friends when they visit they need to stay here. Will definitely stay here again!

This place is gorgeous and extremely clean. The bed, pillows and linens were very comfortable and the location was just minutes from Casa Batllo and Casa Mila as well as a metro stop that goes right to the airport.
El apartamento supera las fotos, todo muy lindo, limpio, los hosts muy eficientes al responder y muy amables recomendando lugares de interes de la mejor calidad. Mil gracias
El apartamento es encantador y está muy bien situado, 100% recomendable.

My wife and I stayed at Antonio’s apartment for two nights. I’m not going to write any fluff, just going to give you the facts. First of all the location is ideal, some of the best restaurants and shopping are in this neighbourhood; it has a really good vibe, it’s safe and it’s in between Rambla de Catalunya and Gracia  streets, what more can you ask for? and around the corner is Casa Batllo Gaudi . I will be recommending this apartment to friends. I’ve stayed at many Airbnb and (Hidden by Airbnb) . I can’t put my finger on it but there was something about this location that made it special!
Absolutely beautiful apartment.
立地も良く､部屋も綺麗で､なによりﾎｽﾄのｱﾝﾄﾆｵさんがとても親切に対応してくれます｡しかし､日本人女性にとっては､鍵がとても固くて開けるのに苦労しました｡あとは､洗濯機があるのですが､説明書がﾎﾟﾙﾄｶﾞﾙ語だったので読めず､うまく使えませんでした｡

Highly recommended ! Responsive and hospitable host. Location is perfect for shopping and dinning with just minutes walk within reach to the “Orchard road” equivalent of singapore. 

Very clean and spacious apartment in modern minimalist setup.

Antonio’s place is perfect for a couple, spacious, clean and in a great centrally located area. The apartment is a 5’ walk to the metro and only a few stops from many of the main tourist attractions.
As a host, Antonio was quick to respond and gave some great recommendations to ensure that we had a an amazing time and experienced the authentic side of Cataluna.
Both myself and my wife (who has extremely high standards, would definitely stay there again).
Great room and best service. Many Thx.

The apartment is as lovely as on the photos. Even though they have doubleglas on the windows, I'd recommend to bring earplugs for the night as its a lively area - which we expected and the location is quite good for trips any directions.
amazing apartment! & great location. definitely coming back:)

Super schöne Wohnung, in perfekter Lage für Shopping genauso wie für Sightseeing-Touren. 
Super Betreuung und Tipps durch Roberto. Einfach alles perfekt!

This appartment is in a terrific location near to the Pedrera building and a short walk to a red bus stop.
The building was undergoing some renovations so the elevator was not working but the appartment itself was spacious and clean . It is in a lovely modernista building and will be lovely when renovations are completed.
I can recommend highly to other potential guests.

We had a wonderful time in Barcelona.
The apartment is very modern and clean, it‘s just about 10-15 minutes to the placa de catalunya.
The area around the apartment is great!
We defenetly would come back again

5 star stay in the heart of Barcelona! The apartment is situated on a lovely street between Ramblas and Gràcia—perfect location to enjoy the city with metro and numerous restaurants and shops nearby. The apartment is GORGEOUS, SPOTLESS, and SO incredibly chic AND comfortable. AMAZING!! Antonio is a thoughtful and helpful host and ensures your arrival is a smooth transition. All the folks in building are kind and Roberto was so gracious to us. You will LOVE this apartment and high level of details to help you settle in.

The condo was clean, modern and in a great location. We loved that Antonio was always quick to respond to any questions we had, and we had many along the way. Upon check in Roberto took the time to give us a map and show us main points of interest. Overall we were very pleased. This was our first Air B&B experience and we could not be more happy. We would absolutely return!
This place was fantastic! Beautiful apartment in the best part of town. Very responsive and a really great stay. Highly recommended

Fabulous location with great hosts.  Really helpful with recommendations and a great place to stay.  One of those lovely moments when you walk in and everything is as described and lovely and clean.  Really near everything and a safe secure area of the city. We will recommend this lovely spacious apartment to our friends.  Thank you for helping us have a memorable time in Barcelona.  David and Debbi

Antonio’s place is beautiful - we loved the architectural detail and charm of the apartment!  It is quite spacious and comfortable and really has everything you could possibly need.  Check-in was seamless and Antonio was extremely helpful with suggestions and advice.  Couldn’t have asked for a better experience!!

We had a great stay at Antonio’s place. Loved the stylish and large apartment. The building will be beautiful once the renovations and lift are complete. Thanks again!! Also special thanks to Roberto for the local tips!

A well fitted out apartment in a great location and Roberto was always on hand too help if you needed any. This made our visit to Barcelona our Highlight of our extended holiday. Barcelona has great atmosphere , great food and nice people. Once again thank you all Warm Regards Jane and Rudi

The studio is superbly located in Barcelona. We could comfortably walk to the major attractions, La Rambla, Sargada Familia, Gothic quarter. Antonio's business partner, Roberto, meet us at the apartment and provided fantastic local knowledge as to the restaurant's in the area, transport options and a update on the situation as there where strikes going on. The communication was fantastic for the entire time of our stay. We would highly recommend this apartment if you are travelling to Barcelona. Beautifully styled and spotless clean.

Sparkling clean and very large apartment in Barcelona. 

It’s a very stylish place in the heart of the city.

If you’re looking for something a bit more upper market then this is your place. 

Roberto the second host whom I met was very hospitable and professional.

I stayed at this place for three days. And it was the best choice. Everything was perfect and his friend Roberto kindly explained anything. I would definitely recommend this house to people who are planning a trip to Barcelona. Thank you, Antonio!
Beautiful apartment, just as depicted. The location is very central and in the nicest neighborhood; restaurants, shops, etc., all at a quick walk. Host is very responsive, pleasant, and helpful.
Great accomodation and great hosts!
Muy caro para lo que es! Esta muy bien, pero el precio es muy excesivo.

The place was amazing! Very clean, stylish and is in a perfect location. Near restaurants and the sights. Its also near the Passeig Gracia subway station which can give u access to almost anywhere. Its also near Batillo Musuem which is also a stop of the hop off hop on bus both blue and red line. Check in was easy. We were late though bet they waited for us. Thank you for such a great stay!

We had an amazing time and we were very comfortable in the apartment. Centrally located, air conditioned and clean! It was beautiful, stylish and modern (but keeping its charm as well)! Highly highly recommend.

This place was fantastic.  Super stylish apartment in a great part of town.  Very much as advertised, but probably exceeded expectations on arrival.  Our host roberto was extremely responsive and helped us out a lot.  His suggestions for eating out etc were excellent.  Would thoroughly recommend this apartment to others.
Great location and stylish apartment - an oasis from the bustle of the city.
Spectacular modern spacious flat in a superb location with everything for a comfortable stay. This is a keeper!!

A gorgeous apartment in a beautiful well-maintained old building with high ceilings, stunning entrance, as well as creature comforts. Perfect location! Terrific mattress. Overlooks street and totally sound proof. Roberto always available. Can’t be beat. Would stay there again and again.
The location was fantastic. This apartment was just as presented. All of the other glowing reviews left us with high expectations which were more than met.
Location, apartment and host are outstanding.  It will always be our choice when we have a return visit.  Barcelona is an exceptionally nice city.
Beautiful apartment and great location! Will definitely come back to stay!
This is a cool and stylish apartment walking distance to everything. The hosts are extremely gracious.
We loved the place!  Only thing you need to do is to shut the balcony doors before sleep.  Else, it was perfect.

Great location and facilities!
Host's kind hospitality is the best among my Airbnb experiences.

Wonderful apartment in a convenient high-end part of Barcelona. This was my first Airbnb experience and the service, cleanliness of the apartment, and the safety of the building made this experience wonderful. I highly recommend Antonio’s apartment for your next trip to Barcelona.

The photos and reviews really do speak for themselves. Everything I had hoped for and more. Don’t waste any more time looking for anything else, or even a hotel, this place offers plenty of space, perfect location, great host and amazing value for money.
This is a beautiful apartment in the best location in the city.  It is near all the monuments and within walking distance.  We would return here.

What a pleasant surprise to find such wonderful hospitality in Barcelona. The apartment was really fantastic, luxurious and very clean (smelled amazing). The location is the best (20 seconds walk to either Paseo De Gracia or the Ramblas. Building entrance was very easy. Our check-in process was excellent. We were met by Roberto, (Antonio's colleague) at the entrance of the building. He was very professional, attentive and courteous. Explained everything in detail. We had a few questions during our stay and Roberto was always on point and responded quickly. Pictures of the apartment are true to form and we felt that many aspects of the apartment, exceeded our expectations in many ways. All in all, we would stay with this host in any of their apartments. To us, the whole experience felt like home away from home. Thank you so much for making it special.

Great location
Very responsive host
Highly recommend if you stay in Barcelona
Awesome place and awesome host. What more do you need?

This was my first time in Barcelona, but after wandering around to the different parts of the city, I'm very happy we chose this location and this airbnb. The apartment was great - clean, comfortable and very easy to get to. I would definitely recommend Antonio's place to any travelers in the future.

What a superb property; wonderful location; beautifully decorated; very comfortable; every feature worked marvelously and backed by superb communication. Five stars all around! Thank you Antonio & Roberto!
房东特别特别热情,公寓很漂亮,所有设备都很齐全.我忘记带驾照,朋友发DHL的快递,我留的房东的电话,房东帮我接受了快递,并把快递给我送过来.完全没有影响我的行程.真的十分感谢房东.

We enjoyed Antonio’s place very much. The location was perfect to get around either by foot or the public transportation system. The place was clean, and the bed was very comfortable. We felt extremely safe in this building as well. The ornate features are incredible in the apartment and keeps character to the old building features absolutely beautiful. My only complaint is that the street noice is loud while trying to sleep. If you are a light sleeper like us bring earplugs.  But any big city in the middle of all the cool stuff is noisy.
Very good place. 100% recommended

name: Modern Waikiki Studio with Ocean Views 29A
summary: Modern new studio with beautiful ocean and mountain views.  Walk to the beautiful Waikiki Beach minutes away. Wifi, HDTV, Gym and pool. Parking available for $25 per day.
space: We provide the following: - Bath Towels - Beach Towels - Shampoo & Conditioner - Iron & Ironing Board - Hair Dryer - Free WiFi - Free HD Cable Kitchenette Includes: - Microwave - Fridge - Stove and Oven - Basic Cookware - Basic Dinnerware
description: Modern new studio with beautiful ocean and mountain views.  Walk to the beautiful Waikiki Beach minutes away. Wifi, HDTV, Gym and pool. Parking available for $25 per day. We provide the following: - Bath Towels - Beach Towels - Shampoo & Conditioner - Iron & Ironing Board - Hair Dryer - Free WiFi - Free HD Cable Kitchenette Includes: - Microwave - Fridge - Stove and Oven - Basic Cookware - Basic Dinnerware Access to all hotel amenities including rooftop salt-water pool, jacuzzi, BBQ area, and access to the Gym.  See security office for details. Available anytime through the Airbnb App. - Public Parking is available for $25 a day and can be purchased upon arrival - On-site Rental cars available on the ground floor - Activities Desk available on the Lobby level  - Multiple Eateries, Convenience Store and a Coffee Shop located on the Lobby level
notes: - Public Parking is available for $25 a day and can be purchased upon arrival - On-site Rental cars available on the ground floor - Activities Desk available on the Lobby level  - Multiple Eateries, Convenience Store and a Coffee Shop located on the Lobby level
access: Access to all hotel amenities including rooftop salt-water pool, jacuzzi, BBQ area, and access to the Gym.  See security office for details.
interaction: Available anytime through the Airbnb App.
house_rules: Check-in is after 3PM The rules are simple. This is a condo-hotel so residents as well as hotel guest. Please be respectful not to make excessive noise, no smoking, and sorry no pets. We kindly ask that you NOT have postal mail delivered to our address.

reviews.comments: Great host! Excellent view and value, I've stayed at many AirBNB locations in Waikiki, and this is one of my favorites!
I enjoyed the apt very much. it was exactly how it was described. Super clean and tidy. Very comfortable.

This was an amazing place to stay in. The view was beautiful, the location was perfect because it was close to the beach and other places we wanted to check out. Even tho we didn't get a chance to meet with Sean, he was very helpful whenever we had any questions. Definitely would love to come back!

Sean's place was amazing! It was clean, great location with good restaurants in the lobby and also amazing views of the ocean and Waikiki. Sean was also very easy to reach for verifications and other information. Our stay at this was great and I would highly recommend it. I would definitely stay here again :)
Great little studio in waikiki. Next to Waikiki Brewing Company which is great for beers and food. Walk to the beach is about 15 minutes but very easy. Nice place, clean and nice.

Loved this studio in Waikiki!  Sean's place has been renovated and is modern, clean and perfect for two people.  The building itself feels a bit run down but it was great to step into such an awesome apartment with great views.

Parking is available in the building for $25 per day (cash only).  Two beach towels are provided.

Sean was super responsive and can't thank him enough for making check-in and out very very easy.  We enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend to anyone!
The description is pretty accurate. It's very clean and overall a great place to stay! I'll definitely book again whenever I'm back in the area for vacation.
I loved staying here during my time in Hawaii. The room is very neat, and there was plenty of room for my stuff. Not to mention the great view :)
The studio was perfect for what I needed for the week. He had the place equipped with dishes, WIFI, bedding, towels, etc...Very clean and simple place perfect for 1-2 people.

My husband and I really enjoyed our stay here. It's perfect for 2 people. The room is really beautiful and the view is great.

As a different reviewer stated the hotel/condo complex itself is a bit run down, but once you enter the room, you forget about the rest. The room is so nicely decorated and the view is the best. I wouldn't even worry about the rest. 

There are plenty of places to eat nearby that you could walk to. There are also a few eateries on the lobby level. There is a place called "burger and sushi" that I suggest you go to if you're looking for a really quick bite. There is also a nice brunch spot downstairs.

Sean was easy to communicate with and did a great job hosting us. When we first came in our key card wasn't working, but we called Sean and he quickly dealt with it. 

All in all, it's a great place, not too far or too close to all the touristy things in Waikiki!

Awesome room, just enough for the two of us. Had a hard time leaving the view. The complex had great places to eat, and we were able to get good use out of the hot tub and pool. Perfect place to unwind or just stay in and enjoy. We're hoping we'll be back soon! Thanks again for everything, Sean!

The stay at Sean's place was great! Very convenient, close from bus station, walking distance from alamoana shopping center as well as Waikiki area. The room was clean and the view from the room was splendid.
He is super helpful responsive and accommodated us at the last minute when we needed a place to stay.

Sean was great! Very communicative all the way through. The apartment was super clean, comfortable, and a great way to spend our 8 nights in Honolulu. The building was close enough to everything and felt safe and secure. Would definitely stay here again! Thanks Sean!!
Amazing stay! Sean's place is perfect & very close to Waikiki beach / shops. Sean was very responsive and the place is equipped with everything you may need. Loved it, we will definitely be back !

Sean was great this was a last minute trip and my husband and I felt confident booking with Sean. The complex is a bit "transitional"  but Sean's place is clean and updated. 2 min walk to a local brewery and less than a mile from Waikiki beach. Thanks Sean!
Sean was very easy to communicate and willing to accommodate early check in. We enjoyed the stay. Highly recommended this place for visitors!

The studio was just as pictured. Very clean and simple. Great view, good AC, and comfortable bed. Sean was flexible with our schedule, which was extremely helpful. It was 10-15 minutes to walk to the beach, and there are markets nearby to grab some groceries. Overall a great rental and host.

Great location if you want to stay out of the hustle and bustle of Waikiki, we were able to walk about 15 mins and be in the centre of everything which was cool. 
The apartment is quite small and basic. It has been renovated and looks exactly as the pictures show.
The apartment was very nice- clean, convenient, with a really great view.  You have a great panorama of Waikiki with the ocean in the background.  It was good value and very pleasant.

Sean's place is lovely, it is clean and nicely decorated. It is also centrally located to great shops and restaurants. The view is wonderful. Sean was attentive and quick to respond to any questions or concerns I had. I would recommend staying here. Thank you Sean!

As first time visitors to Hawaii, this place is great!  My sister & I loved it!  It is clean, modern, safe & the location was perfect for us as most places we wanted to visit/see/check out, were all within walking distance.

Sean is an awesome host - great & efficient communication.  Also helped us check in earlier than normal due to arriving at 6.30am - we were very appreciative of this!

I recommend this place to anyone & would not hesitate to stay here again.

Mahalo Sean!
一般般吧,可以看出房东是用了心要做得比较有逼格,可是毕竟是民宿,和酒店没法比啦,图片看着不错,实际会打折扣,相对来说价格也是偏贵的~

The studio was perfectly located within walking distance of all major shopping, nightlife, and the beach. Sean's place was just as pictured, spacious yet a cozy home warmth to it. With a backdrop of Diamond head for sunrise, waikiki beach during the day, and a great view of city lights in the evening. We had everything we needed to cook a Thanksgiving meal, which made everything feel more like home. This space was perfect. Sean was a great host and was very accommodating to our needs. Highly recommended if you are visiting or just want a getaway in town for a few days as we did.

Sean was a great host. The studio isn't big but it is modern and minimalistic, has everything you need and enough space to be comfortable. I really liked that the shower was a stand up and not in a tub.

My younger sister and I recently travelled to Hawaii for the first time and had the pleasure of staying at Sean's place. Sean was very accommodating to us (even organising a slightly early check in for us given our 6am arrival!) The apartment is in a great spot - walking distance to both Waikiki Beach and Ala Moana. It's a little further back from the beach which ended up being fantastic for us because you're just outside of the chaos but close enough to stroll to the beach/bars/restaurants. Will definitely stay again on future visits!

The place is perfect for one person or couple staying in Honolulu. I stayed in this place for a couple of days in the city and really enjoyed this place. It was comfortable, very clean. The check in process was easy and painless.
Great position

Perfect little apartment! Has everything you need for a few days stay, and in easy walking distance from bars and restaurants. 
Thanks Sean!

The appartment was a great place to stay at, very clean and the whole building is very secure as only registered guests get access. The view you have Out of your window is amazing, you can see the sea, the City and diamonds Head.everything you Need is very close by, ie shops, restaurants , laundry (inside building) , shopping. We had a rental car With which all the beautiful spots can be reached within half an our.
Sean was a Great host enabling us to have the best Time in beautiful Hawaii. We highly recommend Sean and his appartment! 
Thanks for everything, Sean! 
Michel & Danny
Exactly as described

Place was very accommodating, location is great, Sean was also very good in communications. The unit included basically everything we needed which is amazing.  The downsides are that the washer and dryer is on a different floor and requires coins, the AC is also noisy when on energy saving mode, changing it to cool mode keeps it on so we recommend that for overnight. Overall a great unit and would recommend to anyone.

Sean's place is in a great location.  I was here for a conference and it is walking distance to the convention center, as well as walking distance to shops, restaurants, and the beach in Waikiki.  The condo was clean with all the necessary amenities, and has a great view (from the 29th floor)!  I would highly recommend anyone to stay Sean's place.

Sean was an amazing host. He was very attentive. Details provided for check-in was specific and easy to follow. The room met and exceeded my expectations. Very clean and humble home. View was great, I was able to see the ocean and mountains from the high-floor view. All the necessary amenities were provided. There was even water and coffee in the room. i would highly recommend Sean's place to family and friends. On my next visit to Hawaii, I will be booking again with Sean.

숙소를 들어갈 수 있는 방법은 딱 이틀전에만 알려줍니다. 몇박을 하던 타올은 한사람당 빅사이즈 타올 한개만 제공되어 말려서 사용해야합니다.
침구에서 대체적으로 깨끗하지만 
덮는 이불에 먼지가 굉장히 많이 붙어있습니다.  
거리는 와이키키에 걸어갈 만한 위치이며 야경이 좋습니다. 더버스 정류장은 생각보다 가깝지 않습니다.
Sean's place is nice and clean. About a 5-10 minute walk to the ocean. 15 mins from Waikiki Beach. Thanks for a great stay!
Great location and very clean. Perhaps if there were at least a pot or pan for guest to use that would make the kitchen + stove a lot more useable.

His house is really nice. The view is awesome. You can see the river and the beach. And Sean answered quickly.
창 밖에 강이랑 바다가 한 번에 보여서 좋습니다. 그리고 답변을 빨리 해줘서 좋았습니다.

Location, location, location. This is a great value for the location. By stay here, you are within walking distance to all the key areas within Waikiki. A plus - the view from Sean's unit was stunning.

The building offers parking at $25 a day (a bit steep, but understandable), and we never had an issue with finding a spot. It was also very easy to navigate to.

My only recommendation is to pack a pillow and toiletries. To be expected, there were no toiletries in the unit; I was happy to have packed my own. In addition the bed pillows were thin and felt like a low-cost Ikea brand. If you have any preferences on the way you like to sleep, I suggest packing your own pillow. 

Overall, I highly recommend this spot for the traveler looking for a great location to cost/value ratio.

Thanks for letting us get the most of the stay in Honolulu!

Absolutely loved Sean's place. The apartment was very close to the Honolulu conference center (the reason for my visit), but also close to the beach and downtown Waikiki. The view is amazing! The apartment was very clean/well-decorated, and Sean was very quick to answer any of my questions. Beach towels were also provided, which I thought was very considerate.

Beautiful pick! The location is great, the view from the 29th floor was wondeful. The apartment was exactly as described and clean. Everything is in walking distance (e.g. Waikiki Beach ~15min.) Sean was very communicative and friendly. Onsite parking is expensive but i never had an issue finding a spot along the Ala Wai Canal. I would definitely stay again on future visits and recommend Sean and this apartment to anyone. Mahalo!

The unit is close to everything. Eveything is clean and decorated with taste. Kitchen is equiped with the minimal cooking tools but has enough to cook with. Sean was kind enough to accomodate us with a let checkout. Communication with him was really easy!
This place was awesome, the view was better than the pictures. I would definitely book with Sean here again if I'm staying in honolulu again!
This place what definitely what we were hoping for for our stay! The views were amazing! Very centrally located to all of the activities in Honolulu/Waikiki.
Sean was a great host! Extremely communicative, response and accommodating.

This is a great comfortable and cozy place to stay for couples or individual travelers. The place is nicely remodeled, bright, clean and has a beautiful view of the canal and the ocean. It also has all the usual appliances, accessories and utensils for cooking, eating, showering, towels for the beach, etc. Wifi and cable is provided. Check in and check out is super easy. You can't go wrong staying here. Sean is a great host too. He's quick to respond! Thanks!
Great location, easy check in. Parking is a bit expensive $25 per day. Clean room, great air conditioning and comfy bed.
Perfect place to stay in Waikiki! Nice view, close to the beach and all main attractions. We would recommend it to anyone.

My wife and I had a wonderful stay at Sean's condo. The pictures are accurate, the place is very clean, and the view is incredible! The beach and ABC stores are all in walkable distance. We would certainly stay again!
A decent compact studio apartment within walking distance of the beach and all the shops/restaurants of Waikiki. On site parking and gym are both available and easy to arrange. Would recommend.
I had a wonderfull stay in this flat that is very lightfull and with a great view over waikiki's skyline ! Communication with sean was perfect.

The place is in a great location with lots of food and shopping options within walking distance. Everything was clean and having a kitchen definitely was a bonus. Would definitely recommend this place to any friends or family looking to go to Waikiki!

Sean's place was perfect for my trip to Oahu! As others have mentioned the building is a bit outdated but the unit itself is newly remodeled and feels clean and modern. Building was safe. The space is small and the bed is a full which is perfect for 1 person, maybe 2. Parking is $25. Check in was simple, and communication with Sean was quick and easy. Location is perfect if you want to explore Waikiki as well as the rest of Oahu. Room has beautiful views of Diamond Head and Waikiki beach. I would definitely recommend Sean's place for anyone traveling to Oahu on a budget. I know I will be back!

The place looked exactly like the pictures posted. It was very nice, clean, conveniently close to the places we wanted to get around in Waikiki &  Ala Moana Center, and the perfect amount of space for two! Also, very fast and easy communication with Sean. I would definitely recommend his place and would come back and stay at his Air Bnb again!
this is a good place!

We enjoyed our stay. The place is updated, clean and spacious. The kitchen is equipped with everything you might need. TV has Netflix and radio. The view is amazing, especially at night. The window being open the place is breezy and never hot, so we end up turning off the  conditioner. There are buzy streets below, so traffic buzz is unavoidable, still nothing extra, easy to get used to. Lots of good places to eat and close to the beach. The walk to the beach is short and nice as you can walk through Hilton Hawaiian Village with ponds and waterfalls. The host is great and responsive. We would most definitely stay again.
Great location!   We were easily able to walk to the beach and shops! Awesome studio apartment.  Sean was very easy to communicate with.
Sean's place was exactly as pictured, clean, tidy, and great location. Pool area was also great. Would definitely stay here again!
The place is clean and just as depicted. Fridge works. Kitchen works. Everything alright.
Perfect, well kept, comfortable space for one or two people! Convenient location and awesome communication with the host! Highly recommend amd would definitely use again! :)
Sean's place was nice and clean with a lovely view.  It was about a 10minute walk to central Waikii but there is some places to eat that are very close.

We had an amazing time during our anniversary trip to Hawaii.  It was a great apartment that had everything we needed for our week long vacation in Paradise. Our host was very responsive and helpful, we really appreciated it. It was a great location about a 10 minute walk from the beach and near great restaurants, would highly recommend!
Amazing view and 10 minute walk from the beach. Was a great place to stay!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Sean's place for a week and it was the perfect home away from home! The room was clean, bed was comfy, and spacious! Walking distance from the Waikiki strip and beach. Communication came easy with Sean and didn't need much help getting in/out of the room. Would definitely stay again!
Sean's place was great! Awesome location, very clean and easy instructions, we couldn't of hoped for better!

Great location. Apartment was clean and tidy and was perfect for what we were after. Short walk to the start of the main strip (5 minutes) and short walk to the beach (5-10 minutes). Would definitely stay here again. Sean was great, very responsive and easy to talk to, which made staying in Waikiki a lot easier.
We had a excellent stay at Sean's studio. Very convenient location and nice view of diamond head. The ac was wonderful and much needed in the hot climate. Communication with Sean was flawless.

The place felt a little smaller than advertised, but I guess they're all like that especially in Honolulu. Other than that we had a great stay. The view and nearby beach is amazing and Sean was very responsive. Would come back.

Sean's place was great! Such an incredible view both up the canal towards diamond head and over to the ocean at Waikiki. Only a 10 minute walk into the centre of Waikiki, also had air con, and great facilities (bathroom, TV, kitchen, oven/stove, microwave), Netflix was also a huge bonus. Such a cute little unit and a great view, would stay here again.
Все очень чисто, удобно, хорошее местоположение. У нас не было никаких проблем во время проживания. Всем советую арендовать жилье у Шона!
Great place with a surprise view of the ocean and Diamond Head! Really tidy, new and easy check-in and communication. Would definitely recommend and stay again.
Vraiment beau! Ca sent bon! Très centrale! Près de tout! Nous circulions beaucoup avec Biki et The Bus! Je recommande à 100%!!!!
좋았어요

Good location. Strange building, good unit. Simple unit. No top sheet (Sean dropped one off once requested) AC was loud and blasts at your head when sleeping if you have it on, which is needed due to the heat. Host was a good communicator initially, but not after I had to leave unexpectedly.
Wonderful stay, it’s really central to some of Hawaii best hidden gems and has the most fantastic view.
The place is clean, has a great view, and walking distance to everything in Waikiki. Sean was a great host and shared some helpful tips. Would definitely stay here again.
Great location with a great view.

The apartment was much better than the pics. The locations was perfect and nice views of the river and the sea. Cosy place and also the location, you can walk to Waikiki Beach in less than 10min and also Ala Moana Centre! Sean was a great host and responding quickly my messages. Would definitely stay here again. Something I didn't espected was the beach towels, I forgot completally to bring mine and I was thinking to buy one and he had two there already.

100% I recommend Sean's place.

Place was as advertised. Easy access and very central to everything, restaurants and shopping area. 

Only negatives - Staffers in the building are not pleasant and at times rude. The A/C unit is loud for those light sleepers, and water pressure in the shower was weak on the last two days of our stay. Wish we had more than two towels for bathing and beach . Albeit, building did have washer/dryer however do need to pay for it. 

During our stay, building at water system maintenance so they shut off the water. Apparently this is once a month. We were out and about so it didn't impact us. 

Other than issues noted, good location.

Sean's place was exactly as described. We didn't want to rent a car while staying in Waikiki and his place was in a perfect location! It is close to restaurants, the beach, and convenient stores. It was about a 15 minute walk to the beach. The view from the room is amazing too! This was our first Airbnb and it was an amazing experience!

10 minute walking distance to Waikiki beach, great view of the canal, clean stylish room. What else do you need?
Hope to stay here in the near future.

Sean's place was great for our week in Oahu. The apartment was clean and we really enjoyed the wifi, Netflix and air con. The only down fall of our stay was the other guests staying around us, as we had a bit of noise a few nights. All and all Sean was a great communicator and we had an awesome time!

Sean's place was exactly like the images - perfect space for one or two people! I loved the decor and the kitchen amenities. Location was within a walkable distance to Waikiki Beach and pretty central. The apartment was everything we needed!
This place was great! Very clean and cosy. Close to the beach (10 min walk) and tons of shopping and restaurants. Sean was very accessible and easy to communicate with.  Thanks Sean :)
Great view over Waikiki. Check-In was easy. Apartment was clean and had everything you need for your stay.

I really loved the location. You look out the window at night and your surrounded by lights. Waikiki beach is just walking distance away. Sean gave us very clear instructions for check in which made it a breeze to get to the room. We only stayed in our room when we were sleeping since we were always out and about but it was a very great place. Highly recommend it!
Thank you so so much.
