Sean’s place was great! Convinient location with everyone we needed. Everything was within walking distance and Sean was easily accessible via phone. It was easy for parking since it was within the building - worth the $25 bucks since we didn’t have to uber anywhere unless we went out of Waikiki!

Beautiful view!  Definitely a great place to stay on a budget. Close to shops and the beach.  I’ll echo what others have said - the air conditioner is a bit loud, but wasn’t a problem for us. Water pressure in the the shower a bit low. Clean room and well styled.
Great space, great view.  We stayed with our 22 month old son. Perfect amount of space central location. Clean and updated suite that had everything we needed!
Nice apartment with a great view, walkable to all of Waikiki’s attractions (if you don’t mind ~10 minutes of walking). Parking was straightforward too.

You can use Netflix. And laundry is 5th floor. Shower water strength can not control. Its weak to us. And we got 2 body towet for  3 days. And 2 beach towel. Location is good to rent car. Air conditioner sound is little loud. But its good condition.

We enjoyed the central location of this property.  There is a good coffee and breakfast sandwich (crossiant, streaky bacon, eggs and cheese) bakery in the lobby.  The Seven Eleven is next door.  Loved the views from the property.  The Air con is loud but we were grateful for having it :).  Netflix was a great addition.  We did nightly strolls along the Waikiki strip.  It is about a 15 min walk.  Ala Moana Mall is closeby. The property is good value.

Notre séjour de 4 jours dans le studio de Sean était super.  Il est propre et très bien localisé dans le quartier de Waikiki.  Il se trouve à environ 15 minutes de marche de la plage de Waikiki et est entouré d'une multitude de restaurants et de boutiques pour tous les goûts.  On a même une très belle vue sur la ville et on peut même voir l'océan à partir de la chambre du 29e étage.  La communication avec Sean était facile.  Pour les 2 derniers jours, nous avons loué une voiture pour visiter un peu plus le reste de l'île.  Nous aurions pu prendre le stationnement à 25$/jour, parce que ça n'est vraiment pas facile de stationner dans Waikiki, mais nous avons choisi de stationner un peu plus loin et nous trouvions des stationnements, avec un peu de difficulté, dans un rayon de 1,5km.  La seule chose que nous pourrions reprocher, c'est que la description de l'appartement disait qu'il y avait une cuisine pour se faire à manger, ce qui est vrai, mais nous n'avions pas vu dans la description qu'il n'y avait pas de grille-pain et de machine à café, alors que, selon moi, une cuisine fonctionnelle devrait avoir ces éléments à la base.  Il y a tout de même une pâtisserie, qui sert aussi du café, dans l'immeuble... ça dépanne.  Malgré ce petit détail, je recommande le studio de Sean, parce que c'est un excellent rapport qualité-prix dans Waikiki.

The room was the perfect size for just my wife and I, perfect for any couple looking to explore. It didn’t have much in the room other than WiFi and a television which is all we needed for the minimum time we stayed in the room each day as we explored the trails and the entertainment around. The room was clean and had everything we needed, Sean thought about everything, would gladly stay there again

Great place with an amazing view of Waikiki. Very convenient location and the option of parking came in handy. Quick responses from Sean to our questions. Thanks for a great stay we loved exploring the island.

Loved this studio apartment. Perfect size for 2 people. The bed is full size and there is no couch. What you see is what you get. Sean kept in contact when necessary and was prompt to respond. Waikiki was a busy beautiful city and Sean’s place is close to all. Definitely recommended! We’ll be back soon! Mahalo :)
This place was perfect! Beautiful view of Waikiki, clean, fun and stylish!!

We did not enjoy our stay here and I would not recommend this place. 

Good: clean, bed was comfy, location is close to beach and other popular areas downtown, AC worked well, nice pool and hut tub

Bad: shower did not work and I had to fix it for it to run properly upon our arrival, shower curtain rod will fall down during your shower, they give you a broom but no dust pan? No oven mit! No baking pan! No toaster?! Are you kidding!? Smallest frying pan possible provided (big enough for 3 eggs), AC VERY loud beside bed, many police calls in the area, no beach gear provided, building was old and smelly (compared to other places in the area), only 2 pillows provided, not enough towels

We loved this place for the price! The location was great and in the middle of everything. The only issue we had was the parking for $25 a day and the loud AC right next to the bed but I believe that comes with almost any unit you’ll rent since it’s so hot in Hawaii. The hosts were fairly quick on their responses and very kind. Loved having a microwave and a refrigerator for the nights we cooked in or needed to keep something cool. Wayyyy better than a hotel!!!

Exactly as pictured in the photos. A couple minutes walk from the main strip so relatively quiet area. Very responsive and easy check in instructions. No issues in recommending to anyone to stay here.
The place was very clean and Jennifer/Sean were quick to respond! They even had sunscreen and beach towels all set for us! Overall, we had a lovely stay!
Sean and Jennifer we're great hosts. Great communication and easy check-in and check-out. Will definitely stay here again.
Thank you! Everything was fine. Great location and nice view.
Sean/Jennifer's place was awesome!! :) Loved the location, the studio itself, and everything went so smoothly. Staying here definitely added to my Honolulu experience – thanks guys!

Although Hawaiian Monarchs itself is not a best place to stay compare to the other hotels, this room is cute and clean with beautiful Ocean View and Mountain View. 
I enjoyed staying this room and it was easy to go to the Waikiki by walk and easy to go to Ala Moana by bus.
Thank you so much.

Sean’s place was very clean and looked exactly as the pictures portrayed the place to be. Although the AC was loud, it worked splendidly and the room was wonderful to come back to. There were even drinks in the fridge for us and the shampoo, conditioner, and the body wash was provided. There were 2 shower towels and 2 beach towels and the water pressure on the shower was fine. Thank you for a great stay!!

Sean's studio is a great place to stay when visiting Honolulu. The apartment is very comfortable and located in a great spot within walkable distance to shopping, restaurants, and the beach. Sean and Jennifer were also very proactive in providing all of the information I would need to get the most out of my stay in their studio apartment. I highly recommend booking with Sean and Jennifer!
Great place. Very clean and amazing views. Handy location. Thanks Sean and Jennifer.
All around great value for Waikiki on an affordable extended stay. Full kitchenette was awesome. Central location. I will hopefully be returning soon.
Great location, perfect for access to the beaches and the shops.
The views are incredible. The room was more than adequate for our 2 night stay and super clean. The area is good with amenities all around and the beach is only a short walk.
Awesome spot! It’s in a great location/walking distance to many things. The place itself has an awesome view and styled nicely. The hosts had great communication.
Clean, good location
Endroit bien situé , transport en commun accessible et près de la plage

that was
a spaious room with a great view.
you will definitely enjoy it!

This listing was outstanding and the location couldn't be anymore perfect. The waikiki strip and beach were just a 8 min walk and ala moana mall is just a a quick uber away also. Definitely recommend this listing. The hosts were also amazing and response to our messages quickly.

This condo was great value. The location was perfect for us, 10 min walk to both the beach at Fort DeRussy end, and Ala Moana for shopping. Buses to Pearl Harbour and elsewhere were really close too. Plenty of choices for dinner within a mile walk and a decent size pool on level 6. 
Overall, this was value for money and suited us. Good coffee down in the lobby too, which we found on the last day!

Sean's place was just as pictured. It was clean, stylish and had all the basic necessities. The view from the room was amazing and location was close to a lot of restaurants and stores. Communication was also great and very responsive. Would definitely stay again.

Location is great, and the room is clean.
The hot spa is great. But there are no pots and pans.

Seans place was just as in the pictures. Also clean and very stylish. I enjoyed the view out of the windows and the close proximity to food and stores. 

Be careful about parking, a lot of tow zones and not a lot of street parking. This building has paid 24hr parking for hotel guests. But it can add up in price. 

Will be back.

Excellent view of everything Waikiki has to offer. Great walking location to downtown and has an awesome restaurant and bakery downstairs. Parking is gated $25/24-hours or free parking on the street 6pm-6am (no parking any other time).
We enjoyed Sean's place very much and would recommend to anyone looking for a convenient location in waikiki

We enjoyed our stay at the accommodation in Honolulu, the location was great and we had an amazing view! It would be nice to have some more cooking utensils but besides that everything that one could need was there :-) 
Easy check in check out!
Great place with great location! This place also have amazing view which I enjoyed very much!

Room was OK but very minimal. What you see is what you get. The cleaning and the location were great!
The noise is an issue in this house as one apartment is basically divided in 2. The result was to hear everything the neighbors were doing.

Very clean and cute studio. We had everything we needed for our 2 days stay. Check in and check out went off very quick and easy with the lockbox in the lower lobby. We had a great stay there and the location was good to reach great restaurants in Waikiki and the beach.

I had a great stay in this apartment, place is simple but totally clean, everything you need is there, it looks exactly like the pictures, communication during booking was perfect and totally helpful.
I can recommend it!

Sean's place was in the perfect location! We really enjoyed waking up to the beautiful Waikiki skyline every morning and walking to downtown was really easy. The location of the apartment was also not far from the airport as well as North Shore and Kailua. The apartment itself was very clean, thoroughly stocked, and the perfect size for my boyfriend and I. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone visiting Honolulu and looking to stay close to the action, but not too far from the countryside. Thank you again!

This was my partner and I's first stay at an Airbnb and we loved it. Communication between Jenn was fast and easy. The room is in such a great location, an easy walk to everything. It was modern, clean and bright! Thank you!
Thanks a lot! I loved the aparment, great location and incredible view of honolulu. Everything was really well. I totally recommend it!

Aloha,
This condo was perfect for what we needed for a short stay in Waikiki for a dental convention.  It was a 5-10 min walk over the canal to the convention center which was perfect and a bit longer walk to the beach or a cheap Uber there when we got tired of walking.  Very simple condo, but got the job done for 2 people that planned to be on the go more than hanging out in our room the whole trip.  There’s a refrigerator, microwave and stove if needed too.  Would recommend this condo!
Mahalo!
Great location. Nice to have a stove and fridge in the unit to prepare food. Bed was slightly small for two people to sleep in especially if one or both are taller or wider than normal.
Sean’s place had a great location and the condo was clean and nice. Would really recommend this place!

Amazing view. The room was really clean and nicely decorated. They respond quickly to any questions and the people inside the hotel are really nice and helpful. Security was amazing didn’t have to worry about anything.

The apartment is in a great central location, very convenient local amenities (breakfast/coffee, convenience stores, public transportation etc) & all of Waikiki is within walking distance.  Quick & clear communication with the hosts.   Apartment is is perfect base if your “out & about” for majority of the day.   Thanks!

The room looks very cute and was nicely decorated, also the view was perfect. The room included everything we needed and a lot of storage room. The kitchen includes basic supplies to cook small meals but the pots and pans are quite small, also there was no coffee maker, but downstairs is a cafe, where you can get coffee and pastry, and some other places to eat. The check-in procedure and parking is very well organised. The location is good, although ca 10-15 minutes walk from the main shopping center and beach. Nevertheless, we enjoyed the walk.
Loved staying here!

I would rate this 5/5 for its cleanliness, comfort, and safe environment. It is a cute, small studio perfect for two. If you want to explore Waikiki everything is walking distance and the food downstairs is delicious. The apt provided us with beautiful sunrises every morning and we had an absolute blast. If you’re looking for an affordable, safe, and close place to the main strip of Waikiki I would recommend here. We also parked a car downstairs for a reasonable amount a day and the communication between the owners was always quick & informational. Mahalo, we’ll be back!

Lovely clean, compact apartment which is close to amenities like the laundromat and bus stops. About 15-20 mins walk to waikiki and the Ala Moana centre. Excellent views and Taco Bell is only 6 minutes away!

Great location. I really enjoyed my stay, and the view is amazing. 

The only downsides I can think of are that building is a bit run down and the elevators sometimes take a looong time to arrive. But you're on vacation, right? So no rush. The pool area is nice, with a big pool and lots of space. The apartment itself is in good shape, and I need to reiterate that the view is truly fantastic!
Sean's place is pretty  damn awesome. I really love the view that the condo has and I like the way the place was arranged. Thank you again Sean for that awesome stay at your place.
A wonderful place to stay with a great location!
Clean and super cute.

I was in Oahu for a couple days for training and this was such a great accommodating  place for me. I was able to walk to a few places for food during my stay since it’s in Waikiki which there were a lot of options near by. The apartment looked just like the pictures and was very clean. You get a beautiful city, lake and ocean view from the apartment! Jenn was very helpful and quick with responses when I had any questions. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Jenn & Sean!

Great location, amazing view, snorkel equipment + beach towels made a huge difference too. Only one drawback- it is impossible to sleep in if you need a dark room, the curtains do not block the light at all.
Really great location to be in and the apartment is really nice. The only downside is that the walls are very thin so you can always hear the neighbors.
Nice view and location.

It's very stylish and clean. Everything was in the room. But one of room card keys didn't work for elevator and door. I stayed here for 5 days, but towels were given for only a day so it was inconvenient I needed to wash towels

neighborhood_overview: Botafogo is strategically situated near all of Rio de Janeiros best neighborhoods and attractions. The neighborhood is at the foot of Christ Redeemer, 5 minutes from Copacabana, 5 minutes from Sugar Loaf, and a quick (15 min) Metro ride from Ipanema or the center of the city.
transit: There are bus routes to all neighborhoods on the street next to the apartment. The metro is a quick walk and there are public bikes for rent right around the corner.
access: The guests have full access to the apartments common area, which includes a fully furnished kitchen, living room and a separate bathroom. The apartment has WiFi and cable.

name: Lovely & Cosy apartment in the heart of Sheung Wan
summary: An amazing location in the heart of Sheung Wan on Hollywood Road, makes this place magical - close to Soho, Central, MTR. During the day you will enjoy walking to all city's attractions (Man Mo Temple, PMQ, coffees shops near Tai Ping Shan St, antique shops on Hollywood Road) and at night restaurants, clubs, bars (Lan Kwai Fong & Soho) - literally everything ! The apartment is very central, so perfect location to discover Hong Kong city centrer !

reviews.comments: The apartment is very cute and cozy. The place was clean and the host is very nice. Location wise, the neighborhood is one of the best in HK. Would recommend to others. Size is good for single traveler and okay for two people.
The place is great - good location, cosy and clean. I didn't meet Aurelie as she was overseas but she was always very responsive to our messages. Good experience overall.

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.
space: Two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, ideal for groups of six people and families. The main bedroom has got a double bed, the second bedroom has two single beds. Moreover, there is a sofa bed for two people in the living room. It is located in an a Art Nouveau building in the central Eixample neighbourhood. The apartment offers an elegant and contemporary design. Original architectural details such as the high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts.  There is a large shared terrace which offers amazing views over the city. It can be used by all guests who stay in this building. There is Wi-Fi, satellite TV, AC and heating, as well as other modern appliances. This apartment has a spacious, comfortable combined living room-dining room, and a well-equipped kitchen.
description: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona. Two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, ideal for groups of six people and families. The main bedroom has got a double bed, the second bedroom has two single beds. Moreover, there is a sofa bed for two people in the living room. It is located in an a Art Nouveau building in the central Eixample neighbourhood. The apartment offers an elegant and contemporary design. Original architectural details such as the high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts.  There is a large shared te
neighborhood_overview: The Eixample is the Catalan Art Nouveau centre of the city. The area was built in the late 19th and early 20th century. The architecture of the neigbourhood is stunning, with some real gems to explore. A few steps from your apartment you’ll be able to feast your eyes on amazing buildings such as Gaudí’s Casa Batlló and the lesser-known but stunning Casa Amatller. The area is one of the cultural and shopping heart of the city. You’ll find designer stores and high street brands next to all sorts of great restaurants and bars. A short walk (5 minutes) will get you to the bustling old city, where you’ll have another great selection of shops, markets, museums, art galleries, restaurants and bars ro choose from. The area boasts great transport links and you’ll be able to get to all ends of the city in a few minutes by underground, overground, bus and taxi.
notes: City tax is not included (2.48€ per person per night) and is payable upon arrival. Touristic license: HUTB-004930
transit: The apartment has great access to the rest of the city thanks to the metro stations of Urquinaona (L1 and L4 - Red and Yellow lines) and Arc de Triomf (L1 - Red line and regional train station). Both of them are just 5 minutes away. There are also several bus stops around.
access: All you have to do in order to check in is let a member of our team know exactly when you will arrive, so that he or she can come to the apartment and help you with everything you need.
interaction: Our team will be there for you whenever you need it. You can give us a call 24/7. If necessary, a member of our team will come straight to the apartment in order to help you with your questions.

host.host_about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.comments: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

시설도 위치도 모두 만족스러웠어요 
다음에 가면 또 갈꺼같아요
Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.
카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 10분 걸립니다 위치가 매우 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 안전합니다
Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A beautiful, clean, well equipped apartment in a fantastic location.  Exactly as described in the listing.  Check in was swift and efficient.  We were given plenty of tips and information by our host. Within 5-10 minutes walk of Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of shops and restaurants within a minutes walk of the apartment.  You must try the restaurant below the apartment if you stay - we had two excellent meals there.  Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as there is a fair bit of road noise, as is typical for well appointed apartments in Barcelona centre.

Excellent location, very clean, modern amenities, and plenty of space. This is a perfect apartment for four people. We loved staying here. The apartment management was very helpful and allowed us to check in early. We loved exploring Barcelona from here. Almost everything is just a short walk away. It's also very close to a Metro station. We could not have been happier with this apartment

This beautiful apartment was the perfect home base for our family of four. In a very quiet neighborhood situated near wonderful restaurants and shops. Grocery store was also nearby. We had a perfect visit. Other reviews have mentioned corporate apartment. This may be the case but it did not take away from our experience. They responded quickly to all of our requests and arrange a taxi to the airport.

Location is perfect, you can reach a lot of sightseeings, shops, restaurants within 10 minutes. Host was very friendly, ready to help 24 hours a day. Apartments itself really clean and cozy, you can find everything you need. Hardly recommend!

This apartment is beautiful, with old-world detailing and modern amenities. The Metro is literally a block away and there are supermarkets, restaurants and bakeries on the same block. We were glad to have a dishwasher and washing machine as well! Highly recommend this convenient and beautiful location. As others have said, it is corporate-owned so does not have the personal feel at checkin-in but the people that helped us were are very friendly and helpful.

We were only able to stay in Barcelona for a quick 2 night, one day stay, and this Airbnb worked out perfect. It was in great location to get to where we needed to go, and most of it we could do by walking. They were very professional at check in and communication and the place was clean and had everything we needed for our quick stay.  Thanks again for everything!!
A great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Great flat, good communication. Helpful for parking too. I recommend this place.
Yaiza's place was beautiful and great for our group of girls. Towels and amenities were provided and the house was very comfortable. I'd love to stay here again!
Прекрасные апартаменты. Отличное место положение. Рекомендую для краткого пребывания в Барселоне.

Oct 17 – Stayed for 3 nights, 2 guests only. Beautiful apartment. Apartment has 2 bedrooms 1 x double, 1 x twin both with shower rooms, double room overlooks the main street, may need ear plugs if you’re a light sleeper. Lounge/dining/kitchen area with table that seats 6. Kitchen fully equipped for a short stay. The apartment was furnished to a high standard, good quality, well looked after and very clean. It’s a 15-20min stroll to the old quarter/port. Apologies I have forgotten the name of the lady who greeted us, she was extremely helpful indicating good restaurants on the map and places of interest. All the staff were helpful, I have no hesitation in recommending this apartment. Hope to visit again in 2018..
Great location
Place is clean and at a convenient location

Loved our stay here! Centrally located to all sights, and located above a cafe with a supermarket close by. Amazing staff - can't recommend this place enough. Oh, and super fast WIFI. If I'm ever back in Barcelona, I'll definitely book here again!
EVERYTHINK WAS WONDERFUL, THE LOCATION, THE HOUSE AND THE SERVICE . VERY GOOD CHOICE.
Great spot. Recommended
Super Apartment. Sehr zentral, sauber, gute Kommunikation und Tips. Definitiv zu empfehlen!
Muy bien
Great location, perfect apartment for 2 to 4 people, excellent value.

We really enjoyed our stay here. Check in was a breeze, and the apartment was ready earlier than expected. It’s in a great location, and the glass enclosed balcony is fabulous. There is noise from the street that can be heard, but that wasn’t a real bother for me.
Clean, comfortable and very convenient! Walking distance to many restaurants and tourist attractions.

Execelnte ubicacion, muy bueno el departamento y mejor atencion.
10 puntos en todo concepto
Excelente  lugar, cómodo, amplio, ordenado. Lástima que sólo estuvimos dos días

5 of my friends and I rented this apartment for a few days regarding a school trip, and we had the best time. Great location and amazing customer service, would love to come back some time! Thank you for having us.
Excelente departamento y atencion. Nos recibieron super bien y nos dejaron ocupar el piso bien temprano. Muy buena ubicacion cerca de todo. Sin dudas volveria
We are a family of 6 and the space and location worked great for us. A great place for a great stay.

We really enjoyed our stay. I loved the interior, Spanish tiles, modern facilities, high ceilings, attention to detail, easy check-in process. Would recommend if you would mind staying in a small space for four people.

We stayed one week at Yaiza's place. The apartment was perfect for 2 couples.  No hanging space for clothes, so that was a little surprise. The charming balconey was perfect for morning coffee or afternoon wine. The rooftop was also a nice option.

The location was terrific. We went on foot to parks, museums, the Rambla, Gothic Quarter. 

Anna, who helped us check in, gave great orientation to the neighborhood, and recommended a wonderful restaurant just down the street.

We would stay there again.

The apartment was perfect for the 5 of us. Check in was fast and easy. Loved the balcony. The location was perfect and centrally located which allowed us to walk to all the sights we had planned to visit.
Lovely space. Great location.
Nice apartment.  One shower is very small but suitable.  Excellent communication.  Met us very late as we had a late flight.  Gave good tips for surrounding area.  Good location but a bit noisy.

Great place in a great location. Very clean and tidy, recently refurbished flat. However, we found that the 2nd room with the twin beds was a bit tight. The beds were too small for full grown adults, so was the shower.
Apartment ligt heel centraal, is mooi en schoon! Aanrader

Great location. Close to everything with a café downstairs which was awesome. There’s a decent of stairs balcony that was shared. And elevator which is nice and And not always common in Barcelona. All in all had a great stay!

Great apartment for four people on a weekend or few days away.  Central to the city and surrounded by great restaurants.  Would be hard to stay for longer than a week as it had no washing/ironing facilities.

We very much enjoyed our stay. Check-in was great
We enjoyed the front sun room/balcony and even saw parakeets in the tree right in front of us. The terrace on the roof was wonderful at night.
The apartment was charming and sparkling clean.
There a lots of services near by and the location was great for walking to sites.
Great location and space. Easy check in. Highly recommend!

Schöne Wohnung. Sehr freundlicher Service. Einziger Störfaktor war das Zimmer zur Strasse. Aber ansonsten sehr empfehlenswert. Auch toll war, dass wir unser Gepäck in den Büroräumlichkeiten deponieren durften.
Stylish apartment in an ideal location
Beautiful apartment. Immaculate. Great location.
Great place with an even better location !
位置不错,但是房东回复太慢,另外入住前两天凌晨两点和凌晨四点都会有陌生人疯狂按门铃敲门,特别吓人,而且阳台百叶窗也不能锁,房门也不能锁,和房东反馈后,回复也不积极,心惊胆跳的住了三晚,都没睡好!
Nice appartment - Nice neigborhood

logement très agréable, bien placé, deux trois problèmes matériels à résoudre non remarqués par Yaiza à priori.
bon accueil
Wonderful apartment in central Barcelona apartment.  Everything was as described.  We hope to return again someday.
Yaiza's condo was lovely.  Easy walk to great attractions like the Gothic Quarter, and nothing but excellent restaurants nearby.  Would rent again if and when I return to Barcelona.
We booked a two bedroom apartment for our trip to Barcelona and the location is superb! We walked to many places or take the metro, very convenient. The apartment is really clean and stylish!
Rien à dire! Parfait à tous les niveaux...

Appartamento ottimo sia per la posiZione sia per la pulizia e per gli arredamenti veramente ricercati,
L’angolo del terrazzo dove puoi far due chiacchiere alla fine della giornata è super!
Tutto bene l’host è stato perfetto!

This place was wonderful
We loved our stay, it was quiet and warm
Conveniently located within walking distance to a lot of attractions and cafes
I would highly recommend staying here
Nice and spacious apartment in a historic building at a great location close to everything. We enjoyed our stay very much. Highly recommended.
All well and as advertised.

A fantastic apartment 
As good as the pics looked
Would definitely recommend it
Simple but stylishly decorated, spotlessly clean and an amazing location to explore the city from. Loved it

The Apartment was great. Close to the Center of Barcelona, clean and it was super easy to communicate with the Owner. There was a small problem with the Wlan but it got fixed on the same day. Thank you very much for the great hospitality.

Lo bueno:
Buena ubicación 
Limpio
Buena calefacción 
Facilidad al hacer el check in
Buena y rápida comunicación 

Lo malo:
Vajilla insuficiente. (Por ejemplo había 3 vasos y 3 tazas y no habían platos grandes) nosotros éramos 5 y esto nos dificultó. 
Calefón insuficiente para 5 personas. La tercera persona ya se quedaba sin agua caliente. 
Dos horas y media antes de realizar el check out avisamos que el elevador estaba roto. Si bien enviaron el técnico y no lo solucionaron, teníamos que bajar todas las valijas por escalera y no nos dieron prórroga. Enviaron a alguien a que nos ayudara pasada la hora del check out, cuando ya habíamos bajado todas las valijas.
Amazing location, really cool apartment and great hospitality. Would definitely stay again!

The balcony was beautiful. the place you can go any spota by walk.
supermarket and bakery is near the house too. it was perfect place to go enjoy the city.
Apartamento muy moderno con cocina y baños totalmente equipados. Muy acogedor.
My family and I had a great stay in this apartment! Conveniently located, clean, and safe. Would definitely recommend!
Todo muy correcto
Superbe appartement ou tout était parfait.

name: Maui Beach House Chic Style with Tropical Views
summary: Aloha Maui vacation planners,  Welcome to beautiful Wailea. Grand Champions Villas is located in the heart of Wailea and nestled between The Wailea Blue Golf Course, ranked among America's best resort courses by Golf Digest and The Wailea Tennis Club ranked as one of the country's 50 best resort tennis facilities. Across the street from the Villas is The Shops at Wailea where you will find luxury shopping and fine dining as well as the luxury hotel properties linked by a beach walk.
space: Both bedrooms are very large and private as they are located on opposite ends of the condo, linked in the center by the kitchen and living room. Each bedroom has a private ensuite bath with double sinks. Each bedroom contains large double mirrored closets for hanging clothes, shelving for folded clothes and a dresser. The living room furniture has been upgraded with down fill for comfort.
description: Aloha Maui vacation planners,  Welcome to beautiful Wailea. Grand Champions Villas is located in the heart of Wailea and nestled between The Wailea Blue Golf Course, ranked among America's best resort courses by Golf Digest and The Wailea Tennis Club ranked as one of the country's 50 best resort tennis facilities. Across the street from the Villas is The Shops at Wailea where you will find luxury shopping and fine dining as well as the luxury hotel properties linked by a beach walk. Both bedrooms are very large and private as they are located on opposite ends of the condo, linked in the center by the kitchen and living room. Each bedroom has a private ensuite bath with double sinks. Each bedroom contains large double mirrored closets for hanging clothes, shelving for folded clothes and a dresser. The living room furniture has been upgraded with down fill for comfort. Guests are able to access the entire interior and lanai space on one level. There is one locked closet in the master bat
neighborhood_overview: The condo is located in Wailea, a master planned community, which means all green areas and roadways are meticulously kept and high rise/dense buildings are not allowed. Maui's 5 world class beaches are located in our neighborhood, with free beach parking, all within a few minutes drive of the condo in both directions north and south. The closest beach to the condo is Ulua/Mokapu beaches which are a 15 min walk across the street. There is also fine dining, shopping and a grocery store within a 10 min walk across the street at The Shops at Wailea.
notes: I check in with all guests within 24 hours of their arrival via email to inquire if the condo was properly cleaned and prepared for their arrival and to ensure they arrived safely. We are able to offer complete guest satisfaction as housekeeping will come back out and remedy any cleaning issue that does not meet expectations.
transit: The island and area is serviced by Uber and also a local open air shuttle service, Turtle Tracks
access: Guests are able to access the entire interior and lanai space on one level. There is one locked closet in the master bathroom for housekeeping service items.
interaction: Guests have access to my Property Manager in person, by phone and by email. Guests also have my cell phone number and email. I am able to assist guests in their requests/needs/vacation planning and suggestions at all times.

host.host_about: My wife and I have traveled to Maui for years to escape the cold St. Louis winters. We have enjoyed Wailea's luxury resort properties. When we started our family, it was no longer practical to stay in hotels with limited space, compromise security with two separate hotel rooms and incur the food and beverage costs of our growing children. As business travelers we have had the opportunity to visit some of the most amazing cities but none of these locations have come close to the feeling of peace and serenity that we have found in Wailea. Grand Champions Villas is hands down the greatest value in all of Wailea. The central location, beautifully maintained grounds, security and space within the villas cannot be beat. The villa is perfected by a truly beautiful interior with a fresh, relaxing vibe. It was our goal to bring the beauty we saw in the grounds of Wailea to the interior of the villa where we spend time with our family creating cherished memories. We would love to share this magical place with you. Hula On In to Beach House Chic Style. With warmest aloha, Paul

reviews.comments: The condo was exactly as pictured so there weren't any surprises when we checked in. It was clean and well decorated, located in a quiet neighbourhood with a number of nice beaches nearby. The condo's wifi connection gave us no problems, and the owners added the extra touch of giving us access to their netflix account allowing us to relax on the couch after our longs days out exploring. The kitchen was stocked with all the cutley, dishes and pots and pans we could need throughout our stay and dishwasher pods so we didn't have to take time away from vacationing :) The owners also provided us with plenty or towels and beach towels, and other amenities such as a blow dryer. Besides the beaches, I didn't feel that there was too much to do in the close vicinity, but I was still happy with the location as we had plenty of activities planned all over the island, and Waliea-Makena ended up being a relatively central point. I would definitely recommend this condo when your visiting Maui! Aloha :)

This was a very comfortable spacious condo and worked great for us with 4 adults... 2 steps to the pool and less than 10 minutes drive to Makena Beach... a couple of minutes walk to Matteo's Osteria (definitely recommended!). 

Our hosts were in constant contact with us and very responsive. We would highly recommend and would definitely come back if we are in the area again.

Thank you!

It was amazing! Paul was the best!
mahalo

This place is absolutely amazing. We stayed here following the Westin in kaanapali which was a tough act to follow and the condo was absolutely breathtaking. 10/10 recommend and our host was an absolute delight to communicate with. We loved this place so much with my 2 year old son!

We just got back from staying in this condo for 8 nights.  We had 5 of us so worked out great.  Was clean and nice decor... looked looked as pictured.  We enjoyed the convenience of the condo.  The lanai overlooking the pool was great to keep an eye on our older kids as they swam at the pool.  We were in and out alot and very convenient that there was a reserved spot.  The kitchen was well stocked and is great having convenience of kitchen as well as washer and dryer.  Paul was always quick to answer our questions and make suggestions.  We also enjoyed checking out the local restaurants and beaches!
Everything was wonderful!

name: A lovely cozy apartment near HKU
summary: A very lovely cozy apartment with high profile equipment and property management. Super convenient to everywhere in the city and quite close to HKU university.  PS: The fat cat is excluded so she will be not at home during your stay :)
space: It's an all-included studio with one bed room and one shower room. High quality electronic appliance are available. More generously it has two tiny cute balconies which offer you a space to breathe the nature's fresh air. There's also paid TV programs for entertainment.    There's one double bed and one sleeping sofa being capable of hosting 3 persons to stay. You can easily get access to everywhere of the central city as it's only a 5-min walk to the HKU MTR station. Moreover it's definitely a great place to enjoy either artistic or local HK life as all those wet markets, convenience store, restaurants and coffee shops are within walk distance. Last but not the least, HK university is just 10 min walk away which absolutely makes your life easier if you would like to take a visit or just randomly hang around the campus.

notes: This apartment is under an excellent property management. There's also lounge , gym and karaoke room downstairs for you to kill time!
transit: HKU MTR station is just 5-min walk away!
access: Samsung Tv with paid programs, the fridge, microwave, washing machine, piano, Yamaha CD player, Bose Bluetooth music player, built-in Tv in restroom.
interaction: I'll try my best to offer any necessary assistance and revert any of your queries soon as possible
house_rules: Maintain its serenity and do not disturb other neighbors.

host.host_about: After many years of working, travelling and living in different places, I come to understand better of the society and nature. I’m still on the way to know more of my self.

address.street: Hong Kong, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.comments:
Lucy is a great host. She is so helpful and responds quickly.
Her place is compact with all amenities which I needed. 6-8 minutes to the underground and plenty of good local restaurants around .
Condition of the washroom needed to be improved.

name: Superior One Bedroom Golf Course n Mountain Views
summary: Fully furnished and upgraded with granite countertops in kitchen and bath, cherry wood flooring and stainless steel appliances.  Queen bed in bedroom and full futon sofabed in living room.  Washer Dryer INSIDE.  Window ACs in living room & bedroom.  My place is close to the beach, family-friendly activities, nightlife, and public transport.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Rate includes Hawaii taxes.  Parking available for additional fee.
description: Fully furnished and upgraded with granite countertops in kitchen and bath, cherry wood flooring and stainless steel appliances.  Queen bed in bedroom and full futon sofabed in living room.  Washer Dryer INSIDE.  Window ACs in living room & bedroom.  My place is close to the beach, family-friendly activities, nightlife, and public transport.  My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.  Rate includes Hawaii taxes. reviews.comments:
Able to stay well, hosting as good, very good. Also wanted to stay.
ｱｸｾｽも良く､ﾎｽﾄの方も親切でよかったです｡
また滞在したいｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑです｡
It was really comfortable stay.Thank you so much!!

The building was pretty secure. You have to use key fob to enter the building and then to get to elevator as well.  
The host was good and she responded to our messages very quick. However, we still had some issues. People who stopped by to help with problems work as security personal in the building and didn't know how to fix stuff. 
Location was good and beach was about 15 minutes away if walking.

Some pillows didn't have pillow cases and sheet on the fold out couch was all in some spots like it was not washed for a while.
Wifi was very slow and we had times when it was not working.
Some furniture in the living room was very old and ugly. Table and chairs had paint cheeped off and table when unfolds is not straight and things can easily slip down. Air conditioners are loud and when they blow air it smells a little like mold. Couch was so old and looked very washed off or dirty even hard to say but we felt disgusted to seat on it and had to cover it with a blanket. 
Also the place is crazy noisy at night. Since windows were not completely sealed we could hear cars and people all night. Definitely, not a perfect place to stay with a little child. 
Everything else was included like in the description. Kitchen had all the cooking pots, dishes and appliances.

今回私の両親が10日間滞在させてもらいました｡
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝはｲﾝﾀｰﾅｼｮﾅﾙﾏｰｹｯﾄﾌﾟﾚｲｽの正面(ｸﾋｵ通り)から入ったｱﾗﾜｲ運河沿いにあり､ﾜｲｷｷの中心なのでﾜｲｷｷなら徒歩で移動するのに便利でした｡またtheﾊﾞｽの停留所､ﾋﾟﾝｸﾗｲﾝの停留所も近く多方面へのｱｸｾｽにとても便利でした｡

お部屋は予約した部屋の写真と違っているように思いましたが､間取りは同じで部屋は思っていたよりかわいいお部屋でした｡角部屋で部屋からの景色も良かったです｡部屋､ﾊﾞｽﾙｰﾑ等､清潔感がありました｡
Wi-Fiも問題なく使えましたし､ﾃﾚﾋﾞも海外､日本のものも見れました｡
ﾌﾙｷｯﾁﾝで炊飯器､ｹﾄﾙ等､備品も充実していました｡洗濯機と乾燥機も部屋の中にあったのでとても便利でした｡
