Great value for money. Fantastic location close to everything you need and check in/out was seamless

This is a modest condo that has the necessary things to get by. 

Pros:
-Location was very convenient. It’s about a 7 min walk to Waikiki beach. All of the restaurants are around 3-5 minutes walking distance. 
-Condo has a kitchen. We ate out everyday but the fridge and sink was good to have. 
-Cable tv in HD was very nice (watched the games for the World Cup) 
-Ability to park in the secured condo garage (this is also a Con - $15 cash per day/night) 

Cons:
-Queen size bed (extremely hard-definitely on the firm side) 
-Paid Parking ($15 per night in cash or $20 via Airbnb) 
-Condo could use an update (kitchen, restroom, appliances and furniture, etc) 
-No Central A/C (Window A/C units - however majority of the places are like this, unless you stay at a hotel)

This was our first time in Hawaii and I am so happy that we were able to enjoy it at Leonore’s place. The view is absolutely phenomenal. The location is walking distance to everything imaginable. Check in was a breeze. I would highly recommend this beautiful condo! Thanks for having us Leonore! MAHALO AND ALOHA

name: Beachside in Paradise
summary: Beautiful Kailua Beach is just steps down a private lane.  The cottage is on a quiet, private dead-end street with little traffic.  Walking distance to a little shopping area with shave ice, pizza, beach gear rental, and more.  Kailua town is 5 minutes away by car or comfortable strolling distance.  The town has a variety of restaurants, supermarkets, boutique shops, health food stores.  Weekly outdoor markets offer the best in local produce, baked goods, and local prepared food.
description: Beautiful Kailua Beach is just steps down a private lane.  The cottage is on a quiet, private dead-end street with little traffic.  Walking distance to a little shopping area with shave ice, pizza, beach gear rental, and more.  Kailua town is 5 minutes away by car or comfortable strolling distance.  The town has a variety of restaurants, supermarkets, boutique shops, health food stores.  Weekly outdoor markets offer the best in local produce, baked goods, and local prepared food. Hawaii Tax ID # GE/TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % tax is included in daily rate. For stays longer than 2 weeks, an additional $100 cleaning fee will be payable to the owner for every 2 weeks.
notes: Hawaii Tax ID # GE/TA (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) % tax is included in daily rate. For stays longer than 2 weeks, an additional $100 cleaning fee will be payable to the owner for every 2 weeks.
house_rules: - The cottage is next door to our home in a quiet neighborhood, so we ask that you respect your neighbors privacy as well as the quiet nature of the neighborhood.  Please treat the cottage and it's furnishings with respect.  You are welcome to share the pool beside our home from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.

reviews.comments: A place to relax away from the hustle and traffic of Waikkiki after a busy day of sight seeing.  Comfortable accommodations and beautiful, world class beach, 2 minutes walk away. Fully equipped kitchen and 2 bathrooms make family life much easier.
Wanda and Dick's house was amazing, being able to go from the beach to the pool was an experience we will never forget. Everything about the house was absolutely perfect. Thank you for having us!
This cottage is very close to the beach. My children played at the beach everyday with beach goods. Wanda and Dick are very kind and I want to stay again.

My family of 5 (8yo, 6yo, and 7month old) love Wanda's place.  It's only 30 seconds walk to one of the best beaches in Oahu. Their pool is a great addition to have as our kids enjoyed it as much as the beach.  There were a couple of days of non stop raining during our stay and umbrellas were provided to save us $$$.  

They were also extremely accommodating.  They have set up a crib for us so when we arrived at 2am, we can take our baby straight to bed without much interruption.  We even have some breakfast items readily available to make that morning because we arrived in odd hours of the morning to buy anything.  Just be sure to put all food in the fridge as there are ants who'll fight for your food :-)

They gave excellent recommendations on a popular shaved ice joint around the corner that Obama visited often as well as a hidden poke gem in a liquor store next to Safeway (also serves best Kalua Pig in town only on Mondays/Wednesdays/Fridays, so much better than Kono's) that only locals know.  The place is also close to Beto's Taco truck which serves delicious Mexican shrimp and fish tacos (I'm from LA and I know what's good) late night for a decent price.

They have loads of extras,too (bug spray, sun block, shampoo/conditioner, sand toys/chairs/beach umbrellas, beach towels, laundry detergent).  

Overall, we had an excellent experience at Wanda's place and can't wait to go back there next time we're in Oahu.

Wanda's cottage was absolutely perfect. From location to hospitality we couldn't have asked for anything better. Being a block Kalapawai Market is perfect and you're just far enough from the public part of Kailua beach that you can avoid the crowds down on the sand. Perfect for morning walks with your coffee. Best thing about the cottage is the ocean breeze!
So convenient location. Very clean. Both of Wanda and Richard are great hospitality and nice personality. We would like to stay again.
Everything was excellent, location is great and the house too. Private, quiet, comfortable home

name: Spacious Suite - Matosinhos Sul (Beach)
summary: My space is located near the beach, the airport, public transport, nightlife, eatividades for families. My space is good for couples, solo adventures, and business travelers.
description: My space is located near the beach, the airport, public transport, nightlife, eatividades for families. My space is good for couples, solo adventures, and business travelers.
transit: Temos estação de metro a 100mt, autocarros a 50mt, estacionamento a porta. Ligação ao aeroporto de carro em 7min ou metro.
interaction: Teremos todo o prazer em colaborar para uma boa estadia com todas as informações que forem necessárias, restaurantes, lojas, locais de interesse,etc.

reviews.comments: The host canceled this reservation 13 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 111 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

localização otima.,  porem o anuncio estava livre  para  os dois dias que eu  precisava, após  a reserva  houve  uma demora para a resposta, o anfitrião cancelou o primeiro dia e me complicou , a cidade  de porto estava  lotada de turistas e  sem vagas  nos hoteis e  tive que  desenbolsar  um valor alto pra conseguir  uma vaga  em um hotel,  o apartamento e muito bom com tudo por perto, supermercado, farmacia, restaurantes,  e metro

name: Comfy private room in Williamsburg's top location!
summary: It's a private room with a full size bed in Williamsburg. The greatest thing about this place is it's amazing location. Just two minutes away from subway which is running 24/7. It will take only 10 minutes to get to Manhattan. There are plenty of bars and restaurants that Williamsburg can offer. If you have any questions, please reach out to me and I will be more than happy to help you!
description: It's a private room with a full size bed in Williamsburg. The greatest thing about this place is it's amazing location. Just two minutes away from subway which is running 24/7. It will take only 10 minutes to get to Manhattan. There are plenty of bars and restaurants that Williamsburg can offer. If you have any questions, please reach out to me and I will be more than happy to help you!
house_rules: No extra people without permission

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments: Ivan was a great host. The location was good and easy to access anywhere. It was a great experience!
Great place. Very convenient. The room is clean. Good value
Was ok the place was nice the neighborhood was not so cool but the test is perfect

The perfect location in Williamsburg, close to everything you need and steps from metro. Ivan is friendly and communication was easy. The air conditioning was much appreciated during the July visit. There is construction nearby but I didn't hear any of it, just made the building slightly hidden from one of the angles outside.

The location of this apartment could not be better. It is close to many attractions and to public transportation. The room was clean and comfortable the window air conditioner unit was a great amenity for a stay during the summer. I did not have use of the living room because it was being remodeled but it seemed like it will look great when it is finished. Look forward to seeing updated photos.
The room was clean. Ivan is a nice host, gave me the room almost an hour earlier than the check in time considering my flight was an early morning flight. The neighborhood, however, was not so cool.
Ivan was easy to communicate with. Cheap for Williamsburg.

Very well located and comfortable for that price! Ivan and his (Hidden by Airbnb) are a cool bunch of guys, they are welcoming and you can have nice conversations with them. The flat is quite small but cosy (they were giving a little lifting to the living room), plus there's a cooler and a fan in the room, which is really useful in NYC in the middle of the summer!
And you're just one block away from 3 subway lines that take you in the heart of Manhattan (or you can walk 5-10 minutes to enjoy Williamsburg's atmosphere). More than a pleasant experience, I would recommend this Airbnb to everyone looking for a stay in Brooklyn :)
Great location and value. Room was clean and simple, perfect for a quick visit in NYC. I was able to check in before noon, which was very convenient for me after overnight flight.

The people watching over the place were very helpful, friendly, and communicate very well. This was a pleasant stay around a really nice area of Williamsburg. I would definitely recommend these accommodations to anyone.
Awesome place and friendly people there. Would recommend it!

This was a most wonderful place to stay - airy, cool, clean, and comfortable. Ivan was a great host and welcomed me warmly. Incidentally, I had one of the best sleeps there I've had in years. Highly recommend!
It was perfect for our one night stay as a stopover for the US open game. It is in a walkable neighbourhood to subway, restaurants and bars.

Ivan and his roommate are nice people who helped us with any questions. The apartment is located in Williamsburg  with nice cafés and boutiques. It's just a short ride to Manhattan so it's perfectly located! The room is quite small and the apartment is located in the basement of the building. Unfortunately it is not really clean...

Ivan es un gran host. Su departamento esta muy bien ubicado (a una cuadra de la estación Marcy Av.) muy cerca del centro de Williamsburg y a una estación de subway de Manhattan. 
La habitación esta impecable, la cama muy cómoda, el internet funciona perfecto y el lugar muy tranquilo, ordenado e higiénico.
Recomiendo 100% hospedarse con Ivan, sobretodo para quien quiera estar cerca del centro de uno de los mejores barrios de Brooklyn.

Ivan was kind and sent his friend to give me the appartment key, the room is very good located, near the new "soho" in williamsburg. The room is very quite even though it is just around the corner of the Marcy metro station, i will stay over again if im in town.
Ivan's place is located really conveniently for travelling in Williamsburg. It's pretty simple but all that you need.
Nice place to stay. Very close to the metro station also.
This place is a great value. It is conveniently located relative to Manhattan and Williamsburg. The room itself was cozy and clean, as well as quiet.
Habitación en buena ubicación, cerca de zonas de interés de williamsburg y a un paso del metro, muy cómodo para llegar a Manhattan y habitación silenciosa.
Everything was fine and Ivan was great in accommodating my schedule ..
Very flexible and casual.
Perfect location and perfect host. The room in only three minutes walk from the main station. Room was simple and clean. Thank you!
Ivan and his room mate were both very kind and accommodating. The location is perfect with access to the train which is around the corner. I would definitely stay here again.
Comfortable stay all around! A clean and quite room was exactly what I needed for the time I was around the house.
The apartment was right next to the subway that go straight to Manhatten!  Very convenient.
Ivan is a wonderful host. It was very clean and I enjoyed my stay a lot. It's very quiet and I had a great sleep. Thank you Ivan, you are the best!

Good spot if you're looking for a place to sleep. Super close to the J and M train that takes you into manhattan after one stop. Great host, great communication. Clean bedding and rooms. Space heater in the room helps keep it plenty warm in the winter.

Ivan's place is a truly lovely accommodation. It's a great place to have a wonderful sleep, perfectly located in the walking distance to Bedford avenue, which is well known as the most vibrant place in Williamsburg. The subway station is in one minute walk. It was a comfortable stay. Thank you Ivan!

This was my first time to use Airbnb. I was a little worried before traveling, but it turned out to be perfect!!! It was a very great room, clean, beautiful with good neighbors. It felt like a home. Ivan was super nice and handsome! He even bought a new heater for us, because the old one is a little noisy. I will highly recommend this place if you want to go to NY. It is 5 min walk away from subway. There is a big parking lot nearby as well. Thanks!
Ivan was very nice. The room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Bathroom was clean. There were other guests in other rooms but everyone did their own thing. Great location.
Joven muy dinamico y simpatico. un grupo de amigos muy cool.
Ivan's place was great for our stay in NY - conveniently located near public transportation and easy to get around Brooklyn. I recommend his home to anyone looking for a quick place to stay in NY.
Serviceable. No frills, but gets the job done and at a good price. Ivan is great, a responsive and able host.
Great location! Kind and thoughtful host! Everything I needed was there. Also thanks for your flexibility Ivan!

Ivan and his friend were really nice and easy to deal with. They're very flexible as I left my bag outside the room after check out to tour the city. The room and bathroom are clean. I didn't use the kitchen as I was always out but it looked clean as well. 

The place is a 2 min walk to the closest MTR so it was convenient to get to the city. Ivan will respond to your questions right away.

Ivan was a great host. He is very friendly and outgoing. There are a few roommates in the suite and they are also very friendly folks. The place itself is very cozy and close to a subway station. It is very quite at night, which makes it a great place to stay for light sleepers in a sleepless city.
Convenient location and a good place if you are just looking for a bed to crash. Ivan and his roommate are very chill and nice guys!
I would stay again for sure
Great location, Ivan and Maxim were helpful. Small and simple room but fine for my purposes.
Really convenient place, a block from the subway. Quiet place and nice roommates.
Super easy stay. Check in and check out was a breeze. We were out and about most of the time but we were provided with all the amenities we would need. Great location as well.

Ivan's place is in a great location, near Berdford st in Williamsburg (that is full of restaurants and bars) and a train station that takes you directly to downtown manhattan. 

He's a wonderful host and a very nice person. 

The room was smaller than I expected (I couldn't determine it from the pictures) but this is not a problem if you're going alone. I went with my partner which made it a bit uncomfortable. I had a good time overall.
Clean and quite. Very walkable distance to public transit. 1 stop from manhattan.
Great location, good value for money. Everything was OK.
Ivan' s place was as advertised and I had a great stay while I was there. It's  a bargain for the location and I wouldn't hesitate to stay there again if I'm in the area.

Ivan was incredible, from the second I arrived to the moment I left. He made me feel at home and was always available when needed. I would recommend staying here as you are very close to the city and have great restaurants in the neighborhood. The room and public spaces were kept clean. I will definitely be back.
Very quiet, nice place to stay. 1 minute walk to bus and metro stations. Would stay here again.
Great

The convenient thing about this place is just the location. The apartment is in a basement, dark, with no windows at the entrance, kitchen and bathroom. Needs some fresh air. The bathroom is a bit running out and not clean enough. The room was tiny, dark, and with no closet.
I had aunts in my room for 3 days. I've also founded objects under the bed and under the shelf from previous guests. Other (Hidden by Airbnb) were also eating my food from the fridge. All the reviews are great, so i don't know if i was unlucky, but i must say that Ivan is a good guy and communication was great. Even if the price was affordable, surely this flat needs to be well organized to be better.

Ivan's place was perfect for my one night stay.   He was very responsive to texts and emails and met me at the apartment to let me in.  The room was comfortable and the apartment is 1 minute walk from the subway and close to central Williamsburg.  Great value for the price.

Place is in a perfect spot, close to everything and you can walk absolutely everywhere.  I'll definitely stay again.  Max was super cool, I also had quick responses from Ivan.   The place is just what you need.  Other roommates are in the actual apartment but I didn't see anyone.   I stayed for a night .  Place gets the job done if you just need a place to stay that's close to everything in Brooklyn-   Thank you Max and Ivan

The location of Ivan's apartment is more than perfect. You are literally 3 minutes walking from the metro station, which is 15-20 minutes ride to the heart of Manhattan. The room was clean and comfortable. The AC was more than perfect for the summer days. Ivan is very friendly and cooperative. I will surely stay in his place again.
Ivan was easy to communicate with, location was great, room was ok, bathroom was too dirty for my liking.

good location.
so comfortable to enjoy bloklynand easy access to Manhattan.
Good location in Brooklyn, close walk to all Williamsburg restaurants and bars. Right next to the train and easy to get to Manhattan.
Great location! Quiet and comfortable place in a fantastic neighborhood. Would recommend!
Great place. Accurate and super close to train. Ivan was really nice and responsive.
Ivan is such a nice host, he helped me in many ways. Subway station and a quite big super market are just around the corner.
Ivan was fantastic and very welcoming. We enjoyed our stay a lot
Great location, conveniently located next to public transit. If your looking for a clean affordable place, this will get the job done.
Just stayed for one night. Ivan was very nice!

My stay at Ivan's place was perfect.  The room is very quiet (which is a true rareness for New York City). The room and the apartment are very clean, and Ivan is a fantastic host. He was very flexible with the check in and check out. I would most certainly recommend Ivan's place to everyone!

I was really please with Ivan's place, Ivan met me when I got there and explained everything, the room was very functional, good AC and clean, the location is excellent. I would definitely recommend it and will be back
Ivan was a great and friendly host. Always responsive and eager to help!
Convenient location to the subway, stores, and restaurants. Nice and quiet room. Ivan was very polite. Enjoyed my stay.
Nice guy, nice stay, couldn't really ask for much else
The house is near Subway station and it's very convenient. The room and bathroom is quite clean. The room is a bit small but I think it's common type in NYC. Finally, Ivan is very nice!

Super logement , très bien placé a deux pas du métro 
la clim était nécessaire heureusement que la chambre en était équipée .
Ivan est très accueillant et toujours rapidement la quand on a besoin de quelques choses
Solo traveler. It was a great place to stay at. Super close to Bedford Ave. and all it's cafe and bars. Would recommend.
A simple room in a really convenient location - metres away from an all-night metro stop and within walking distance of great Brooklyn cafes, bars and yoga studios.

Overall, fantastic. Ivan was a great host, and very easy to communicate with. The location was amazing (hip neighborhood, and 1 subway stop from Manhattan). Good value for your dollar if you’re looking for a place on the cheap to stay in Williamsburg. Only had one problem — the room and bathroom weren’t as clean as we would have liked them to be. If this 1 issue is dealt with, this place is a definite 5/5!

Ivan's place is as advertised. It's a private room in Williamsburg, close to the subway. It's clean, the bed is quite comfortable.  Check in and check were a breeze, and Ivan was flexible with those times, accommodating and friendly. I'd be happy to stay there again, if the opportunity comes up.

Good for modest price allowing nearby access to Manhattan on subway.    
3 blocks to subway line. 
Small room.  comfortable bed. no closet or drawer  space . 
Ivan very nice.
Decent sized room in a fantastic location. Less than 5 minute walk from the metro, one stop to Manhattan.
In a convenient location next to williamsburg. Ivan was available when needed.
Ivan’s communication was fantastic. The space was quiet and calm. Location was very ideal
Alright place. Nothing fancy, but does the job for the price. I was there just to sleep. No heating in the bedroom. It was kind of cold at night.

Great weekend stay at Ivan's place -- he was very friendly and accommodating with my requests to drop off and pick up luggage before and after check in and check out. Excellent location for the price!

Very centrally located to Williamsburg and Ivan was extremely responsive and flexible with my check-in, thanks Ivan! Room was very basic with no storage space but clean, warm and should fit your purposes if you are only there for a night or two and aren't planning on staying in much.
Great room. Conveniently located by the subway. Great host and tips.

Ivan's place was perfect for our quick weekend trip up to NYC. his communication was so prompt and gracious; he met us right at his place and make great suggestions on local places to see/eat at! glad we stayed with him!

Ivan was a gracious host in that he accommodated for me arriving 2 hours earlier than anticipated and still welcoming me. The room is as advertised; comfortable and private feeling, even being quite close to the subway and bustling Broadway Ave. Of the rooms I stayed in during my visit to NYC, this was one of the cleanest and homiest feeling. Whenever I return to the city I only hope Ivan is still a host

This would be a good deal if it was twice as cheap and had an easy cancellation policy. 

This is not a private room by any means, this is a shared student apartment with very thin walls and a lot of traffic and a bathroom used by at least 3 other men and every woman that visits them. 

The location is great but it doesn't justify the price point, amenities or conditions. 

The space heater was like a jet engine, but I guess it's necessary to filter out roommates chatting in the lobby at 2 AM or the terribly annoying bass echoes from the hipster dance club next door. 

I didn't even sleep for 15 minutes that night. 

For travelers looking for a quiet place to sleep it's a 2/5 - if you're going to get wasted and try to get tail, this is the perfect 3.7/5 if you don't tell them it's an airbnb. 

Please lower the price, I've had way better experiences in better locations and conditions for a much lower price.

Ivan was great on responding fast to any questions we had. He had a great place to stay and was very accommodating when my boyfriend and I had to check out later than the time. I Highly recommend, I would defiantly stay again if the chance came out. Overall very nice place for the price!!! Thank you Ivan!

Amazingly located apartment, you have everything you need close by.
2 minutes walk to metro lines into the city. Apartment was clean and Ivan was really nice. Would stay here again if I visit Williamsburg again.
Great spot. Clean house. Right by the subway. Host was hospitable and kind and helpful
Great place, great location, great host. Perfect place to stay in Williamsburg!

This is my second time at Ivan’s place. The room is great, it’s clean, comfortable and quiet. Ivan was very flexible with my check in which was great. The location is simply amazing, just minutes away from the train and one stop from Manhattan. Thank you Ivan for being a great host!
Ivan is place is great for its price!
위치가 정말 좋아요
War super gut! Sehr guter Host!

Great little place to crash for a few days if you’re in brooklyn. It’s very quiet and relaxing. It’s within walkable distance to the Metro and to bars & restaurants. It’s smack dab in the middle of it all yet maintains a quiet living space. Overall, would recommend to anyone looking to stay in brooklyn.
Ivan’s place is great! Really near a subway station and therefore easily accessible. I would recommend to anyone going to NY
Good place to stay in if ur visiting for a couple of days

Ivan is a great and gracious host. He gave me all the details I needed to know and was very helpful to point out directions and where to go. Even offered me dinner the first night, great host. Would come back and stay. He lives in a great part of Brooklyn.

This is a great value.  It's not particularly fancy but the space offered what I was seeking this past weekend as a solo traveler in NYC: a clean space in a convenient location.  While it took a little while to get in touch with Ivan at first, once I got in touch with him, his directions about how to access the building, etc. were very clear.  There were other guests staying here in another room but our paths never crossed and I didn't have a chance to meet Ivan in person.  It was a very quiet environment which worked perfectly for me (I was essentially just looking for a place to sleep, get ready in the morning, etc.).  It's an easy walk to the Marcy Ave subway station and feels like a safe neighborhood of Williamsburg.  It's a cheap Uber ride from Manhattan, which is where I spent most of my time during the stay.  I would stay here again and would recommend it to others.
great little room hidden from the street.  very close to the subway. didnt’t get to meet Ivan but everything is easy here. good for a short stay.
Excellent location. Walkable access to subway.  Clean place comfortable bed.
This is an awesome place to use as a base for checking out Brooklyn.
Tak for husly:-)
Good

Ivan's place is ideal for whoever is looking to visit Manhattan and Brooklyn area.  It is very close to the subway and walking distance from the lively and hipster area of Williamsburg. The room was clean and quiet. Ivan was very responsive host. I'll definitely book Ivan's place again for my next stay in NY.

It was the perfect stay and I recommend it for anyone wanting a comfortable place to lay your head while be in proximity to both Brooklyn and Manhattan. It was a great price point for the city and the host was extremely accommodating. Not to mention it’s located right by the train, so you can easily navigate the city to and from. I will definitely be back and using Ivan’s place as my preferred stay again!
Check in was super easy and the location was perfect! The subway stop is right around the corner and everything in the apartment was as I pictured. Overall, great place to stay!
Comfy apt in a great location

Great place to stay. Very convenient public transportation. Station Marcy St. is right around the corner. 
Place is clean and cool.

Ivan’s apartment is perfectly located just a 10 minute walk from Williamsburg and directly underneath Marcy Av station which is one of the main subway lines into Manhattan. The bed was comfortable and the space was ample. Couldn’t have asked any more. 10/10
Good location.  Nice clean room.
Great location, clean place, would stay again!

Ivan’s place was not as expected. While it was in a convenient location, it was uncomfortable because other rooms within the Airbnb were being rented at the same time. I did not have the ability to lock my room and therefore felt uncomfortable leaving my belongings in the room. I would not stay here again.
Ivan was fantastic! He’s super chill and nice!!

I stayed at Ivan’s place for three days and two nights and I would not recommend this place for longer than that time frame.

It was easy to check in and Ivan was responsive. However, I was not aware that there were two other Airbnb guests and no option to lock my door. Thus, I just carried my important belongings throughout my trip. It felt like a security hazard.

I didn’t mind this other issue, but others might. My first morning here, I noticed at least 10-15 ants all along the baseboard and walls of the room. When I texted Ivan about the ants, he said that he would take care of it right away. The next morning when I was scheduled to leave, I noticed more ants along the baseboards of the room. Again, I did not mind this. It is New York and pests are everywhere. However, if you’re deeply concerned about ants or other critters, I would probably avoid this place.

I really enjoyed my short stay at Ivan’s place which is located only a short walk from Williamsburg’s restaurants and cafés. Ivan showed great hospitality and had tons of ideas where to go and what to do around Brooklyn and Manhattan. I can highly recommend staying with Ivan if you are looking for an easy place around Williamsburg.

Ivan war sehr freundlich und hat mir seine Hilfe angeboten. Das Zimmer liegt im hinteren Teil der Wohnung und ist ruhig. Die Subway-Station Marcy Av befindet sich in unmittelbarer Nähe und ist der optimale Ausgangspunkt, um Manhattan und Brooklyn zu erkunden.
You can’t beat the convenient location to the train, a great stay for those who want a safe quiet space in a good transit location. Short walking distance to bars and restaurants

Really close to public transit and the room is amazingly quiet for being so close to the train. Ivan is very friendly and nice and was attentive when I needed something. Couldn’t have been more convenient to get around!
Ivan’s place was great. Great location next to the Marcy Ave train station - it’s about as close as you can get to Manhattan. Very hospitable as well.

I’ve had one of the best experiences staying at Ivan’s place. The apartment is super cool and the location is amazing. I totally recommend this place to anyone who wants the best experience in Brooklyn.

Ivan was a great host! Very hospitable and nice, his place was perfect for my stay in New York. He made sure I was settled in and showed me all the different amenities I could use :) would definitely come back again.
Ivan is a great host, responds very quickly, and keeps the room very clean. I had practically no issues with him what so ever. Would definitely stay at this place again.

Good value for money and very close to the subway. Room relatively small and just about fits one with no hanging space. If you’re traveling light and planning on stopping 1-2 days on your own this is a good spot, anymore and you’ll find it tough.
Room was clean and the location is great if you want to catch the train. Really nice guy

It was an excellent experience staying at Ivan’s place. The apartment is literally a minute away from the subway, but it doesn’t affect the serenity of the apartment in no way. It is super quiet and cozy. The apartment is just one stop away from Manhattan, you can also walk over the bridge to get to the island. Ivan was very friendly and helpful. I would certainly recommend Ivan’s place to everyone!

Super friendly host who had no problem waiting up late to check me in, which I really appreciated! He really made me feel at home. The room was very clean and cozy, and the bed was super comfortable. Location was in prime south Williamsburg, with easy access to Manhattan and the rest of Williamsburg/Bushwick. Would definitely recommend a stay with Ivan!
Great host and great place ! Very comfortable ! I will totally recommend you Ivan’s place !!!
Great location! 2 min to subway. Ivan is very hospitable and try to do the best for the guests.  That is the 1st floor what is really great when you have a heavy luggage. Highly Recommend!
good sized room for the area, could easily accommodate 2 people even though I used it only for myself. convenient location and close to subway and good restaurants/bars.
Great and convenient spot in Williamsburg

Great place!
Location is great! Close to the subway to get right into the city.
Area is walkable for everyday daily needs.

name: Yun's Apartment (center of Barcelona)
summary: My place is < 1 min to Metro, Very close to center of the city, e.g., Sagrada Familia, Plaza de Catalunya, etc. You’ll love my place because of the location and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids)..
description: My place is < 1 min to Metro, Very close to center of the city, e.g., Sagrada Familia, Plaza de Catalunya, etc. You’ll love my place because of the location and the coziness. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids)..
house_rules: Can not take sauna at my home.

reviews.comments: The room is the same as the picture, Yun is nice, and it's very quiet during the night,traveler can have a good rest here!

Yun is a nice host, her apartment is clean & very quite. She is friendly & helpful giving recommendation & directions. The location  is vety closed to Bac de Roda metro station. I would highly recommend stayiny Yun's apartment if you 're traveling BCN or saving money on other things. I wish you have a nice trip.

Viidenpäivän majoittuminen Yunin luona oli kaikinpuolin positiivinen kokemus. Huone ja asunto muutenkin oli erittäin siisti. Asunto oli hinta-laatusuhteeltaa loistava. Suosittelen erityisesti matkailijoille, joille majoituspaikan tarkoitu on lähinnä toimia nukkumispaikkana ja paikkana jossa voi säilyttää tavaransa. 

Asunto sijaitsi mukavassa naapurustossa, sopivasti ydinkeskustan ulkopuolella, mutta kuitenkin lyhyen metromatkan päässä siitä.
Nice residential neighboorhood. 1 minute walking to metro. Nice stay. Thank you.

Well located (metro station at 100m) room, good for a new nights for a single traveller. Basic accommodation but very good value for the price, especially in summer when accomodation is difficult to find in Barcelona.
Yun is very sweet and helpful. She even came with me to the bus station on the day I left.
Yun was very welcoming and helpful and friendly. The apartment is located very close to the metro and in a quiet neighbourhood.

Place is well located next to the metro and also it is just 15 minute walk from the beach. Yun is very nice lady and she is always there to help you with anything. room was nice and it is good value for money if you are on budget trip.

Yun is a very kind and sweet lady, and I felt very relaxed and comfortable from the moment I entered her home. 
She is extremely chilled out and easy going and always on hand to offer advice on where to shop or places to go in Barcelona. She also lives 2 minutes walk from the metro with fantastic links to all over the city.
I would definitely recommend Yun's place to stay and will visit again when next in Barcelona.
Thank you Yun!
很好

Nice, quiet apartment with a spacious single room. Very close to the Barcelona metro station which takes you anywhere you need to go. Highly recommended if you want a quiet stay during the nighttime. Area isn't quite as lively as other areas though.

The place is very well located, quiet and really priceworthy. I liked the fact that although it is within easy reach from all touristic places it is in a typical local neighbourhood. Wifi works very good what was essential for me.  Thanks Yun!

Shower from 7pm to 11pm is an issues for me. I wish this rule was stated under House Rules. Otherwise the place is quiet so it is good for resting. The place is close to subway, café bar and food markets. It is convenient. This place is good for short stay for travelers wants to discover the city by day and come home by night (rest).

Yun's flat is clean and calm, with wifi, in a popular district. 
Yun is a very pleasant and open minded person
Economico
Yun was very welcoming. The room is just as advertised and is great if you are traveling on a budget. Very close to the metro and easy to get around.

Excellent experience.  Yun kept communication open in the weeks before our arrival and made sure we had no problem getting in.  She is a nurturing grandmother type.  The apartment is modest but perfectly adequate.  Two guest rooms, very tiny kitchen.  Hot water for shower must be turned on from porch.  To save some money, we did not reserve the double room.  Yun offered her own room to us for the few nights my wife joined me in Barcelona.  Location is great, beyond the crowded touristy downtown area, yet a short ride anywhere in the city on the excellent metro and bus network from the station two blocks from the apartment.  Nice cafe across street for breakfast, Mexican influenced tapas bar for the evening, several gyms and pools in the neighborhood.  Would stay again.  Thank you Yun.
Yun's apartment is clean and as advertised. Great for a short stay and very close to the L2 line.
I really enjoyed staying with Yun. She is very kind and helpful person. I highly reccomend staying with her. Apartment is very clean, room cosy and quiet.

Very good location, house was basic but reasonable with great wifi, and overall the host was quiet nice. 
However, the boiler was in my room and when the host wanted to turn it on she would come into my room without knocking even when I was asleep and she was noticeably uncomfortable when I was using her kitchen.

Yun it's an extremely rude and impatient host. She made me leave the house early by giving me verbal abuse and harassment. She came to my room number of time when I was in bed at sleep or sitting without knocking or get a permission to enter. On the first night when I got back home I saw a note in there and my room door wide open with light on?! When there were other people living there she had no right to do so and money was missing from my luggage! So I decided to leave and told her so the next morning I will check out.  She jumped in my room the next morning again saying I need to leave and I was shocked, woken up and confused!?i explained because it's only 9:30 am not a check out time which is 11:00am and this is no way to talk to a guest and enter in!? I left Barcelona early because of her, please don't ruin you experience with this so called host. Disgraceful

Yun e uma pessoa super doce, e me ajudou muito durante minha estadia em sua casa. Me deu algumas dicas, me emprestou seu charda chuva e guia de barcelona. Foi muito prazeroso me hospedar em sua residencia.

Yun was a lovely host, she was so accommodating and helpful if ever you needed to know anything about the area or Barcelona.  She is a very sweet lady whose company I really enjoyed, her hospitality and kindness were very appreciated.  I would recommend to anyone looking to stay on the outskirts of the city centre, a quiet little neighbourhood with a cafe and small bar just downstairs.  Very easy to get around as it is right beside the metro line L2.  I loved it here, and would definitely come back :)
yuns place is a minutes walk from the mero bus and cafes... its a lovely residential area with few tourists
Bom
Very central place...

방이 사진에 나온 것 처럼 딱 그대로에요. 공간도 넓고 편하기도 해서 머무는 기간에 항상 푹 잤네요. 
약간 쿰쿰한 집 냄새가 났지만, 
밖에서 나는 피톤 치드 냄새가 배안듯한 냄새인 것 같기도 해서 그렇게 신경 쓰일 정도는 아니에요. 
위치는 주변 2분, 3분 거리에 마트 음식점, 빵집, 과일 상점 다 있구요, 
1분 거리에 L2 지하철역 있어요. 
걸어서 30분 거리에 해변 있어요. 사람도 바르셀로네타보다 없고 좋아요. 
호스트 아주머니는 매우 어머니 같이 편안한 분 ! 마시는 차도, 사과도 주시고 소통을 잘 하세요. 마지막에 헤어 질 때, 아쉬워서 허그도 하고 그랬네요 ㅎㅎ. 
단지 이 방이 세탁실, 보일러와 연결이 되어있어서 호스트 분을 포함한 다른 방 사람들이 중간 중간 들어 올 수 있어요. 그렇지만 노크하고 들어오셔서 별로 신경은 안쓰였어요. 예민한 분들에겐 좀 불편 할 수 있어요.  아 그리고 화장실 문이 안잠겨요 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 꼭 노크하고 들어가기!!
Lokasyon metroya yakın. Ev temiz. Evdeki 2 oda kiralanıyor. Bir sıkıntı yaşamadım.

Lovely clean place 
Close to everything you possibly need 
Very clean peaceful quiet apartment 
And a lovely host 
Enjoyed my stay

Yun is a very warm hearted lady and she's very willing to help. I had a great time at her place! Her place is located in a quite neighborhood which is close to the beach and also close to city center which gives great convenience to travelers. She offers nice trip advices and cares about your personal safety. I'd strongly recommend her place for a cozy, relaxing trip in Barcelona!

Destaco la hospitalidad y amabilidad de la anfitriona Yun. 
El dto es muy accesible a pocos metros del metro. Se lleca al centro en 10 min. Facil llegar desde aeropuerto.
Zona es muy segura. 
La habitacio  es comoda y amplia.
Limpieza muy bien.
交通十分便利,性价比很高｡晚上也非常安静｡入住房子要守房东的规矩｡是个超值的住所｡

space: Hello, Fully furnished room is available. I have a home in the center of nişantaşı-topağacı. I need a clean and tidy friend to share my flat. The flat is 100m² , 2 rooms (with both windows) and a living room. It's in the center of  nişantaşı and very safe place to stay. it's 3 min. to bus station, 10 min by foot to bahcesehir university, 20 min by foot to galatasaray university, 20 min by foot to yildiz technical university, 30 min by bus to bogazici university. name: Nuevo espacioso apartamento en BCN
summary: If you like to stay in a beautiful local area but still close to all the tourist attractions we have a place for you. Spacious and renovated three bedrooms Apartment in the magnificent district of Barcelona, with a capacity of a group up to 8 people.
space: This recently refurbished apartment is perfect for a family or a large group of friends travelling together. In one of the most beautiful areas of the city, Eixample, the apartment has recently been renovated with an eye for comfort.  It has three bedrooms, all with closets, a toilet and a bathroom. It is equipped with everything you need to make your stay comfortable. The decoration is modern and practical, suitable for making your visit enjoyable.   The living room contains a comfortable double sofa bed, a flat screen TV, a dining table and two comfortable single seating sofas. The kitchen has been re-designed and comes complete with an oven, a hob, microwave, a fridge, coffee machine, a toaster and a kettle. There are three bedrooms, two contain single beds (which can be put together) and one have comfortable double bed. All have nightstands, bedside lamps and plenty of closet space with wardrobes. The bathroom is fitted out with a toilet, a mirror and a shower. This apartment is eq

neighborhood_overview: Our apartments are located in the architectural wonderland that is Eixample, beside Hospital Clinic, about 15 minutes walk from Plaça Catalunya and Passeig de Gràcia and walking distance from most tourist attractions in the district. Take a stroll along the majestic tree-lined streets of this historic area and marvel at the curio shops, stunning houses and numerous local bars and restaurants. Around us are: recommended restaurants, the second fresh market in Barcelona-Market Ninot. We have all types of services in the area: pharmacy, hairdresser, supermarkets, internet cafes, tobaccos and Clinical-Hospital Center world-renowned University of Medicine and School of Industrial Engineering.   All these buildings are modernist. A 10 minute walk away you can find a very popular area of nightclubs and clubs.
notes: CHECK-IN / CHECK-OUT Check-out is before 12:00 (noon). Check-in from 15:00  In case of check-in or check-out before or after the scheduled hour please contact us. TAXES: As of November 1, 2012 the Government of Catalonia will impose a tax on tourism. Barcelona Rate: € 0.72 per person per day (including VAT). Tax aimed at: people 17 years or older.  Applicable: up to 7 nights.  Methods of payment: This fee must be paid to the owner of the property when the customer makes the check-in and will be transferred by the owner to the Government of Catalonia. RESPONSIBILITIES: MHBS Apartments is not responsible for any consequences that may result from making use throughout their stay in the apartment, including damages, injuries, losses due to theft, fire or criminal activity. In the event that during the client's stay in the apartment had a fault external to misuse by the customer and make it impossible to stay in it, MHBS Apartments will arrange to fix it as soon as possible, upon notificati
transit: In our district is very easy to move by public transport and also by walking. About 50 meters from us there is a metro line L5 (metro stop Hospital Clinic) and bus line 37 to Pl Espanya, line 66 and 63 to Pl Catalunya. Night bus line N7, N12. From the Airport you can reach our apartments by Aerobus T1;T2 (bus stop GranVia Urgell) or by bus line 46 to Pl. Espanya. It is also an option to get into town by train to Pl. Sants or by taxi, it takes about 25-30 minutes and cost between 30-35 EUR. If you are planning to drive around the city you can find parking space around the apartments.
access: Our Clients can enjoy a 24 hour customer service, counseling, special laundry and dry cleaning service, fully equipped Housing, separate fully equipped kitchen, air-conditioning, free Wireless Internet and ADSL, dryer, sheets and towels in the room, public parking in surrounding. The Apartments are spacious with large and bright rooms that will make you feel comfortable.
interaction: We are a small company specialized in apartment management service in a gorgeous building of a beautiful district of Barcelona. A familiar and personal contact with our clients is fundamental for us. To make the communication easy, our team speaks 5 languages: Spanish, English, Russian, German and Hungarian. You are always welcome if you have any question or just need an advice where to go to shopping or eat the best tapas in the city. During the day we are personally present in the building and we are also available in 24 hour in case of urgency.
house_rules: There is a security deposit of 200 of 200 € (by airbnb), which will be refunded after departure if there has been no damage in the apartment will. If the "check-in" occurs delayed, there will be an extra 30 € (from 20:00 to 00:00 h and, after negotiating). The violation of these rules implies the retention of part or whole deposit and immediate eviction from the apartment. SMOKING IS STRICTLY FORBIDDEN IN APARTMENTS.  Failure to comply with this rule MHBS Apartments is obliged to charge 100€ for cleaning the apartments. Payment is by cash or credit card.  Customers undertake to act with the utmost respect and courtesy to the maximum neighbors and other guests in the building. Not be tolerated loud noises or any act of disrespect. The celebrations of any kind are severely prohibited. The failure to comply with these rules may result in immediate expulsion of the customer from the apartment without refund and without the right to claim any compensation.  The customer must leave the apart

host.host_about: PROVENZA MBS, a  small company managing an apartment building at nice centric neighborhood one block away from central hospital, a polytechnic university and a Ninot Market. Centric but safe surroundings.

reviews.comments: It was great on every point

The accommodation was perfect for us! Dimitry was a very friendly, uncomplicated and reliable host and the apartment was very clean and well equipped. We were seven people and it offers enough space for us. It was situated in the 6th floor and when we open the windows a fresh breeze blows throw the rooms. The neighborhood was save, even at night and the next metro station is 5 minutes to walk. 

Thanks for the nice apartment. We had an amazing time in Barcelona!
Классная большая квартира почти в центре
Dimitry is a great host, very friendly. The place is great for bigger group of people. The apartament is clean, well prepared.

We did not see Dimitry during our stay but his assistant in the office was exceptionally helpful and friendly.  
There were many cafes, bars and restaurants nearby and there was a metro station and bus stops in close proximity.

One bedroom had a light glaring in all night from outside neighbouring apartment block and was unusable. A dryer should be provided. Bathrooms should be restocked and cleaned at least every second day.

name: OCEANFRONT - Vacation in Sand - Harmony
summary: Upon entering, you will be greeted by the cool tropical ocean breeze and soothing ocean waves which can be heard all throughout the house. We want your vacation to be as relaxing and stress-free as possible, and our preparation for your arrival will reflect through the littlest details.The beach right across, Baby Beach, is a rest spot for monk seals. This home will soothe and relax your soul, and create amazing memories w/ your ohana. ***Nighty rate includes 9.25%TAT+4%GET Hawaii tax*tvnc#4247
space: This house is very unique because of the location. We cannot express it enough how wonderful the location is. Kapaa, where this home is, is in the middle of everything! We are also right across the very famous 7mile bike/walk path which is perfect for sightseeing!

We want your vacation to be as relaxing and stress-free as possible, and our preparation for your arrival will reflect through the littlest details.The beach right across, Baby Beach, is a rest spot for monk seals. neighborhood_overview: This home is not located in a touristy neighborhood . Our friendly neighbors are all local. Baby beach is a very famous beach but doesn't get too overcrowded. Kapaa town is a 10 minute walk and you can easily shop, dine and maybe have a drink or two! Grocery shopping is literally right across our street (Big Save, Safeway, or Foodland) and the post office is a 5 min walk.
notes: This is strictly a no smoking house and environment.  If you choose to smoke please do so off property. Penalties will be enforced.
transit: Yes, the bus stop is right across our street next to the grocery store and Usps.
access: The guests will have access to the whole house, including an outdoor shower with hot/cold water.
interaction: We live on island, and as much as possible, we greet the guests when they arrive or drop by to say hi (if they want to) We are easily accessible to help them out with anything- whether it be cheap shopping places, great eats, free local activities, etc.

reviews.comments: Wayne &Kim welcomed us with open arms & smiles. Very gracious & accomodating.  Unobtrusive (they live next door), yet available for questions or help.  Awesome hosts and would stay with them again without reservation. House was on the beach; neighbor hood was average beach houses; always felt safe.  Grocery stores,shopping were within walking distance.

This cute oceanfront home in Kapaa was perfect for us.  The central location made it easy to do hiking at both extremes of the island - 
Hanalei and the Waimea Canyon, and then come "home" to a refreshing 
swim in the ocean just across the small road/bike path. There were only 4 of us so the house felt very roomy.  It would be very suitable for a bigger group or even 2 families with kids. We used the screened porch dining area several times as well as the deck area - perfect for morning coffee while watching the sunrise and the early morning joggers along the bike trail.
   We enjoyed being in a neighborhood amongst the local folk.  We felt 
very safe.
   Our hosts provided every amenity needed in the kitchen and bathrooms, plus Wifi, TV and music, as well as beach towels, chairs, etc. for a trip to the beach. Travel guides and brochures were available as were our hosts. We were even treated to a nice welcome tray of goodies and a cute little departure gift.  
   I highly recommend this home to other travelers to Kauai and I would be happy to stay here again.

We had an awesome stay at this oceanfront home! The host left us an amazing welcome tray of goodies to enjoy. We had a fairly large group (6 adults and two small children) and the house was a perfect fit for us. The host even provided a pack 'n play crib and beach toys for our little ones. We had most of our meals in the house and loved the sunroom dining area. The kitchen is fully stocked and we enjoyed the other amenities of the house (porches, BBQ, outdoor shower, beach towels & toys, Wifi, travel brochures, etc). Kapaa was the perfect, central location for our vacation.  It was easy for us to explore all parts of the island. We felt safe in the neighborhood. We recommend you stay at this home when you visit Kauai. We would love to stay here again.

The layout of the house was perfect for 3 couples - with privacy in the bedrooms and bathrooms. The shared space, living, dining and kitchen were comfortable. The kitchen was very well equipped and we liked the open design - we cooked Thanksgiving dinner and enjoyed a few other meals at the house, and also local restaurants. Of course, sitting on the porch looking at the ocean was a favorite activity, between outings to hike, kayak, snorkel and see Kauai. We also enjoyed being on the bike path - mostly we did walks/runs, but the bike rental shop is close by for those who want to bike. Great to be able to walk along the beach away from traffic. Little extras were nice, like the cooler box, so we could take picnics with us on our outings. Check out the Weds afternoon farmers market nearly - bought some flowers and yummy fruit!

The house is right on the ocean. It is lovely there. Several decks to sit on. Great view of the sunrise. Right on the start of the walk/bike path. Very accessible to town. 
Wayne and Kim greatest us when we arrived. Gifts of coffee and macadamia nuts and chocolate. Also necklaces for our girls. They are both lovely people with great hearts!
The beds were good with nice linen. The towels were new or near new and white. They had beach towels for us that were very nice. 
Wayne and Kim were very accessible via phone or text. Great source for what has great value on the island.

We had a great stay at Wayne and Kim's house! The location was perfect, and the house was really comfortable. Wayne and Kim were both super responsive and helpful and made sure to check in to see that we had everything we needed, or provide recommendations for the area. Would definitely love to stay here again - thanks for everything!

Kim and Wayne are a young and energetic hosts who go out of their way to ensure guests have what they need. I highly recommend their home. It was better than presented in the photos, the location and home were much better than anticipated!

This is a delightful home for an easy-going vacation.  It's across a small street from the ocean, and the beach had a monk seal visit during our stay.  We saw whales from the lanai.  It doesn't get better than that.
Wayne and Kim were excellent hosts and the house was clean with abundant amenities.  We will definitely return to this property.
Wonderful location right on the water with amazing breezes, a perfect beach for kids, and a five-mile bike path. What amazing hosts, too!

Wayne and Kim were very accomadating. They made sure we were comfortable and everything was in working order! Awesome host! The deck outside the master bedroom was is a great place to hangout and enjoy the ocean view.

What an incredibly beautiful oceanfront home in Kapaa. This is a really large and very comfy place to stay with your family and/or a group of friends. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay and Wayne and Kim are minutes away to help you with any unexpected needs. We can't wait to return to this amazing home!

We stayed for 8 days with our 2 adult children and their spouses and our one-year old grandson.  We concur with one of our daughters who wrote, "Kim and Wayne were great! They were friendly, helpful and proactive,"  and with one of our sons-in-law who wrote, "Wayne was awesome, very friendly and helpful.  He quickly solved any issues we had and was eager to serve."

The house was very comfortable and ideally located, steps from the water.  The view from the living room and master bedroom and deck are wonderful and the hedge around the property affords privacy from the infrequently used one-way street.  Had it not been for the comment of someone driving that road while we were outside, we might have missed the sea turtle swimming in the bay-like area right in front of the house! 

The bedrooms are in different corners of the house and each has its own bathroom so there was plenty of privacy.  The location is almost equi-distant from the North Shore and Waimea/Poipu areas where we enjoyed beautiful beaches and wonderful trails that led to amazing scenery!  The bike trail in front of the house is 7 miles along the coast and a great way to see it and get some exercise.  We didn't spend much time in Kapaa since we were more interested in scenery than 'the scene' but next visit we will spend time exploring it.

The house is older but nicely decorated and any problems are quickly and satisfactorily resolved by Wayne.  While we were there they kindly purchased snorkel gear for our use, as we expressed an interest in it.  We found them very accomodating, making our stay better than expected.

Wayne and Kim are very thoughtful and helpful. Staying here gives you an opportunity to truly feel like you are living on the island. Shopping is right down the road yet you are in a quiet, friendly neighborhood. You will love waking up to the sun rising on the ocean and going to sleep to the sounds of the waves.

Wayne & Kim were excellent and very attentive hosts.  We appreciated the 'welcome' goodies.  The home and beds were comfortable and clean.  We loved the central location of the home and the fact that there was an amazing view from the two bedrooms on the east side as well as an excellent breeze. There were beach towels, chairs and ice chests as well as snorkel gear for a great day at the beach.   The neighborhood was quiet overall.  Home is right on a great bike/walking path.  Easy walk or drive to town/shops.  Thank you so much Wayne, Kim and Kane!

Wayne and Kim were both terrific hosts. Excellent communication and great attention to detail. We stayed for 7 days and were traveling with our family of 2 adults, 3 teens and 2 younger children. The floorplan of the house worked really well for us. The description is accurate. Plenty of rooms and bathrooms. The outside shower was especially wonderful! Kim left special items for the family and there were games and small gifts for the kids. The house came with chairs, snorkels, beach towels and ice chests that made our island adventures a breeze. The kitchen is well stocked with everything you might need for meal prep. We even used the outdoor grill. It felt so luxurious to sit out on the deck to eat breakfast and enjoy coffee. The view is wonderful. The beach across from the property is nice, but not the very best for children to swim. However, Lydgate Beach is a 5 minute drive away and perfect for families. Our teens were able to rent bikes for the week and explore some of the island on their own. The central location of the house was ideal for us as we were wanting to drive to other parts of the island, both west and north. Close to the airport, adventures, stores and local shopping & food. We really enjoyed Street Burger! During our stay we did experience a couple of issues. Rain on the island is pretty typical, but due to a leaking roof, the dining room area became unusable. Our hosts shared this had been an issue, but they thought it was repaired. We also experienced an issue with roaches in several rooms. Wayne did come and put out "roach motels." Other guests might also consider the fact that the home does not have air conditioning. (1 room has a small unit) We knew this, but didn't understand the implications of this for our JULY stay. Even with all the fans going, the house was hot and humid. The weather remained in the 78-84 degree area. Wayne and Kim were responsive to our concerns/ issues. I believe they will continue to strive to improve the stay of their guests.

Great location. Great hosts who were available always for questions etc.
Nice having the beach chairs and boggie boards and grill for use. Perfect spot for traveling  to the north or south side of the island. Easy access to fine dining and grocery stores. Just a few steps to watch the morning sunrise.

I’m not sure I know enough positive words to fully describe how amazing Wayne, Kim, and their home was for our family vacation. From the first communication, Kim was prompt, caring, open, and made me feel comfortable and excited about our stay. She was amazing about keeping in touch, accommodating our check in and check out needs, and even remembered details about my family and our trip that made us feel special. The home itself was lovely. The location and view are the main selling points. If you want to stay in a comfortable home with ocean views and within walking distance to shops and restaurants, you can’t do better than this. They also included a handy guide with things to do and places to eat so you know where to walk to and what to try (I ALWAYS love local recommendations so this was awesome for me). The house has a lovely Hawaiian beach house feel that is colorful, comfortable, and functional. There was plenty of space for the whole family to gather outside and inside for meals and fun and the bedrooms accommodated everyone very comfortably. We loved that the house was fully stocked with beach towels, snorkel gear, BBQ, condiments, etc. It made it very easy to walk right in and feel at home. It was the epitome of relaxation to be able to enjoy breakfast and dinner out on the lanai while listening to the waves and enjoying the sea breeze. Now let me talk about Wayne and Kim. They are some of the nicest, warmest, most hospitable people you could ever hope to meet. From the warm correspondence to the welcome preparations, we immediately felt like we were being treated like longtime dear friends or even family. Kim was ALWAYS accessible via text or phone if questions or concerns popped up, and talking to Kim was so easy, at times I would forget that we had only just met through Air Bnb. Wayne stopped by and introduced himself as well and we felt very comfortable with his presence and warmth. They handle their rental properties with real Aloha spirit and professionalism. They truly are rare gem human beings. From the moment we walked in the door, my family already started planning our next trip to Kaua‘i... a trip that we now can’t imagine making without staying at Wayne and Kim’s. Mahalo for everything, Wayne and Kim! Can’t wait to return next time.

We booked this home last minute and Wayne and Kim were quick to respond and booked us in the next day. They even left a cute welcome toy car for our toddler son and some fresh fruit and treats on arrival. The home is across the road from the ocean and we saw a monk seal sunning himself the first morning. Walking distance to good food. Nice clean family home. Lots of love has clearly gone into the place.

The house is great for a large family (we had six adults, two young children and one infant).  With four bedrooms and three baths, there was more than adequate space.  Remember, however, that this is a beach house, not a mansion.  If we were to return to Kapaa, Kauai with as large a group again, we would not hesitate to book Wayne and Kim's place.

Fantastic location; not only right on the ocean, but a good central location to travel around. The house has everything you need to accommodate a large family. We used all appliances, bought a Costco or Safeway (nearby) and either cooked or grilled out. Great place for walks along the ocean and just relaxing with family. We'll stay again, either at this one or the one they own next door.
Excellent location,  beautiful views,  a stones throw from the ocean

Great place for family fun at your doorstep! Great hospitality and convenience. From walking, biking, snorkeling, shopping, eating out without having to drive, to whale watching and sunsets while lounging on the lanai, it was all we hoped for when we booked it, thanks Wayne and Kim for an awesome stay!

The location was amazing! The quiet area, great walking road, beautiful views from deck, the ocean life, close to businesses and restaurants made for a great stay. Wayne quickly responded to any requests or concerns we had. Loved the location and a pleasure to work with Wayne.

Thank you so much for letting us stay in your home. My family and I were so happy with all that you had available. Pictures don't do it justice! Perfect location and perfect house for our crazy, loud kids! There was more than enough room for all of us and even the yard was perfect to throw a frisbee. Outdoor shower was a must! The kitchen had everything that we needed.  We had left over food, so it was nice that we were able to leave it there since Wayne and Kim share it with the homeless shelter.  Coolers, snorkel gear and boogie boards were great! Wayne was very quick to respond with any concerns we had. I don't know what else to say, but hopefully we can come back to this amazing property!

Kim & Wayne's place was amazing. The home is definitely older but so charming and updated with everything you need and more. Kim & Wayne left a beautiful welcome surprise for our group. I loved that the home has so much character and open space. We were visiting Kaua'i for a family memorial and were rained out at every venue the entire weekend. We were able to hang out comfortably with our family and have a lot of space to relax. We even met a lot of the neighbors and would meet up for sunrise with the local fishermen at the beach and talk while drinking our coffee. The best surprise was the local monk sea that would visit the little beach right across the street and frolic in the water before sunning on the reef. Great place for family, friends, adults and children alike!!! We hope to come back and stay again.

The place was great! Has a great yard and so close to beach. Walkable to everything but still super quiet.
My favorite part is the SUPER kid friendly beach. I have a 2 and 4 year old and it was perfect for them to swim with no (Website hidden by Airbnb) has a rock wall that makes a perfect lagoon.

The layout of the house was absolutely fabulous for our family and would be perfect for 3 couples. The view is a million dollar view at a bargain price. There are markets, coffee shops, and restaurants all within easy walking distance. And Baby Beach is literally a 90 second walk, walking at toddler speed. And the house is really centrally located so that you can easily get to Princeville and Hanalei Bay, or Lihue & Poipu. Wayne & Kim were amazing hosts who were super easy to get ahold of if needed, but were very non-intrusive. I would recommend this rental to anyone looking for a place to stay in Kauai!

Perfect! Wayne and Kim really bring the aloha. The house is super comfortable with practically everything you’d ever need.  The location is fantastic- especially if you have little ones.  Baby beach is literally stumbling distance and the bike path is great- we didn’t use our car much.  The views and sounds of the ocean are idyllic.  I also thought it was a terrific value.

This place is fantastic!  We went as two families. Our party included four adults and two toddlers (16 months). We were so close to the beach, we didn't need to bring anything with us!  No schlepping food, diapers or extra anything!  We didn't even bring towels as we would just go back to the house to the outdoor shower and throw a towel on after!  

The beach is perfect for littles who aren't swimming yet!  Our daughter is such a water baby and loved splashing around in the shallow water,  and we loved that we could give her the freedom to explore! 

The house has a fantastic deck overlooking the water and wonderful lanai if dining indoors is your preference!  It's not air conditioned, but we never found that to be an issue. Even during naps it was cool enough, and a small give to get such a wonderful home with wonderful hosts. 

Wayne and Kim are lovely and incredibly accommodating!  They provided two high chairs and a pack n play to make our stay easy!  Check in and out was a breeze!

The path outside the house was a flat and easy walk to town along the water!  We felt so lucky to be there!

This was our 4th time to Hawaii, first time staying at an Airbnb vs. a resort (though we've rented houses and condos in other locations, and knew what to expect). Aside from a few areas of the house that could use some updating, it was just what we needed!  Super cute home, with all of the amenities to do some living for the week. The kitchen was stocked with spices, oils and other things to cook with. The beach chairs, umbrellas and coolers helped us have great days at the beach. We stayed with another couple and had such a lovely time sitting on the deck, watching the ocean and the stars, cooking together (and drinking, too! the blender comes in handy), and eating (and drinking :) ) on the lanai. The beds were comfortable, there's a nice breeze most times of the day, and there are fans throughout. The location is fantastic! Aside from day trips out, we walked most of the time - to eat (Lemongrass, J02, Sam's Ocean View, Olympic Cafe), to massages (try (Website hidden by Airbnb) - AMAZING), to the beach (SO CLOSE!!), to shop in the downtown Kapa'a shops, and to grab odds and ends at the Big Save. Safeway is a super quick drive, too (their poke is surprisingly good!). Most of all, Wayne and Kim were delightful hosts and I'm so grateful for opportunity to meet them stay at their home. Just a great vacation!

First and foremost Wayne and Kim are wonderful hosts who want you to have a great time on Kauai.

There are many nice touches:
- drinking water dispenser 
- lots of good towels and linen
- well provisioned kitchen in terms of condiments, dishes and utensils
- excellent wifi and TV
- comfortable furniture throughout.

Plenty of outdoor space and so close to the water/beaches.
You can walk to numerous eating places in Kapaa + excellent coffee at Java Kai.
You may want to consider bringing earplugs for the morning call of the roosters.

This is an older house exposed to the sea air and all that means in terms of the impact on metal and wood plus salt air on windows & cars.
The house is spacious and the location is ideal for exploring the wonderful island of Kauai and proximity to Kapaa township.

Aloha! 
Wayne And Kim thank you so much for your hospitality , we loved that home, highly recomented esp those who travel with children

We had a great trip in Kaua’i with this house as our home base!  It was set up nicely for families, we had a 5.5, 2.5 and 8 month old with us.  We appreciated the outdoor shower and big bathtub for post beach kid clean-up, cocktails and dinner on the deck, and the strong sound of the ocean as we went to sleep.  Wayne and Kim were so quick and responsive to our questions.  We will definitely consider staying here again when we come back to Kaua’i!  Enjoy, wish we were there!!

This is such a beautiful and relaxing house to stay in. You can enjoy the sounds of the ocean to sleep and sunrise over the ocean in the morning. We were excited to stay here from the get go, but the house still exceeded our expectations. Relaxing, and Kim and Wayne have thought of absolutely everything you could need and are very kind and helpful. A great central location with a. Beautiful little beach right out the door. We only hope to stay here again on our next trip!
Fantastic location. Quiet beach across the street. Perfect for kids!!  Nicely located to drive to north island (hanalei bay), south (poipu) or west to Waimea canyon.

Perfect house for larger groups on the East Side of the island. Our group of five fit comfortably in the house, whose best feature was an outdoor shower.
Loved the welcoming gift on the kitchen counter and the keyless check in. 
Wayne and Kim are great hosts and make sure their guest feel right at home. 
Thank you for sharing your wonderful house!

This is our fourth time to stay in this fantastic space - and there are so many reasons we keep coming back! The house is lovely, with a gorgeous maintained front lawn and the ocean right in front of you! Wayne and Kim go all out as hosts, from the thoughtful hospitality basket filled with local goodies like chocolate-covered macadamia nuts and Hawaiian coffee, to plenty of pillows, linens, and towels, and everything you might need: snorkel gear, boogie boards, sand umbrellas, the works. They are so prompt in their responses and a joy to work with. This house is charming, one-of-a-kind, and we can't wait to come back again!

This was our first trip to Kauai and is the start of a new family tradition at Wayne and Kim’s. Everything was perfect... from the location to all of the amenities to how helpful and personable Wayne is. We have a new friend in Hawaii and can’t wait to go again next year!

This is a perfectly delightful place to stay.  There are really 3 separate bedroom/bathroom areas which was  great for our adult family group.   The kitchen has just about everything one needs to cook - the whole place is abundantly furnished .  The screened -in dining area was were we began every morning with coffee and ended every day with a game or two.  So beautiful.  And finally - such a great walking area along the paved parkway next to the beach and a great way to walk to the charming  town of Kapaa  just 5-10 minutes away.  This is truly a charming place to stay and Wayne and Kim were perfect hosts.  Highest recommendation.

We we're so close to the beach I could hear the waves, it was so relaxing.  The kitchen was well stocked as well as the bathrooms.  The screen dining was the perfect place to have our meals or just sit and chat.  They had everything you need for a day adventure, we took advantage of the cooler.  The keyless entry was a great feature.  Our flight was delayed and the host turned on the lights for us, so thoughtful. They had a goodie basket waiting for us. We would stay there again.

The house was so cute and had a great intereur. It was well equipped and we had a wonderful view to the ocean. Wayne was so nice and really helpful. 
Mahalo!

We booked this house over the holidays and it was amazing!  You are steps from the ocean and have a protected beach across the street that doesn’t get too busy and is perfect for kids as the water only comes up to waist level.   You are an easy walk into Kapaa where there are great restaurants and shops, and we made use of the 15 km walking/biking trail outside the house every day.  Wayne and Kim were fantastic to deal with.  We rented the house with two other couples and everyone had enough room (rooms were spacious and everyone has their own bathroom and the common area is great). and we were very comfortable.  We loved eating outside on the porch and were able to watch the sun rise/set.   We hope to book this house again in the future as it was fantastic!  Thanks Wayne and Kim!

We had a wonderful time! It was in a perfect location, a minute walk from a small yet awesome kid beach, perfect for our 10 month old and 3 year old. We loved hearing the waves at night and watching the sunrise from the porch. The house was older but in nice condition.  It was a great setup for kids with a large yard, beach toys and baby/toddler beds.  We would love to come again!

Our trip to Kauai was a three-generation celebration, and our party of eight included two babies - one a year old and the other eight months. None of us had been to Kauai before and booking accommodation sight unseen for a ten-day stay with a gang like ours was an act of faith. We chose Oceanfront Harmony because the layout included separate living spaces for three families, and it was next to a bike path/quiet road and across from a baby-suitable beach. The accommodation and location turned out to be even more perfect for us than we imagined. It’s a short walk not just to the beach, but also to shopping and dining - and the bike path is a terrific walking trail that extends along the coast. The house is part of a small subdivision and the neighbours are friendly and welcoming. The layout of the house allowed us to have both together time and quiet time for babies (and parents) to nap. We dined in a lovely screened-in dining room and had drinks on the deck with a view of the ocean. Our hosts, Wayne and Kim went beyond our expectations at every level – including an extravagant welcome basket, a well equipped kitchen with lots of cooking basics, as well as many beach supplies including chairs, towels, toys, and an umbrella. They had wonderful suggestions for places to eat and sights to see. To top it off, we had expected to rent high chairs and sleeping cots for the babies and instead Wayne and Kim bought two of each to add to their guest supplies. Oceanfront Harmony was a spectacular place to stay and we lacked for nothing

name: Cozy Studio Copacabana RJ
summary: Conjugate studio , cozy , facing , high floor with a amazing view, prime location , wooded and quiet street , residential building, 24 hour doorman , video camera .
space: Close to the beach, bars , restaurants , cinemas , theaters , leisure , banks , supermarkets and all types of businesses . Next to the tube station ( Siqueira Campos ) , bus and taxi anytime . Well equipped , with double bed ( mezzanine ) , sofa / single bed, Air cooled , Fan , Sound , LCD cable TV , broadband Internet . Stove, fridge , microwave , coffee maker , sandwich maker , toaster , blender , iron . Various kitchen utensils . Electric shower . Bed linen and towels of good quality. Functional , clean and airy .  Ideal for up to 3 people . Special packages for Réveillon, Carnival and Easter . Daily rate is according to the season , and combine . For more information inbox me.

Close to the beach, bars , restaurants , cinemas , theaters , leisure , banks , supermarkets and all types of businesses . Next to the tube station ( Siqueira Campos ) , bus and taxi anytime .
