Functional , clean and airy .  Ideal for up to 3 people . Special packages for Réveillon, Carnival and Easter . Daily rate is according to the season , and combine . For more information inbox me.
neighborhood_overview: Copacabana onde se localiza a praia mais famosa do Mundo e diversas atrações no famoso calçadão de pedras portuguesas. Muitos bares à beira de praia ao longo de toda orla com atrações musicais, onde se pode  beber uma deliciosa água de coco, um shop gelado ou a nossa famosa caipirinha e diversos sabores.
interaction: Estamos sempre disponíveis para auxiliar o hóspede no que for necessário para tornar a sua estadia o mais agradável possível na Cidade Maravilhosa.
house_rules: Entregamos o apartamento limpo e organizado, não cobramos taxa de limpeza mas contamos com o bom senso dos hóspedes em deixar o imóvel organizado e limpo como recebeu.  Obs: O valor da diária é para até 2  pessoas, em caso de um hóspede adicional, será cobrado um adicional proporcional ao valor da temporada.

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Esperienza magnifica a Rio de Janeiro, i proprietari sono stati molto gentili e disponibili per qualsiasi cosa, adorabili. L'appartamento è un po' piccolo (perfetto per 2/3 persone) ma c'è tutto, stereo, ferro da stiro, wifi, tv. Il letto era molto comodo e la casa molto pulita, inoltre l'appartamento si trova a 5 minuti a piedi dalla fermata della metro, a 10 minuti dalla spiaggia, posizione perfetta. La zona inoltre è molto tranquilla e li vicino c'è tutto, panifici, ristoranti, super mercato. Nel condomino è presente il portiere 24 ore su 24.
Insomma grande esperienza, lo consiglio a tutti

Pedro and his wife were very helpful. They showed us around the neighbourhood, pointing out interesting places. They checked on us a few times during our stay. The neighbourhood is safe and very close, both to metro station and to the beach. The apartment is small as shown on pictures, but great value for money.

Incredible location on quiet street less than a 5 minute walk to heart of Copacabana. Pedro and Maria are great hosts, happy to help with any advice you may need it. Can easily fit up to 3, but a very comfortable experience for one or two. Metro and super mercado are a 2 minute walk. Ideal spot, has my strongest recommendation. Boa viagem.

Pedro and his wife are absolutly adorable and really helpful, they helped and care for me all along my time in the flat, it was great to have them in such a city ! The flat is everything you can need, in a very safe neighborhood with a doorman always there to help you. Very close from the beach, gorceries stores or even the metro (50m away) i highly recommand it !

Nos hospedamos en el apartamento de Pedro durante 4 días y encontramos que es muy lindo. Tiene el tamaño adecuado, es acogedor y está totalmente equipado. Su ubicación es excelente, a tan solo 4 cuadras de la playa de Copacabana y con muchas líneas de transporte público para toda la ciudad a sólo 1 o 2 cuadras. Pedro y su esposa estuvieron siempre a disposición para lo las cosas que necesitamos.
El apartamento es muy recomendable para quien quiera conocer Río de Janeiro.

Pedro and Maria are very charming hosts. They made me feel very welcome and checked with me via (Hidden by Airbnb) to see if everything was alright during my stay. Their apartment feels like a cozy nest and has everything one might need for a week's stay. Warmly recommended.

Pedro and his wife Zeneide are wonderful hosts. Welcoming and very helpful. Their tips make you feel safe in rio. The apartment is located in a nice and safe area of copacabana, which is also a great plus, and it is guarded 24/7. You will find everything you need nearby.
The apartment is small (as seen on pics, roughly 20m2), but the space is well used (mezzanine bed) and is fine for one to two guests.
Ratio quality-price is ok.
Great experience

Muy buena la elección del departamento, los Anfitriones muy amables y atentos a nuestras inquietudes.

La ubicación excelente: seguro y tranquilo, cerca del metro y de la playa, supermercado, farmacias, lugares para comer... 

Recomendado en  un 100%

Das Apartment ist ein lauschiger Rückzugsort im lauten Rio, das Hochbett gemütlich, das Bad neu gemacht, alle Geräte inklu W-Lan funktionierten einwandfrei und auch sonst war alles was in der Beschreibung steht, vorhanden. Pedro und seine Frau waren fantastische Gastgeber, die Buchung verlief problemlos, es gab eine herzliche Begrüßung am frühen Morgen nach unserer Ankunft und auch noch eine kleine Tour durch unseren Stadteil. Während der gesamten 14 Tage war Pedro immerzu für Fragen erreichbar und ich musste nicht lange auf Antworten warten, was ich sehr geschätzt habe. Das Haus und der Stadtteil sind sehr sicher, ins Haus kommen nur deren Bewohner und in den Straßen rundherum finden sich etliche Cafe´s, Restaurants und Supermärkte. Und nicht zu vergessen, der beach ist nur 10 min. zu Fuß entfernt.

Quero parabenizar ao casal pelo acolhimento e cuidado. O apto foi entregue em ordem e nos foram transmitidas todas as orientações pessoalmente sobre cada detalhe do apartamento. É um espaço pequeno e muito bem aproveitado por ter o mezanino. Colchão confortável. A kit fica numa rua bem tranquila e super perto do metrô.
Supriu bem nossas expectativas. Eramos duas pessoas.
A unica coisa que senti falta foi de local para pendurar roupas, embora tenha alguns ganchos pela kit.
Super recomendo o espaço. Gratidão!!!

Muy buena ubicación en Copacabana (cerca a la playa, cerca a restaurantes, cerca al transporte público).
Muy hospitalarios y buenos guías!

É como se sentir em casa. Um local aconchegante, que tem tudo o que você precisa, um chuveiro delicioso, colchão super confortável, a rua é silenciosa e ainda assim é do lado do metrô, ar condicionado gela direitinho, receptividade dos anfitriões é um adicional a parte, pois são maravilhosos e super atenciosos! Recomendo de olho fechado.

name: 2 Bedrooms/1 Bath Unit-5 Min Walk to Kailua Beach
summary: Our Shared bath unit is located on our Ali'i property which is centrally located with a short 5 minute walk to Kailua Beach and around a 10-15 minute walk into Kailua town. Both the bedrooms have king size beds in them with the bathroom in-between them. This unit is also has a mini refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, and dishes for light cooking. This unit is great for small families on a budget, couple friends, or any party of 3-4 guests.
description: Our Shared bath unit is located on our Ali'i property which is centrally located with a short 5 minute walk to Kailua Beach and around a 10-15 minute walk into Kailua town. Both the bedrooms have king size beds in them with the bathroom in-between them. This unit is also has a mini refrigerator, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, and dishes for light cooking. This unit is great for small families on a budget, couple friends, or any party of 3-4 guests.
house_rules: - We do NOT allow smoking in our units however we do allow our guests the option to smoke outside.

host.host_about:
Aloha, My name is Brandyn. I am so blessed to offer people from all around the world the chance to experience the breath taking scenery and beautiful culture of an island paradise I have called home for my entire life. My family has been in the vacation rental business for over 30 years and it all started with my grandmother Kay (hence Kay's Ali'i Vacation Rental). Now myself, my mother Brenda, my wife Kristina, and my aunt Lucy have taken over the reins and are continuing the legacy my grandmother started. 

Our families journey in the vacation rental industry started with one small simple unit and slowly evolved into something special for generations to come. We now we have 3 vacation rental properties in Kailua with multiple units on each. Our goal is to offer parties of all sizes the chance to visit our island paradise without having to break their bank accounts. We have 2, 3, & 4 bedroom units for larger groups or extended family getaways. We have 1 bedroom units & large studios for our guests who are traveling with their immediate family and we also have a private rooms for those of our guests who want to get away by themselves or with their significant other to relax and enjoy our beautiful Hawaiian weather. No matter what group size you have we can accommodate you. Take a look at our listing and feel free to message us. We look forward to hearing from you soon. :-)

reviews.comments:
房子被分割成几个单元进行出租,所以我们花了一些时间才找到我们的单元｡
离kailua海滩很近｡房东还提供了一些潜水及沙滩用具｡

Spacious and equipped with everything you would need to prepare your meals. Washer and dryer very convenient. Parking was great. AC was great and really quiet. I would forget it was on. Beach within walking distance through nice residential neighborhood. Would definitely recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 110 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: ➳ Logement  4 1/2 Rosemont ❤️
summary: Chers Glob-trotteurs, travailleurs, vacanciers ou qui que vous soyez :)  Notre demeure est au dernier étage d’un petit immeuble (3 étages), situé à 20 min du centre ville.   L’appartement possède un salon double avec chambre ,balcon donnant sur une rue passante, deux chambres dont une fermée, une salle de bain ainsi qu’une cuisine avec un second balcon donnant cette fois sur une vue panoramique.  Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre !
space: Notez qu’il y a deux chambres, la première étant en fait dans le salon double ainsi qu'une seconde isolée. La configuration est parfaite pour un couple avec enfants, travailleur ou groupe d’amis. Envie de vous promener dans le quartier ? Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre, très agréable l’été ! Il y a aussi beaucoup de parcs aux alentours. Si vous désirez vous rendre au centre-ville il ya plusieurs possibilités : Transports en communs : bus, metro  Vélos, Bixi (il y a plusieurs boutiques de vélos dans le quartier) Voiture (Parking sur la rue) Il y a un supermarché à 2min à pied pour faire vos courses et une station essence ouverte 24h juste a coté en cas de besoin.
description: Chers Glob-trotteurs, travailleurs, vacanciers ou qui que vous soyez :)  Notre demeure est au dernier étage d’un petit immeuble (3 étages), situé à 20 min du centre ville.   L’appartement possède un salon double avec chambre ,balcon donnant sur une rue passante, deux chambres dont une fermée, une salle de bain ainsi qu’une cuisine avec un second balcon donnant cette fois sur une vue panoramique.  Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre ! Notez qu’il y a deux chambres, la première étant en fait dans le salon double ainsi qu'une seconde isolée. La configuration est parfaite pour un couple avec enfants, travailleur ou groupe d’amis. Envie de vous promener dans le quartier ? Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre, très agréable l’été ! Il y a aussi beaucoup de parcs aux alentours. Si vous désirez vous rendre au centre-ville il ya plusieurs possibilités : Transports en communs : bus,
neighborhood_overview: Rosemont est essentiellement un quartier résidentiel, vous pouvez trouver des commerces sur les rues Rosemont, Beaubien, Masson. Parcs aux alentours : Parc Père Marquette, Parc Sir Wilfried Laurent Vous êtes à 20min du métro Berri-Uqam. (Downtown)
notes: Ne pas stationner en véhicule toute la journée devant l'entrée de l'immeuble (devant le garage)
transit: Arrêt de bus : - Pour rejoindre la ligne de metro verte : 10 - la ligne orange : 197/25 Metro Rosemont à 15 min à pied.
access: Toutes les pièces sont accessibles.
interaction: Aucun. reviews.comments:
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Rebekah, c'est un ami à elle qui nous a donné et repris les clés. Nous étions une famille de 4 (un bébé et un enfant de 4 ans).
Nous avons aimé : la proximité des commerces (supermarché, pharmacie, fruiterie, le chaleureux Rose Café), le bus au pied de l'immeuble, la taille de l'appartement confortable pour 4, 
Nous avons moins aimé : l'appartement pas très propre (odeur de cigarette, cendrier pas vidé, mégot dans la chambre - pour un logement non fumeur !!- le parquet qui noircit les genoux de notre fille à quatre pattes, le frigo pas vidé, la poussière sous les coussins des canapés ... et j'en passe), le manque d'équipement (balai, aspirateur, vaisselle pour préparer à manger), la machine à laver défectueuse (elle est tombée en panne après 2 utilisations, nous avons du aller en laverie), les lumières cassées dans les 2 chambres (que nous avons réparées), la TV qui est en fait un écran pour regarder des DVD, le couchage pour la 3e personne dans la petite chambre fermée est en fait un canapé non convertible de 1 mètre de long (notre fils de 4 ans ne pouvait pas dormir dessus ...). Rebekah nous a donc fait passer un matelas gonflable.
C'est un appartement à moindre cout, certes, mais pas conforme à la description. Bien pour un couple qui aime manger à l’extérieur.

name: Mezzos Studio in Sydney CBD
summary: An ENTIRE studio ALL TO YOURSELF at Circular Quay in Sydney's CBD marks this inner-city home a must for any weekenders, interstaters or holiday makers. Fully furnished with FREE Wi-Fi! BOOK NOW and receive 15% OFF car rentals with Europcar across Australia, New Zealand & UK wide!

An extended living area with a comfy 2-seater sofa bed that folds out to a double. A fully decked kitchen and dining. Complimentary coffee and tea. A laundry area with a washer, dryer, iron and an ironing board. ALL TO YOURSELF! Please click on the photos to view more about this property and it's surroundings. neighborhood_overview: Ideally placed in Circular Quay, you'll be in the heart of the action near the Sydney Opera House, The Rocks, and George Street. Enrich your experience in Sydney, be it for work or for play! Explore the spectacular array of Sydney local attractions during your stay. The playground of Australia, Sydney boasts some of the country's most iconic landmarks and we're in the perfect location to experience the wide array of things to see and do in Sydney. Experience unique Aussie tours, check out some of the world's best restaurants and bars and, of course, take in spectacular views of the breath-taking Australian scenery… There are tons of things to do in the city itself which are mostly a quick stroll away. I've included most of my favorite places and more in my extensive "Local Recommendations Guidebook" on this listings page, so please feel free to check em' out for awesome things to do and eat in the CBD area.
notes: This is a private unit ALL TO YOURSELF and you WON'T be sharing this with any strangers during your stay. The "INSTANT-BOOK" function is enabled so you may instantly book the place if the dates you want are available. A representative will be assigned to check you in in person. Please be sure to notify us of your arrival times so that we can hand the keys to you personally. This pad accommodates 2 adults comfortably but a max of 4 overnight. Any more than 3 adult guests overnight will attract an extra $19 per night, per additional guest. The sleeping arrangement for the 3rd and 4th adult would be on a 3-seater sofa bed which folds out to a queen with extra quilts, pillows, sheets & covers. The 3-seater sofa bed measurements: - Measurements when sofa:  Width: 230 cm  Depth: 91 cm  Height: 79 cm - Measurements when bed:  Width: 140 cm  Length: 200 cm Please do let us know before hand if you would like us to pre-make the sofa-bed prior to your arrival.
transit: Needless to say, surrounded by trains, cabs and buses, getting around is not going to be a problem at all. (TIP: Sydneysiders commute mostly by train, bus or light rail. Get an "OPAL" card at any train station for AU$60 which comes with $60 worth of credit to get you around via train, bus or light rail). - Circular Quay - 5min walk - Circular Quay Train Station - 5min walk - Wynyard Train Station - 5min walk - The Rocks - 6min walk - Martin Place Train Station - 9min walk - The Strand Arcade - 9min walk - MidCity Shopping Centre - 10min walk - The Royal Botanic Gardens - 10min walk - Westfield Sydney - 11min walk - Pitt St Mall - 11min walk - Sydney Harbour Bridge - 11min walk - Sydney Tower Eye - 12min walk - Cockle Bay Wharf (Darling Harbour) - 13min walk - Town Hall Train Station - 14min walk - Sydney Opera House - 15min walk - SEA LIFE Sydney Aquarium - 16min walk - Hyde Park - 18min walk - World Square - 19min walk - Chinatown - 21min walk - The Star Casino - 22min walk - Museum T
access: You will be allowed to access the: - Lobby - Lifts - Apartment unit - Wi-Fi - 15% OFF car rentals with Europcar across Australia, New Zealand & UK wide!
interaction: I only interact with guests via AirBnb, What'sApp, Email, SMS or Mobile when necessary. Rest assured, my response time is pretty much instant. I will not be present at this property during your stay. A representative will be assigned to check you in in person. The apartment unit will be vacant (Furnished of course along with the amenities) and it's a private self-contained fully serviced unit ALL TO YOURSELF. You WON'T be sharing it with any strangers during your stay. Please refer to my calendar for availability. If your preferred dates are available, please feel free to book 'em. If the dates that you're after are blocked, they are most likely taken. The "INSTANT-BOOK" function is enabled so you won't need our "Pre-Approval" to make a booking. Just "INSTANT-BOOK" it if the place suits and if your dates are available. "EASY-TO-FOLLOW" directions to access the unit will be provided once your booking is made. FREE internet available. Password will be provided upon check-in. Complimentar
house_rules: STRICTLY NO PETS, SMOKING, HOUSE PARTIES, YELLING OR LOUD MUSIC PLEASE. Kindly treat my property with respect during your stay and do not cause any major or superficial damages. NOISE In the event our neighbours are disturbed by particular incidents like amplified music, vocals or excessive noise emitted during your stay, an abatement direction may be issued with an on-the-spot fine of AU$200 or more by our local council or the local police station. SMOKING If evidence of smoking is found during your stay or right after you check-out, you will be subject to a fine of AU$200 for the the removal of odours, debris and such. PETS Similarly, if evidence of housing pets are found on the premises during your stay, we will impose a fine of AU$150 for professional carpet, sofa and bed cleaning services along with any other strata related fines for breaching the building code. reviews.comments: A great comfortable little place right smack bang in the centre of circular quay. Contact with host/s was quick and easy too

Our stay in Jared's apartment was exactly what we needed. It's a very comfortable space for two people. There is a big window that provides a nice view of the surroundings and a lovely breeze. We didn't use the rooftop pool (too cold) but it was gorgeous! The kitchen is very small but it's well set out so there is still plenty of bench space. Being on a high floor the hot water doesn't run for particularly long but it's fine if you leave a bit of time between showers. Checking in and out was super easy! The building is in a wonderful location, we walked easily to Haymarket, Darling Harbour, the Rocks, and Circular Quay. TIP: If you are driving into the city, this is not the place to stay. Parking was a nightmare. Jared does warn that parking is expensive (he mentions $69 in the apartment description) but what I didn't realise is it's not just a $69 flat rate for more than three hours, it's $69 the first day, $50 overnight, then $69 for the next day. In the end we just gave up trying to find cheaper parking and paid. Other than that our stay was wonderful. Thank you Jared for being a wonderful host!

The studio's location is very accessible. Its a few minutes walk from both Wynyard and Circular Quay train stations. That was a major win for us. We were able to visit one place in the morning, then return and feed the kids and visit another place in the evening/night. Jared provided us plenty of everything described in the listing.

You can even see Sydney Eye Tower from one of the windows. No balcony though.
很干净,结构布局都很喜欢,如果check in的时间能在灵活一点就好了
It was a great place to stay, awesome location for a good price, and it was a good size for the four of us for four nights. Nice view out the window of the city too

Nice and clean place to stay int he middle of the city
Really recommended!
The location is okay and safe.
Great great location! Lovely little thank you note too. The place was spotless and had everything we needed!
Good Host
房东非常热情和友好,公寓的地理位置也很好,走路就可以到很多景区,公寓有厨房,可以自己做饭｡一次不错的居住体验｡

Great communication from Jared at the time of booking and leading up to our stay.  The apartment was perfect for us as our weekend was spent mainly in the Rocks and Circular Quay area which was about a 5 minute walk.

Pub across the road has all the sports channels (perfect during finals footy) and does a pretty good meal as well.

There is a little noise in the morning from the Light Rail project works but overall value for money and location were perfect.
Great place in the middle of the CBD. Checking in was super easy and communication with the host was spot on. Great value when you consider what a room of similar size in a nearby hotel would cost.

The location was great for our interests.  We literally walked everywhere we wanted to go and we got around.  There are so many great things to see near Mezzo's Studio.  Our check-in and check-out were easy and our requests were handled in a helpful and friendly manner.  I highly suggest this location and the price can't be beat!
房东的房子在悉尼cbd｡位置非常好｡我们转了几天才发现他四通八达｡大门非常有范儿｡房间内设施齐全｡是个好房子!

Thank you for consistent communication and reliable contact. 
The presentation and location of this property is excellent.
Given the location, it was good value for the cost. We had issues with the elevator, but that can't be fixed by the host.

A smooth pre-stay process with an easy check-in and out procedure. We were a bit late arriving due to flight delays but that was no problem. There were a couple of hiccups that were dealt with quickly and I believe will be sorted for future guests as a result. 
Fabulous location (a bit of street noise, but that's what you get being in the centre of the city!) and I felt safe in the apartment which was comfortable.

If your are spending time in circular quay or the rocks this place is well located for the price. It accommodates 4 people with the fold out bed and has everything you need. Our arrival was easy and communication was great. The place does need a really good clean, other than that this was a great pick.

Location was good and price was reasonable, but I would not stay here again.

The television only had three channels that worked and none of the lights in the kitchen were functional (so I didn't even try to cook or use anything in the kitchen, thus can't be sure if the appliances work). The bathroom flooded when you took a shower no matter how careful you were, which is probably why there was a lot of mold in the bathroom, particular between the sink and shower. In general, the unit was quite dirty.

The location is unbeatable. Bathroom needs an update but other than that we truly enjoyed our stay. 
Ate breakfast looking out to the city and enjoyed some sunshine at the rooftop pool. Quiet building mostly businesses so no waiting for elevator. And it was more than enough room when my parents joined us for a few days.
Host was very prompt to respond to inquiries and worked with us on our early arrival. 2 big thumbs up!

Jared was not there himself to handover the apartment but was very thorough in organizing somebody else to meet us there. Loved how clean and airy the apartment felt. And the location was fantastic. Would definitely stay here again!

Fantastic neighbourhood. Close to Martin Place in the middle of Sydney CBD. Walking distantie to darling harbour, the rocks, CBD etc. Easy contact with Jared to align arrival times and follow up questions, very helpful and on the ball. Small, slightly dated appartment.  But great bed and fold out bed, all amenities in place.

Host was great, I just had to text when our flight landed and we were able to check in at 12 which was really handy. 
Excellent location. We just needed somewhere to shower and sleep so it fit the bill.
Perfect place. Everything is near. Great communication.
Good location next to Circle Quay and Opera House.
The listing description was accurate, the location was great. However the apartment was lacking character, the kitchen was a little bit dirty - needs a good clean

Perfect location - 5 mins from Circular Key and the Sydney Opera House area. Noisy, but to be expected for the location so not a problem for us as we wanted to be close in to everything. Communication was very good, and we were able to pick up the keys with no issues. Little smaller than expected, but absolutely fine for us - a couple. Only real problem was a very soft bed which did not help my back issues. We would stay here again.
Great location!!! Short walk to ferries. Easy safe entry with very comfortable accommodations.

Location, location, location.  This apartment is close walking distance to anything you want to do in the city.  The room is high enough in the building that we slept comfortably with the window open without city noise.  The room is spacious, and the bed is very comfortable.  The bath and kitchen are small and dated, but perfectly functional and it was no problem for us.  I think this is a great deal for a fabulous location.  Don't miss the views from the roof.
Great location :)
Wonderful location , hassle free check in and check out :(
Great place to stay...clean, very central location and had everything we needed for our stay. Thanks!

great location within minutes of circular quay, the rocks, and everything the city has to offer. the check-in and check-out processes were smooth and easy. two notes i would share are: 1) there is a recurring tapping/hammering sound that occurs throughout the day and night which i could not identify--perhaps a building-wide issue--that was a bit loud. i had to use earplugs to get to sleep as the noise was a bit disruptive. 2) i didn't end up using the pool because i was afraid i'd be locked out of re-entering the floor from the rooftop stairwell. it appeared to require a key to get back on the 11th floor, but the only key i had did not fit the lock. something to be sure to ask upon check-in so you can be sure to enjoy all the amenities the apartment has to offer.

This is a perfect little apartment centrally located in Circular Quay.  quick walking distance to Opal station which gets you to the train and ferries around Sydney Harbor.  Amazing little breakfast/lunch shop downstairs for amazing coffee and food.  Wifi was great and apartment was clean.  The rooftop pool was small but nice.  great place to stay with my family of 4: two parents and two kids.
Perfect location in the middle of the city. Wonderful place to stay and would love to come back!

PROS: The location is great. Minutes away from the main ferry terminal, which is the best way to reach the different neighbouhoods in the bay, and also very close to the city center 
CONS: The appartment is no more than a large hotel room. It is aged, lacks any charm, and is not really good if you want to do some cooking. If your aim is to spend time outside and not inside it's perfectly good
Fantastic location for Circular Quay and the city. Tidy and comfy.
We've had an amazing time in the apartment. It has a perfect location!! Everything is on a walking distance. It was perfect!!!
Studio is located in the very heart of Sydney, can't get any better for exploring the city. It is small, but very well equipped. Swimming pool on the roof is a nice bonus too.
It is in the central CBD area quite close to both wynard station

위치가 서큘러 키 역 근처라 아주 편했고
방이 넓고 전망도 괜찮았습니다.
소음도 없고 좋았네요
잘 지내다가 갑니다

The apartment is located in a nice place.We can walk to the circular quay in 10 mins.The Rocks,Royal Botanic Gardens and Sydney Opera House are not far where we can walk to.The apartment is small but equiped well.There is everything we need.Cen is very helpful.But the mattress is too soft for my parents,since hard mattress is good for old people's back.
The place is close to train station but it is a bit old.
Great location, neat and tidy. Exactly what we were after!

Location, location, location. We were initially underwhelmed by the apartment when we first arrived. It was small, needs some updates and a really good clean. However, the location and he price can't be beat and we would 100% stay here again!
Great location, neat studio apartment with all the necessary amenities. Highly recommend.
Very central location! Walking distance to the botanic gardens, bridge and opera house. Very clean and neat.

Excellent location with basic, comfortable accommodations.  We could easily walk all throughout the CBD, the Quay, the Gardens, the several bridges.  Very excellent stay in the heart of  Sydney.  Note:  There are several Bridge Streets.  This one is between George and Loftus Streets in the lower CBD.
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The best thing about this flat is its location. Overall is not as I expected it, pictures were better than the place actually was and cleanliness was quite poor.
The unit is well located and while small, had everything we needed to be comfortable. It was clean and the bed was very comfy. No complaints at all.

Our family of 4 (2 6yo kids) stayed at the apartment for 9 nights. Whilst it's a simple studio, the apartment was everything that we could need. Well equiped with cooking, bathroom, washing and cleaning stuff which made the longer stay more comfortable. The communication with host was good- whilst we didn't see any host it did not hinder our stay. The only things to keep in mind at this location is inner city street noises- more on the weekends at night. And also apartment is right next to the elevator which does have an interesting sound but doesn't take long to get used to. Location in the cbd was ideal and super close to public transport options and sight seeing activities. Overall we had a wonderful stay and would recommend to others
Great location for the Opera. Very clean. Enjoyed our stay.
This accommodation is just great for a night in the city or if you just need somewhere to sleep after sightseeing and dining out. Close to transport, dining and shopping areas

We LOVED this place!  It was sparkling clean, central to the ferries, the Rocks, the botanical Gardens and the Opera House.  We appreciated the size, with two big windows on the top floor and all we needed for a very comfortable stay.  The water was good and hot, the wifi was good, the bed comfortable.  We would definitely go back and will recommend Jared's place to friends.
The apartment is within walking distance to Circular Quay, place was clean and tidy and the host communicate everything clearly. We enjoyed our stay and have no issue. Recommendable.

This small apartment is centrally located to everything we wanted to do.  With 3 of us, the apartment was filled but we weren't in Sydney to hang around the apartment!  With Woolies just down the street, we were able to get heat 'em and eat 'em food that worked great in the kitchen.  The downside was the 24 hour construction on the rail system on the street below.  Incredibly noisy, so if you are coming in the next few months bring earplugs.  The rail system will be great once completed though!

Jared's apartment is in a perfect location so close to the centre of  Sydney and also to the train stations. It is ideal for a couple. Small but we found it ideal for us and definitely value for the cost. The bed is very comfortable. It is a bit noisy at the moment with road construction going on but I still slept very well and I'm a light sleeper! Just used ear plugs. The bathroom is a bit dated but the shower works well.  Check in and out was easy and apartment very easy to find and secure. Would definitely stay again if returning to Sydney. Jared is a great host!

An amazingly great location -- couldn't be better!  But if you are hoping for something above "very basic", this isn't it.  The bed is VERY SOFT - very very soft and the place is desperate for some basic upgrades - wouldn't take muchto make it significantly better.
Good apartment for the price.  Not paying Hotel prices so don't expect hotel quality.  The bathroom could do with a decent clean.

Jared's place was pretty spot on, I'll go on the things I like such as the location it was a 10 min walk to circular quay the main sightseeing suburb. The room had probably one of the most comfortable beds I've been on haha. I the only big thing that I advice or maybe they could improve was parking (I know it wasn't mention), I got a rental and it was difficult finding parking overnight in the city that wasn't over priced. I assume since it was a studio the apartments probably had their own parking but that wasn't the case. Overall I Recommend the place.

Great location! 5 min walk to Circular Quay and the Sydney Opera House. We were able to walk and take public transportation to all the sights. 

The studio was spacious for our family of 3. The bathroom is a bit small but it worked. The bed was comfy and there were plenty of pillows and towels.

This is the best location you can ask for. You're in the center of everything. Apartment is nicer than what you would get in a hotel room. They're doing construction a street over for a light rail, so ear plugs are necessary. But if you're looking for something that's affordable and in an unbeatable location, then you won't be disappointed.
Excellent location with a short stroll to the circular quay and the opera house. Also thanks to the great host - I left something in the fridge after checking out and Ellie

The main bed was super comfortable and the place was clean and just what we needed.  Close to all the transit and sites.  The shower wall doesn't come out far and there is no curtain to prevent splashing, so you'll need to wipe down the toilet and floor after showering. Bring your own hand towel and wash cloth if you use one.  Also, it's on a heavily used road and the noise is constant.  Light sleepers won't rest well.
Conveniently located in the city
Very nice location! Walking distance to all tourist spots. Will definitely book again with Jared.
Great place! Really enjoyed the stay! Can be a bit noisy on the street at times

Very cute studio apartment within walking distance of everything you need. We caught the train from the airport to Circular Quay and it was only a 5 minute walk to the apartment. The only drawback was luggage storage - we were unable to leave our bags before check-in time. This is understandable, given that it is an airbnb and not a hotel, however it was an inconvenience and added cost for us to use public luggage storage. The check-in process was easy and the apartment itself was perfect for a weekend away. Very small and basic but the bed was comfortable and the location couldn't be beaten.

Jared's apartment is very well located. You can see the Opera House & Harbor Bridge everyday coz it's just a 10min walk to Circular Quay. Very accessible to tourist spots within the city, walkable or within 1-2stops from Circular Quay or Wynyard Stations. The space is enough for us 5 (2adults, 1 teen, 1 child & 1 infant). The place is clean, with every basic thing provided. We did not cook though, so we were not able to use the oven. It was a bit cold though during some nights since it's winter & we were not able to find a heater. Tried to adjust the thermostat to 20 degrees but it turns off. It's more of an airconditioner. But it was fine & we didn't bother to ask Jared anymore since we are outside most of the time. I highly recommend this place in Sydney. If we'll be back, I hope to book this place again.
位置很好!

Location! 5-10 mins walking distance to everything you would want to see in the CBD! Very accessible to attractions, public transportation and shopping. The studio is a little tight but completely doable for four adults.

Amazing location in a nice and comfortable unit, equipped with everything you need for a great time in Sydney.

Would recommend the unit for anyone looking for a great time in Sydney at a very central location.
Strategic location and fast response host

The studio apartment was really cold at night, as the room wasn't heated and only had a tiny portable heater. This was made worse by the fact that the second doona was really thin, so didn't keep us warm at night. 
The room was also quite noisy from the streets.

Otherwise a very central apartment, very close to circular quay and most other parts of the Sydney CBD.

Stayed here for 2 nights with my mum and sister - was comfortable for the 3 of us. Very convenient being so close to everything! We could walk to circular quay, opera house, darling harbour & CBD shopping. Great price considering the location.
Very good location. Close to every thing you need for a great vacation.

Jared's place was perfect for our requirements. It is very near Circular Quay and within a few minutes of the pick-up places for the tours we booked. The description and the instructions he gave were very accurate. 

Jared, while we did not personally meet him, was very accommodating and prompt with all our queries via email.
价格优惠 设施齐全但是相对简单
Jared is fast respond guy. Jared's place is perfect location and really convenient to central. The apartment is so lovely and clean. Thanks you so much for the lovely home and is highly recommend.

The location is very good. It is very close to circular quay and opera house. But it is little far from cbd... and its heater is broken. So it is little bit cold while i am staying here.......But they bring oil heater to me. Hahaha.......
Great location. Good value.
As expected, right price for the room. Easy check-in. Good location, very close to circular quay
性价比很高,自由,不用跟别人共用房间和设备,安全,比住酒店划算｡
It was nice to stay here. A bit dirty inside though. Very close to everything you need. Close to Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge. Lovely staff.

Stayed for one night and was an awesome stay, super close to everything, very tidy, and the host was amazingly helpful and check in was made very easy. They even made the sofa bed for us upon our arrival!
Muy buena ubicación
Very close to Circular Quay station & The rock.
This place is good coz everything around you.
在悉尼住的这三天非常愉快和舒适｡很有家的感觉,房屋整洁｡步行到附近景点都在10分钟以内,任何时候可以出门,方便,快捷!下次来悉尼还会选择!非常感谢!

We had a fantastic time staying at this amazing place. Our hosts were cordial, communicative, amicable and made our stay really pleasant. We would highly recommend this cozy house for anybody who wishes to explore Mt Gambier and surrounds.
Awesome location
Jared's accomodation was great. The location was quite near to the wharf and it was clean. Especially, Ana and Francisco were so kind. Thanks for everything.
Very good location and clean room condition.

Great place, clean and tidy room
Comfortable location !!!
kind and friendly

The location is good, walking distance to opera house and royal botanical garden and ferry terminal and also train station. Air con with an old system so it didn't cold like usual in a daytime, and it makes outside colder than inside.. 
But ana gave a quick response to check.

The place is well located, close to food and amenities, and within a short walking distance to the quay.  Jared responded very quickly and key collection was easy and efficient. 

Only issue we had was noise.  The pub opposite was blasting loud music, especially on Saturday night, till 12:30am.  Street noise starts in the mornings.  

The facilities in the apartment are complete and comfortable.
Great location! Walking distance easily to cruise terminal.

Apartment is conveniently located within a short walk from Circular Quay. Baggage storage company just down 2 blocks away. Open from 8am - 5pm at a cost of $13. This was handy as we arrived early in the morning and wanted to go to the zoo for the day before checking in the late afternoon. Communication with our host was prompt and they were flexible with check in time. 
The apartment was exactly what I expected.  Very spacious for central Sydney. Opening window to let in fresh breeze. The most comfortable bed I have ever slept in . Better than most hotels.

Walking distance to circular quay train station. Surrounded with Sydney main attractions.  Clean house with all basic facilities. Highly recommended. What you see in Airbnb website is what you actual get.. I give 5 star rating. Really satisfied. Thank you Jared and Ana for being a good host. Hope to see you again in future.
This the second time we stay @jared place. Jared management team is professional. I always tell my friend. Aus airbnb--> Jared. Thumb up for you guys . Thanks for Ana and Fransisco for everything.
Great location! A short walk from the Opera House. Clean, easy check-in and great communiation. Too easy
Great place, centrally located and very easy to stay in. Would stay here again, highly recommended
This studio is at a good location  .
Great place in the CBD, terrific location. Ana was also very patient with us as we were stuck in traffic.

Awesome location and walking distance to most attractions. 5 mins walk to Sydney harbour.  Place has everything you need for a short stay and quite comfortable. Would stay there again if visiting Sydney.
Great location, great for overnight, easy to find, great communication via txt.
Worth every penny
Great place  !!! great access to everything in the CBD (Opera/Chinatown/Museum).
Great location. Very clean and a fun place to stay.

Fantastic location. Within walking distance to many places of interest. Getting grocery was such an easy feat!Can save a lot on transport. We checked in late and Ana was very kind enough to accommodate my boy & me since I was my first time using Airbnb. Ana was very sweet and helpful in!!! That really makes us feel so welcome! I have read about other feedbacks about noises. As for me, I felt the noise level was not as loud as what others claimed. Since we were living right at the heart of the CBD, we do not expect total silence like living in a cave. We actually enjoyed the random sound of siren from ambulance, party-goers chiming to Christmas songs. It really represents a true heart of a city!
A big thumb up for the cleanliness of the places. Not a insect to be found! The air-con system was great! 
Discover that there is no shower curtain. Not sure if it is to deter people from taking long shower. Maybe having a simple one will be helpful to prevent unnecessary splashes. Just need to put a gentle note to remind to conserve water!
Thank you so much Jared for your prompt response and Ana for your great hospitality!

Very nice place, cozy and well-equipped. The apartment is close to shopping mall, Royal Botanic Garden, Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, etc. We had a great time there, and we'll recommend it to friends.

It was our first experience with airbnb.
Our place was still spacious for a family of four.
Great location and good security.
Everything we ever needed was there for us.
Out host was nice and kind too.
The place is a bit old, otherwise I will give four star out of five.
Great place to stay. It’s super central and very clean. Awesome, Thanks.
El lugar se adecua a nuestras necesidades. La ubicación es excelente y no tuvimos ningún problema
Clean and in a prime location! Walking distance to everything! Perfect for two people looking to explore Sydney. Highly recommended!!
Loved the location (5 mins walk and your in Circular Quay) and the apartments high ceilings (its top floor). Was also surprised to find a small but lovely pool area on the roof.
The location is great! It was walkable to everything!

This apartment is bright, airy and in a great location for visiting Circular Quay and the Rocks. Jared is a great host and replied promptly to any messages. We were greeted at the door and shown where the apartment was.

The place was fine. The person that checked us in was great! Note ahead of time that the owner gives a warning that the ventilation isn’t great and be careful cooking food—-he said you would have to pay for it if the fire alarm went off while cooking. Other than that it’s in a great location for touristy sights in Sydney
Host didn’t respond and could check in, finally got told at 8:30 pm to find somewhere else to stay. Terrible host!
Very good location . Perfect for 2 people.
Great spot, great location but also great value
该房子地理位置太棒了,市区繁华地带都可步行到达
Great if you need an overnight stay for an event around the rocks or Opera House
位置非常好,楼下就有便利店和早餐店,步行3分钟到租车店铺,步行5分钟到环形码头,可以看到悉尼歌剧院和海港大桥｡
房东非常热情,仔细｡
Great location was close to everything !!!!! Could have used a good dusting and a coat of paint needed some more hangers as well .. but overall a good place ...
很好的地段｡去环形码头､歌剧院､皇家植物园､博物馆均只需要步行｡饭店､酒吧､超市也很近｡房间里的电器一应俱全,餐具也准备的很齐全｡居然还有筷子｡总之,体验不错｡推荐

This is a great location! Close to the cruise docks, ferry and the train. We walked to the opera house and had fun exploring the area. Took the train to other places as our main transportation, including to the airport at the end of our stay. The appartment has lots of room and fully stocked kithcen. The bed was very comfortable and there were plenty of towels. A washer and dryer was a bonus. Great place and location for the price!
Great location. Good value for money
予想以上に奇麗でした｡ｼﾝｸがﾋﾟｶﾋﾟｶ｡ｻｰｷｭﾗｷｰに徒歩5分最高のﾛｹｰｼｮﾝです｡

Great location. Short walking distance to the ferry terminal (circular quay), Sydney Harbour Bridge & Opera House. Apartment is little on the smaller side but perfect for a weekend stay. Prompt response from host also. Would definitely stay again.
地理位置优越,离各景点距离很近,步行均可到达十分方便
It is very convenient to travel, and you can get to Sydney harbour and the commercial street shopping. The rooms are very comfortable.
Close to every thing. Clean with everything you would want. 10 /10 highly recommended
Cute apartment in an awesome location.

We would not recommend staying here at all. For just $10 more you could stay at the Marriott across the road and enjoy a clean room. The apartment was not properly cleaned: gaps between cabinets and white appliances showed piles of dust and dirt; tiles missing on shower exposed mold; stains were all over the walls and there was an intense chemical smell throughout the apartment. The location was perfect, but it seemed obvious the host was cutting corners to produce a profit. We love staying with Airbnb all around the world, but the lack of care and attention to detail in this unit is unacceptable.

Great communication and great location. Everything we needed for a short stay and the bed was very comfortable which helped since this was one stop of many for us on a bucket list trip to 'the other side'. A great way to get the city feel without the big hotel costs and really get a feel for the city. We had a great time.

Jared’s place is in a wonderful location, 5 mins walk to most places! A lovely space for an over night trip to Sydney. The only drawback is if sleep if what you want... bring ear plugs- the noise from the roadworks went the entire night. Otherwise, lovely space- reccomend!

Myself, my partner and our two boys (11 and 6 months) stayed for 4 nights at Jared’s apartment.
PROS..
Location is fantastic, close to Circular Quay which was great for us.
Size of the place was very comfortable.
Air conditioning works really well.
Kitchenette is well equipped for a short stay (small fridge, sink, microwave, kettle, toaster)
Beds were comfy and sofa bed had been made up ready for our stay.
WiFi was a great plus, and although we didn’t use it much it was nice to have it.
Check in was easy and the communication was excellent.

CONS..
Condition of the place left a lot to be desired. There was left over dirt on the carpet (bits and pieces, food, pieces of crayon) when we arrived. 
The bathroom needs to be stripped out and replaced, there are tiles missing, the bath tub is in terrible condition, there’s visible mold, the shower screen does nothing and you end up with a completely wet and slippery bathroom floor every time it’s used. 
There’s a bunch of exposed wires that have been carelessly taped to a skirting board in the kitchen area, fun when there’s a crawling baby exploring the place!
Air con, while it worked great, the dial is broken so its hard to know when it’s on or off.

I’d recommend a set of ear plugs for anyone staying here as there’s road works outside at the moment so there’s a bit of noise, as well as the apartment sharing a wall with the elevator shaft and a fair bit of noise coming from the roof (top floor apartment). 

Overall we had a great trip but for the money we spent we could have stayed in a nicer Airbnb (as we have in Sydney before).

Great Location for those wanting to spend a night enjoying the Sydney Night Scene. Perfect for small groups looking for a place to stay downtown that’s not only centralized but also easy on the Wallet.

Great central location, a bit noisy at night but Jared is a good host and accommodated us :)

Thanks again!!
Fantastic location, great communication, bed was extremely comfy. Apartment was just what we needed we New it was a studio but as a family we all found it was still enough space

Perfect location. Great value for money.   Bed is soft and cushions are comfy.   Big leather couch opens to sleep two more.  Kitchenette is functional with toaster and kettle and basic tea/coffee on hand.  You are literally minutes away from circular quay, opera house and shopping.   Only downside is that you are opposite a pub and it can get noisy late into the night as patrons leave plus the lift mechanisms seem to clunk so may not suit if you’re someone that  needs a dead quiet space to sleep.
Great location and great amenities! Communication was very prompt and thorough.

Hi Jared thanks for having us 
Your light filled comfy studio apartment was perfect and a great location in Sydney and even better for the circular quay and the rocks area.
Jared’s studio apartment is a lot bigger than most expensive hotel rooms in the area too.
It is clean with all the major and minor amenities you need for a stay in the city It is located in a beautiful building with quiet and friendly neighbors.
Check in was super easy and Jared was very quick at replying to any messages and requests. 
Jared warned us that there is some city construction close by but we barely heard it and it made no difference to getting around the area via car or walking.
We hope to be back at Jared’s place soon thanks for having us.

The location is superb !! The heart of Sydney!! Just 5 mins walk to Circular Quay Opera house. Many good restaurants around. it’s like a NY style apartment, lovely, sweet and quiet. Perfect for couple. Loved it! Will definitely visit again.
Great location !!!!!
Excellent location, quick communication and confirmation. You can't go wrong
Great space in an excellent location.
Great location, neat and tidy apartment. Will stay again!
Great location and convenient access to public transport.
房子位置不错,离各大景点都挺近,去哪里步行坐车都可以,出行是很方便的｡只是房子本身有点旧,有看到蜘蛛网和小蜘蛛,厨房有很多工具都没有,切菜刀都没有一把只有一把小刀,做饭不是很方便,也没有洗碗机可用,有红酒杯却没有开瓶器,冰箱坏了,在入住期间漏了一地水,窗帘也坏了｡入住建议问清楚房东是否已解决以上问题｡

This apartment is in a fantastic location. It’s a short walk to Circular Quay, the Rocks, Opera House and Botanical Gardens. We appreciated the security  of a locked entrance, key swipe for elevator and door lock. It was easy to check in by connecting with Ana. Enjoyed our stay!
Good location, nice stay.

Location is perfect, super close to public transportation, restaurants and bars. It is right in the city so at times it can be a little noisy. But that’s to be expected in any city!Studio was clean and had everything we needed for our stay. Host let us check in a little earlier as well, thank you! I’d definitely book again!

Ubicado estratégicamente, cerca al Opera house, nos desplazamos a pie facilmente por todos los lugares turísticos, la chica que nos recibió fue de gran ayuda, recomiendo este sitio 100% y volverla seguramente.
perfect location.

Terrific location - very central to Circular Quay (also very easy walk to Barangaroo Wharf and Wynyard Station), Opera House, art galleries, shopping etc. Convenient stay - property was as I'd expected.
A great, central apartment, perfect base for a weekend away.
Great location. Great communication. We were late on our agreed check in time but ana patiently waited for us. Thank you so much. We enjoyed our stay.

This cosy unit is suitable for 2 people, 3 at a pinch. It is clean, comfortable and close to Circular Quay.
We didn't cook in the kitchen, only prepared cereal for b'fast, and made tea and coffee.
Being winter, we made use of the convection heater when we returned from an evening outing.
The bed was very comfortable,  and the bathroom quite modern and sufficient.
Really great location nearby main attractions.
The location is the best , place is very clean and the possibility for an early check up was so unexpectedly pleasing ! thank you and I would definitely recommend this place to other people .
Jared’s place was great, and I can’t imagine a better location in Sydney. Highly recommend!
离歌剧院很近
It’s a lovely house with very clean environment and convenient facilities.  Also the owner is very nice.

This is an amazing location, we could not have expected anything better.  The location is walking distance from all prominent  landmarks of Sydney and all good restaurants. The place was clean and the host was very responsive and very accommodating, we would highly recommend this place.
Great location.
地理位置极佳,交通便利｡
Location is ok, hygiene is very poor, quilt is very thin, very cold, air conditioning only refrigeration, there is an electric heating, no use.
Nice appartment, perfectly suitable for 2, but for a short stay also possible for 4. Perfect location near Circular Bay. All necessary amenities available. In total, a clear recommendation.
Emplacement parfait
Great location, the host is very helpful and responded quick.

This location can't be beat, especially for the price! About two blocks from the ferries and walking distance to several sites, bars and restaurants. Communication was good also. Would definitely stay here again!

Really appreciated the early check-in. 
Excellent location, except for noise at night from club across the street. (Which the made the understandable clause about "fines if you make noise" a bit hypocritical)
Bathroom could do with some basic renovations, tiles fixed/replaced etc.
Loved the arch windows high ceilings, lots of light.
Fantastic location, though a bit noisy but understandable as it's right in the middle of the city. Would definitely recommend!
Best location! In Sydney CBD, close to everywhere. Very convenient and safe!

Really good location, walking distance to circular quay & wynyard station so really handy for travelling around for site seeing. Apartment was as expected. WiFi didn’t work properly meaning had to use my 4G majority of the trip but have mentioned this to Jared so hopefully will be sorted. Communication was good, Ana responded quickly and gave clear instructions with photos so that was helpful. Thought it was a bit harsh/ strict for check out times as we asked for a possible late one (only an hour or two- check out is 10am) & it was a flat out strict no, but never mind! Was an overall good stay & would stay again, recommended to everyone
mouldy bathroom spoiled our stay, we would not stay again and think it very overpriced for those conditions. wifi not on for first 2 days
A wonderful little apartment. We had a great time in Sydney and this apartment was cosy and had a great feel about it. A great place to relax after each long day exploring Sydney.
Great location when in Sydney. This place is a regular stop for me.

Great location in Sydney. About a five minute walk from the harbour. It’s a small studio great for one or two people. There is a washer/dryer that I found super helpful since I ran the half marathon while I was visiting. It’s a good spot to stay a couple days in the city.

The location is superb. The service was great unfortunately the condition of the unit itself was disappointing and I felt sorry for the cleaners because they are obviously under pressure because of the high turnover.
This could was ok could be better looked after and maintain better
Really great location...perfect for a couple or small family for a short stay. lil noisy (from outside traffic) but nothing over the top. enjoyed our stay.
Great location and easy check-in.

Awesome location. 5 min walk to circular quay. 

Place is prob only good for immediate family as not much privacy but was perfect for us. 

The only thing I would have liked was a top sheet on the bed as a quilt is too warm but no sheet is too cold. 

Bathroom was a little grubby but I guess with a quick tern around of guests it may be hard to maintain. 

All over VERY good value for money and we will stay again one day
A nice little place, and a great location! We didn't have any troubles here and thoroughly enjoyed our stay :)
great location
Excellent location!   Absolutely everything you need!   Great bed.
Nice place for a short trip. Great location and speedy response.  recommend for two people.
Great location! Very central and perfect for us who were spending all our time out and about. Very helpful and quick responses from host.
环境很棒  有历史感  日常用品齐全  离悉尼歌剧院很近  步行5分钟差不多就到了  正对面的小巷子进去 有家中餐 Mr wong  味道很好 有许多当地人在那里吃饭   体验非常好!大赞
Location is awesome

Jared’s place was in the perfect location. About a 10-15 minute walk to the major sights and attractions. The apartment was a little more run down than I was expecting but overall we had a great experience.
Great location, apartment & value. Just confirm that the elevator is operating when you book.
Well located apartment clean and good
Jared’s AirBnb was amazing. Super safe and great location- walking distance to everything! Check-in process was very easy and communication was quick. Highly recommend.

This is a small/studio apartment in the heart of the CBD and within walking distrance to many attractions including 2 train stations, Circular Quay, lots of pubs/restaurants and coffee shops. Apartment is very clean and had everything we needed. Check in was easy and Jared is very responsive. I would stay here again and recommend to anyone looking for basic accommodation in a great location.
NICE LOCATION, NICE HOST.

Great location and communication was great! I appreciate that they let us check-in early, and it was nice of them to offer to make the sofabed ready prior to our arrival. I was never offered that at other places before. Maybe a bit pricey considering space, but probably it's partially due to the sofabed being open. Many restaurants and stores nearby. We didn't cook, but wish there was a coffee maker. Overall, a great stay!
Great location and a very comfortable space.
Very cozy place in the centre. Very convenient to everywhere. Highly recommended.
위치가 정말 좋아요. 기차역과 시드니 오페라 하우스도 매우 가깝습니다.
Everything was great, in a great location. Only downside was there were very limited working tv channels.
Awesome location . Great communication
Great spot! thoughtful directions.

The sheet is kind of old and holes on it, so If you’re a highly required person, it’s not a place for you. But the place is near central and got everything you need in the area, near bus stops and train stations.
The apartment was very centrally located, an easy walk to many tourist destinations. The wifi was a bit spotty. It was convenient to have a washer and dryer in unit. Would definitely stay here again!
Great location.
Great location!

We have great  time in Sydney, this accomodation is very well located.
I'll recommand it to my friends.
Thank you.
Ana was very attentive and helpful.   Perfect location for us.

Please show up clear information for everything in advance. For example,  if guest arrive late,  how much they have to pay or not.  Otherwise,  guest will think it will be a part of sevice for the room.

Jared's place was perfect for our 3 day/2 night stay in Sydney before we took off for another city on our honeymoon. The apartment was as described, and perfectly located near Circular Quay. Air conditioning was great to have during the 97 degree day and evening. Ana was very communicative and responsive to any questions we had. Would stay again. Thanks guys!

you couldn't find a much better location for seeing what Sydney has to offer! 
bed was comfortable and a lot of toiletries and cleaning products left so you don't need to worry about buying things.
It is a great place to stay in a city and enjoy Sydney.
A very clean place with awesome air conditioning and wonderful location.

name: Bosphorus view apartment
summary: Fully furnished apartment; two bedrooms, big & small living-room, kitchen, terrasse over the Bosphorus and amazing vue..Internet line, two tv Ideal for family or two couple. We are in the middle of town shopping, sideseing, café/everything easily done
space: A very comfortable apartment, fully furnished, two nice bedroom up to 3/4 people + one sofa in the living room.  It is situated in a strategic location on the Asian side; only 15 minutes from Üsküdar harbor to the European side. The view on the Bosphorus is amazing, wide big balcony where you can have your meals or just relaxing. You are five minutes from the harbour by foot where you will find all shops and the best fish restaurant in Istanbul.  Weekly or monthly renting
