neighborhood_overview: Very quiet...The area of the town is lively, pictoresque and charming. Historic part of town and the Beylerbeyi Sultan Palace to be seen.  Beylerbeyi is well known for traditional turkish breakfast and fish restaurant.We are five minutes away from the sea.  You are in a old building with three other apartments one at each floor. Ours is on the forth floor without lift but easy stairs.
notes: Our cleaning will come once or twice a week with extra charge. Air condition are in the two main room, ventilator in the two bed rooms, one extra bed/sofa in the main dining.
transit: Located two minutes away from ferry crossing, bus stop and taxi. Yes we have a private parking space secured. The apartment is 20 minutes away from Sabiha Gökçen airport". We may be able to pick you up depending on your arrival date.
access: Complete access to the whole apartment and equipment on arrival. Two large bedroom, one big dining and living room, television plasma.  Sofa can be use as a extra bed for children or kids + one extra bed in one bed room. Other small salon with television, working desk and electronic walking machine with view on the Bosphorus always from every room of the apartment...The bathroom is spacious with a big bath, toilet and lavabo. Big balcony with roof. Kitchen with all equipment and view on the Bosphorus.
interaction: If needed we can pick you up from the Sabiha Gökcen airport. We can spend sometime with you if you wish to see around Istanbul (regarding our free time).  As a wine consultant I may also make you discover the turkish grapes and (website hidden) We will not be present in the apartment during your stay. We may arrange guide for you if needed and cleaning ladie (extra cost).
house_rules: No smoking and no pets...

host.host_about:
I am french. I like to have contacts with people.  I am  64 years old, married with Figen and have a wonderfull 10 years old boy. I have been living in İstanbul since 2005.
I am a wine consultant. I organize  wine tour in Turkey and abroad. I like Beylerbeyi village on the Bosphorus very much.

name: Awsome international appartment
summary: Hi !  We have a spot available as of August 1st in our awesome international appartment (we have people from Quebec, Japan, France, Peru).  Basically someone that is
description: Hi !  We have a spot available as of August 1st in our awesome international appartment (we have people from Quebec, Japan, France, Peru).  Basically someone that is

reviews.comments:
J'ai passé un super séjour dans cet appartement. C'est une grande collocation avec un grand groupe de personnes et tout le monde est très sympa et sait mettre à l'aise. En quelques jours ils m'ont fait visiter Montréal, m'ont aidé avec mes démarches administratives et les différences entre le Canada et mon pays d'origine, nous avons fait de grands repas communs... 
Je recommande particulièrement ce séjour pour les gens qui sont actifs et veulent faire des rencontres. Il y a toujours du monde à l'appartement, c'est vivant et pour les gens qui savent l’apprécier cela peut-être génial. 
Il n'est pas loin du bus / métro. J'ai pu me rendre plusieurs fois au centre de Montréal sans problème en peu de temps. 
L'appartement est plus grand que les photos ne laissent à penser. 
Ma chambre était spacieuse et agréable. Aucun problème niveau propreté. 
Malgré la courte durée de mon séjour, je sais que je vais garder contact avec mes hôtes et continuer de passer régulièrement. 

Tl;dr : Plus grand que sur les photos, rien de négatif à dire, très vivant et gros gros plus sur la convivialité et le charme des collocs.

name: Penthouse 260m2 - Laranjeiras - Rio
summary: Welcome to this beautiful and renovated "cobertura" 260m2 on  the popular Plaza São Salvador. View the Christ of Corcovado and large terraces.  All shops, bars, restaurants, subway nearby.  Ideal location between the beaches and the Centro.
space: Wide atypical apartment (entire top floor of a old building with 4 floors) fully renovated; Rustic furniture and decoration typically Brazilian. Large kitchen (no dishwasher, but the possibility of providing a housekeeper and / or cook Brazilian, Daily rates in addition to the rent) Hot showers, WiFi, cable TV, washing machine, Air Conditionned in all 3 bedrooms. New beddings: 2 queensize beds + 2 single beds Cotton linen, tea towels and towels provided. Spacious closets in each room. 2 terraces, one overlooking the square with a view of the Christ of Corcovado and the other very large with hammocks and outdoor shower.
description: Welcome to this beautiful and renovated "cobertura" 260m2 on  the popular Plaza São Salvador. View the Christ of Corcovado and large terraces.  All shops, bars, restaurants, subway nearby.  Ideal location between the beaches and the Centro. Wide atypical apartment (entire top floor of a old building with 4 floors) fully renovated; Rustic furniture and decoration typically Brazilian. Large kitchen (no dishwasher, but the possibility of providing a housekeeper and / or cook Brazilian, Daily rates in addition to the rent) Hot showers, WiFi, cable TV, washing machine, Air Conditionned in all 3 bedrooms. New beddings: 2 queensize beds + 2 single beds Cotton linen, tea towels and towels provided. Spacious closets in each room. 2 terraces, one overlooking the square with a view of the Christ of Corcovado and the other very large with hammocks and outdoor shower. Equipment access: In the central office: unlimited wi-fi internet and cable Living room: TV LED 32 "with Brazilian public + cable ch
neighborhood_overview: The "Praça" (square, plaza) São Salvador is a  popular and typical area in the neighbourhood of Laranjeiras, in the South Zone of Rio de Janeiro; It's ideally located between on one side by  Botafogo and Copacabana/Ipanema beaches areas and, on the other side, the "Centro" and Lapa. Supermarket 50m away, Pharmacy 100m, both open late. Many shops and restaurants nearby. 500m from the beautiful park of Flamengo (beautiful view of the Sugar Loaf), ideal for sports and walks. Closed to traffic on Sundays for even more space. Free musical and artistic entertainment from Thursday to Sunday on the very Plaza Sao Salvador. Many activities and many people on the site sometimes until dawn! But recently installed double glazing ensure your peace of mind.
notes: Caution: DO NOT THROW TOILET PAPER OR OBJECT OF ANY KIND in the toilet!  Unfortunately a common situation in Brazil, not by particular ecological awareness but often the lines are too narrow, and any omission of this detail can turn into a very unpleasant experience, not to mention a costly intervention at your expense)  110V electricity in the whole city! Please check that your adapters are bi-volts! Internet Wi-fi network is not very fast and limited to the central office. You can connect through Ethernet for better speed.
transit: For fans of running, the Rio Marathon  (July) and the  international semi-marathon (August), as well as many popular races and events arrive in the Flamengo Park, 500m from the apartment. Ideal to participate or support! Largo do Machado metro station 400m; Bus lines throughout the Zona Sul (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) permanent taxi in the street or on call. Beaches: Copacabana / Leme 10 minutes by taxi, Ipanema 30 minutes by subway or 20 minutes by taxi. Easy access to the Santos Dumont National airport (10 minutes by taxi) and Galeao-Internacional Airport (30 minutes by taxi through Tunnel Santa Barbara)
access: Equipment access: In the central office: unlimited wi-fi internet and cable Living room: TV LED 32 "with Brazilian public + cable channels (sports, cartoon, news ...) Access to all rooms of the apartment except the "closet" of the master suite. This piece containing personal business owners remains locked and inaccessible.
interaction: Monitoring and internet bookings (selected via (website hidden) connection) directly with the owner (based in Paris, speaks French, English, Portuguese); The owner has lived 15 years in Rio and really knows the city and its surrounding destinations (Ilha Grande, Buzios ...). Reception by bilingual host on arrival;  Booklet of instructions and detailed advices (FR, U.S., POR)
house_rules: Smoking allowed (but not in the rooms!). Pets not allowed in the building. The flat is on top of a quiet, family building with mostly families and kids, which means NO "SERIOUS" PARTYING ALLOWED, no use of drugs or escort services possible in the flat (but you have hundreds of people partying in the street in front of the building almost every evening and many places for such activities in the city!)

host.host_about: 47 ans, music producer

address.street: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.comments:
Super appartement très confortable et grand dans un quartier de Rio très sympa. 
La terrasse est très agréable et propice à passer des moments de détente. 
Proche de tous commerces et transports. 
Marc a facilité notre arrivée et notre séjour à tous points de vue notamment en nous indiquant toutes les adresses utiles dans le quartier et ailleurs. 
Nous le recommandons fortement !

Marc est l'hôte franco-brésilien parfait : il nous a aidé en nous envoyant un taxi dès notre arrivée à l'aéroport et a su répondre à toutes nos sollicitations par mail pour un séjour sans faute ! 
Son appartement est très bien situé, pile entre le centre historique et les plages de Copacabana (15 min taxi pour 5 euros, 3 stations de metro, arrêt Largo do Machado à 300 mètres seulement) et d'Ipanema (5 stations, idem en taxi).
Situé au cœur du quartier Laranjeiras, à la fois populaire, pas trop touristique  et sans danger, proche de toutes commodités (supérette ouverte tout le temps et pas trop chère), au-dessus d'une place animée avec son bal choro typiquement brésilien le we ! L'appartement en dernier étage avec ascenseur, est tout simplement magnifique, sobrement décoré mais avec beaucoup de goût, et offre une très grande terrasse au calme de l'autre côté de la place avec 2 hamacs, dont on a bien profité, ainsi que d'un petit guide papier maison réalisé par Marc, bien utile aussi pour visiter Rio et connaître les bons tuyaux (balades, restos, vie quotidienne...). Nous nous sommes sentis a la fois bien dans l'appartement avec tout le confort, les prestations nécessaires (2 salles de bains, chambres climatisées) et les ustensiles nécessaires, et très en sécurité avec notre fils de 9 ans, qui a joué au foot avec ses petits camarades en bas de la maison, comme un vrai carioca, pendant que nous sirotions des caïpirinhas au bar juste à côté, dans une ambiance unique de quartier ! Le plus ultime : la vue sur le Corcovado depuis le balcon filant donnant sur la place Sao Salvador !!! Un vrai super plan qui gagne à être partagé pour des vacances de rêve à Rio de Janeiro.

Experiência excelente! Marc foi incrível desde o primeiro contato. Confiante e confiável, ótimo anfitrião. O apartamento é lindo e nos foi entregue impecável! Tudo o que a gente pediu tava lá. A localização é ótima. Vale a pena!
Apartamento muito agradável e espaçoso num ponto muito bom do Rio. Voltaremos com certeza.

name: White House
summary: Single-family home in Barcelona with lots of charm. Living room, fully furnished kitchen, 2 triple bedrooms, 2 double bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with showers. Accommodation for 10 people. Heating and air conditioning. Garden with barbecue grill and private pool.
description: Single-family home in Barcelona with lots of charm. Living room, fully furnished kitchen, 2 triple bedrooms, 2 double bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms with showers. Accommodation for 10 people. Heating and air conditioning. Garden with barbecue grill and private pool. One hundred meters from the house, there are buses that can get you to the city center in 15 min. (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
notes: (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)
transit: One hundred meters from the house, there are buses that can get you to the city center in 15 min.
house_rules: - El horario de entrada en los apartamentos será a partir de las 14.00 h. del día de llegada debiendo quedar libres las habitaciones antes de las 10.00 del dia de salida.  - Tarifa por registro de entrada a deshoras (después de 20:00): 40€ - El cliente se obliga a cuidar el apartamento amueblado, siendo de su cargo los deterioros o pérdidas que se produzcan en la misma. - Menores de 21 años, serán solamente admitidos en compañía de un mayor - Las HORAS DE DESCANSO son de 22,00 a 10,00 entre semana y de 00.00 a 10,00 los festivos, - Los apartamentos están dotados de un sistema de control de ruido, en caso de superar el máximo durante el periodo nocturno, un agente se desplazará hasta el apartamento. Si se vuelve a ocasionar un problema de ruido tras la visita del agente, será bloqueado el depósito - En el momento de la salida del cliente debe entregar la casa en buenas condiciones de limpieza. No se puede dejar la basura en la casa, utensilios de cocina y vajilla debe estar limpia, toal

host.host_about: Me encanta la decoración, la moda y estar al día de las tendencias pero lo que más me gusta es conocer gente de diferentes culturas y paises y hacer que su estancia en barcelona sea lo más agradable posible

reviews.comments:
Villa fidèle aux photos, bien entretenue avec un jardin  agréable. Propriétaire disponible et a l'écoute. Seul bémol : le quartier industriel alentour qui peut parfois être mal fréquenté. 
En résumé nous avons passé un très bon séjour dans cette maison idéale pour partir en famille ou entre amis.
Très bon accueil et maison très agréable conforme aux photos

This was a great little house, fresh decor and a really fun outdoor area to lounge around in. We found everything we needed there and very accommodating service.  I would highly recommend this as a place to stay, especially for a group it is perfect. My only drawback is that it is quite removed in location from city centre and we got a taxi each time we left the house. Still I would return to this location regardless as we had such a great time. Thanks!, Sinead.

The White House is a fantastic place. The rooms are a good size and the air con is efficient & relatively quiet. The living area is large and well-equipped and the outside space is also a great size. The pool makes a real difference too as the walls & surrounding buildings mean there isn't much of a breeze. It is in quite an industrial area, but there's a large shop nearby and buses & the town centre a short walk away. 

Jose Luis and Isa were very helpful and provided a lot of info for us when we arrived - taxi numbers were very useful as there aren't many passing, but you do need to speak Spanish in order to call. They were very flexible with our arrival time and would have been so with our checkout too, if they didn't have another booking. The only downside was some communication issues, which meant we only found out about having to checkout early on the morning it happened - so we were left with 20 minutes for 10 people to pack up.

That aside, the house is great and the hosts very friendly & helpful - a nice and excellent value house for a group in central Barcelona.

We were met by a very friendly host as soon as we arrived at the Villa, which was clean and tidy. The villa is located in a more industrial part of Barcelona but this isn't an issue with a supermarket just around the corner.  Barcelona centre is just a 10 minute taxi journey (approx 12-15 euros) away or there are local buses very close to the villa that can take you into town.  This villa is perfect for large groups, particularly with it's outdoor space that many other Barcelona apartments do not offer.  We would definitely stay again if coming in a large group.
Posto bellissimo...comodo all'aeroporto..alla città...persone disponibili e accoglienti!!!!!!!perfetto.....
Very Nice place

La casa, es preciosa, muy bonitas nos encanto.
muy grande y para repetir.
Muy recomendable  para grupos grandes.
Isa la anfitriona muy bien.

We had a lovely stay at the White house. Isa and Jose was really helpful with both the booking and greeting us at the house. The house is perfect for a group or friends or a bigger family. It's quite far from the city center and it take some time to reach. Especially in rush hour. But there is a big super market close to the house. Perfect for shopping for dinners in the patio.

We had a great time at the apartment. The garden and pool are great and the apartment was really well presented. The location is quite far out from the center but there are lots of buses from about a 6 minutes away. Highly recommended.
The place was fantastic and we had an amazing time! Highly recommended
Hello, welcome was perfect Mr Jose cas There to welcome us And give us all thé information around the Area. Nice week-end with friends And the housse os perfect for group friends.

We had a very nice holiday and the hostes are very friendly. 
For us the best part of the house was the garden with the pool there we spent a lot of time together. The house is perfect for large groupes unfortunately there are not much plates and glases and to cook with 2 pans was sometimes a little difficult. Even there are a loot of moskitos. But everything worked and de house was nicely done up. To the center we had with the taxi 10 minutes and with the bus 15 minutes, both is cheap. There is also a big supermarked about 5 minutes away.
We  very enjoyed our holidays in the white house and we will come back if we stay again in Barcelona.
The host canceled this reservation 230 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The house was as described and the pictures provided were accurate. The host made us feel most welcome with some water in the fridge and a bottle of red wine upon arrival. This was received especially well as we didn't arrive until midnight! Our flight was delayed considerably, but the host still met us with a friendly face. 

We has everything we needed, including fast internet and a dishwasher. The pool could have been a little bigger, but we were more than happy with what we got for the price, and again, it was as described. 

The house itself was in the industrial part of town, but it's only a 5 minute walk to the bus stop and 10 minute bus to Espanya, which is a Metro hub that will basically get you to everywhere in Barcelona. Travelling around on public transport is also inexpensive (1€ per ride if you get a T-10). The house was also about a 5 minute walk for a large supermarket.

Overall, the house had a nice clean feel, and was nicely decorated. I certainly wouldn't hesitate to book this house again or any of the others the hosts have on offer. They also let us check out late on our last day as no-one else was due to check-in (this saved us carrying our luggage around on the last day)

On behalf of the Honey party, thanks!

La maison est très agréable. Nous étions 8 à l'occuper et c'était, selon notre vécu, le nombre idéal et maximum, pour en profiter au niveau de la vaisselle disponible et de l'espace repas de la cuisine. 
Notre hôte a été très à l'écoute de nos demandes et très réactif. Par exemple nous n'arrivions pas à faire fonctionner les climatisations, une personne a été envoyée très rapidement pour nous aider à les faire fonctionner. 
Enfin, en ce qui concerne le quartier, en effet, il est éloigné du centre ville et surtout désert. Il faut compter 10 minutes en voiture ou taxi pour rejoindre le centre ville, mais 40 minutes en bus. 
Nous avons passé un très agréable moment dans cette très jolie maison.

Buscabanos una casa cerca de la FIRA. La casa de Isabel esta bien equipada. 
Esta aislada de comercio al estar en la zona franca, pero eso es por desconocimiento nuestro

Super cute little house on a quiet side street near the Barcelona/Hospitalet city line. Easy cab ride into the city, 2 blocks from a supermarket. Loved the layout - it was perfect for the 3 of us staying there for the week. 

Just wish it was warmer outside so we could have taken advantage of the pool!
Great house ... excellent location ... would definetely stay there again ...
The host canceled this reservation 205 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Leiligheten var fin og vi ble tatt vel imot av Isas venn da vi kom sent på kvelden. Den var velutstyrt og praktisk men renholdet kunne vært bedre. Det er kort å gå til bussen men du må regne minst en halv time på lokalbusser for å komme inn til sentrum. Ligger i et industriområde så det er ikke mye som skjer i umiddelbar nærhet, spesielt ikke om kvelden.

Contact with the Host was good. We had some problem with internet but we managed to resolve it by ourselve. The house is located quite far from the centre but about 500meters from it is a bus stop with all the necessary buses.

Non fatevi ingannare dalle foto, la casa è piccolissima mal tenuta e senza l'arredo delle foto, la piscina in realtà è uno stagno per le rane, il prato in erba sintetica e la zona è forse la più brutta è pericolosa di Barcellona abitata per lo più da spacciatori e prostitute, tanto che certi taxi si rifiutano di portarti a destinazione per paura, niente metro, solo un autobus che impiega 40 minuti fino al centro. Una delusione

Nous avions les deux maisons et le fait qu'on puisse passer de l'une à l'autre est parfait quand on est un groupe nombreux. La maison est comme sur les photos, la décoration soignée, et apaisante. La cuisine très bien équipée, la maison est assez spacieuse, plus que sur les photos selon moi. 
Il y a un bar en face qui ouvre très tôt, idéal pour manger un excellent sandwich et prendre une bière. 
La zone est plutôt industrielle mais il y a une station de bus (qui circule toute la nuit à proximité). Sinon, en taxi, c'est environ 12€ pour aller en ville.
Le supermarché est à 5 min à pied, ce qui est très pratique.
Globalement, ce fut un séjour fantastique, je recommande vivement ce logement !

Lovely villa, great size for 8 of us. Perfect place to chill. Only downside is it not being near to a metro but buses are easy. Also bathrooms could do with ventilation, but otherwise it's a lovely place :)

I really couldn't fault this villa! Everything was as described; it was clean, a huge amount of space for 6 of us, all the amenities worked and beautifully decorated! The location was perfect for us - you have a supermarket within a 5 minute walk and it is the same distance to a bus stop that takes you right into the centre of Barcelona. Alternatively, getting a taxi was super easy (download the Hail O app!) and only cost about 10-12 euros. 
We would all love to return and can hopefully do so :)

Attention aux photos tapageuses ! Nous étions quatre amis à avoir réservés cette maisonnette pour notre séjour à Barcelone de trois jours. Nous ne sommes restés que une nuit, préferant perdre notre argent,  tellement nous avons été déçus par cette location. Plusieurs raisons à cela: 
- La localisation. Pleine zone industrielle, odeur nauséabonde à notre arrivée, 25 minutes de bus du centre-ville.
- La piscine. Point central de notre réservation, la photo qui la représente sur l'annonce est clairement un trompe-l'oeil. Nous appellerions ça plutôt un bassin, étant donné qu'il ne doit pas dépasser les 4m carré. De plus, elle etait dans un état de propreté lamentable ( nous en sommes ressortis les pieds tout noirs après 5 minutes à faire trempette).
_ L'ensemble du logement. Pour le prix affiché, nous nous attendions a trouver une literie de qualité. En guise de cela, de simples matelas à ressorts, et au réveil de multiples boutons de piqures. De plus, l'ensemble est bien moins attrayant en réalité qu'en photo (Finitions bas de gamme, simple vitrage).

En résumé, nous avons la désagréable sensation de s'être fait avoir en bonne et due forme, tellement le décalage entre l'annonce et la réalité est terrible. Nous ne pouvons que vous conseiller de passer votre chemin, vous trouverez bien mieux au même prix ailleurs à Barcelone, n'en doutez pas !

We had a great time at the White House and the kids loved the pool ! The house itself is spacious and all amenities were available as listed. The wifi connection is great. On the negative side, the house smelt a bit of paint when we arrived, presumably because paint works were recently done, and we had some trouble with non-functioning light bulbs, but nothing serious. The neighborhood is a bit isolated (with lots of car and metal workshops nearby) but very quiet, and the bus service to the center of town is excellent. There's one supermarket in the immediate vicinity where we could buy all groceries we needed. Overall, we would definitely consider coming back to the White House on our next trip to Barcelona !
The house is very nice for a group of friends, its outside the city, for traveling by car it's perfect. The cleaning can be better.

we all really enjoyed our stay at the white house. we were a group of friends who only see each other a few times a year and had a wonderful time. the house was clean and had such adorable decor which we all loved.
the hosts were lovely and had good communication and let us check in early and out late so we weren't left carrying our luggage around.
had difficulties with everyone showering in the morning as water would go cold after a few uses, so bare that in mind when staying.
couldn't seem to find the hairdryer that was said to be provided, but didn't contact host as it wasn't a huge issue.
had a lovely stay, would stay at the white house or other properties by the host again!
Perfect little house, clean tidy and private

It's a pretty small house in an industrial area. It took about 10-15 minutes by bus or taxi to the city central. The supermarket was like 10 minutes away. If you want to go spontaneously out in the neighborhood you won't find anything. The communication could have been better. We flew in to groups to Barcelona. My friends were the first who arrived and asked if they could stay on the last day little longer because their flight back was taking of at evening. They were told it's ok to stay till 5pm if there's no other guest booking. And as he looked he said there wasn't any. So on the last day we had to leave within half an hour because no one told us anything about the other booking.

Great place, the garden is great to hang out! 
To get into the city it's faster to order a taxi to your doorstep by using the mytaxi app, because pretty often when you call the given tel. Numbers they don't have one available.
Would recommend, since it's big, it's secluded and your in the city really fast! The hosts were great, easy to communicate and very efficient!

Myself & 7 female friends stayed at the White House over the Easter weekend. The house was perfect for us - the large open plan living room / kitchen / dining area was a great place to sit as a group and relax. The bedrooms were light & airy. There were 4 bedrooms: 2 with 3 beds & 2 with 2 beds. Each 2 bed room had one of the 3 bed rooms connected to it through a set of doors. The outdoor space and little plunge pool were great too and gave us another place to chill out and get some sun - we didn’t mind being a bit outside the city centre to be able to get this. The White House had everything we needed, even uk to eu adaptors and a hand blender! Alina, who met us at check in, was really friendly and gave us all the information we needed. Isa responded quickly to any questions I had and even allowed us to check out a little later on our departure day. It was a great experience and I’d recommend it to anyone.

Good size property to comfortably accommodate 6 of us that were travelling. Location is not central but very easy to commute, close to Olympic stadium and Magic Fountains. Big grocery shop nearby well equipped and reasonably priced also close to nice bakery/Coffee Shop. Area seemed safe and quiet. Had good stay. Recommend for larger groups or family with kids
Very good. No complaints. Much bigger than previously thought.

Spacious and comfortable with an awesome plunge pool. The garden is a sun trap from mornings to early afternoon! 

Good for groups. Located slightly away from the beaten track but with a supermarket nearby and taxis always available.

Host was easy to arrange and great communication!

Thanks! :)

Great little dive pool and backyard area with a few deck chairs and a table.

location is not the greatest as it takes a while to get the bus and it will only take you as far as Sants station, no further. we caught a lot of taxis which were about 12 euro to get where we wanted to go 

good for a group of people that are not couples
What a great house. Kids loved the pool. Nice quiet area but close enough to town.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Es un lugar acogedor, mucho más aprovechable con el buen tiempo (por la piscina)
ES UN ALOJAMIENTO TOTALMENTE RECOMENDABLE

name: Sunny Bedroom in trendy Bushwick Apt. w/Rooftop
summary: My apartment is within five minutes to a ton of amazing bars (The Johnsons, Miles, Three Diamond Door ) and restaurants (Dear Bushwick, Forrest Point, and Robertas).  Perfectly centered between the L train @ Jefferson and the JMZ @ Myrtle Ave.  Grocery store on the corner. Laundry in the basement.  Bike rack out back. Cute little balcony off the living room, natural sunlight that comes through, and the giant rooftop that has a stellar view of the city.

Perfectly centered between the L train @ Jefferson and the JMZ @ Myrtle Ave.  Grocery store on the corner. Laundry in the basement.  Bike rack out back. Cute little balcony off the living room, natural sunlight that comes through, and the giant rooftop that has a stellar view of the city.
house_rules: - This is a two-bedroom apartment, so being respectful about cleanliness and noise is important.

name: Typique appartement Villerois
summary: Charmant 4 et demi avec pièce doubles (deux grandes pièces: chambre et bureau, salon et cuisine/salle à manger) avec boiseries et hauts plafonds dans l'un des plus beaux quartiers de Montréal. Lit queen douillet à souhait, laveuse-sécheuse, grand balcon ensoleillé, potager à votre disposition: le bonheur! Il y a même un divan convertible en lit double pour loger 2 personnes de plus Emplacement idéal, à 2 pas du métro Jarry (accès rapide au centre-ville) et 10 minutes du magnifique parc Jarry!
space: This is a one bedroom apartment with a lot of charm: a typical Montreal apartment with high ceilings and woodwork. Ideally located, it is a 3 minutes walk to Jarry metro station (easy access to downtown) and a 10 minutes walk from the legendary Jarry park. Perfect for one person or a couple, the apartment can accomodate up to 4  with the comfy sofa-bed.
description: This is a one bedroom apartment with a lot of charm: a typical Montreal apartment with high ceilings and woodwork. Ideally located, it is a 3 minutes walk to Jarry metro station (easy access to downtown) and a 10 minutes walk from the legendary Jarry park. Perfect for one person or a couple, the apartment can accomodate up to 4  with the comfy sofa-bed. You will have access to the whole fully equipped apartment, including: two double rooms (bedroom/office, kitchen/dining room/ living room) and a sunny terrace. Washer and dryer at your disposition. Free parking on both sides of the street. 3 minutes from metro station Jarry
transit: Free parking on both sides of the street. 3 minutes from metro station Jarry
access: You will have access to the whole fully equipped apartment, including: two double rooms (bedroom/office, kitchen/dining room/ living room) and a sunny terrace. Washer and dryer at your disposition.

reviews.comments:
L'appartement de Fannie est un appartement typique du quartier de Villeray avec beaucoup de charme. Appartement propre, parfait pour un couple !!!!
Le quartier est très sympa avec pas mal de restos et commerces à proximité de l'appartement. La station de métro Jarry est à 2 minutes à pied et permet d'accéder au centre de Montréal très facilement. 
Je le recommande sans hésiter !!!
On a tellement aimé ce quartier qu'on veut s'y installer  ;)

Le logement est très chaleureux et agréable dans l'ensemble. J'ai beaucoup aimé le quartier pour sa proximité avec de nombreux endroits qui me tiennent à coeur : parc, marché talon, Villeray... Le métro est très pratique, à  2 min à pied, en quelques minutes on se retrouve en plein coeur de Montréal. 
Le logement en soi est plaisant, mais très peu lumineux. La chambre est super, la literie nous a fait passé de très bonnes nuits. 
Le ménage pourrait être plus soigné, le lieu ne respirait pas très bien quand nous sommes arrivés. Petit hic aussi avec le voisinage, nous avons eu un concerto chaque soir qui peut être parfois dérangeant quand on rentre pour avoir du calme après une journée entière passée dans le son constant de la ville. 
Merci à Fannie en tout cas qui est très agréable et arrangeante, merci à elle avec la distance d'avoir été présente quand nous avions besoin.

reviews.comments: 住的地方很小,但是很干净｡
Nice place,good location. The biggest problem is one-there are no towels in the room. But everything was great. Thanks a lot!
sam and team was very helpful..
A great place to just go and sleep

Like the interior of the room. Wished there was instructions to disposed our trash because bin was a little too small. Overall location was convenient and centralized. If you are always out travelling, looking just for a place to rest the night and on a budget, then this could be the place for you.
청결이 아주 조금 아쉬웠고 드라이기도 못쓴게 좀 그랬지만 좋았어요! 나머지는 다 완벽해요 잘자고 가요~!
Very convinient and central position, 1min to Tsim Sha Tsui metro station.
位置很方便
Good place to just sleep
去年新年来香港在房东Sam的房源住过,感觉很棒,所以第二次来香港,又选择了Sam房东的房间,房间里的玛丽奥墙壁居然是立体的!房间设施齐全,墙壁画超赞!房间所在的大厦位置也超赞,走几步就到地铁站和重庆大厦,同楼一层有珍妮小熊正店和7-eleven,楼后面有K11楼和翠华｡再来香港还住这里!

位置无敌,地铁尖沙咀出来就能找到,附近百货,便利店,电影院,一应俱全｡
check in需要电话联系房主,房间是小,五脏俱全,但是如果都是女孩子看到港片里一模一样的楼道还是会有点儿害怕,楼下有保安安全倒是不错~
比想像中小,不過性價比還算高
房间很不错干净有特色虽然还是小但是什么都有 孩子很开心 地铁就在楼下性价比超高 下次来还会选择这

就在弥敦道上,步行购物很方便!对面就有莎莎,卓悦｡步行去海港城很近!楼下就有尖沙咀地铁口,巴士站也在附近,搭车回深圳湾上车的k11就在旁边上车,很便利｡
这一栋住的人不复杂,房东很好人,干净,就是空调制冷的时候很大声,不过我比较累很快就睡熟了｡ 房间厕所都有窗口,公共走廊很漂亮,隔音还不错｡
反正不要去重庆大厦住就对了,那里百度一下你就知道｡
Good 교통 너무편리함
离地铁站非常近 房间小 但是风格很可爱 马里奥是乐高拼的很有意思
性价比很高,逛街出行非常方便!谢谢你｡
挺不错的
地理位置非常好,就是房间很小很小,但是这个价位这个地段,是正常的!!
地址稍微有点难找~晚上太晚回去只有一个电梯 有点麻烦~退房时间好早……房间不错~很喜欢~
位置很好,适合两大人或加个小孩慢慢享受旅游的乐趣!
本想在同一间房定两晚,但是操作问题导致第一晚订了,第二晚没定上｡后来再定的时候第二晚已经被定出去了,所以联系房东帮我推荐还有什么同等的房间｡回复太慢,多问两句到后来直接不回复了!要是第一晚的能退,我肯定退了!老板聊着聊着都不见了!抱着忐忑的心情定了第二晚的房间,还好是上下楼｡好在入住的时候态度很好,房间也不错,算是弥补了
旅馆式,房间还行,边上就是重庆大厦
位置绝佳,走两步就是崇光和海港城,就是卫生间略小,不过寸土寸金也可以理解
性价比高这是真的 不要太挑剔都行
地理位置很好,附近很多吃的离商场也很近｡很方便｡夜里到也可以打车到｡总体不错!超级玛丽很可爱
非常棒~下次还想试试住隔壁的小屋~
楼下有很多黑人,晚上回来有点怕怕的,不过地理位置很好,出来随便逛逛都很热闹,乘地铁也非常的方便,性价比可以说是非常的高了~
非常可爱的房间,虽然整个大厦的环境很一般,不过地理位置非常好,一下楼就有地铁站,进到房间也感觉比较干净整洁,总的来说是一次不错的入住体验｡

Great place that is literally seconds from the train station. Fantastic people running this place, really nice and accommodating. Small rooms but that’s expected in HK. No towels or amenities but that’s worth it for the price!
地理位置很好,交通方便,但房內有異味,整個房間和浴室只有一盞燈,其它燈都是壞的,房間及浴室地板上很多小蟑螂爬行｡

位置无敌,离尖沙咀地铁口很近,不管是去海洋公园､迪士尼乐园还是太平山顶,都非常方便,而且出门就有很多逛街的商店,特别是离海港城也很近,如果主打购物的话,这里的位置绝对够正｡但是大厦整体环境一般,我们住的楼层有很多制衣小作坊,感觉人员比较混杂,楼下还有很多南亚人,自身感觉太晚回家还是有点怕怕｡房子很小,如果只是抱着晚上找个地方落脚的心态还可以,谈不上舒适｡有一个小窗,但是打开会有楼下飘上来的油烟味,根本不敢打开,导致屋子味道很大,还有股霉味,热水器第二天晚上也坏了,然后还有小虫子｡只能说,在寸土寸金的香港,毕竟这个价格,我可以理解｡就写这么多,给后面的旅客一个参考｡
房间有虫子,很闷,洗澡冷热交替相反的,时冷时热
连续住了3天,对于香港这个大都市来说一晚300多的房价算便宜了,但是第一天入住的时候发现5支蟑螂,联系房东有位阿姨就拿了杀虫剂上来,地段确实很方便,不管是地铁还是维多利亚都很近,晚上虽然有阿黑在楼下,但是没有说的那么恐怖,如果是女生单独入住我觉得应该是出了电梯后整个走廊四通八达的有点怕吧

마리오 방

침사추이 D번 출구와 제일 가깝습니다. (하지만 올라가는데 계단이 좀 많음) 
빠뀌뻘럐 많습니다!!! 현관에 있는 전화기로 밤 11시에 전화했더니 청소부가 잡아주심.. 
집 주인과 (Hidden by Airbnb) 에어비앤비 메시지 연락 아예!!! 앙댑니다 ... 보이스톡도 네버. 연락이 되지앙나서 숙소까지 가능데 매우 뿔평했어요 유령 찝 쭈인입니다 
온수를 틀어도 촤가운 물이 좀 나옵니다.
화장실은 샤워하기엔 너무 쫍아서 뿔편합니다
방 안에 있는 편의 시설은 커피포트와 티비 바디워시 에어컨이 있는데 에어컨은 1도  안 시원함  밤새틀고 그냥 환기용으로 썼어요 (숙소에 퀘퀘한 냼썌가 좀 납니다) 바깥에는 공용 드라이기 2개가 있는데 넘나 짝아서  장 앙댑니당. 밤 늦게 10시 이후에는 엘베 1대만 운영합니다 (숙소는 11층).  제니 베이커리가 같은 건물 1층에 있습니다 숙소 키가 따로 없고 현관에 도착해 주인에게 현관에 붙어있는 전화기로 연락해야합니다. ( 이게 유일한 소통의 수단입니다 ) 숙소 휴지통은 2틀에 한번정도? 비워주는 듯 합니다. 방 안 와이파이 됩니다 콘센트 3개 멀티탭1개 있음  방 안에 캐리어 2개 펼치기 힘듦  매우매우 짝숩니당  성인 남성 2명은 쫍을 듯 하고 오래댄 건물이어소 빠뀌뻘럐 나오는것 빼면 이정도 가격에 괜찮은듯 합니다

Search the Apple or Android store for “Captain Cook Resorts” today!
house_rules: The Principal Guest, must be 21 or over in order to make a Reservation, must be present during the entire stay and is completely, solely, and unequivocally responsible for his/her personal actions as well as the actions, both financially and physically, of other guest occupants during the dates of stay.

host.host_about:
ALOHA !  E komo mai . . . and mahalo for choosing to stay with Captain Cook Resorts!  

Captain Cook Resorts manages over 140 privately owned vacation rentals in Waikiki (a district of Honolulu on the island of Oahu).  Everyone on the fun and energetic CCR team works hard to offer great accommodations, great service, and has a passion for sharing all that Oahu has to offer our guests!  

We appreciate that you're on vacation, and we ask that you let us know if there's anything we can do to make this visit stand out as one of your best!

Provided with your rental:

• Bed linens, bath, beach & kitchen towels, dishes, silverware, cookware (including tea kettle & rice cooker)
• Beach chairs
• Hair dryer, iron & ironing board
• Several days’ supply of coffee filters, laundry detergent, dish soap, dishwasher soap, bar soap, 2oz shampoo & 2oz conditioner, paper goods (paper towels, tissue, toilet paper), and basic cleaning supplies. Additional sundry and food items are available local markets and grocery stores, for example, Safeway, at 888 Kapahulu Avenue, or Costco at 525 Alakawa Street (between the airport and Waikiki).
 
Not provided with your rental:
 
• Beach umbrellas, beach toys, aluminum foil, Zip-Lock baggies, coffee, condiments, seasonings, cooking oil, fabric softener, bleach, and hand lotion.

Please let us know if you have any questions!

Mahalo!

reviews.comments:
非常好的地段,正中大旺,楼下就是DFS,著名的餐厅都在附近,走到沙滩只要5分钟｡

窗外的风景非常美,左边是海,右边是山,中间是城市花园景观｡

我这次一共5个人住,1个睡房,客厅有1个墙柜床,1个沙发床｡睡房的床超级舒服,不是那种酒店的软塌塌的床,床垫非常的舒服｡这个要给5星｡

房间里有够用5天的毛巾!还有阳伞､冲浪板､凉席等设施,拿去海边用实在太方便了!

非常棒的住宿体验,一定会再来的｡
Great location/view and full equipped one bed room with closet bed and sofa bed. Our family had a great time during the stay!

Location is very good, close to everything.  Very clean and have a good view of the city and the ocean especially on Friday nights when there are fireworks.  The parking space is tight but good for my rental mini-van.
ﾛｹｰｼｮﾝが最高｡何でも揃っており文句なしです｡
Great place to stay with a beautiful view!
You don't need bring anything, they have everything for you
The host was very accommodating making check in very smooth.  Very lively neighborhood if you are looking for easy access to Waikiki.
Great location! Clean and quiet yet close to it all! Check-in was very easy and staff is very friendly! We will definitely return and highly recommend this condo.

PROS
-Amazing Location, right in the middle of Waikiki. Tonnes of restaurants, stores, the beach etc within walking distance.

-Apartment is exactly as pictured. Very clean and a great size for our family (4 adults and 2 kids). The open concept is also great especially if you have kids.

-Captain Cook is extremely professional and very responsive. They will work hard to accommodate your every need. The service was so good it was almost as if we were staying in a hotel.

-They provided everything we'd need for the beach. Including boogie boards, a beach umbrella and beach chairs. There was even a playpen there for the baby. Unfortunately the beach umbrella they provided was damaged though. I forgot to report it but I'm sure they would have replaced it if I did.

CONS

- The washer and dryer weren't as powerful as expected. Especially the dryer, so be prepared to do very small loads (max 5 pieces of clothing).We had to run the dryer several times just to dry simple loads such as our swimwear. They did provide a drying rack however so we were able to utilise it on the lanai.

- Only two keys were provided with the apartment. Typically this wouldn't have been a problem but with 4 adults it kinda got a little tricky. Especially if you want to do your own thing. Mainly so because you're not able to access the Penthouse from the elevator without a key. (You also can't enter the building after 10 o clock if you don't have a key). That pretty much meant that we had to do everything together or 1 person would have to wait at home with a key in order to let you in. We made it work but I think at least 3 keys would be ideal for a place that sleeps 6.

Overall, this was an amazing apartment and Captain Cook's made our stay that much better with their professional service. It's definitely worth the price and we would all book with them again in a heartbeat. Mahalo!

It's great location you can find anything you want by walk in 5min
Specialy many japanese restaurants around. View also great! Mount and sea view!!!
Perfect place  to stay with family and friends. Very close to the beach, shopping stores, and popular restaurant. Mostly liked the security of the Resort.
This was a lovely apartment and we had a great three days here. It was in the perfect location with restaurants and shops just downstairs.

This was the first time I used Air BnB, and I really didnt know what to expect. My Husband and I travelled with our 4 kids ages 18-5 years old. We had a great stay! The unit was beautiful, clean, comfortable, spacious, centrally located and most of all security was great. It is exactly what it is in the photos and so much more! We had everything we needed in this unit. The parking spot was good for a mini van. The balcony was a great addition! It had great views of the ocean & mountains. The host, James, was very accomodating with my requests, and patient with all my questions, we loved our stay here. We will be back for sure and we highly recommend this unit. This is truly one of the best stays I’ve had in Honolulu!

Thank you so much for hosting us! We requested the early check-in. The host responded to me so quick and looked after us so well. The place was so lovely, outstanding view and great location. We totally enjoyed our family staying in Waikiki. I highly recommend this place. And I would love to come again!
Very organized information about the place and checking in, spacious, and great location.  The building itself is little old but the place is clean.

This is an amazing place to stay 
Close all shops and food 
Check in wasn’t the greatest experience, even after confirming I still had some issue with having a host arrive to let us in luckily I was able to contact some one from the main office and they arrive 30 mins later 
Apart from that this place is amazing and was perfect for us and our stay x
Captain cook resorts were so easy to deal with. The washer and dryer was fantastic to use. Walking distance to everywhere in Waikiki.
Looks exactly like the pictures! Beautiful space with a great view and two great bathrooms.

Centrally located . Clean and functional accommodation , great value. The apartment has ocean & city views and fortunate enough not to have another high rise too close. With 5 adults travelling together , it was perfect for our needs .

The location is prime with walking distances to restaurants, shopping, and the beach. The penthouse pictures shown are accurate with sufficient supplies provided for the bathrooms and kitchen. We rented a car and it was nice to have an assigned parking spot. The host is good at communication and responds promptly. The sofa beds and pull-down bed are not very comfortable but are manageable to sleep on for a few days. We noticed some lightbulbs that needed to be replaced and a door lock to be repaired, in which the host was notified and worked on fixing them quickly. Overall, the experience was good and I recommend this penthouse!

Have had a great stay at PH4, this place was not misrepresented by the images and the location is great, so close to the beach walkway, shops, bus stops, car rental and restaurants. 
The smell from the restaurant at the bottom of the building is pretty overwhelming in the hea, only negative. 
Enjoy your stay, we did!

Mahalo! We had a wonderful stay at the penthouse. The location is perfect. The condo is nice for our family of five including two kids. Special thanks to James for his advices making our stay much easier.

욕실의 사용감이 많아서 조금 더 심경써서 관리해야할 것 같습니다. 욕실을 제외하고는
굉장히 잘 관리된 숙소입니다.
한달간 잘 지내다 갑니다.

name: Sunny double room with balcony
summary: Room with double bed and balcony. Great location: Eixample-Sant Antoni, Barcelona’s top district. 1’ walking to Gran Via av., 5’ walking to the old Sant Antoni market, 10’ to Plaça Espanya, 3’ to subway L1 (Rocafort stop), 3’ to/from Aerobus stop (to/from Airport), 10’ to Plaça Universitat, 15’ to Plaça Catalunya. Check-in time: weekdays 18 hs, weekends anytime.
description: Room with double bed and balcony. Great location: Eixample-Sant Antoni, Barcelona’s top district. 1’ walking to Gran Via av., 5’ walking to the old Sant Antoni market, 10’ to Plaça Espanya, 3’ to subway L1 (Rocafort stop), 3’ to/from Aerobus stop (to/from Airport), 10’ to Plaça Universitat, 15’ to Plaça Catalunya. Check-in time: weekdays 18 hs, weekends anytime.
house_rules: - Room is for one or two people - Towels and bed sheets will be changed upon guest request in stays longer than 3 days - Smoking is allowed only in the balcony

reviews.comments: Oscar est très accueillant et toujours disponible pour répondre à mes questions. La chambre est conforme aux photos, très propre comme le reste de l'appartement. Merci Oscar pour ce court séjour, je recommande à 100%!

Merci a Oscar pour son acceuil tres (Website hidden by Airbnb) me suis senti tout de suite a l aise.l appartement etait superbe.tres (Website hidden by Airbnb) Oscar tjrs a l ecoute. ..tres belle personne.sejour au top....

La habitación es muy cómoda y luminosa, y el piso en general está muy bien equipado. Oscar es un muy buen anfitrión, por lo que recomiendo este alojamiento para quienes quieran hospedarse en un barrio central y entretenido de Barcelona, con buena conexión a la red de transporte público (metro y autobús) de la ciudad.

Oscar picked me up from the airport bus station. His apartment is SUPER clean. Cleaner than most hotels I stayed at thus far. The room is very nice too, it even has a small balcony where you can sit in the evening and enjoy the commotion on the street, or work with the wifi that has perfect reception outside. Oscar himself is a really nice guy who was very helpful in showing me what to do in the city.

Staying with Oscar is why I love Airbnb so much. This was one of my favorite places I've been. It's a lovely flat, very clean and perfectly located. The room and the small balcony were perfect to relax after a day full of sightseeing.
Oscar himself is such a great host. He was so kind and generous. I would definitely stay at this location again. Thanks Oscar.

Oscar es una persona muy amable que tiene un piso muy limpio y ordenado. Él me ofreció mapas y sugerencias de la zona y la ciudad. La ubicación del piso es muy cerca al metro y un bus hasta el aeropuerto.  Oscar habla inglés muy bien y fue un placer para quedar en la habitación compartida.

Muy buen host, nos tenía todo listo para nuestra llegada y muy atento con todo, el piso demasiado bonito y limpio, muy comodo y acogedor. Perfecta opción para quedarse en un viaje solo o para 2 personas. El lugar es muy céntrico y de fácil acceso al metro. Muy excelente referencia.
Oscar  et le logement parfait pour un week-end pour visiter barcelone !

Oscar's place is exactly what you need in Barcelona, super spotless clean! The location, the room, the neighborhood especially, coffee shop downstairs, kebab across the street, supermarket right in the corner, airport bus 2 minutes walking, metro station 5 minutes walking, surrounded by clubs and other establishments. Definitely will stay again! He picked me up at the bus station. Thank you so much for hosting us.

Everythink was perfect! Oscar is a very friendly person with a nice flat. The service was great and the location of his glat is perfect to discover barcelona. It is in near to the center and you feel save in the area. His room and bathroom is very nice!

I was very happy to stay there!the room is very clean and sunny! Apartment located near the city  center, metro and Aerobus stop. Oscar is very polite, friendly and open, always helped. I can sincerely advise it, and will stop there next time!!THANK YOU!!

Nous avons passé une semaine en couple chez Oscar, l'appartement est très bien situé (métro à 2 minutes) nous avons pu profiter de le plage et de visiter Barcelone.
Oscar est un très bon hôte, il nous a conseillé dans nos visites. La chambre et le lit sont confortables, le balcon sympathique. L'appartement est propre et contient tout le nécessaire possible (notamment pour cuisiner)

La casa está en una ubicación inmejorable, cerca de plaza de España y de la estación de trenes Sants. Es moderna, limpia y el balconcito de la habitación es simplemente genial. Óscar ha sido muy atento en todo momento y nos ha hecho sentir como en casa. Sin duda volveremos! :)

Vi var personlig rigtig glade for værelset. Det er rent og pænt. Værelset har en dejlig god seng. Vi var flittige brugere af den lille lækre altan. Oscars lejlighed er nem at komme til, fra lufthavnen. Området er super nice, med flere supermarkeder, caféer og bars. Vi var især vild med restauranten Dorit Tapas et par gader væk samt Panda caféen nedenunder. Det er super nemt at komme rundt i byen med offentlig transportmiddel. Flere busser kører tæt på lejligheden, så det var virkelig lækkert. Vi vil varmt anbefale Oscars værelse til venner og bekendte.

Oscar's apartment is very well-located, it is easy to find when you are coming from the airport (20 minutes ride by the bus). The area is nice and all the attractions are walking distance away (beach, old town), moreover, there is metro and bus stations 5 min away from the apartment. Oscar is an excellent host, he helped us a lot, advised on really nice places to visit and to eat :) Apartment is clean, room is light and it was such a pleasure to have a coffee on the balcony. With no doubts Oscar's apartment is highly recommended!

Oscar's place is super clean, you'll find everything you need there, he provided clean towels, hairdryer, offered to wash our clothes ( when I accidentaly washed our 10-trip metro ticket he gave us his own! ) Beside this , he is a super nice & understanding person and we absolutely LOVED our stay at his place! Highly recommended !

Oscar's place was nice and the room was comfortable and very clean. It was great to have such friendly hosts! The bedroom fits a double bed and enough space for your luggage. The host is very welcoming and accommodating and allowed the use of the kitchen as well as the bathroom. Location couldn't be better - the airport bus stops near the Urgell metro station. There are many great restaurants and bars nearby within walking distance also to the city center.
Great host. Thank for all.

Oscar was a fantastic host! His place was very clean and in a great location. We walked almost everywhere, and were able to easily grab a cab or a train when we needed. There was a some street noise at night, but it really didn't bother us. 

Oscar gave us recommendations for restaurants and local sites and was always right on. He was friendly and informative, and I highly recommend his place!

If you are thinking of visiting Barcelona, then oscar is the really super hosr that you need. His kindness and welcoming is something you rarely would find.
The house is clean and tidy the room is comfortable. You’ll find everything you need.location is great quiet neighborhood and near the metro station.
Oscar became not only our host but our friend as well.
I highly recommend and i will visit again for sure.

A very nice place to stay! Conveniently located (3 min from Metro), and close to the Aerobus stop. Everything you need is present in his neigbourhoud (stores, bar, places to eat, urban spa retreat). The room was nice, and Oscar is really friendly. Gives you nice tips, a map, and a warm welcome (he even placed some fresh bottles of water on the nighstands in our bedroom:-) ).

Going to Barcelona and looking for a place? stay over at Oscar's!

Really nice apartment and host. Absolutely clean. Oscar is super friendly and helpful if you want some tips about where to go, otherwise you basically have the apartment for yourself. Also a great place to stay for couples.

Oscar es un chico muy majo, muy atento y discreto. Se ofreció para aconsejar lugares, pero no hizo falta, ya conozco bien la ciudad. El apartamento es espacioso, todo nuevo, limpio y elegante, tal y como se ve en las fotos, y con un encantador toque geek (que no freak). Lugar tranquilo (hay tráfico en la calle pero está bien aislado). Bien aclimatado (la calefacción se agradece estos días de frío). Muy bien comunicado y en muy buena zona. Experiencia genial. Uno se siente como en su casa. Para repetir!

Oscar's place is a good location and the room got lots of light. It's a good size for Barcelona and we really appreciated him letting us use his office to do some work. Communication was very easy. Thanks Oscar!

Oscar is a kind, gracious, and accommodating host -- and his flat is clean, comfortable, and in an ideal, central location, perfect for seeing everything there is to see and do in Barcelona. Loved the balcony, loved the Panda Bar downstairs, and the Kafka and Borges in the original in the room were nice touches. Oscar was also extremely helpful in guiding me from the airport and giving me local tips on what to do and see. Would absolutely stay again.

Oscar's place is super good! His house is as clean as a 5 star hotel. The position is great and transpiration is convenient. Oscar is very helpful and always reply to my message very soon. I highly recommend his place and would love to come back again!
Oscar is very helpful, i can recommend him as a host in Barcelona, great guy!

Oscar is in alle opzichten een voorbeeldige gastheer. Zie waarderingen. De bereikbaarheid van en naar vliegveld met de Aerobus is super!
Geweldige plek om Barcelona te ontdekken. Je kunt helemaal je eigen ding doen, met gebruikmaking van alle faciliteiten. Volgende keer weer....

Fijne, lichte kamer op topplek in Barcelona. Oscar is een fijne host en erg attent. Goed bereikbaar ook - mocht er iets zijn. Het huis is schoon en van alle gemakken voorzien. Mocht je een lichte slaper zijn, neem dan voor de zekerheid oordoppen mee. Er komt ‘s nachts nogal wat verkeer langs, en dat hoor je goed als je de balkondeuren open hebt staan. Wij sliepen er in ieder geval zo goed als doorheen :)

Had there perfect holidays!! Oscar is such a friendly, relaxed and trustfully host who is well organised in having all needed facilities and giving you the right tips. The flat is very inviting, the room super nice and the balcony awaits you for a sunny breakfast outside in the heart of Barca. In addition the entire site is absolute clean. Just can recommend!!!!

Der Aufenthalt bei Oskar war super.
Ich war sehr beeindruckt von deiner hilfsbereiten und offenen Art und wie bemüht er war uns egal um was es ging mit Rat und Tat zur Seite stand.
Auch vor unserer Anreise war Oskar stets ein guter Ansprechpartner und hat schnell geantwortet. Die Wohnung ist super gelegen und man kann alles sehenswerte gut zu Fuß oder mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln erreichen. Auch Restaurants, Einkaufsläden, Park Möglichkeiten, Meer,... Sind super zu erreichen und bei Fragen ist Oskar jederzeit gerne für einen da.
Das Zimmer war perfekt für uns und auch der Rest der Wohnung war sehr ordentlich und täglich sauber. 
Ich würde jederzeit wieder zu ihm fahren und bin froh ihn kennen gelernt haben zu dürfen. 5 Sterne sind für die Gastfreundschaft eigentlich zu wenig :)

Oscar's place is super clean and great located in one of Barcelona's best neighborhoods. It is walking destance to lot of attractions and tourestic points.
The room itself is clean And a balcony is great for a quick cigarette.
I got to know the meaning of super host after meeting oscar. You cannot say he is a host. You can consider him as a freind. And sure he will be.

Thanks Oscar, this was my second time at your house. And hope will have the next soon

Oscar was a really good host; he was kind and friendly. We also felt he got the balance right between being welcoming and sharing tips, and leaving you to do your own thing with privacy. Oscar also kindly allowed us to use his washing machine. The apartment itself is nice, and is matches the description. Location wise, you are really close to the San Antoni market and some great food places.

Oscar went above and  beyond our expectations. The apartment is very nice with nice touches all around. my girlfriend and I did a romantic getaway and he made sure we were well taken care of and even offered more services than standard. if you want a place you dont have to worry about and is central, this is it! thanks for the magic!!
Oscar has been a great host and provided us with a great & clean space in a wonderful part of Barcelona. Highly recommended!

Oscar’s apartment was a beautiful, clean and well-located place to stay in Barcelona. The whole apartment was spotless and well-lit, and had everything you could possibly need for a holiday in Barcelona, as well as  thoughtful little touches such as the beach towel and the coffee machine. Oscar’s list of recommendations also came in handy, as we had possibly the best meal of the whole trip in one of the tapas bars he recommended (El Bitxo). Oscar is a fabulous person, and after helping us in a tight spot it is clear why he is a superhost! We would definitely stay here again!
Oscar has a great, clean place, located in a safe neighborhood. He is a very responsive host and I enjoyed staying at his place.

name: Oceanfront 2 Bedroom House
summary: ON THE OCEAN, extremely private, CLEAN & protected from random visitors. Stunning views, great hikes, swim, surf & beaches! Kayaks, SUP board & snorkel gear avail at no charge. Well maintained grass yard with private stairs to water (you can walk around naked). Oceanfront dinning, fully equipped kitchen, outdoor bbq. Surreal sunrises! Hammock, very comfy beds, high ceilings, movie projector with surround system, original artwork through the house. Plenty of parking space. A true island paradise!
space: This is truly one of a kind location. You will never get tired of the views. You will have your own private entrance to the ocean. The property is gated and has  a spacious yard with lush vegetation. The house is new and clean and there are no bugs or any living creatures inside except for an occasional gecko. Very comfy,  new beds with mattress covers and high quality sheets. Fully equipped kitchen (with sharp knives)! Master bedroom has a movie projector with a large screen and surround system. Relax with a book in a hammock and enjoy  the oceanfront privacy of the outdoor bbq/dinning area.
description: ON THE OCEAN, extremely private, CLEAN & protected from random visitors. Stunning views, great hikes, swim, surf & beaches! Kayaks, SUP board & snorkel gear avail at no charge. Well maintained grass yard with private stairs to water (you can walk around naked). Oceanfront dinning, fully equipped kitchen, outdoor bbq. Surreal sunrises! Hammock, very comfy beds, high ceilings, movie projector with surround system, original artwork through the house. Plenty of parking space. A true island paradise! This is truly one of a kind location. You will never get tired of the views. You will have your own private entrance to the ocean. The property is gated and has  a spacious yard with lush vegetation. The house is new and clean and there are no bugs or any living creatures inside except for an occasional gecko. Very comfy,  new beds with mattress covers and high quality sheets. Fully equipped kitchen (with sharp knives)! Master bedroom has a movie projector with a large screen and surround syste
neighborhood_overview: If you are looking to get away from the  hustles and bustles of a big city then this is definitely the place for you. Just close the gate behind  and  unwind to the sound of crushing waves and swinging palm trees. There is a great surf spot nearby and the ocean is very safe for swimming and snorkeling. You will be able to watch amazing sunrises without leaving your bed. Lots of options for day trips and hikes, beautiful and empty beaches close by. Take a drive to the famous North Shore or check out Kualoa Ranch for attractions such as Jurassic Park tour, horse back riding, zip line,  catamaran rides any many more.
notes: Not recommended for children due to a small,  unprotected cliff area on the property and easy ocean access. There is a busy road behind the house, be careful  pulling in and out. You will hear some noise during rush hour, however you can not see the road.
transit: There are some buses you can catch, but you will definitely need a car.
access: You will have the whole space to yourself - there are no other tenants or people  on the property,  just you and the ocean. Separate laundry room. Lots of parking in the driveway.
interaction: We will gladly be of help and answer any of your questions!
house_rules: - Please note there is a small, unprotected cliff area facing the ocean, which makes it dangerous for small kids. Adults should also watch their step, especially after consuming alcoholic beverages. - Respect the ocean. Use water gear with caution and at your own risk.  You will have to be able to carry kayaks and sup board down a few stairs. - You will enjoy the ocean breeze and be able to jump in the water to cool off, but please rinse your feet and wash off the sunscreen when back in the house. Salt causes corrosion, please cover the grill after each use and take any stainless steel kitchen equipment back inside.

host.host_about: Aloha! My husband and I are an outgoing, fun-loving, active couple who surfs, kite surfs and hikes every day. On occasions, when we travel, we make our home available to guests and we do our best to ensure they have the real Hawaiian experience. Enjoy country living at its best - with breathtaking views and ultimate privacy! We are new to Airbnb - be the first one to give us a review!

reviews.comments:
Edi and Dom were FANTASTIC! My girlfriend and I were looking for a private getaway and we certainly got it! Their place is in such an amazing location outside of the hustle and bustle of the "touristy" honolulu, yet close enough if you wanted to trip there, even multiple times in one day (roughly 20 min drive). We were also super close to north shore which has incredibly beautiful beaches. The home itself was in immaculate condition, and the view, spectacular! There's nothing more beautiful than waking up to the sunrise over the Pacific Ocean and being able to prop yourself up on the bed to soak it all in. I would visit Edi and Dom's place again in a heartbeat. It was unfortunate that the vacation ever had to end. Thank you to them both for such a wonderful stay, I couldn't have asked for a better, more accommodating trip.

To anyone thinking of using this as your destination, I would highly recommend. You will not find a better stay on the island!
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Cute Attic room Beyoğlu, Istanbul
summary: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.
space: This sunny room for one person is on the same floor as the terrace, which is the third floor (three levels up from the entrance floor). It gets plenty of light. After entering the building, we have wooden spiral stairs that lead all the way up to the terrace on the third floor. The room is furnished and you have: - single bed - wardrobe - divan (couch) - desk - chair - shared bathroom (one floor below) I provide traditional turkish breakfast with homemade marmelades. It is 5 euro per person if you want to try it. You can use the washing machine free. I give traditional turkish cooking courses in my apartment. You can also join us as my quest. If you want to organise it for yourself for your group, whole program costs 50 euro. We buy ingredients together and cook together.
description: This is a room in an Ottoman liberty style townhouse in Beyoglu. The location is very central, walking distance to istiklal street, one of the main centers in Istanbul. There are many cafes, restaurants, bars, and shopping, night life.  This sunny room for one person is on the same floor as the terrace, which is the third floor (three levels up from the entrance floor). It gets plenty of light. After entering the building, we have wooden spiral stairs that lead all the way up to the terrace on the third floor. The room is furnished and you have: - single bed - wardrobe - divan (couch) - desk - chair - shared bathroom (one floor below) I provide traditional turkish breakfast with homemade marmelades. It is 5 euro per person if you want to try it. You can use the washing machine free. I give traditional turkish cooking courses in my apartment. You can also join us as my quest. If you want to organise it for yourself for your group, whole program costs 50 euro. We buy ingredients together
neighborhood_overview: Tarlabasi neighborhood was a middle class Greek neighbourhood when it was founded at the beginning of 19th century. The area is full of houses of eclectic Ottoman liberty style buildings and ours is one of them. By the 1950’s most of the greek population of the area had to immigrate to Greece because of political reasons.  The area was deserted and by the 1980’s got an internal immigration from the east part of Turkey mostly of Kurdish origin. In the neighbourhood very few Istanbulite Greeks remained, there is a big Kurdish community of rural origin, a gypsy community that settled down many years ago and work in the area as musicians, many transgender people, poor families from the East and the Balck Sea coast, expats who fell in love with decadent touch and reasonable prices of the area, young artists, old artists, students, and us.  We, in our extent, fell in love with the building and liked the spirit of the area that welcomes all the outsiders of the town. It is the gilded area in
notes: Please check out our other rooms in the house: Double room (biggest in the house, with "bow window") https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1296050 Cozy single room (entrance floor, away from street side, quiet) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/4119020 Cozy single room (1st floor, away from street side, quiet, more light) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1131124 Cozy single room (entrance floor, street side, lots of light) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/1034587 Studio apartment (with bathroom and kitchen ensuite) https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/937206
transit: Walking distance to many of the touristic attractions and gourmet spots. Close to the bus, metro station.
access: - wireless internet connection - use of equipped kitchen (on the second floor, common use with the me and other guest of the house) - free use of washing machine - terrace that everyone can use - all bills included
interaction: I live in the same building, on the second floor, two levels up from the entrance (same floor as the kitchen). You are always welcome to have a tea or coffe with me or share my table if you happen to be at home while we eat.
house_rules: Please do not smoke inside the rooms, throw your own garbage. In Istanbul the tap water is not drinkable, please buy your own drinking water. Please clean the kitchen after you use, do not leave dirty dishes, left overs, vegetable remains that can stain the working space. ıf you use the terrace and want to move the chairs, please take them back to the original place after using. Do not throw cigarettes inside the plants. For long term stays please buy your own toilette paper. Please switch off the lights that you do not use. Close the door  of the terrace and switch the light off when you leave the terrace. Sorry if you feel like" why do you need to tell me such basic behaviors!". Not all but some people forget that it is not a hotel but a home. Thank you very much in advance.

host.host_about:
I am from Adana, a town in old Cilicia, have been living in Istanbul for quite a while. I have worked in tourism sector for a long time now I am retired and want to know new people. I can speak english and I can join you through your visit to show Istanbul or giving you some local information. 

I love cooking and feel myself lucky to know both eastern and wester cooking traditions of Turkey and willing to give half day cooking classes to whom it may interest.

reviews.comments: Comment raconter en quelques mots les trois semaines magnifiques passées chez Fatma ! Impossible. La pension est charmante et possède une terrasse très chaleureuse. Fatma est une personne extrèmement intéressante avec qui il faut absolument prendre un café dès quelle le propose (ce qui arrive très souvent !). Elle cuisine merveilleusement. Elle connait Istanbul comme sa poche. La chambre est au dernier étage, elle est calme et douce. Elle a un accès direct sur la terrasse ce qui permet de bouquiner avant d'aller dormir ou de faire un peu de yoga le matin. Le quartier est au coeur de Beyoglu avec une foultitude de restaurants et de bonnes adresses à découvrir. Si vous hésitez encore à réserver, n'hésitez plus ! Quant à moi, je reviendrais le plus vite possible !

Ich bin unheimlich glücklich bei Fatma Abla gestrandet zu sein. Es ist immer was los und selbst wenn mankein türkisch kann,Fatma Abla versucht mit English und Händen und Füßen zu reden. Eine unglaublich sympathische und unterhaltsame Dame, die ich sehr schnell ins Herz geschlossen habe. Sonntags sind wir zusammen zum Bio Bazar gelaufen und an einigen Tagen kochen wir sogar was zusammen.  Mein Zimmer befindet sich im obersten Stock, wo ich komplett meine Ruhe habe. gegenüber von meinem Zimmer ist eine wunderschöne Terasse, die zum Yoga machen oder ein Buch lesen einlädt. Gäste sind auch immer willkommen. Fatma hat ihre eigenen Stil, welches dem ganzen Haus, bis auf den Eingangsbereich, einen unglaublichen charm gibt. Jedes Zimmer ist individuell und man muss sagen, dass bis her die Leute, die ich im Haus kennengelernt habe, echt toll sind. Wenn man sich für Fatma entscheidet, sollte man auf alle Fälle kulturoffen sein und sich diesem schönen antiken Stil und der Nostalgie einfach fallen lassen. Ich bin durch Fatma und durch die Wohnung in einem alten Istanbul angekommen und fühle mich super wohl. Zu meiner Arbeit in Cihangir laufe ich täglich zu Fuß. Die Lage ist sehr perfekt. Ich brauche kaum Bus oder Bahn zu benutzen, da ich alles in Beyoglu und Taksim finde, was ich brauche. Nur für meine Touristentour habe ich lediglich die Bahn benutzt. Obwohl man zum Eminönu auch zu Fuß laufen kann, wenn man spazieren gehen mag. Ich danke Dir, Fatma abla, so wie ich dich gerne zu nennen pflege, für Deine Offenheit und Deine Wärme. Ich werde Dich sehr bald wieder besuchen kommen und hoffentlich sogar mein altes Zimmer beziehen im obersten Stock.

Fatma's home is a perfect place to enjoy Istanbul : peacefull place, independence, located close to main places ... Fatma is nice, and other people staying in Fatma's house so you can meet new people etc
So I recommend it !

I stayed with Fatma for many weeks in December 2013, in the attic room on my own, and then with my boyfriend in the larger double room, and had an amazing time. 
The neighbourhood, Tarlabaşı, is different and more down to earth than the posher neighbourhoods around. The location is wonderful: it's easy to get anywhere by foot, taxi, bus, dolmus, metro or boat.
Fatma, who lives there, and her daughter Elvan, who lives in Italy but is quick to communicate by email, are extremely friendly and helpful. 
Fatma also cooks wonderfully and even offers cooking classes. 
I would definitely recommend staying there, for three nights or three months, and hope to stay there again myself.
Be aware though that if you have respiratory issues, this might not be a good choice as there is a fair amount of smoking happening inside, and even the neighbourhood is quite smoky because of the coal heating.

Sono stata 5 giorni ospite da Fatma. Purtroppo non l'ho conosciuta perchè era in Italia dalla figlia, con cui sono riuscita a comunicare molto bene in italiano (dato che il mio inglese è molto scarso..), è stata gentilissima! come anche gli ospiti che mi hanno accolto lì a Istanbul! Si è creato un bel clima e anche se spesso ero fuori per visitare la città, ho passato due bellissime serate in un clima multiculturale!

The perfect visit. 

For me, this attic room in Beyoglu was perfect for my time in Istanbul. My hosts were wonderful, the room is great, the terrace is greater, and the location is fantastic. I was in Istanbul for a intensive summer school at their Technology University, and got the privacy, space and support I needed to get everything done, and to a high standard. I was sad to leave and am looking forward to returning again in a few months. 

Thank you thank you thank you, and will miss you guys!

Beau x

Fatma, Elvan, her daughter, Hasan, her husband, and all of the other guests with whom I shared the house made this one of my best travel experiences. Fatma really tries to make everyone at home in her home and in her city. We shared dinner on the terrace several times with her past guests / friends, and they made me feel so welcome and quickly become knowledgable about Istanbul and the broader society. 

The room, itself, and the neighborhood have been correctly detailed in the room information, guest feedback, and the feedback for Fatma's other rooms' feedback. I encourage you to read them all to get a clear idea. 

All said, the room is good value for money, and the people will make it a fond, memorable experience.

I stayed for one month in the attic room and was very pleased with how everything turned out. Fatma and Hasan are very welcoming, and I have many good memories of my stay (like drinking raki and talking about Turkish music with Hasan at the dinner table). If you stay here you will meet many interesting people from Turkey and around the world passing through the house. The area will not be to every ones tastes, but I highly recommend it for the more adventurous among you.

Thank you Fatima and family for a wonderful time in Istanbul!
I love your house, my attic room which is very central and from where I was able to walk to all sites in Istanbul. You, your husband and daughter, all were very welcoming and helpful. I definitely want to come back.

Fatma and Hasan, the hosts, are truly some of the nicest people I've had the chance to come across. I stayed for 3 months and loved every second of it, only regretting that I could not stay for another three. The landlords are fantastic and experienced Airbnb hosts, which makes the experienced that much better. Fatma is an outstanding cook, and one should not miss a chance to dine with her and Hasan! The house is great, very typical and nice - as a bonus, the bathrooms were all renovated and they look fantastic. The terrace made for many evenings relaxing away from the hustle and bustle of Istiklal St. In terms of location, the house is in a great spot: seconds away from Istiklal, minutes from Taksim and the cool Cihangir area, and a short train ride or longer walk to Sultanahmet, Topkapi and all the tourist sites. Would recommend without any hesitation, as I already did to two friends of mine who also stayed at Fatma and Hasan's house.

I spent a really nice month at Fatma's house. The room is lovely and fits the description. I also really enjoyed the beautiful terrasse from where you can watch the neighborhood. I thought the house was in an ideal location to explore the city. The street where the house is on is pretty calm. 
This room is on the same floor with the terrasse and the kitchen, so you have ideal access to both of them. The kitchen is ideal if you just want to cook something small from time to time as there's only one cooking plate.
This room is perfect for people that wish to be in contact with the host and exchange with them from time to time as you walk by their living room and kitchen as well as share the bathroom with them. If you rather be a little more to your own and mind cigarette smoke, I recommend one of the other rooms.
Fatma and Hasan are both very very nice, always asked about my day and they were very patient when I tried to say something in turkish. I hope that my turkish will be better one day so that we can have longer and deeper conversations!  They made me feel very welcomed and I also really enjoyed meeting Fatma's daughter and grandson!They are very generous, sometimes invited me for tea or something to eat. I also got lucky to taste some of Fatma's amazing food!

It was fantastic to stay at the house of Fatma and Hasan! The room is very nice, like you can see on the pictures. Next to the room is the kitchen and the terasse, which is great. The bathroom of which you can´t see picture was aesthtic too.
Particularly if you are in Istanbul because of learning Turkish Fatma and Hasan´s house will be the best choice as both are very communicative and patiant with beginners. Above all Fatma and Hasan are such nice people, I am really looking forward to stay in contact with them. 
I highly recommend the room. But you should have no problem with shareing the bathroom with the hosts as well as shareing the kitchen and the terasse with a lot of other guests who stay in the house. But that´s why the attic room is the best one for people who want interact with the hosts and get to know other guests.
I also loved the neighbourhood.

Fatma and Hasan are wonderful hosts, warm, welcoming and very hospitable.  The room is just as describe.  Central location, easy to get around by foot or public transportation, grocery stores and lots of dining options at your finger tips, can't be beat.

I really enjoyed staying at Fatma and Hasan's. They were incredibly sweet and welcoming, it almost felt like staying with my aunt and uncle. I was alone with Hasan for the most part as Fatma was out of town. During that time he always made sure I'd get home safe at night. I thought that was very endearing. The room itself is super cute, with its own kitchen and terrace access, which I tremendously enjoyed as it gave me the sense of having an entire apartment. The neighbourhood is a bit off the tourist track but for that reason very charming. And it still is very close to Istiqlal, essentially just across the street. So you are strategically located.

파트마는 친절하고 가족처럼 대해줘서 편안하게 잘 쉬다갈수있었네요^^ 가격에 비해 좋았습니다. 오래동안 머물면서 특별히 블편한점은 없었구요. 샤워 요리 빨래 등등 마음껏 눈치안보고 할수있어서 좋았네요.
추천합니다 :)
Amazing and warm place that I fully recommend. Hassan does delicious Turkish breakfast...
A lovely place to stay! The house has character, there's a gorgeous terrace and it's well located for bars, cafés and museums. Hasan was the perfect host!

A wonderful journey at Fatma and Hasan's house !! So pleasant place, clean, very very well located, lot of plants on the terrace... But above all, amazing and great people live here !
