Fatma and Hasan are so welcoming and warm, it was a real pleasure for me to spend time with them. I definitely recommend this place, and hope to come back as soon as possible !

Fatma and Hassan are wonderful and caring hosts. I accompanied Hassan to work and he showed me his favourite breakfast stops; I also had a lovely few hours drinking tea with both of them chatting Turkish recipes.
The room was just what I had hoped for with a lovely terrace just outside it.
I will be back!
Great little room on the top floor. Perfect for solo traveler. Lots of other people staying there also. Both Hasan & Fatma were warm and friendly. Lots of stairs

Friendly place, quit no noise, clean. I stayed in the attic had amazing view of the neighbourhood. Owners are friendly. Only complain is that the bed might have bed bugs. I got eaten all over and started to notice it the third day in.

Fatma and Hassan are very gentle and kind - a beautiful couple. Their hospitality is genuine. Their home becomes your home. They engage  in conversation but also respect your privacy. The attic room was an excellent option - it's very private, clean, warm in winter, quiet at night with beautiful pieces of furniture. The neighbourhood is secure. I want to return to Fatma and Hassan's home for a longer stay.
Fatma and her husband are lovely and very welcoming hosts. The place is great, close to Taksim, and it's a great place to stay longer-term as well. Highly recommended!

I made the reservation for my son who was in Istanbul for a week and decided to stay in different parts of the city to see as much of it as possible.  His comments: "The home, in a popular  area of Taksim, is in a great central location. I was able to see a non-touristy side of Istanbul. Fatma and Hassan were both INCREDIBLY WELCOMING AND GRACIOUS HOSTS."  My son also took a cooking lesson, which he loved.  Thank you!

Thank you!
Very hospitable people and nice place!
Same feeling like at home.)

Close to Taksim square and Istiklal. 

I recommend!
Great location, very sweet hosts, the neighbors nicely helped me find Fatima when I showed up without phone credit.

You will find a very cute and warm home with two lovely people. They are always up for a cup of Turkish tea and a chat. They know İstanbul well, so they can also give you some insider tips. The house itself is very clean and the roof terrace is nice.

This place is wonderful. Fatma and her husband are very friendly and helpful with local tips. The place is totally central, walkable to all the tourist stuff but still located a bit off the beaten track. The WiFi signal is strong. The neighborhood is bustling 24 hours a day and I always felt safe. Communication was easy and quick. In fact, I liked it so much here I extend my stay :)

 I 1,000% recommend this place for your trip to Istanbul!

Fatma’s room is lovely - it’s in the attic and has its own mini kitchenette and a beautiful terrace with a table. It’s in a slightly rougher area than I expected but it was really interesting to see another side to Istanbul. Fatma and her husband’s hosting was also fantastic - they were consistently so kind and offered me food and told me to come back and say hi as I was still in Istanbul after my check out. Would definitely recommend.

Pour moi le cœur d’Istanbul bat dans cette maison !  Hasan Fatma et Elvan sont des hôtes à la hauteur de la réputation de l'hospitalité Turc et ce n'est pas peu dire ! J'étais seule et j'ai eu la chambre du haut qui donne sur une terrasse envahi d'arbres fruitiers et d'aromates ! mon petit paradis Istanboulote !  J'y reviendrais c'est sûre !

Best place in Istanbul!! I stayed there for 2 months, and will come back whenever I can. Hasan and Fatma will make you feel at home, while giving you the space to have your own life. The room upstairs is great because it is opposite the terrace, where I spent many evenings having tea and working or reading, and had coffee in the morning... The neighborhood is interesting, has an unjustified reputation as it is very animated at all times of day and night but this should not discourage guests, it is very safe: I'm a 22 year old woman, and was able to come back at any time of the day/night and everything was absolutely fine. Don't hesitate to ask questions, Hasan and Fatma are super helpful!

My trip wouldn't have been as amazing without the generous and thoughtful help of Fatma and Hassan. Not only did they have a great place, they helped me to move around the city and gave me tons of great recommendations, not to mention a nice conversation with a cup of tea every other day. Highly recommended, will definitely be staying here again!

I was really happy with the flat and enjoyed to stay there for some days. For me the flat is located near interesting spots like Galata Tower, taksim, shopping streets and so on. I just walked about 20 minutes to Galata bridge and here you are in Sultanahmet  Fatma and Hasan were helpful and friendly. And Hasan makes the best Turkish tea I have ever drank  thank you.

Fatima and her husband are beautiful hosts, and were very nice. The neighborhood has an unsafe feel to it, and I established a buddy system with a fellow traveller to walk back together at night- but it was completely fine and nothing happened to us. Also, if you have allergies to smoke or dont like being around smokers- this place is not for you. The smell of smoke wafts up and the room smells of it all the time. Other than that, location is very convenient in terms of transportation and main tourist attractions. 

Thanks Fatima and Co!

Fatma's house is a great place to stay. Walking distance to Taksim Square and restaurants and nightlife in Beyoglu. The house is clean and well organized, with a terrace that is perfect for breakfast or a few drinks later in the day. I enjoyed my time at Fatma's house.

Fatma is very warm and welcoming. I was out most of the time so unfortunately did not get to enjoy her company more. The attic room is large and very comfortable. The bathroom was very clean. Although the area is a bit rundown I found the people so friendly and enjoyed having çay in the small cafes there rather than in the busier more touristy areas. Fatmas house is well located close to all the areas one might want to visit in a short time; such as Galata and Sultanhamet. I  walked everywhere and even when returning around midnight never felt unsafe.
Great place to stay around Taksim square and Galata tower. Hasan and Fatma were really reliable hosts. Would recommend this place to everyone who wants to visit Istanbul.

Amazing
Merveilleux
Harika

name: Beautiful Bushwick loft for August
summary: A real Bushwick gem, right next to the train and close to many great places to unwind.
description: A real Bushwick gem, right next to the train and close to many great places to unwind.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: From Brooklyn, work as an audio engineer and touring guitarist with indie bands.

name: Penthouse at Moda with two terrace
summary: Cozy room at center of Moda. The flat is closed to bars street, cafes, shops, parks and galeries. You can go to the seaside by walking. Also many transportation options available.
description: Cozy room at center of Moda. The flat is closed to bars street, cafes, shops, parks and galeries. You can go to the seaside by walking. Also many transportation options available.

reviews.comments: Aysem was very welcoming and kind, despite a very hectic arrival. I really enjoyed my evening with her in Kadiköy and hope to return soon!

name: SOOTHING WAVES WITH A 180* OCEAN VIEW
summary: Valley Isle Resort 306  We are located beachfront with an amazing view  of the ocean and sunset. We can look right down into the water and watch the turtles swimming. We offer a full kitchen including poolside barbecue grills. Within a block of our Resort are several restaurants and bars. Our condo has a comfy queen-size wall bed along with a small sofa bed.   The ambiance is soothing and relaxing. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with one child).
space: We have a beachfront location that gives a 180 degree view of the water. Our Lanai offers a perfect viewing area to watch the turtles swimming in the water or the whales frolicking in the ocean, beautiful sunsets, and of course to enjoy your favorite cocktail or cup of coffee.
description: Valley Isle Resort 306  We are located beachfront with an amazing view  of the ocean and sunset. We can look right down into the water and watch the turtles swimming. We offer a full kitchen including poolside barbecue grills. Within a block of our Resort are several restaurants and bars. Our condo has a comfy queen-size wall bed along with a small sofa bed.   The ambiance is soothing and relaxing. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with one child). We have a beachfront location that gives a 180 degree view of the water. Our Lanai offers a perfect viewing area to watch the turtles swimming in the water or the whales frolicking in the ocean, beautiful sunsets, and of course to enjoy your favorite cocktail or cup of coffee. You have access to all of the beaches on Maui, our swimming pool, barbecue grills , and an herb garden for your use. We offer my phone number so you can call or text at any time. I will send you information on check in, obtaining your free
neighborhood_overview: We are in a quiet neighborhood where you will find many local residents visiting the same restaurants that you do. There are a few restaurants and bars within a short walking distance, along with a couple small grocery stores, Maui Baby Rentals, Boss Frogs Rentals, a bank, Maui Brewing Company , a coffee shop, and even a McDonalds.
notes: We offer 2 beach chairs, a small cooler, beach towels, a boogie board, several noodles, and a beach bag for your use. You will also find reusable shopping bags for your grocery shopping. (You can be charged for grocery bags if you dont bring your own.)
transit: There is a bus stop directly in front of our parking lot. Taxi service and Uber is nearby and always available for you. For our guests with rental cars, our Resort offers free parking.
access: You have access to all of the beaches on Maui, our swimming pool, barbecue grills , and an herb garden for your use.
interaction: We offer my phone number so you can call or text at any time. I will send you information on check in, obtaining your free parking pass, laundry information, and things to do and see in the area. We also offer a guest book with dining and happy hour suggestions.
house_rules: - Coin operated washer/drier down the hall from 8am to 10pm -Valley Isle Resort is a non-smoking Resort. There is a smoking area to the right side of the parking lot for guests. - Valley Isle is a pet free Resort, sorry but you will have to leave your four-legged family members at home just like we do! Service dogs are allowed however. - It is required that you relax to the soothing sound of the waves, enjoy the turtles swimming below you, and have an overall wonderful Maui Adventure. - It is Valley Isle's rule that beach towels and clothing may not be hung on the Lanai railings.  With the trade winds, your articles may end up on someone else's Lanai or down on the beach.

host.host_location: Lake Havasu City, Arizona, United States
host.host_about: I am currently a 6th grade math teacher and competitive baton twirling coach.  I fell in love with Maui and the Valley Isle Resort over 7 years ago.  I have an amazing husband, 2 daughters with great husbands, and 3 grandchildren.  I have a love for the island and the culture of Hawaii!

reviews.comments: My first experience with Airbnb was perfect. The location was great, on one of the sunniest sides of the island, near a mall with a general store and a gas station. The condo was exactly as described, the building is right by the water and it's really tidy and well organised. The view is amazing. You get to wake up with the sound of the waves every morning and watch the beautiful Maui sunsets right on the balcony. The process was really simple and stress-free. The place was immaculate. We really felt at home and got everything we needed and more! I'm really grateful for Sherry and Shane's attention to detail and recommendations about the island. Thank you for making this experience better than we could have imagined. I hope we can stay there again soon!

Beautiful place along the beach. Good location. Pictures are pretty accurate and close to McDonalds, Maui Brewing Co. and a Coffee Shop within walking distance. No central A/C so be prepared to run the fans in the summer. Hosts were very responsive and extremely helpful with requests.
This was one of the coolest places I've ever stayed in. And definitely the most beautiful neighborhood.

The owners, Sherry and Shane, were great. They were very responsive, the place was great and the view was unbelievable. Thank you so much for sharing your place with us. It was a great spot for me and my wife to vacation as it was right by the ocean, grocery stores and restaurants. We highly recommend!

The view from the Lanai is nothing short of spectacular. It was every bit as advertised. Plus, the proximity of the 3rd floor to the actual ocean means you can hear the waves thoughout the day and night. We literally watched people line the beach in front of our lanai each night to watch the gorgeous sunsets - we didn't need to do that however, we could watch it from the lanai!  We're going to miss that. Folks from the north should be aware that there is no A/C here, which is common in Lahanai apparently, we learned, because of the strong trade winds which cool things considerably. The hosts were very responsive and gracious. This was a very nice experience and we look forward to our next Maui adventure!

Sherry left us great instructions.  We loved the location and the beach --not too crowded, perfect.  Garbage disposal and laundry facilities just across the hall.  The condo felt like a home ratherthan just a place to put your head!!  Beautiful view, and so nice that the sun was not  directly on the deck and condo, as it was quite warm and yet we saw the beautiful sun and sun set. Loved the rocking chairs.  A wonderful place to stay, hopefully again.!

We felt at home immediately upon entering the unit.  The pictures of the unit are very accurate; however, do not do it justice.  The lanai has the most breathtaking view I have ever had the privilege of experiencing.  Sherry and Shane were more than accommodating and made the arrival extremely easy.  They have everything you could think of needing at your finger tips.   They go above and beyond for their guests.  They respond immediately if you have an inquiry, and they have a homemade binder full of detailed information, including points of interests and restaurants to dine at. 
My husband and I are humbled by their graciousness as hosts. We could not be more content with our stay here!!
Mahalo!
This private home is amazing! Leaving the door open so the strong wind would come through the whole room was to die for! The view was magnificent! Amazing! I would definitely come back!

Sherry & Shane's condo was very clean and welcoming. It had all aminities for a perfect beach vacation including recommendation for restaurants, beach chairs etc..They were great hosts with clear and quick communication. The condo had spectacular view of the ocean and its proximity to the ocean gave us advantage to wake up with the sound of the crashing waves in the morning and amazing sunsets. We highly recommend this place!!!
This is a jewel of a place to stay-the views, the convenient location, and everything you need for a beach vacation-all in one spot! Thanks Sherry and Shane!
Loved this place! Beautiful beach front lot, caring hosts, and a really clean condo. I would recommend!

This is an awesome airbnb! By far the most stocked one I have ever stayed in. Sherry provided everything that we could have needed. Great portable beach chairs, cooler and towels. The kitchen was very prepared for major cooking endeavours. There were even spices and some cooking oils. Plenty of towels, pillows and blankets. All the things that you would hope there might be but sometimes aren't. The view from the room is perfect. You can hear the waves crashing and the view from the bed is directly into the blue of the ocean. We enjoyed the condo so much there were several days we didn't leave. So the perfect relaxing holiday we needed. We will definitely stay here again when we come back to Maui.
Nice comfortable spot. Great communication.

We can only endorse all the wonderfully positive comments others have made about their experiences staying in this very comfortable, well-appointed condo.  We just knew from our communications with Sherry and Shane and their thoughtful attention to detail that we were being hosted by very generous and caring people.  We can’t thank you enough.

We loved our stay, and I would totally come back. The view was awesome. Close to food, shopping, beaches. Everything we needed was provided and our host checked in on us because of road closures, that was very nice. It was awesome!

Amazing! First time AB&B user and would have to say will be doing this again! Experience was nothing short of spectacular. Sherry's hospitality and attention to detail were phenomenal and the condo was immaculate and very cozy. Everything you needed to enjoy a great vacation was there. The accommodations were simply fantastic and would like to recommend this place to anyone who wants a stress-free, smooth and quiet environment. Location was key and Sherry's place makes you feel right at home! Will stay here again the next time we come to Maui...for sure! Thank you.
Drop dead views, nice beach. Condo has everything you need and more. Sherry is great hostess.

Our stay in paradise (Maui) was brought to perfection by Sherry's and Shane's fantastic condo. The photos you can see on Airbnb are very accurate, though they cannot fully capture the breathtaking reality of staying at this accommodation. In this apartment you will fall asleep and wake up to the sound of the waves of the Pacific ocean. You can enjoy an unobstructed view of the setting sun from the balcony while enjoying your dinner and/or a glass of wine/beer/whatever. You can go for a spontaneous swim in the sea, which is only a few steps away from your room.  Sometimes you can even see sea turtles in the water in front of the condo.

The apartment is perfectly equipped. You'll find everything you need for cooking, doing your laundry, going to the beach (beach towels, beach bags, a cool bag, beach chairs, etc.) and more.

We will definitely return to Maui in the near future and we hope that we can stay at Sherry's and Shane's condo again. We strongly recommend staying at their condo!

Fantastic stay. The apartment was perfect for the two of us, and having meals overlooking the ocean was certainly a highlight. The place was incredibly priced, very clean, and well-equipped. We continued to say throughout our time that we couldn't believe how great the place was. Thanks!!
Cozy place with a breath taking view

Even better than I hoped. Sherry was incredibly responsive and flexible. We landed early and were able to check in early. Same on checkout. When the hair dryer didn't work, Sherry immediately said we could just buy one and she'd cover the expense. the view is incredible from the balcony and you could sit there for hours. Absolutely great value for money.

What can I say about your condo other than "WOW." The ocean view and the sound of the breaking waves is enough to make your stay a calming and stress reliever vacation. You not only had the sound of the waves, inside your condo  you had everything in the kitchen a master chef would need for preparing a full course meal. When we opened the sliding glass doors out to the patio the cool breeze off the ocean came through the house continuously. I can't say enough about you quick responses to my questions. We hope to be able to do this again but will want to stay longer. This was a perfect 25th anniversary for my wife and myself. Thank you.
Joe and Lenore 
Beaumont, CA

The picture is only a small reason this is a great place to stay. Right by the beach for daily swims and snorkels and every detail is covered that you could possibly need. 
Yeah, the view is great! Sunset view every night and rainbows in the morning. Wow!!

Das Appartement direkt am Meer war atemberaubend! Der Blick und der Balkon zum Meer einfach super. Alles sehr sauber und liebevoll eingerichtet. Die Ausstattung der Küche lässt keine wünsche übrig. Auch die Kommunikation mit sherry verlief einwandfrei. Die Anlage liegt genau mittig zu den super Schnorchelstränden im Norden und der schönen Hafenstadt Lahaina im Süden. Würden sofort wieder hinfliegen!!!

Sehr gute Lage. Blick auf das Meer und die Sonnenauf- und -untergänge einfach fantastisch. Wohnung und Küche sind gut eingerichtet, so dass Kochen kein Problem ist. Cherry antwortet sehr schnell auf E-Mail-Anfragen.

The condo has a spectacular view and wonderful location.  The proximity to the Maui fish market is perfect and we took advantage of grilling the fresh Hawaiian fish by the grill.  Sherry is an amazing host- we enjoyed the note from the previous condo owner as well as the personal hand written reviews from previous renters.  We can't to come back!
Absolute paradise! So close to the ocean and nearby sights/restaurants. Condo had everything you need to cook and relax on the lanai. Highly recommend and we will be back again.....soon!!

This was our first trip to Maui and we were very fortunate to have found Sherry's place. The view is everything you wish for: palm trees, beach, and no one in front of you. Sherry has the place completely stocked with everything you need from coffee and snacks to beach towels, coolers, beach chairs, and a body board. The balcony has rocking chairs which we enjoyed our coffee on everything morning. The apartment is very comfortable and we can't wait to come back.
Sherry's place is amazing. Wonderful location, incredible view, her unit is spotless and she is ultra fast with her communication. Doesn't get any better. A model airbnb host!

Sherry's place was absolutely gorgeous! We had the most breathtaking view of the ocean and enjoyed spending time on the lanai each night. Sherry was extremely helpful and responded very quickly to any questions I had. I would recommend her condo to anyone traveling to Maui!

From the minute we walked into the suite we felt at home. Sherry has thought about everything that one could need or want to make your stay comfortable. There is a very generous lanai for watching the activities on the water, the glorious evening sunsets and sharing in a meal or toasting another beautiful day in Paradise.
The location is ideal for visiting Napili, Fleming Beach, Honolua Bay ( watch great surfing) Kapalua, Lahaina and Ka'anapali. So much to see and do.
We also appreciated having Maui Farmers market nearby to get groceries for making a meal or to buy delicious homemade food.
We will come back, we have only just scratched the surface!
Mahalo!
S and R

Sherry's condo was a perfect place to stay for a few days. The location was convenient, parking was easy, the room was cozy. The view of course was incredible! It's walkable to the Maui Brewing company and a delicious sushi place, and quite close to Ka'anapali as well. I've only stayed at resorts or hotels in Hawaii so I was used to having a big resort or boardwalk to walk around on, which I did miss here, but there are neighborhoods to walk in nearby, and you can always drive to Ka'anapali to get the "resort full of people" feeling. Sherry's place was much quieter and serene than the big hotels. I would definitely stay again or recommend this place to others!

My husband and I really love everything about the condo. Our baby moon vacation was perfect and memorable. We love sleeping with the sound of the waves and wake up to the rainbow almost every morning. Perfect location and close to everything. We already have plans to come back in three years.
Very nice place! It was a bit smaller than expected, but we didn’t care much. We stayed out most of the time and only used it for sleeping. Very clean, great host, and a great value.

Sherry’s place was amazing! Falling asleep and waking up to the sounds of the waves was so relaxing. The views were incredible! You can see Moloka’i and Lanai across the way. The location is great, too ... good restaurants within walking distance. We had our 7-month old with us and he LOVED it! We spent hours just sitting on the lanai, enjoying the beautiful scenery and sounds. The sunsets are amazing! The pull-out chair/couch was the perfect place for our little one to sleep. Laundry was right around the corner, which was very convenient. Overall, a great stay and would certainly book again, when we come back to Maui!

Awesome view of the ocean, we saw many whales go by!  Sherry has the place very clean and comfortable, could not have been better. Sherry also gave us many tips on where to go for food and beers. We liked Dollies and Maui Brewing- both within less than a quarter mile!!!

Perfect location! Close to beaches, restaurants and shops. 

The hosts are super. Quick responses, easy check in/check out. The space is perfect!

Great location. Nice condo with all you need for a nice stay in Maui. There is not beach out front of this resort. Don’t trust the internet photos of the valley isle. According to the locals the beach has been gone for the last year.

Wow! Sherry was a pleasure to work with and her Maui home is a dream come true!! Hanging out on the balcony looking at the beautiful Maui waters and whale watching was probably one of our favorite things we did our whole trip. Yes, we saw SO MANY whales from the balcony - it was amazing!!! Sherry was always quick to respond and gave us so many pointers on excursions, restaurants and more! We will certainly be returning to Maui in the near future and we would love even more to be able to stay with Sherry again! Absolutely unforgettable honeymoon! 

Mahalo!!
Great location, view the whales from your balcony during the season

Great studio condo on Maui. Lovely to be oceanfront and hear the waves at night. Very well appointed with all you could ask for in the way of kitchen, bathroom amenities and more. We would thoroughly recommend as a great place to stay. Maui Brewing Company - 5 minutes walk - excellent place for dinner and drinks.
It really is a great when you are in the room. The Lanai is fantastic, watching the waves and the whales was great.

The view was incredible. Everything from begin to end went off without a hitch. It was just two of us and we thought it was perfect in an intimate setting. We would most definitely book this place again

We loved staying at Sherry's place.. it was a perfect size for my husband and I . She had everything you could possibly need for a full kitchen, the decor was lovely along with all the photos. The balcony was the best part, I still can close my eyes and hear the ocean waves. If we ever come back to Maui, we will definitely be staying at this airbnb again!

We stayed in this apartment in March 2018  for three nights and thoroughly enjoyed it. Communication with the owners was great, with everything thoroughly explained to us. Locating the apartment was easy, as was check in and the apartment was clean and comfortable. The views over the water were just to die for, and we spent hours sitting on the balcony whale watching. Restaurants, shops and petrol station are directly across the road, and public bus stop right at the front door. 

A great apartment which I would highly recommend.

This condo was perfect for our family with an ocean view and breeze. Every night we were able to sleep listening to the waves outside. The lanai was great for relaxing on and we viewed a few rainbows in the mornings from there. Pretty much, everything we needed was in the room; towels, dishes, beach gear, even little things like zip lock bags and tupperware containers, which made our stay that much easier. Communication with Sherry was great! Saw some sea turtles while swimming in the ocean, and at one point a seal came on shore on the adjacent beach to nap. The condo is conveniently located by restaurants and shops. Parking was a breeze, and the elevators were hardly ever occupied. We definitely enjoyed our stay! If we're able to in the future we would love to come back!

Wife and I had an amazing stay, the view was breathtaking. Lots of beach supplies at the apartment, from beach towels to a cooler, beach chairs, body board. Loved drinking the supplier Maui coffee on the patio during sunrise.

Well appointed condo. I was pleasantly surprised at how well organized the unit is. Great cookware and utensils. The unit is in a great location. The lanai was a wonderful addition to our stay. We watched sea turtles in the morning and enjoyed the sound of the surf in the evening.  Sherry was a consummate host! She let us know Mick Fleetwood would be having a concert while we were in Maui. We went and was a very delightful evening.
The view is stunning. It is a nice studio with kitchen. We enjoyed the beach chairs. Free parking is great. Mahalo
This place was great! Lots of amenities and right on the beach. The bed is super comfortable! Sherry was very responsive and always available. We would love to stay here again.

We had a fantastic time and Sherry and Shane have a lovely place. The view from the lanai, especially at sunset, is gorgeous. I’d recommend staying here to any friends looking for a spot in West Maui.

Sherry fue muy amable, nos dio todas las instrucciones, tiene en el apartamento recomendaciones locales y guías para visitar Maui. El apartamento tiene un vista hermosa, con un balcón para disfrutar de esa vista. De noche dormir con el ruido del agua es hermoso. Muy recomendable.

Sherry's place was a delight to stay in. Everything was perfect and as described and communication with the host was easy. I can't say enough good thing about the view from the patio during the day and hearing the waves at night. The apartment was well stocked up and ready for all the beach gear you need to spend a nice day at the beach, which is right downstairs! It is also close by to all the West Maui attractions and activities and Lahiana downtown for your shopping and restaurant needs . Overall I give this place 5 stars for all that it has to offer and would be glad to recommend this to anyone interested.

Views are more beautiful than pictures can show! Sunsets are spectacular. 
Host has everything you could possibly need during your stay. 
There isn't any air conditioning, but if you shut the blinds during the day (while you're at the beach or sightseeing), it'll keep the room a bit cooler. 
Plenty of fans in the apartment as well to help cool you off. No need to stay in the apartment though, go outside...you're in MAUI and it's GORGEOUS!

The highest compliment that I can give Sherri is that she was VERY responsive to make sure that our stay was perfect.  The condo itself is cute and very comfortable.  The beach is small but fun, and surprisingly offered some decent snorkeling.  We even caught glimpse of a sea turtle just off the beach!   I would highly recommend this condo, if not for the condo itself , but for the responsiveness of Sherri when you have any questions or concerns.

My wife and I stayed here for our honeymoon and loved every second of it.  Between the amazing view where we could see turtles and dolphins swimming, and the great beach the condo is on we couldn't have asked for more from a 5 star resort.  Also, she provided beach chairs, a cooler, and noodles to make beach going extra easy.  Our stay was amazing!

The condo is 3rd floor right on the ocean.  A decent beach area is 50 feet from the lanai.  Gourgeous sunsets are framed between the properties palm trees.  Nice little pool area that was never crowded. Great BBQ area.  The condo has a nice breeze that circulates through which keeps it comfortable even in the 87 degree temps we had in July.  There is no air, but it is not needed.  Everything needed to have a great stay in Maui.  We loved being on the West side, so much to do.   Our host Sherri was very accommodating with our request for a late check out, going the extra mile to arrange it.  Perfect for couples. My wife and I had our 10 year old granddaughter with us and the space was adequate.  We will not hesitate to use again when we return to Maui.

Sherry and Shane have a wonderful condo that literally feels like home away from home.  The pictures do not do it justice.   The place is very clean and organized.  It is a studio but it does not feel small or crowded.  The kitchen is spacious and comfortable to cook and has all the necessary amenities that a kitchen needs.  You literally just have to buy is your food.  Everything else is provided for you.  But....... nothing can to compare to the beautiful view and the sound of the ocean as you fall asleep.  It’s awesome!  You will not be disappointed.
Sherry was a wonderful host and we had an amazing time staying here. Any questions we had were quickly answered and she was super helpful with recommendations!
Perfect place on the beach !!

We arrived in Maui just before Hurricane Lane was getting ready to hit.  When we got to Sherry's  condo, we found it to be exactly as described. The location is amazing with a fabulous view!  The studio style unit has all necessary amenities including high-speed internet and was quite comfortable throughout our stay. Although the weather was rough for a good part of our trip, the Kahana area never lost power or internet even though downtown Lahaina lost power for two days. We were able to take nice walks on the beach right in front of the complex and Lahaina is only a ten minute drive if you need more action. The condo is located within walking distance to several restaurants, a small market, and of course Maui Brewing Co.  We can definitely recommend this place as a great value for a couple to enjoy a romantic getaway and will likely return again for another stay!

Fantastic place to stay - great location close to attractions and short drive to places you will want to see on Maui. Lots of extra amenities in the condo. Amazing view right by the water. Sherry was fantastic with communication and answered questions immediately. Would highly recommend and would stay again.

Our stay was wonderful! The condo is in a great location, close to amenities, and the view is incredible! Sherry was quick to respond with any questions we had and provided us with recommendations for our stay. We will recommend this condo to friends and family and hope to return in the future :)
We loved our stay. The view form the balcony is priceless, you can hear waves all day. Perfect location. We will be back.
Perfect view and very comfortable condo
Such a wonderful vacation spot! The condo was perfect and the view was amazing!  I can't wait to go back. So peaceful!
We had a wonderful stay at Sherry's place. The view was breathtaking from the condo.
Beautiful views and lovely location!

Sherry's place is absolutely amazing! The proximity to the beach is unmatched! It is so clean and so many places to walk to from there.  It is only a few minutes to Lahaina and     big plus - best sushi - across the street from Miso Phat! Absolutely would stay there again. Sherry communicates so quickly as well.

You will not regret booking this place! The keyless entry made coming and going a breeze, and checking in with the office to get our parking pass was super easy. To welcome us, there was a note from Sherry and some Hawaiian-made goodies, which was a nice surprise! She has a binder full of places to eat and things to do, and the view from the lanai is everything you could ever want! The building has it's own beach, and there's a place to buy beer and wine across the street. Sherry provided beach towels and beach chairs, making watching the sunset on the water a no brainer. We would definitely book this place again!

Great House in the Jungle. 
You need a Car.

Great location with a beautiful view of the ocean! Everything explained was accurate and Sherry was extremely helpful throughout the process! Great restaurants and the beach just steps away. Wonderful host, great condo, and excellent communication! Would recommend to anyone seeking time away in a beautiful location!
Spectacular views! We would wake up and sit on the patio to watch the whales breach and the feel a wonderful breeze blow off the ocean.

This place is amazing! The picture of the view does not do it justice. It is even more beautiful in person. If you are lucky enough to go in January you can see whales right from your lanai and watch the sunset behind a corner island!! And they have binoculars to help you enjoy the whales.
On top of this amazing view you get a fully stocked kitchen along with a reusable ice pack for the cooler that they supply. Basically, if you can think of something you might need, Sherry has it stocked in the kitchen ... even extra beach bags. 
Would totally recommend this place to all my friends and family.
Beautiful place and awesome location. Everything you would ever need. Very thoughtful touches

A great little condo with a perfect location! Walkable to a few restaurants and even Maui Brewing which has great food and even better beer! 10-15 minutes drive into town if you are looking for more hussle and bussle. Everything was very clean and really loved having the beach towels and chairs ready for us! Perfect relaxing place to start our honeymoon!

Great spot if you want a more local location off the beaten path. Very easy to get to Kapalua, Whalers Village, and Lahaina. Walking distance to some small restaurants but didn’t manage to visit this time. I knew ahead of time, but beach area is mostly sandbags. However, most places in this price range don’t offer access to safe swimming beach, so that wasn’t an issue and knew before I arrived. The condo has many locals that clearly all know each other. It was really fun to watch sunset with them one night-they all blow on conch shell at sunset and it’s a hoot! Pool was nicely situated to maximise sun throughout day (although shady spots as well). Condo has everything you need and great Lana’i for coffee in AM or bad weather (we had a horrible wind storm but somehow it was still fine for sitting on Lana’i). Great views of water-tons of whale action some of the days.

Had a wonderful time at Sherry’s home. She was very helpful, thorough and extremely prompt in answering messages. The place is in a great area with the beach and stores just moments away. Would definitely stay again.
Right on the water! Sherry was an impeccable host with quick response times and excellent solutions to our questions. Thank you!
Yes book it

name: Cottage in Haiku
summary: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds.
space: Screened in Lanai with comfortable seating you likely find yourself spending most of your time on the Lanai. We have comfortable new beds with 400 thread count bedding. Kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook a full meal. Our guest all seem delighted that such a unique experience is available.
description: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds. Screened in Lanai with comfortable seating you likely find yourself spending most of your time on the Lanai. We have comfortable new beds with 400 thread count bedding. Kitchen equipped with everything you need to cook a full meal. Our guest all seem delighted that such a unique experience is available. Wonderful grounds and entire home. This cottage is on acreage you will enjoy exploring and identifying all the foliage. I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family
notes: This property is on water catchment. Meaning we catch the water off our roof store the water in tanks then pump it into the house for showering and washing dishes. A little off the grid type living. You will need to bring your own bottled water for drinking. We provide 5 gallon jugs that you can use to purchase water  in town.
transit: Parking for 2 cars. One car can park in the carport and the other car directly behind the car in the carport. You will need to rent a car.
access: Wonderful grounds and entire home. This cottage is on acreage you will enjoy exploring and identifying all the foliage.
interaction: I am available throughout your stay, living on property with my family. Being a busy family you might see us at home often or not see us at all; depending on our schedule and your schedule during your visit. However I will be available if you need anything, messaging me via airbnb is best way to reach me. If we see you we will happily chat and "talk story". There seems to be no rhyme or reason to our level of guest interactions some of our guests have joined us for dinner, or just sunset drinks on our Lanai, and some of your guests we never meet face to face. We are very easy going and follow our guests lead regarding interaction. Truly I believe it all depends on guests schedule and our schedule during that particular visit.
house_rules: 1. The premises are to be used only as a private vacation residence for Tenant(s). Tenant will provide the owner with a complete list of all occupants of premises. Tenant will not allow occupancy over that agreed upon in reservation. Tenants will not permit gueuts on peroperty at any time.   2. Reservations are limited to one infant.  3. 100% Smoke-Free Property. Tenant(s) or Tenant(s) Guests cannot smoke anywhere on the property ground inside our homes or outside. We do not rent to smokers. Please do not rent if you are a smoker, even if you plan on smoking off the property. Our daughter is allergic to smoke, and also the residue left on clothing and transferred to our belongings causes an allergic reaction. A $500 extra cleaning fee will be charged for smoking. 4. Please use beach towels at the beach and the bath towels to remain inside the unit. We have beach chairs and a cooler for your use.  5. Owner provides necessary household supplies, dishes, utensils, towels, sheets, And a st

host.host_about: Lucky we live Hawaii. Friends often describe me as eclectic. I am easy going. Love to play tennis, surf, & hike. I've traveled extensively, for short vacations and long periods of time. I've been know to stay at 5 diamond hotels, my tent, in the open air on my white water raft or in my 88 VW bus in the wilderness. I farm my own land for profit.  You won't find me sitting inside watching TV. I find my peace outside. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread."  Edward Abbey

reviews.comments:
This place was amazing
Kandy was so quick to respond and so accommodating -even when I was a little needy a couple of times (I needed a wine opener and I had one within the hour)
It's a hidden gem and just what we needed to reset life
It had every modern luxury while being tucked away in the jungle and right next to the bay
Thank you Kandy so much for having us
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

From the moment I entered the property I felt at peace, lots of light, tastefully decorated and clean. The place was very quiet and private,and so was the neighborhood , a short walk takes you to an amazing cliff view of the ocean. The steady breeze at night and the fragrent smell of flowers was great . The beds were high quality and comfortable. I enjoyed getting up in the morning and picking oranges from the trees on the property for some fresh squeezed juice.  Our host Kandy was available to help with any needs and made you feel welcome. I would definitely rent this place again on a return trip to Maui .
Kandy and her husband were amazing hosts. I felt like we were part of there family on their property. Would recommend this place to my mother. We will be back.

Ce logement privatif est très bien placé pour se rendre à tous les points de l'île. De plus il possède tout le confort qu'on peut espérer avoir chez soi (cuisine tout équipée, grande chambre, etc.). 
Kandy est une personne sympathique et accomodante avec laquelle vous n'aurez aucun mal pour arranger votre départ/arrivée mais aussi poser vos questions.
Amazing place, very clean and great hosts. It has everything you want and more.

The cottage is in a beautiful and quiet street , in the north shore of the island .
Its for people who want to get away.
If you need food and grocery Paia is not too far . (15-20 min)
We met our host , and she explain us about the property.
That's a beautiful property with verity of trees, and fruits around .
In the morning we enjoyed fresh orenge juice directly from the trees . 
the cottage is very nice and well equipmened .
There is everything you need there .
Towels, beach chairs , cooler and more . 
The place was pretty clean.
All tough it was kind of hard to reach our host.
I text Kandy asking about place to see around, but I got a late response and not much information,
In general , the experience was very nice and we all enjoyed it .

We went to Kandy's for our honeymoon and had the worst airbnb experience we have ever had (and we use airbnb a lot).  She stopped communicating with us and then tried to lock us out of the house one night when we went back. Thankfully we found an open window, got in, evacuated our belongings immediately and had to pay for a hotel for the rest of the honeymoon. Completely outrageous.

Beyond that, the place was disappointing. It smells like mildew and she doesn't have screens on many windows so you're stuck in a mildewy sauna. I would not recommend it and would advise people to be extremely careful with Kandy.
This place was an amazing experience!  you're deep in the jungle but still close to Paia. Extremely family-friendly our kids loved it! I will most definitely visit again

Kandy was very accommodating, and provided such a lovely place to stay. She responded quickly if we had questions, and is very much a professional in the world of home away from homes. The house is quiet, cozy, and worked well for a family with teenagers.

Thank you Kandy, It was a great trip!

We enjoyed our time at the cottage so much, we didn't want to leave! As Airbnb hosts ourselves, we love to be the 'guests' when we can, and Kandy was a wonderful host. She communicated excellently with us leading up to, during, and after our stay, with quick answers to our questions and suggestions for how to best enjoy the property and surrounding areas. We found both a fresh chicken egg and several avocados to enjoy within moments of our arrival - yum! The cottage was very clean, comfortable, and incredibly relaxing. We would certainly recommend!

My family loved this 2 bdrm cottage.  It's located on an incredibly beautiful piece of land, quiet and away from the hustle--a perfect place to stay when exploring the road to Hana.   The place is tastefully decorated and extremely comfortable.  We particularly liked lounging in the screened porch room. It's a little far from town, but sometimes that's necessary to fully unwind! The only thing I would change about our stay is the number of nights.... We should have stayed a week at least!

Our stay at Kandy's place was great! Throughout the course of our vacation she was very helpful. The location is quiet and beautiful. The backyard provides fresh fruit, truly making you feel the island vibe. Our stay consisted of 5 people for 2 weeks; the house had plenty of room for everyone to feel comfortable. We will definitely consider staying here again in the future.

Jungle relaxation, just what we needed after a week of hectic ocean front resort land visiting. Fruit everywhere, evening winds cooling breeze, even some nighttime rain tip tapping on the roof. The house is charming, comfortable, and more than enough room for 7 of us.  Kandy and her family are lovely, kind, and generous and made us feel like guests, not just visitors.  I would recommend this property to anyone wanting a respite from the heat and traffic of the oceanfront and easy hop up to road to Hana or upcountry explorations.  Oh, and the outdoor shower- bliss under a night sky filled with stars and moonlight.

5 of us stayed here and there was plenty of room.  The house is very clean and spacious.  We had a vegan Thanksgiving dinner on the huge screened-in porch and one of Kandy's very friendly chickens was our guest of honor!  My personal favorite was the outdoor toilet and shower - cleaner than many indoor bathrooms I have used :)  I would definitely stay here again.
We loved staying in this Private Paradise! My kids enjoyed the yard and it was relaxing and very pleasant.
Beautiful place with an amazing outside living room. Kandy was very helpful.

I have read Mark Twains descriptions of his time in Maui. Guess what my time at this house made me think of those descriptions. A beautiful property with lush vegetation and fruit trees of many kinds which you can partake of. Just down the road is a path that has an absolutely stunning view of the Maui coast with a path to a beautiful rocky beach. The house is comfortable and cool and is a great place to relax and rest after exploration. Every amenity you could want or need is there for you. We enjoyed the barbecue very much and loved that we had the washer and dryer. In short I will attempt to stay here any time I visit Maui this place is an outstanding value. Lastly Kandi is a very responsive host and obviously wants her guests to be impressed, we were, thanks a bunch.

Kandy is a great host. The location is quiet, spacious and equipped with almost everything we need during our stay. 

The house is located in a peaceful jungle area, with very localized decoration and furniture, it has variety of facilities and cultural props to play with while we stayed there.

Kandy is also very responsive and helpful to answer our questions. We'd definitely recommend this place to whoever visit Maui.

Do not stay there!!!! The house is not bad first floor but the secobd bedroom is an attic with a chipped beam and my mother hit her head eneterung it as one side is too low. The host will make you strip the bed and wants money and the gusests to to do zero all the cleaning after. She exaggerated the dishes are dirty as my eldery mother must have forgot to wash afork or two. Crazy many requirements for someone with excellent airbnb re iews and years of use so far. Pay more and get a better host. Greefy lady harassing the guests. The house has some paint chip.issues inside.  Very isoleted yet you can see all the neoghbours in the complex.

Great place. Looks better than the photos. Very well designed, very comfortable, cool furniture. Fully stocked kitchen with everything you might need for a great meal. 

My only issues were the lack of drinkable water provided with the house. I was not aware of this prior. Also a bit buggy, but didn't bother us very much.

We reserved a 4-night stay at the place, but were only allowed to stay for two. The house is advertised as being in bug-friendly Maui, so I expected some bugs. We have them where we live and most everyone does, so no big deal, right? However, when we first arrived we immediately noticed a bunch of wasps in the house. Bug-friendly to me means you’ll probably see some mosquitoes, roaches, or ants, not an infestation of wasps (I estimated close to 40 flying, on walls, or crawling on the floors during our stay). My kids were kids, and having fun counting them. The majority of the wasps were in the upstairs bedroom that we intended to use for our two little kids. We called the host and she sent her husband to vacuum up the wasps. That's all he did. He basically told us it’s to be expected and gave us no apology. He left and we inspected and immediately saw more. Over the next day we complained to her again, and finally to Airbnb. The company agreed that the place was unsuitable and immediately refunded our cleaning fee after seeing pictures of the place. The host responded by booting us out of the rental two days in. We were polite and tried to fix things in a civil manner (the main complaint was really just the wasp infestation), and we didn’t complain about anything else. We weren't prissy babies and don't really care about minor problems. But wasps flying around the rental and in your kids' room can cause some concern. Apparently, the host didn't like our complaint and saw fit to have us vacate and find lodging elsewhere for the next few nights. Imagine staying in a hotel, for example, complaining about a bug problem and having the management kick you out instead of trying to fix the issue. Crazy, right? We agreed, however, leaving the place in good order (cleaned the dishes, took out the trash and recycling, and even folded up used blankets and such). There's no reason to return pettiness with pettiness, I suppose. After that “customer is always wrong” treatment we felt it was fine anyway. Unfortunately, the host refused to refund our remaining 2 days of unused time. We stayed 2 of the 4 days at the host's request and we still got charged for 4 days. After nearly two weeks of no effort on her part to refund us, she is just now saying that we damage her bedding but is providing no details or proof. Anyway, that’s our experience. No aloha in the land of aloha really sucks, but it happens and I can’t be too bothered by it. Here are the pros and cons of the place (fairly, I hope): Pros: *super quiet – out in the middle of the country. Middle of nowhere = nice and quiet. There are tons of big pitbulls as you ride down the 2 mile dirt road to the house, but even those guys...

This cottage was in a quiet neighborhood close to town; secluded enough to relax after a long day of adventures.  Beds were comfortable and the house is very cozy and clean.  Our host was good about answering any questions we had very promptly.  We had a great family vacation.
Great place on a huge property with plenty of fruit trees, big trampoline in the garden: perfect for families. Very friendly host always ready to help. Overall highly recommended
Was a nice cottage. Lots of space. The outdoor area is neat. Nice and quiet and remote. Not a far distance from the start of road to Hana.
We had a great stay! Very comfy for our needs and the garden is very beautiful and quite!

Merci pour votre gentillesse, disponibilité et de nous avoir transmis les valeurs de Maui. "MAHALO" for all. 
Un endroit en dehors du temps et très typique. Tout ce que nous recherchions pour une escale incroyable sur cette île. Surement à bientôt :)

Having stayed a number of times in the fancy hotels in the tourist areas of Maui before, we were looking for a more authentic perspective of the island.  My word did we get just what we needed.  This place is what one thinks of as true Hawaii.  Being able to walk out the door and pick bananas and other tropical fruit, sitting out on the screened in veranda, listening to the birds and the gentle wind in the trees, and having the most gracious hostess was amazing.   Congratulations on a world class experience!

This wonderfull cottage is located in a calm area, surrounded by a lot of green. 
Kandy is a absolutely friendly host. It was easy to communicate and it was no problem to ask her for help.
The day we arrived, we were without electricity, but that was the county's fault and we managed those first hours well.
We enjoyed our stay at the cottage!
Beautiful secluded property near a beach with beautiful views of sunrise and sunset! A must if staying on this part of the island! This is a very special experience.

This place was amazing! If you're looking for a quiet retreat surrounded by nature, this is the place for you. It was very clean, well stocked with the basics in the kitchen, communication was great, easy to find in an off the beaten path, quiet neighborhood. The screened porch did a great job keeping most of the bugs out. Would definitely stay here again!

Located deep into a tree covered neighborhood! Beautiful! The few people we came in connect with were great. The home is beautiful, the area is and very comfy and cozy! Great for friends, lovers, kids, etc. no near grocery stores, 45 minutes or so away so stock before hand. The mini mart has a few necessities but not grocery like. Will definitely return!

Kandy was great and very helpful. It's very easy to stay at this place. It's on the road to Hana. Kandy has everything you could need in Hawaii. There were beach towels and chairs. Awesome stay. Thank you!

This rustic, well equipped cottage is in a secluded, rural area in a jungle shortly into the start of the popular road to Hana. I came with my 13 year-old son, cousin and dad and we absolutely enjoyed our 2-night stay. For us city dwellers, staying in this cottage is like having close contact with nature while still having the convenience of a modern house. Our host Kandy was very helpful and attentive in answering all our questions about the area. I wouldn't hesitate to stay here for a week or recommend my friends to do so.

Kandy's place outside of Paia is exactly as described, yet even so, delightfully surprised us. Every detail was charming and one could sense she had gone to a lot of effort to make her place welcoming. After spending time in other parts of Maui, it was a relief to arrive "home" to this seemingly secluded, lush paradise. Most of our time was spent on the deck; the wind blowing through the tropical plants, the occasional rain, all served as a soothing (and at other times exhilarating) backdrop to our activities. Then there are the animals. My children delighted in the tame free range chickens roaming about, as well as the geckos and rabbit. We were able to spend about half an hour with Kandy, who was rushing from one thing to the next, but generously took time to show us around her property and even offered us some of the ripened fruit available. We would have loved to spend more time with her, but our schedules never matched up. Perhaps next time?

This place was an awesome find. We were able to book it with LITTLE notice. We had a great 2 night stay here. The environment was awesome! If you are looking for a quiet get-away with a touch of nature all around, this is the place!

Kandy's place is in the rain forest and not too close to beaches or shopping. It is really beautiful land and there is a nice hike to Haumanu Bay. We knew where the property was located, and it was exactly what we expected, plus! Some places we have stayed in this area are dirty, musty and full of roaches. Kandy's place was clean and cheerful. The yard is full of chickens and one may even leave some eggs for you on the outside dryer! Staying at Kandy's is a great way to immerse yourself in a true hawaiian experience.

We thoroughly enjoyed the stay at Kandy's place.  It's isolated enough to experience the style and living of upcountry Maui but also perfect location for starting trips on Road to Hana, Haleakala summit, Lahaina and west, as well as just cruising into Paia for the day or for supplies.  Besides location the cottage itself was perfect for us two parents with two young adult children. House is very much as advertised with everything you need. Outdoor shower is poppin'....and the screened lanai could itself  be lived in for days at a time.  May sure you plan some downtime during your stay to appreciate the lanai!. Overall excellent experience.  Kandy was responsive with all request and offered info and suggestions when requested.  Would love to return somedat, and highly recommended overall.

This place is located in a secluded location.  If you want a place to just get away from it all – this is what you are looking for.  It is just as it is explained in the description. Kandy  he is a terrific host.  Communication is second to none.  Very clean.  Beds are very comfortable.

This cottage is very beautiful. In the garden there are many tropical fruit trees. If you are lucky, you can get some bananas and coconuts. The location is convenient to Hana road. However it's a bit far from restaurants and grocery stores. You need to drive about 20 minutes to get there. The cottage is very clean and close to ocean and mountain. There is no air condition in the house. The time we stayed is ok since it's not that hot. We used fans and at night it's cooling down. Kandy is very friendly and responsed issues quickly. Overall we had a wonderful experience staying in this cottage.

What a beautiful place to stay! All of the elements were available for us.  The house was clean, spacious, and more than accommodating.  My family and I live on Lahaina side, and wanted nothing more than a relaxing environment that offered a different side of Maui, for our staycation.  We were not disappointed.  A beautiful place to rest, and a perfect start location to explore into Hana.  We will definitely be back!
Thank you very much. We loved the stay in the cottage. Best place in the island. We will come back!

I'll make a 4 part review since each member of our family had a different take.
MOM: awesome peaceful setting. Clean house. Everything provided to cook a great family meal, lots of fresh towels. Washer and dryer, beach gear all is there for you. Small Grocery in paia is 20 minutes, so load up at a big grocery in advance. Perfect for family if 4 or even more. There were a lot of bugs and liazards inside though even if you take out the garbage and recycling every day wich we did.
DAD: Beds were all comfortable and soft clean linens. Easy access to get a head start on Hana road.   The beach is acessable from home but not a great beach. Really Noisy at night with jungle and rain sounds, but it's a nice noise. Loved the outdoor bathroom.
KID 1: cool place, but kinda boring. Nothing to do here while we wait to go out. Had fun at all the waterfall and seeing sea turtles at hanoa beach. Glad I had a comfy bed to myself I didn't have to share with my sister. Good Wifi.
KID 2: I loved it here, nice place to relax and read. To many GECKOS  they are all over the walls and windows and they are cute but freaked me out. Bed was really comfortable. There are some fruit trees in the yard and a trampoline
Loved the place, really cozy, great experience, clean, upfront, direct, helpful, Kandide is a total professional
Very nice house in the jungle!

This place kicks butt, it's close to Paia which is the greatest little spot on the north side. The house is much bigger than it seems and the chickens and fruit trees makes this place look like your very own tropical paradise. The place is very well kept and has a very modern feel to it. I would go back every time

My husband, baby daughter, and I had a great stay at Kandide's house.  It's beautifully decorated, comfortable, and very well located - close to the towns of Haiku and Paia.  The house is surrounded by fruit trees and other plants, including an avocado tree!  Check-in was very easy, we were able to check in several hours early, as soon as we arrived on the island.   I would go back next time we're in Maui, and recommend it to anyone visiting the island!

We had a great time on Maui in this AirBnB. You live in the middle of the rainforest and can eat fresh fruits from the yard. The house has a great outdoor area where you can sit and relax and watch the daily rainshowers and geckos who live there.
I can highly recommend this Airbnb.
Pictures do not do this place justice!  Just wish we had more time!  Definitely recommend this home for your stay in Maui, perfect location for Road to Hana excursions.
What an absolutely adorable spot ! I highly recommend this little treasure if you are looking for something away from resorts and people . Quiet , comfy , clean , well stocked and georgeous !
Das Haus war sehr schön. Man kommt sich vor, als würde man sich direkt im Regenwald befinden. Überall exitische Früchte und die Outdoor Toilette und Dusche waren unser absolutes Highlight.

This was an amazing experience. We arrived to a clean beautiful home situated in the middle of the jungle. One of the coolest experiences I’ve had in my time living on Maui. Would definitely recommend.

We stayed in Kandis house during our three months’ trip with our two little kids. 
We spent there 9 entire weeks and we loved all about it. We arrived to a clean beautiful home in the middle of the jungle. The house is fully equipped and is decorated beautiful. You can cook whole meals, there is even a grill outside the house. Washing machine, dryer, beach gear everything is right there. There is also a blender so you can make fresh smoothies with fruits from the garden which is huge and well kept of. 
The kids loved the place too, huge trampoline a lot of space and they even installed a swing for the kids.
Kandi is a super friendly host and really helpful if you have any question or need anything. We had a wonderful time in this beautiful house and can highly recommend staying there and would definitely stay again!

The cottage was a little slice of paradise. Really comfortable living there for a week and nice to go outside and pick fresh fruit and avocados. We found the location really great for exploring all of the island too. Thank you Kandide for offering this space!

Kandide's cottage was beautiful. The pictures of it on Airbnb are good, but they don't do it justice. Every decorative detail of the cottage is deliberate and in excellent taste. The beds were comfortable, the appliances were amazing and top-of-the-line, and the art on the walls was perfect. 
Kandide was a great host. She told us nearby spots that tourists might not have found yet, directed us to the nearest market/commercial center, and even walked us to a special spot by her house.
I can't speak highly enough of this spot; if you get a chance, rent it, and enjoy.

We enjoyed our stay very much!  Love that there was a trampoline and large yard for our kiddos.  

The house is adorable and very comfortable.  There are definitely bugs and geckos but we went there knowing from previous reviews that this would be normal.

If you trip is anything like ours, you can expect lots of rain, fresh fruit and loads of adventure!

This airbnb was by far my favorite airbnb in Hawaii. The whole entire place was very well designed and decorated. Really loved the backyard arrangements and bonus points for providing a washer and dryer, a cooler,  beach chairs and snorkel gear for their guest. Kandide was super sweet and made she she was avail to us when checking in and was super communicative throughout our stay!
This is a beautiful unit and location. I was disappointed that the owner did not take the time to make sure it was not fully prepared for guests.

We loved this hideaway in Haiku. It’s very close to Paia which is convenient for groceries (Mana Foods! but there’s the Haiku Super Market too, which is super local) and an excellent start point for the Road To Hana (start early).  The house is well-designed and very tasteful with stylish designs and furniture. It’s VERY homey and the screened-in porch is great for late night hangs or a rainy day chill-out. The rain catch water system is genius, and Kandide is very accommodating, but invisible if you want privacy. She was extremely accommodating to us when our 2 year-old got sick and needed an air-conditioning unit. But the house doesn’t need AV generally, as it cools off pretty rapidly at night. We loved our stay there! Recommended!

We celebrated our tenth wedding anniversary here and had a great time. The accommodations were exactly as described, clean, and comfortable. Our host was quick to reply to all our requests in a very timely manner. One night we lounged out in the yard and just watched the beautiful sky and listened to the ocean. Great vacation!
Spacious. Bucolic setting with lots of things to enjoy: Ukulele, trampoline, chicken house and so on. They are very attentive on any concern in your staying.

Absolutely lovely! Very beautiful home in the perfect location to drive the Road to Hana. Very relaxing. I cannot wait to come back again. Very large space suitable for a family or a larger friend group traveling together. Beds were comfortable. Outdoor shower was a great touch.

Epic property. The cottage is super amazing with everything you’ll need to feel like you’re at home. You will not be disappointed. Stoked level was super high our entire stay here. Can’t wait to rebook for a longer stay on our next trip.

We stayed at this place with another couple and it was everything we expected. The place was clean, very trendy, and big enough to give each of us our own space. The deck is an amazing spot to sit and read a book and just relax on their beautiful property. They have an adorable bunny that lives in the area who melted our hearts. The place is really close to Paia and to Kahului so we were able to go to all the places we needed. Kandide was very quick to respond with any questions and gave us great tips for food! We highly recommend this place!
We absolutely loved our stay here and plan to book it again next time we visit Maui!! Really clean and super comfortable beds! If your are wanting a real island home experience this is your place!
This was a fantastic cottage to retreat to after a long day at the beach. We hope to stay again!

Fantastic place to stay in Maui to experience the unique jungle life.  Kandide is a super host, very sweet and generous.  Besides the full kitchen there are a lot of spices  too.  The washer/dryer, beach chairs, snorkel gear, beach towels, ice chest, fruits from the yard trees, comfortable beds, shampoo and conditioner, organic hand soaps, ...... all made our stay so enjoyable.  Highly recommend!

Nous avons passé un merveilleux séjour chez Kandide. Ce fut une expérience unique qui nous a permis à tous de vivre comme dans un rêve. Cette demeure située en plein milieu de la jungle nous a permis de vivre des moments magiques. Aussi, c'est un lieu parfait pour la famille! Je recommande fortement cet endroit féérique!!
good space. private and quiet.

This place is amazing!!! You'll spend half your time in the screened in porch. Has everything we needed and more, including an outdoor shower with a friendly gecko. Only thing we couldve asked for was an air conditioner to pull the humidity from the air. Felt like the coolest house ive ever been in. Make sure you put your food away at night to avoid bugs!

Kandide was very communicative and offered great recommendations for dining nearby. Her place was super clean and there was an amazing outdoor shower that was absolutely delightful after a day of exploring.
If you are looking for an awesome place to stay look no further! This hide out in the "jungle" offers everything you need and is definitely not the boring main stream!

Mahalo to Kandide for being such a great host. The location is superb and allowed us to see a different side of Maui which is exactly what we were looking for! The house was well equiped with everything we needed for our stay. If you're looking for a calm place to stay, in the nature of Maui and still a short drive away from the beaches and the cities, this is a great place!

A truly grounding/recentering experience!  We traveled to Maui with our two small children, almost 3 year old son and 8 month old daughter.  Our stay at Kandide’s cottage was excellent!  She’d purchased a crib for the cottage and for us to use during our stay. It was a super cozy location tucked away in the jungle with little ocean views sneaking into a couple windows.  It was so great to have all that we needed to make our meals at home!  We did breakfast and dinner at the cottage, and packed lunches/snacks for our beach and adventure days.  Kandide had tons of info on places to visit on the island with our two little people.  Traveling with kids it was great to have the comforts of home, but on a more simplified level.  We didn’t mind the drive to activities, it was part of our plan...if we stay on the beach or a place with a pool we knew we’d never leave and explore!  This cottage welcomed you and invited you in, but also helped you to be eager to start the day.  I think it’s due to the comforts of home and almost immediately feeling settled in.  Our son said it perfectly on our last morning at the cottage while having breakfast before heading to the airport, “This place is just right for our family.”  It sure was, buddy!  We’d definitely stay here with Kandide again and certainly recommend it to those looking for a truly special experience while in Maui!

Great relaxing place to stay. Enough space for two couples or two families with kids (extra beds and couches), good amenities overall, great kitchen for cooking full meal or a smoothie with Vitamix, or beat something up in the toaster. Great location close to Paia, beaches (windsurfing, surfing, turtles and explore road Hana), also relatively easy to get to Haleakala, hikes and the airport.

We enjoyed a wonderful stay at Kandide’s cottage. Kandide was extremely communicative and helpful, and even though we did not meet her we could see so many thoughtful touches throughout her place. The cottage was clean, the screened-in lanai was amazing. Would definitely come back again if we are in the area!

If you are looking for a secluded getaway with all the comforts of home, this is your place. It’s decked out with top of the line appliances to make any stay comfortable. Very well designed space with common areas, tons of light, and lots of airflow to keep the place cool. The unit is well equipped to host a group dinner or a great day at the beach. 

Kandide was a very accommodating host and answered all our questions. If you are looking for off the grid retreat with all the comforts of home, this is your place.
Stylish cabin on the edge of the rainforest with all the amenities of our dream home! This home is a blessing and we're so happy with the memories of our stay. Thanks again!

great location-off the beaten path. Loved the proximity to Paia.  Beautiful lanai to enjoy cool breeze in the evening and listen to the birds. Comfortable bed and short walk to lookout over the water. IMHO, much better than anything on the west side of maui. This is real maui, great food in Paia, very friendly locals. Beautiful beaches, love all of the microclimates and wildlife.

Cute place, our kids had a blast.  It was a bit warm.  They aren't joking about the bugs (use the can of raid when you leave and it should be fine) no rhyme or reason for the ants they are just there.  There are so nice touches to the place like the new vita mix.  The shower and toilet outside was great too.

Beautiful location on the road to Hana. The outdoor shower/bathroom is unique. There's a constant breeze throughout the house that makes you feel as if you are outdoors. Kandide is a nice host who will work on any issue that may come up during your stay. We would happily recommend to stay at her place.

Not what I expected. Bugs & little geckos all over the house. We all slept in the same room because everyone else was scared. One person said they think they saw a rat running around kitchen (I didn’t see it so I’m giving the benefit of doubt)  and another person had a gecko land on top of them. WiFi signal very poor (I didn’t care much for it because I wanted to be disconnected, but the other three folks wanted their WiFi) The place itself is really gorgeous. If you want to get away and enjoy the rural life this is a great place. I have to say I was really looking forward to staying here. It’s definitely clean and provides so much great aesthetic touches. I just hate having little creatures in my bedroom, so I’m biased. Definitely, not the type of person to camp outdoors...just yet at least.
Cozy spot on a beautiful property.

A wonderful hideaway from the busy parts of Maui. The cottage has more than basic kitchen appliances one needs to prepare decent meals. Those who plan to do serious exploration along the road to Hana should do well to book a few nights here. Also, we love the outside shower/toilet.

Kandide was a wonderful host. She was very responsive in our initial communications. The house was very beautiful and clean. We really enjoyed our short stay here.  I'd recommend this place to others.

We loved staying here! This almost off the grid oasis was the greatest way to spend our time in Maui. We really enjoyed the lanai, the beautiful grounds and the outdoor shower. We didn't get a chance to meet Kandide but she was quick to address the few questions we had. If you're doing the Road to Hana this is the perfect base, the zero mile marker is just down the highway. 

PS If you get a chance go down to the end of the road past the cottage to catch the sunrise. There's a path straight out the point and another that splits off that and goes down to the secluded beach (bit of a hike but worth it).

Beautiful AirBnB on a farm surrounded by fruit trees and chickens. We loved the lanai during the evening. Our host was very nice and helpful during our stay. Note: this is a very remote part of the island so you will find lots of bugs and critters in the living room. But no issues in the bedrooms. Make sure to   put all food in the fridge.
Very nice terrace / area with outdoor seating. We enjoyed our stay.

This place is so cute and very clean!! Very private and spacious. The screened in porch was the best place to hang out at night.  There was a nice cross breeze.  It gets pretty hot during the day, but we were out exploring. We did not have any issues with bugs.
Cute, cozy, and very outdoorsy! Good for those who prefer creature comforts and the more wild adventurers as well.
there is a great yard for fun, we really enjoy it!
We had a Great time here and felt real Aloha

Tolles Cottage mit fantastischer Terrasse. Betten sehr gut. Küche sehr gut ausgestattet. WLAN etwas wackelig. Kommunikation wunderbar und Kandide war mit allem sehr hilfsbereit. Das Cottage liegt in einem schönen Garten, man kann das Meer hören.

Kandide’s place is beautiful and peaceful. We had a really comfortable stay and loved being tucked away at the end of the road, in the trees. Kandide was very quick to respond and helpful, making our stay lovely. The only thing a bit intermittent was the wifi which would be helpful for planning what to do in the area, but it didn’t detract from our stay. I’d recommend this sweet place

My husband, myself, and our 2 yr old had a great stay here. The space is light and well designed, the kitchen is well equipped, the bed is comfy. The screened in lanai, layout, and nice touches (good kitchen knives, crib, ukulele, etc) all made our stay very enjoyable.
