Good place if you're looking for a low key stay in the upcountry, and have a healthy tolerance for insects/critters. If you've never stayed in the upcountry but decide to give it a go, just remember that you're more or less staying in the jungle and (especially with a house this size) you are likely to have some 'house guests'. We passed a couple suggestions on to the owner regarding minimal maintenance items.  It is worth noting that none of us received a single bug bite while in the house. Wish we were sitting on the lanai right now.

We loved our stay in this beautiful cottage. It’s in a very quiet area and surrounded by all kinds of fruit trees. We traveled with our baby and loved the feature that there’s a portable crib provided by the host. Even though during our short stay we didn’t get to meet the host, she provided very detailed and welcoming instructions before our arrival. The only negative point is the WiFi was extremely slow, but there’re plenty of activities to keep you busy anyways. Overall this is the place we want to stay again for our next visit to Maui.

Loved the vibe of Kandide's place -- so simple, yet stylish. The location was pretty cool -- it felt far off the beaten path (it's on the rainy side of the island) but it was lush and so beautiful. It's a great place to be if you want to drive the Hana road, and it's close to Makawao and Paia, both great, little communities with wonderful boutique shops. There are some trade-offs bc of the location -- really slow wifi, bringing all our own water (house runs on catchment system), not near any beaches -- but worth it to experience the other side of Maui. We spent most of our time in Lahaina (going to beaches) and spent the last few days here, and really enjoyed both.

We thoroughly enjoyed our time at Kandy’s cottage.
The remote location was SO restful and relaxing, I wish that I was there right now listening to the wind in the palm trees.
The cottage was comfortable and clean, with all the amenities that we needed to feel at home.
We appreciated the beach chairs and flippers for our sea side excursions.
We loved the fruit trees!
Thanks so much for making a wonderful space available to rent!
ps send our love to the geckos!
Beautiful starlight
Great place to stay on Maui - awesome location (especially if you're doing the Road to Hana)!

We had a lovely stay at Cottage A.  Our family of five had more than enough space inside, there were many nice touches like fresh flowers left for us on the kitchen table, and a ukulele and guitar that my husband and son had fun playing.  The cottage was a great launching off point for exploring the turtles at Ho'okipa Beach Park, shops and restaurants in Paia, mountain biking at Makawao Forest Reserve and waterfall atTwin Falls.
Great location, more local experience, beautiful property full of fruit trees!
Big and clean. Thanks

We stayed for 2 nights to visit Haleakala and the road to Hana. Great location at mile marker zero on the road to Hana. The cottage is very spacious and is a very good value if you have a larger group as the upstairs bedroom has a twin daybed and a king sized bed and the downstairs bedroom has a queen bed and a queen sleeper sofa. The kitchen was well stocked, and 2 beach towels are provided along with beach chairs, snorkeling gear, and beach toys. We didn’t get to meet Kandide and her family as we arrived late evening and were out and about all day. Overall a good stay and convenient for exploring the east side of Maui.

You can hear the Ocean from this place, if the lovely birds allow you to. This is rain forest territory and it's a beautiful green space to relax in. Lemons, limes and oranges are growing throughout the property.
It's a great spot for a family or two couples.
this is a spot for you when you want to get away from tourist crowds and be with nature!

Kandide's place is just as beautiful as the pictures, and sparkling clean.  Definitely the most stylish place we stayed at on Maui.  We booked a bit last minute, and Kandide responded really quickly to our inquiry.  Would definitely stay here again on future trips.

name: Double Bedroom with Ensuite & Balcony + Kids Room
summary: Double Room with Ensuite + 1 Smaller Room, ideal for families with kids.  Both rooms with access to a sunny balcony Inserted in a typical 3 storey house, with shared access to a modern kitchen and living room. 5 minutes walking from the beach and 15 minutes by bus to the city center. Has bus stops right in front of the studio, as well as a fresh food market, restaurants, cafes and supermarkets in close proximity.
space: The main room has a double bed, ensuite bathroom and balcony.  There is another smaller room attached to it, with access to a balcony as well.
description: Double Room with Ensuite + 1 Smaller Room, ideal for families with kids.  Both rooms with access to a sunny balcony Inserted in a typical 3 storey house, with shared access to a modern kitchen and living room. 5 minutes walking from the beach and 15 minutes by bus to the city center. Has bus stops right in front of the studio, as well as a fresh food market, restaurants, cafes and supermarkets in close proximity. The main room has a double bed, ensuite bathroom and balcony.  There is another smaller room attached to it, with access to a balcony as well. Guests have access to private rooms, balcony, a shared modern kitchen and communal living room We'll meet for check-in and you can contact me at any time. Foz is the noble area of Porto. The studio is located in the center of Foz, right in front of the typical market, and very close to the beach and the Avenida do Brasil promenade, that goes all the way from the hystorical center to Matosinhos. Bus and Taxi Stops right in front of the S
neighborhood_overview: Foz is the noble area of Porto. The studio is located in the center of Foz, right in front of the typical market, and very close to the beach and the Avenida do Brasil promenade, that goes all the way from the hystorical center to Matosinhos.
notes: Rooms are located on the 1st floor of a building without elevator.
transit: Bus and Taxi Stops right in front of the Studio.
access: Guests have access to private rooms, balcony, a shared modern kitchen and communal living room
interaction: We'll meet for check-in and you can contact me at any time.
house_rules: Os hóspedes devem fazer silêncio após as 23 horas. Obs: A permissão de fumar refere-se a espaços exteriores como varandas, terraços e corredor de passagem entre a garagem e a cozinha.

host.host_about: Olá, o meu nome é Jorge. Nascido e criado no Porto, sou um amante desta cidade.

address.government_area: Aldoar, Foz do Douro e Nevogilde

reviews.comments: We had in total a nice stay at the flat. It's a nice area and you can get easily to the City Center by bus. I would recomend it to familys.
Appartement propre, confortable et bien situé. Hôte fort sympathique et disponible. Je recommande!

name: habitacion en Barcelona
summary: Lugares de interés: Poble Espanyol, montaña del Mont Juic- piscinas. fuentes de las AGUAS MAGICAS .conexion con Metros y buses en todas direcciones , Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a los espacios verdes y amplios, el espacio acogedor, los teatros que la rodean,los lugares para deportes etc.
description: Lugares de interés: Poble Espanyol, montaña del Mont Juic- piscinas. fuentes de las AGUAS MAGICAS .conexion con Metros y buses en todas direcciones , Te va a encantar mi lugar debido a los espacios verdes y amplios, el espacio acogedor, los teatros que la rodean,los lugares para deportes etc. Prohibido fumar Phohibido visitas
notes: Prohibido fumar Phohibido visitas
house_rules: Lavar máximo una vez por semana

host.host_about: soy una abuela, estoy jubilada y me gusta recibir huéspedes en casa, pues conozco nuevas personas y culturas diferentes. Me gusta leer, nadar y practico tai-chi cada semana. Las personas que hospedo deben ser ordenadas y llevar una vida calma. hablo un poco de francés e ingles !

name: Waterfront Cabana
summary: Come stay with us in our beautiful cabana steps from the waters edge.  Walk through the tropical garden and enjoy some fruit from our edible garden(depending on season).  Imagine seeing the water from nearly everywhere in the cabana.  Eating breakfast out on the lanai (balcony) so close to the water you feel like you are on a boat.  Listening to the waves of the water and the serenity of the canal as the Hawaiian breezes envelope you.
space: Approximately 600 square feet. (400sf with 200sf loft). Enjoy the views with indoor dining or outdoor dining on balcony (lanai), and wall-to wall front and back opening accordion doors.  Have clothes washer/dryer located on the left side of the cabana (outside), hot water, wifi and internet TV.  Large shower and comfy beds for a good night sleep.  Air conditioning in loft is sufficient to cool house to 76 degrees at night but not for daytime use. Kitchenette has full-sized refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and many small kitchen appliances, pots and pans, dishware, etc... for short or long stay.
description: Come stay with us in our beautiful cabana steps from the waters edge.  Walk through the tropical garden and enjoy some fruit from our edible garden(depending on season).  Imagine seeing the water from nearly everywhere in the cabana.  Eating breakfast out on the lanai (balcony) so close to the water you feel like you are on a boat.  Listening to the waves of the water and the serenity of the canal as the Hawaiian breezes envelope you. Approximately 600 square feet. (400sf with 200sf loft). Enjoy the views with indoor dining or outdoor dining on balcony (lanai), and wall-to wall front and back opening accordion doors.  Have clothes washer/dryer located on the left side of the cabana (outside), hot water, wifi and internet TV.  Large shower and comfy beds for a good night sleep.  Air conditioning in loft is sufficient to cool house to 76 degrees at night but not for daytime use. Kitchenette has full-sized refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave and many small kitchen appliances, pots and pan
neighborhood_overview: Quiet neighborhood -Located on the Koko Marina. - we highly respect our neighbors who are kind and friendly.
notes: You are welcome to use the snorkel gear, beach chairs, and boogie boards, but please clean and return to the front porch for future guests.  We also have paddle boards for your use. Adjacent house is occupied by a family with children that like to interact, swim, and play.
transit: convenient bus access on Lunalilo Home Road.   Within 2 miles (or less) - multiple dining options, shopping such as Safeway, Costco, Longs Drug, Ross.  Close to Post Office, hiking, movie theatre, and watersports rental.
access: The Cabana is a stand alone structure located on the back of the property steps from the waters edge.  Access to shared yard, shared pool, shared dock.  The adjacent house is private - no access. The Cabana has a downstairs that is used for storage - no access. you can access the dock, however the boat and boat lift are prohibited from use.  For safety reasons - children under 8 must be accompanied by adult when accessing lower side of cabana at waterfront as there are no handrails or guardrails to prevent fall an no lifeguard. For those with mobility issues, the cabana has about a 100' random rock walkway path on grass/stone pavers and stairs with 4 steps up leading to entrance.   Upper loft leading to queen sized bed has a steep ships ladder and head clearance issues (approx. 5 foot height at top of stairs).  Enter at your own risk. Bedroom Queen bed and pullout queen sized couch are for  those who may have difficulty with the head clearance in loft.
interaction: We will be on-site often as the cabana is located in the back of the property.
house_rules: - Quiet time from 9:00pm to 8:00am - Driveway parking for 1 vehicle.  Street parking may accommodate 1 additional vehicle, however not guaranteed.   - Property contains stairs and unguarded access to the water and no monitor or lifeguard.  Entrance to cabana has 4 steps and pathway leading to cabana includes a grass and stone walkway that is not an even surface.  - alert to those with mobility issues or small children under 8 - enter property at your own risk - this place may not be for you. - Be mindful of neighbors peace and quiet - Property is shared.  Driveway must not be obstructed.  Property is a shared yard, pool, and hot-tub. - Do not access boat or boat lift adjacent to boat dock. - Please be mindful of energy use- it is expensive in Hawaii. Air Conditioning is for your sleeping comfort.  Do not open doors and run AC.  The Air Conditioning is limited to nighttime only.  - Property is limited to 6 guests (4 staying and 2 visitors).  Visitors beyond the 4 staying must vacate dur

host.host_about: ALOHA!  I'm Sarah, my family and I have lived on the Hawaiian Islands since 2006.  We love everything Hawaii has to offer.  Some of our favorite hobbies are boating, hiking, surfing, and boogie boarding.  We are honored that you are considering our beautiful waterfront cabana for your Hawaiian vacation.  We look forward to meeting you!

reviews.comments: Sarah was so helpful in every way. She had everything we needed and lots of extras like beach towels, a cooler and snorkeling equipment for us to use at the beach. The Cabana is so peaceful and relaxing, the yard and pool were so pretty and enjoyable to spend time in. I loved our stay so much and hope to return again next time we make it to Hawaii!

I was a little nervous about booking originally because it was a somewhat new listing and there weren't any reviews posted yet, but, I am so so glad I trusted in Sarah and Curtis because their cabana home in Hawaii Kai was absolutely amazing in every way. When we arrived Sarah and Curtis  were there to greet us and show us around and had everything set up for our week, including fresh mangos from their tree!
The home was so open and clean and fresh but so relaxing as well. We were able to fish from the balcony and we all enjoyed watching the various watersports going on in the bay. The week has been a dream. I hope I am able to come back to stay with them again in the future. Thank you for everything Sarah and Curtis, and.... Mahalo.

We were so lucky to have had the opportunity to stay at the Cabana. It was a peaceful Hawaiian retreat! We enjoyed just sitting on the couch and looking out at the water, or watching the sunset. The Cabana was thoughtfully filled with everything we needed and more. We only had to go out and buy food to cook. The Cabana was only a few minutes away from a lot of the activities we wanted to do; Koko Head Trail and Hanauma Bay were less than 10 minutes away! Sarah and her family were very welcoming and thoughtful hosts. On our arrival, we were welcomed with some Hawaiian treats, and throughout our stay, they checked in to see if we needed anything. We stayed at the Cabana during a week when there were two hurricane warnings issued for Oahu, and Sarah came by to assure us that they had enough food/water and a plan if we had to evacuate. This was our first AirBnB stay and we were so spoiled, it’s hard to imagine how another place can top this!

My husband and I stayed at Sarah and Curtis' cabana for our anniversary. Both the cabana and hospitality exceeded our expectations. The cabana looks beautiful in the pictures but is even better in person. We loved that it overlooked the water and was very peaceful. It is away from the hustle and bustle of downtown Honolulu but still a short 20 minute drive to downtown Waikiki. It's also very close to Hanama bay which was a great snorkeling place and the cabana had snorkeling gear for us to use! It also had boogie boards, beach chairs, beach towels, and all of the basic necessities. Sarah and Curtis were very welcoming and kind. We would honestly and most definitely recommend this place to our friends who are looking for a place to stay in Oahu and hope to stay here again in the future! 

Thank you Sarah and Curtis for hosting us at your wonderful cabana! 

Chris and Kiyomi

5 star accommodations.  Comfortable bed, clean sheets and towels.  Breathtaking views from large panel folding doors that open to Marina. Sarah and family have the aloha spirit. Close to Roy's and Island Brew Coffeehouse and away from busy Waikiki.  Definitely a place to revisit.

We had a wonderful experience at Sarah and Curtis's cabana. It sits right on the water, so you can open the sliding doors to enjoy the cool breeze and beautiful view of the pond and rolling hills from anywhere in the home. Everything in the cabana was clean and comfortable, including the beds and linens. 

Sarah and Curtis are perfect hosts. They were friendly and attentive, and we really enjoyed chatting with them throughout our stay. 

This is a perfect place to stay for a couple, or a small family with children. One thing to note: the bathroom is connected to the master bedroom, but does not have a separate door. It's still semi-private, or fully private if you close the bedroom door. 

Stay here if you want to escape the hustle of Waikiki and enjoy a more peaceful side of the island.

Simply the best.  Our stay at Sarah and Curtis' waterfront cabana exceeded our every expectation.  It is beautiful to look at, well maintained, clean and so thoughtfully appointed.  The pictures look awesome but the cabana is even better in person.  

Sarah has done a wonderful job equipping the cabana with nice things, everything you could ask for and so much you wouldn't even dream of asking for.  It was clear she worked hard to make our stay special.  She is very attentive while giving you as much or little space as you want.  She was very responsive and responsive both ahead of and during our stay.  

The location is wonderful.  A quite sanctuary on the water.  A short drive away from the hustle and bustle of Waikiki beach and only a few minutes from excellent snorkeling, hiking, a blow hole, light house, beaches and more.  

We're already trying to figure out when we can return for a longer stay in this beautiful, peaceful cabana.  I'll be recommending it to anyone who will listen.  

Thank you.
Thank you for such a wonderful stay! Cabana is beautiful! Your family is so sweet and welcoming! Thank you again!

This Cabana is the most beautiful place I have stayed in any vacation. It's convenience location is definitely a plus. Sarah is a wonderful host. Providing us with abundance resources to make our stay the best it could be. I will definitely come back to this Cabana if we decided to come to Oahu again.

Sarah contacted us ahead of time so that we knew how to get ahold of her when we landed. She was prompt in responding when we landed and came out to meet us immediately on arriving. She spent time showing us around and how everything worked in the space.

The cabana was absolutely amazing. It had been completely cleaned and everything in the place worked correctly without issue.

Sarah and her family were amazing hosts. Our children had a wonderful time playing with hers as well. Very nice people.

We were truly spoiled by the Cabana, and by the warm and welcoming hosts - Sarah, Curtis and their adorable kids! The space is so beautiful and serene, spotless, and surprisingly modern. The entire house opens up to the bay and the backyard, allowing the relaxing tradewinds to breeze thru and naturally cool the house, even without the multiple ceiling fans and AC in the loft. Every convenience and luxury has been considered, from the remote-controlled fans and sunshades to the brand new appliances, cooking and entertaining supplies and outdoor dining set. We were so enamored with the view, we never turned on the TV - this space is as close to sleeping on the actual water as I can imagine. Sarah, her husband Curtis, and their adorable children were warm, helpful and easy to communicate with, readily sharing tips for local stores, scenic hikes and North Shore snorkeling spots for our trip. This was the best introduction to Oahu living we could have asked for, and we hope to visit again in the future. Aloha and Mahalo!
The house is so relaxing and clean. Sarah and her family and very sweet and welcoming. Definitely a place to stay if you want to relax and be a few miles from gorgeous beaches.

This is a unique boat house / cabana right on the water. The huge doors open completely so you live outside-ish if you want. Perfect for reading a book, creating, or cooking. We slept with doors open to the water, lovely. The hosts' family pool is available to use also. Our kids enjoyed it and played with their kids. a shopping plaza just around the corner has all your basic supplies, including poke and good burgers.

There are so many positives things I could say about this cabana! It is more beautiful on the  inside than the pictures represent. The water is right outside the large windows  that open up fully and capture the crosswinds. The bedroom has these as well. We were a family of four and we were all very comfortable. Everyday I looked forward to coming home to the cabana! Every amenity was there, and we needed nothing. But we knew that if we did, Sarah was always there to provide anything we needed. 
We came during Thanksgiving, and she invited us to her feast, we met so many wonderful people there! We felt as if we were part of the neighborhood, and a part of her wonderful family! (The kids are so cute!) 
I wish I could keep it a secret so I could book this every time I come back, but everyone  coming to Honolulu that wants to stay close enough to the city to access it, but  away from it to experience living in Hawaii, should stay in this cabana. It is peaceful, charming, and beautiful. I felt very safe and had lots of privacy, so much so that when I come back by myself to drop my son off for college, I will book this cabana(if I can get it!) because the neighborhood is quiet and very safe. 
The cabana has shopping nearby, less than a mile, so you can get groceries, eat, and there is fishing and water sports nearby. It is a very convenient neighborhood. 
I consider myself lucky to have found this! I hope to be able to be lucky enough to book this again!  Thank you Sarah and Family!

I'm a Real Estate agent who has been in many high end properties and this place ranks right up there with them. It looks even better than the pics. When you walk in your in the great rm looking out on the water. Walnut cupboards in Kitchen w high end appliances. Vaulted ceilings. Awesome bath w/ walk in glass block shower. Flooring through out is stunning. Sara is an awesome host!

Similar to previous reviews, I can't stress enough how lovely this place is. Sarah was extremely easy to get ahold of and communicate with. The place has everything you need and more. Sarah and her family were so welcoming and helpful, but also gave us plenty of privacy. The view was amazing, and the accordion-style doors, letting in a lovely breeze in the evenings, were just magical. We traveled with our two young kids, and the accommodations were perfect for our family of four. Highly recommend. We plan to return!

We had a great experience with Sarah and her family! The place was fantastic and the location is great. There are a ton of great beaches on the east side of the island and the pool and hot tub were great too. We look forward to coming back!

Sarah and her family are fantastic hosts - quick to respond but also respectful of our privacy. Accommodation is a big part of the holiday experience and for our family of 3 this was perfect. Nothing like sleeping to the soundtrack of lapping waves. Very good neighbourhood and located within 20 minutes of Waikiki (if you need to go!). This is our second Oahu trip and will not hesitate to book again if we return.
Much mahalo to Sarah.

If you are looking for a beautifully scenic, clean, quiet, unforgettable, warm, and hospitable place to stay, this is it! The cabana has everything you will need and only a few minutes from the amenities and beaches. The reviews from myself and the others who have stayed at this cabana are 100% accurate. I cannot say enough amazing things about Sarah and her wonderful and friendly family. Don't pass up a chance to stay at this unforgettably local place!
The vocation in this is place is wonderful.

Unique, quiet cabana with scenic views on the water. Even better than the pictures. Very clean with all of the amenities needed and a fully stocked and functional kitchen. Plenty of space for 2 of us and the sliding doors throughout the cabana brought the outside in. Sarah and her family were great hosts very welcoming and friendly.

Sarah is a warm, responsive and caring host. She is genuinely interested in her guest's plans and even offered to drop us off at the nearby state park (we didn't rent a car and were using ride share to get around). The cabana is even more impressive in person. Prepare to be inspired!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at the Cabana. Sarah and her family were amazing hosts, and the accommodation was superb! Ideal location for relaxing and exploring the East / North shore side of the island.
Beautiful location, nicely appointed, it had everything we needed. The Cabana is close to Hanauma Bay and several great beaches. Thank you so much for having us.
Fantastic accommodations all the way around.  The host and the family are fantastic.  Check in was easy and communication with Sarah was fantastic.  I couldn't recommend this place enough.
Great place to stay. Out of the busy City but close enough to be part of it when you want. Sarah is a great  host.  Thanks again Sarah

This is a great place to stay! The cabana is bright, airy and makes you never want to leave. The location is also amazing putting you outside of the crazy downtown Waikiki area and near all the main outdoor attractions. Sarah was so hospitable and leaves no stone unturned when it comes to keeping the cabana stocked with whatever you need. Wether it be sun screen or beach towels she has thought of everything. We were able to use snorkeling gear, boogie boards, and many other things we didn't even think to bring or buy. I would highly recommend a stay in this wonderful place.
Awesome place.  The pictures do it some justice but  cannot relay the overall open air ambiance  of this beautiful house.  The hosting family is also very kind and helpful.
A hidden gem!  Beautiful sunsets right over the water, quiet, meticulously clean, Sarah has thought of every detail and is a gracious host.  Would stay again for sure.

This is such a wonderful place to stay and Sarah is the perfect host and quick to communicate. We loved the location by the marina, watching life on the water and having breakfast on the deck. Sarah provides everything you could think of to make your stay easy and for day trips away from the cabana. The kitchen is well equipped, the shower has good water pressure, the beds are comfortable and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. So much so, that we are coming back again! Thank you for sharing your home and making the cabana available. Highly recommended.

Magical.  Simply magical.  Not only would I stay again, I did.  My wife and I stayed at the Cabana for a week last September (read my September review)and knew then that we just had to come back for a longer stay.  We just finished a three week stay at Sarah and Curtis' cabana and this stay was even better than the last.  Architecturally beautiful, thoughtfully appointed, awesome views, and a world class location. Sarah and Curtis are amazing hosts, great communications, so warm and welcoming, they made us truly feel at home.

Sarah's Cabana was perfect for my family's first stay in Honolulu. The pictures certainly do not do enough justice to the beauty of the indoor/outdoor living of the space.

The neighborhood is quaint and quiet for some rest and relaxation, but close enough to drive around if you want to get to the action. 

Sarah was one of the most accommodating hosts I've ever stayed with and she is running a smooth ship. Would recommend this place to anyone looking to relax in the Hawaii Kai area.

Our return visit and we loved it even more than last time (see March review). Such a great location and Sarah makes a huge effort to ensure everything is just right. We love it here and will definitely stay again next time we are on the island.

A lovely location on the water.  The cabana was charming and well appointed.  The stairs to the loft were tricky for the less nimble footed.  Sarah was a great hostess and her adorable children were equally welcoming.

We loved our stay here, great a four girls on a girls trip. The view is unbeatable and the house is absolutely gorgeous, the house is clean and has everything you need. We loved enjoying some drinks on the balcony overlooking the water and hills. I will note that the location is about a 30 minute drive to central Waikiki.

Highly recommend! Gorgeous house on the water! It was perfect for our family of four with two 6 year olds! Location was excellent. Close to restaurants, groceries, amazing beaches and also close to tourist attractions when we were ready to venture out. The kids loved the downtime we spent at the house swimming in the pool or playing in the backyard. We would rent this house again on all future Hawaii trips! Thanks Sarah & Curtis for your hospitality!

Curtis and Sarah were wonderful hosts! Curtis was so helpful (Sarah was away, but still very responsive!) with recommendations, and getting the paddle board out for my niece. Awesome people, excellent place. Loved it!
Sarah is a considerate and responsible host.

Totally recommend.  Our family (two adults & two children 9 and 11) used the beautiful cabana as a base from which to explore the island.  We had a everything we could ask for plus some super bonus items (who doesn't enjoy being surprised with fresh mango's every day).  Sarah & Curtis were very welcoming and made us feel totally at home and relaxed.  Our children had a great time playing in the beautiful garden setting with their lovely children.

The cabana is like having a home away from home in the most beautiful place on Earth, Oahu. Sarah and her family were so welcoming. The cabana was so absolutely relaxing and filled with a fresh Hawaiian breeze every night and morning. I would definitely stay there again.

AMAZING,AMAZING AND AMAZING!!!! Sarah is a super host. The pics of this Cabana are so pretty, but when you are actually in it you will be in awe. As soon as you walk through the gate into the tropical garden to the natural playground and pool area. The scenery is magestic, you either face Koko crater in it beauty or the calming bay. The breeze through the Cabana with all the doors open is just heaven. Sarah's children are beautiful with their smiles and giggles, such a beautiful family. Sarah & Curtis are genuine hosts that put their whole heart into making there visitors welcome. It truly was home away from home. Cant wait til our next stay in the Cabana. Mahalo for making this a completed package for us to enjoy our perfect vacation. Love you all.
We thoroughly enjoyed our stayed at the cabana. Sarah and her family were super amazing hosts. The place was fantastic and the location is great. Absoulutely recommended!!
It was little piece of paradise in Hawaii. Absolutely recommend. Sarah and her family were awesome. Specially lovely kids!!!I  I hope we could meet  them again. I appreciate all helps.

The Cabana was fantastic. Sarah was an excellent host, very helpful and friendly. We loved the cabana so much it was hard to leave it each day to go out on our island adventures...we found ourselves rushing to get back so we could spend more time enjoying the amazing views.
Beautiful place. Very clean and modern. It’s right on the water. The host Sarah is very accommodating and super friendly. It’s located near Hanauma Bay, which is gorgeous. Great value in Honolulu!

很寧靜的社區, 有漂亮的河流
房子很棒, 主人很友善
遠離Waikiki的好地方, 離恐龍灣很近
往北一點去Kailua Beach 或 Lanikai Beach也很好玩
Cabana is everything pictured and more! You’ll have a hard time even leaving to go see the island with the views here!

Sarah’s place is amazing! It is super clean and very well maintained ~ one can truly tell that she and her family really care about the property and your comfort during your stay. 

Each morning we opened the beautiful wooden doors overlooking the water and enjoyed the view while making breakfast. Sarah was so nice and thoughtful ~ she even left us a very delicious pineapple in the fridge and avocados from her tree :) . She was always very quick to respond to any of our questions, was extremely helpful, and also went out of her way to help us enjoy our first paddle boarding experience outside by their dock! Her kids were also very polite and wonderful to meet as well!

The location is great because it’s in a very quiet area but still close enough to downtown and also to Kailua/Kaneohe area. We also liked that it was close to a 24-hour market (Safeway). 

We loved staying here so much that we are actually going to plan our next trip to O’ahu around it’s availability :D.

Mahalo nui Sarah and for all the Aloha that you and your family have shared with us!!

Wonderful!  The view, location, and amenities are excellent, and Sarah and Curties are great hosts.  My husband and I had a super enjoyable stay.

The Hawaii Kai location is very close to grocery stores, restaurants, beaches, Koko Crater, and Hanauma Bay, which was perfect for our short visit.   (We’ve been to Oahu before so we knew what we wanted to do in our limited amount of time on the island.) However, it is really good central location as a base to visit many of Oahu’s attractions.

Highly recommend!
Awesome house and awesome host.. Sarah and her family are very friendly and helpful. The place is even better than the photos.
Sarah and her family were the perfect host.  Their cabana had everything we needed.  It was clean, quite, and a perfect location on the water in Hawaii Kai.   We will be back soon.

We were lucky enough to find this gem with availability for the week were visiting Oahu and we honestly cannot say enough great things about our stay at the cabana! It was amazing! Sarah was a great host. The views from the Cabana are so beautiful. She really went above and beyond to include everything you might need during your stay. Snorkeling equipment, body boards, beach chairs, a cooler, fans, washer and dryer, every kitchen accessory you could think of, etc. We will definitely be back!

This home is even more beautiful than the pictures describe.  The family who own it live in front of the property.  They are a delightful family.  They seem to intuitively know how to be helpful yet allow privacy depending on the needs of their guests.  There is a little village nearby. We were able to enjoy the beauty of Hawaii without having to venture far or see any crowds. For those that want more hustle and bustle, the city is a short 20 minute ride away.  I would LOVE to be able to stay there again!  Thank you to this wonderful family!

We had such a wonderful stay at the cabana! My husband and I traveled with our 10 week old baby to Oahu and spent two weeks in this amazing rental. It has everything a family could need and is a beautiful place to stay. The pictures do not do it justice. You have great privacy and plenty of space along with amazing views of the marina and mountains. Sarah and her family were such great hosts and made us feel right at home. We had a fun time getting to know them as well, and they made our newborn’s trip feel even more special. We hope to stay here again!!
friendly and relaxing
지금껏 모든 여행 중 최고의 숙소였습니다. 깨끗하고 포근한 침대,너무나 아름다웠던 풍경,귀여운아이들과 행복한 가족,모두가 꿈꾸는 파라다이스였습니다.한국인임을 배려한 라면과 소주는 정말 감동적이었고요.사진으로는 표현하기 힘든 최고의 숙소입니다.

We had a wonderful stay in Hawaii Kai at Sarah's cabana!  It is absolutely beautiful inside and out and sits right on the water's edge.  Our kids wanted to move-in permanently.  And Sarah was such a generous host - providing us with everything we needed for a comfortable stay.  I highly recommend this property if you are looking for a serene visit to Oahu.
If you are looking for an exceptional place to stay with the most accommodating host, look no further.  Sarah's Cabana is beautiful, in a great location and has everything you need.
Nous avons été reçu comme des membres de la famille.Hospitalité exceptionnelle. Très bien situé à (Website hidden by Airbnb) recommande fortement.

The Cabana is a hidden gem right on the water.  It is not only beautiful and spotlessly clean,  but Sarah is also a considerate and thoughtful  host who has covered all the details.  This is our favorite place to stay on Oahu and we have been there over 20 times.   Thank you, Sarah.
Sarah's place was amazing.  The views are amazing.  You feel like your on a boat.  Great location, comfy bed and great amenities.  Thank you Sarah for sharing your wonderful home.  Aloha - K & D

This was my first experience staying in an owner-occupied property. I'd booked stand alone homes before, but never had the owner there, so I was a little wary. But as the other reviews mentioned, Sarah knows just when to appear and when to give guests space; we had all the privacy we could have wanted and once ensconced in the bungalow, it was as if we were in our own private world. 

We loved fully opening the sliding doors and letting the warm trade winds flow through the house, even on rainy days. The wind, the lapping waves, the occasional drizzle and pounding of rain made for a most contemplative setting. Forget the Headspace app, I just closed my eyes and meditated! But when my eyes were open... wow, what a view! My son enjoyed fishing along the lanai. He saw a puffer fish and a barracuda!

I would say that the bungalow fits 4 comfortably: One person in the loft, two in the queen bed downstairs and one (or maybe two kids) in the living room sofa bed. Three would be ideal, but 4 is doable. The loft is for the able-bodied and sure-footed, as the stairs are not for the clumsy or the feeble. It's also an open-floor plan, no floor to ceiling interior wall between the bathroom and bedroom and no floor to ceiling walls on two sides of the loft (and the bathroom has no door) -- so just beware that sound travels! 

The bungalow is sparkling clean! There's no overload of tchotchkes to get dusty and in the way. The house has all that you need, but not clutter. Having a washer/dryer just outside was the best, especially since I have boys!

The location was convenient to grocery stores (Safeway, Costco) and restaurants. Nine minutes away from Hanauma Bay and minutes away from the original Roy's. I compared my experience at Sarah's bungalow with that of my friend's, who stayed in a Waikiki hotel during that same week and I have to say, my friend was jealous! 

Sarah and her family were warm and accommodating, approachable and casual. The three children are absolutely adorable. What a wonderful family!

Sarah and Curtis and their family were awesome hosts. Because they had such glowing reviews, we weren’t surprised, but they really thought of everything, including providing fresh fruit from their trees! We really can’t say enough. We had a delightful time and would certainly stay again!  Beautiful and clean! Thanks for making our stay so enjoyable!

Sarah’s cabana is awesome. Great location in Hawaii Kai, convenient to a ton of attractions, and close to town for restaurants/groceries/etc. Sarah herself is as warm and welcoming a host as one could ask for. We did have to coax a gecko out the dryer when doing laundry. Other than that, our stay was perfect!
Incredible hospitality and unique location next to the water. The cabana is exceptionally appointed. The owners are very thoughtful. We wish we could have stayed longer

The Cabana was perfect the 4 of us. The cabana is beautiful and Sarah has done an amazing job to make this the perfect place to stay while visiting Oahu. The location is perfect if you want to be away from the hustle and bustle of downtown and Waikiki, with amazing beaches, hikes and eating options in such close proximity and town never being to far a drive. Sarah, Curtis and family are great and we will definitely be looking at staying here again on our next trip.

I can’t say enough about Sarah’s cabana!  You will definitely love it.

We loved it, me, my husband and my kids all loved the cabana so much that we really didn’t want to leave!

The Cabana and the facility is exactly what you see on the pics.

The place is very clean and they’ve got all kinds of beach gear ready for you. 

It’s located in the famous Hawaii Kai residential area, right in front of the Canal. It is very quiet and nice neighborhood. 
Things are all close too.
The beaches, supermarkets and restaurants are within a few miles. 

Sarah and her family was such a kind hearted, lovely and amazing people who went beyond to help us and make us happy.

We would love to stay at Sarah’s Cabana again!
You will love it here!!!

We had the best time at The Cabana while on our vacation in Honolulu. From the warm greetings upon our arrival until the hugs goodbye, it was a ten out of ten. Looking forward to returning to this special spot.

Sarah's place was exactly as shown in the listing and the pictures. Beautiful waterfront view with a great deck / patio. To just be able to sit out there and watch the sun set and sun rise was so awesome. Place itself was clean and tidy, Sarah herself was very accommodating and very friendly and was easy to get a hold off. This was probably my favourite Airbnb I've ever stayed at, thank you again Sarah for the awesome time!
非常棒的住宿体验｡房间干净,房主会把zi j自己种的水果拿来分享｡芒果好甜｡

We traveled to Oahu to celebrate a milestone birthday.  Sarah was a delight to work with—we arranged to have some tasteful birthday decorations and a bottle of champagne to arrive in advance of us.  Our friend was surprised and delighted by both!  

Sarah greeted us when we arrived, but her communications were so clear it would have been a breeze if she hadn’t.   She and her family are warm and open.  

The cabana is perfectly sized. The doors open fully to allow for a great cross breeze. During the day, there are motorized shades to stay cool. We were able to use the pool and hot tub on site. The balcony is unique and the view of the canal is lovely.  The stairs up to loft are quite steep, but craftily engineered.  

We highly recommend the cabana for a luxurious space off the beaten path.  Maholo, Sarah!

We enjoyed very much staying at a beautiful cabana.
The papaya in the garden was delicious.
Sarah’s hospitality was just perfect!
We appreciate so much!
Sarah's place was outstanding.  Being on the water was truly a breath of fresh air. She has thought of everything someone would need to enjoy the island and we were grateful.

Sarah, Curtis and their family were such gracious hosts. We were greeted with a beautiful homemade lei and fresh fruit from their trees.  They truly thought of everything we might possibly need.  The cabana was beautiful and clean and the location was ideal.  We really can’t say enough good things. We had a wonderful stay and would certainly stay again! Thanks for making our stay so enjoyable!

The waterfront cabana is incredible. The openness and space are so thoughtfully designed. This is truly an oasis in paradise. Sarah and her family are so welcoming and go above and beyond to meet your needs. Every detail has been thought of. Shopping and sightseeing is very close to this property. We were so pampered, we didn’t want the trip to end.  I have never wanted to stay at a place on vacation again in the future like this place. You won’t be disappointed.
Wonderful place,quiet and charming. Would make a great honeymoon or couples getaway. Totally enjoyed ourselves and Sarah is a terrific host.

You will find Sarah and Curtis very friendly and responsive.  Their location is well located in Hawaii Kia close to good restaurants and stores.  While the area is called East Honolulu, it is located out of the hustle and bustle of Honolulu with easy access to Sandy Beach - fantastic boggy boarding.  Their accommodations are located right on the water of the inlet.  Are great place to relax and read a good book.  We will look to stay at their locations the next time on the island.

Sarah’s cabana property is everything you need in a vacation home. Awesome hospitality, beautiful property, every single amenity you could imagine, and not to mention her home grown papayas are delicious. 

We will definitely be referring her property to our friends and family. The photos on her page do the property no justice - it’s simply beautiful. 

Great find!
The view from the bedroom waking up, was worth everything. Then you get to wake up with your morning coffee over looking the bay listening to the birds. At night the sunset is amazing.

The cabana was a wonderful place to stay. Easily accessible to the rest of the island, yet quiet with beautiful views. Sarah and her family were very accommodating, and I would recommend their place to anyone looking to getaway to Oahu.

Sarah and Curtis were excellent hosts. They were very welcoming and super friendly to talk to. Their cabana was clean, comfortable, and offered stunning views of the canal. The sliding doors fully opened up to the balcony and this was a great place to enjoy our morning coffee. The cabana has a full kitchen and there's a washer/dryer so you have all the comforts of home. Our stay there was perfect. I highly recommend this cabana for your visit to Oahu and honestly can't wait to come back again.

Sarah’s Cabana is everything we hoped for and more! Clean, comfortable and incredibly beautiful. As a host, Sarah and family were responsive and very kind and helpful. We did not want to leave. I wouldn’t hesitate to come back in the future. I highly recommend Sarah’s Cabana.
An absolutely beautiful home hosted by a special family. We loved our stay here so much that we added an extra day. Everything you need for that perfect retreat is right here.

The cabana is an exceptional place.  Lovely, quiet setting to escape the rush of Honolulu.  
Sarah is a welcoming hostess who ensures your stay is just right.
We will come back and highly recommend it!

name: Saint-Henri, c'est ici / Welcome to St-Henri
summary: À 5 minutes à pieds du métro Place St-Henri et de la piste cyclable du Canal Lachine, se rendre au centre-ville est très facile. Le Café Campanelli, le Bar Courcelle, le Tuck Shop et le Marché Atwater sont très près. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la hauteur des plafonds, le lit confortable, les boiseries et les puits de lumière. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.
description: À 5 minutes à pieds du métro Place St-Henri et de la piste cyclable du Canal Lachine, se rendre au centre-ville est très facile. Le Café Campanelli, le Bar Courcelle, le Tuck Shop et le Marché Atwater sont très près. Vous apprécierez mon logement pour la hauteur des plafonds, le lit confortable, les boiseries et les puits de lumière. Mon logement est parfait pour les couples, les voyageurs en solo et les voyageurs d'affaires.

reviews.comments: This was a great place to stay with even better people to deal with! We unfortunately didn't get a chance to meet the owners, but they answered within reasonable time and were very kind. Very cute place, close to the subway, churches, restaurants, and more. My boyfriend and I had a lovely weekend and are very grateful we found lovely people to lend us their home. We would recommend them to anyone! Thanks again and all the best!
We had an excellent stay here.

Our trip to St. Henri was wonderful. The apartment was a great space for two and Ode was an excellent host. This was our first time using airbnb and we can’t wait to plan our next trip! Thanks again Ode!!
L’appartement d’Ode est très sympa, agréable et fonctionnel. Pas mal de restaurants à proximité et de la place pour garer la voiture. Un excellent séjour !

name: Cosy Private Room best for long stay
summary: The room has a comfortable bed, towels and clean sheets. The room is cozy and comfortable with basic needs like a desk and hangers. We will be ready to help you with any problem at any hour.  Our Place is located in the center of old city called Sultanahmet. We are 2 munites away from Gülhane and Sirkeci Tram station. Our place is close to Metro (Marmaray), Ferry Station and Golden Horn. The best part is, it is close to all main attractions of Istanbul. Nightlife very easy to reach.
space: Our place has one of the best location in this area. Close to most popular attractions of Istanbul including Gülhane Park, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace and Basillica Cistern. Close to the city center, close to taksim square. Public transport, restaurants and supermarket is easy to reach in a couple munites.
description: The room has a comfortable bed, towels and clean sheets. The room is cozy and comfortable with basic needs like a desk and hangers. We will be ready to help you with any problem at any hour.  Our Place is located in the center of old city called Sultanahmet. We are 2 munites away from Gülhane and Sirkeci Tram station. Our place is close to Metro (Marmaray), Ferry Station and Golden Horn. The best part is, it is close to all main attractions of Istanbul. Nightlife very easy to reach. Our place has one of the best location in this area. Close to most popular attractions of Istanbul including Gülhane Park, Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, Topkapı Palace and Basillica Cistern. Close to the city center, close to taksim square. Public transport, restaurants and supermarket is easy to reach in a couple munites. Common lounge, kitchen and rooftop terrace We can help you at any time. Public transport is a couple munites walking distance. Our common area is pet friendly.
neighborhood_overview: Sultanahmet Istanbul'un tarihini taşıyan bölgedir.
notes: Our common area is pet friendly.
transit: Public transport is a couple munites walking distance.
access: Common lounge, kitchen and rooftop terrace
interaction: We can help you at any time.
house_rules: - best for long stay in istanbul

reviews.comments: Die Unterkunft ist zentral gelegen und man kann auch ganz leicht zu Fuß einiges entdecken. Mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmittel kommt man sehr gut überall hin. Wer keine allzu großen Erwartungen an die Unterkunft stellt ist genau richtig hier. Der Gastgeber ist hilfsbereit und kümmert sich um einen. Würde auf jeden Fall nochmal diese Unterkunft nutzen, wenn ich wieder in Istanbul bin.

Es un lugar barato así que no se puede esperar unas instalaciones de lujo, pero si eres una persona poco delicada es el lugar perfecto. La ubicación es inmejorable, el personal es muy simpático y hay una azotea donde relajarse y disfrutar de las vistas con una cerveza o un té. Lo recomiendo sin ninguna duda.
Все отлично.  Дом,  район супер.

Secondhome is in an ideal location for looking around the main sights of Istanbul. The hospitality was excellent, they were very helpful with our many questions and had great local tips on where to eat etc. I would highly recommend staying and if we visit Istanbul again we would rebook here. Thanks Secondhome!

Excelente lugar con una muy buena ubicación, el hostal se encuentra a unos 800 metros de Santa Sofía, y a unos 10 minutos caminando del puente Galatasaray, además a dos cuadras hay lugares para comer con excelentes precios, puedes llegar animando a cualquier lado. Recepción en inglés y un poco español, sin problemas en la comunicación. Recomendable

Me voy con muchos recuerdos, muchas gracias por alojarme disfrute mucho mi estancia en Estambul, me hiceron la vida mas facil con su hospitalidad y buena ubicacion asi como su buena disposición para las preguntas. Sin dudas lo recomiendo
Good place for it's price. Excellent location. Nothing fancy but very cheap :)

Нам в этом хостеле было очень комфортно, по-домашнему все. Персонал, как радушный хозяин, вежлив, заботлив и улыбчив. Жили на 4 этаже. Номер маленький, но уютный и чистый, постельное белье свежее. Санузел и душ на этаже на 4 комнаты. Гель для душа и бумага никогда не кончились, строго следит за этим персонал. Когда мы замерзли, учтиво принесли очень теплые одеяла)) Если номера и с удобствами в номере, но мы выбрали такой. Курить бегали на балкон на терассу. По вечерам на ней тусовка из проживающих. Но это не мешало особо. Оборудованная кухня, холодильник на 1 этаже. Очень понравилось, что в 20 шагах от  нашего хостел работает небольшой маркет в котором большой выбор и Очень маленькин цены. Покупали продукты, готовили сами.  А еще отличное расположение хостела, метро в 200м, трамвай в 220м, Гранд базар в 700м, мост с морским транспортом в 1км. Вот что еще важно: в отеле персонал говорит по русски! И очень нам рады))
Excellent location and cool atmosphere! Rooms are comfortable, and open spaces are great!

It is a room of a hostel. The hosts are very friendly and provides a lot of tips. Room is clean and towels provided. The shared bathroom was cleaned daily and sometimes it also depends on the other guests. I suggest add more light in the 2nd floor bathrooms. They also provided laundry and printing services. The lounge area is also a good place to hangout and meet other people.

name: Comfy Room in Mong Kok for 2 ppl-Y5
space: DEAR GUESTS, WELCOME TO HONG KONG!   【About the room】 --There’re five separated rooms in one big apartment, each with private lock and bathroom --Newly decorated, providing you with a most comfortable stay --Elevator service from the ground floor to our apartments --Thorough cleaning before guest arrival, including changing on all clean pillows, quilt and bed covers --One double bed --Private bathroom --Air conditioner --TV --Free wifi, stable and fast-speed [Attention] --We provide just one time cleaning before you check in. To be environment friendly, please pay attention that we don’t provide the towel, toothpaste, toothbrush, shampoo, shower gel, tissue and garbage bag. So please prepare for yourself in advance. Thanks. --Please send us an enquiry message to make sure the room is available before booking since our booking situation update very frequently. --Without extenuating circumstances, there is no refund if the guests check out earlier than the date of check-out. --After the
description: DEAR GUESTS, WELCOME TO HONG KONG!   【About the room】 --There’re five separated rooms in one big apartment, each with private lock and bathroom --Newly decorated, providing you with a most comfortable stay --Elevator service from the ground floor to our apartments --Thorough cleaning before guest arrival, including changing on all clean pillows, quilt and bed covers --One double bed --Private bathroom --Air conditioner --TV --Free wifi, stable and fast-speed [Attention] --We provide just one time cleaning before you check in. To be environment friendly, please pay attention that we don’t provide the towel, toothpaste, toothbrush, shampoo, shower gel, tissue and garbage bag. So please prepare for yourself in advance. Thanks. --Please send us an enquiry message to make sure the room is available before booking since our booking situation update very frequently. --Without extenuating circumstances, there is no refund if the guests check out earlier than the date of check-out. --After the
neighborhood_overview: DEAR GUESTS, WELCOME TO HONG KONG!   Our rooms are located at the heart of Mong Kok, simply a must-go place during your Hong Kong trip with convenient transportation to all others places of Hong Kong and various distinctive restaurants, stores and shopping streets. We guarantee you an enjoyable and memorable stay in Hong Kong. 【Surroundings】 --5 minute walk from MTR Mong Kok-Exit E2 --5 minute walk to the Ladies' Market and Sneakers Street --Local food stalls and distinctive restaurants downstairs --Supermarkets, electronic stores, money exchange stores are around
notes: 【Check-in & Check-out Time】 Check-in after 3:00 P.M. Check-out before 12:00 P.M. *Early check-in or late check-out is not provided. *Late check-in is possible but please understand that Muriel and Ben cannot be reached by (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or phone after 11pm. So if you need to check in late at night, please make sure you have the pictures we provide for you to find our place.  *Please take good care of your belongings, and we suggest you take your valuable belongings with you. Although our security is very safe, we cannot be sure and will not be responsible for your losses. Please understand.
transit: 【Transportation】 Located at the very heart of Mong Kok, the hostel has extremely convenient access to elsewhere of Hong Kong. Literally you can go anywhere in Hong Kong within 1 hour.  --Direct Airport Bus E21/A21, which can be taken downstairs, travels to and from Airport for only 60 minutes --Two lines of MTR and numerous bus routes pass through --10 minute to Tsim Sha Tsui --15 minute to Central, Exhibition Centre in Wan Chai and Causeway Bay --40 minute to famous spots Disneyland and Ocean Park
house_rules: -- Please turn off air-conditioner before leaving the room, and turn off the water heater after shower in order to save energy. Otherwise, the guest will be fined 300 HKD each time discovered. Please understand. --The room is passcode locked and you will do the check-in by yourself with the passcode we send you after successful reservation --Thorough cleaning will be done before guests check in. We don't provide everyday cleaning during guests' staying. Please keep the place clean. --There is a big garbage can next to the safe exit. Please take garbage out by yourself to keep the room clean. --No Smoking  --No Pets  --Check-in  after 3:00 P.M. --Late check in is ok --Check-out before 12:00 P.M.   --During your stay, in case the security guard or anyone else at the building asks, just say you are my friend because they don't like strangers getting into the building. Thanks!

host.host_about: easy-going, crazy~~

reviews.comments: Excellent spot in the heart of Mongkok. Very clean quiet and restful considering the neighborhood is alive and vibrant. You won't find better value for this area.

숙소 찾기가 좀 어려웠네요.
주변상가 분들도 잘 몰라서 한참 찾아서 겨우 도착했네요.
실내시설은 사진과 동일했고 깔끔했습니다.
공간이 좀 협소해서 잠만 자는 정도로 사용하셔야 할 것 같습니다.
지리적 위치나 청결도 가격대비 만족스러웠습니다.
Lovely, accessible location in the heart of Mongkok. We were very pleased with our stay. Thank you Jimmy for sending us pictures of the place so we could find it, that was really helpful!

The apartment is clean and in a great and vibrant location in Hong Kong (Kowloon) - we think it was good value for money.  It is small so its perhaps not for 2 people for a long stay and the mattress and pillows are not very comfortable for extended periods.  We had an amazing time in HK and the room's location was perfect for seeing everything.

The room is great! It's small but definitely comfortable and sufficient, with enough storage space for clothes, luggage, and shopping bags. The location is hard to find, but once you found it, it's a great spot! It's right in the middle of shopping, and very near to the MTR station.

Jimmy's a great host - he's helpful with information, and thoughtful as well. Highly recommended!

Location was really convenient and really easy to locate from Mongkok MTR Exit E2.
You can basically get all the necessities you need nearby, and ladies' market is just a few minutes walk away, so so so convenient!

However, do note that the space is rather small but definitely comfortable! The building itself is also very safe as we noticed that there are many security cameras around. 
And the hosts are very helpful as well!

We stayed at Jimmy's place for 4 nights in July and thoroughly enjoyed his place. After exploring Hong Kong we realized that the location of the guesthouse is in the perfect location for exploring the city. You step outside and you are immediately in the hustle and bustle of Hong Kong. The metro station is literally a 2 min. Walk away and Jimmy gave us excellent directions on how to get to his place from the airport. 

The rooms are tiny but that is to expect in Hong Kong. Also, a change of towels would have been nice!

Great stay!

Clean room with a great location - it's small but functional. I never met Jimmy but the staff was quite accommodating. Upon arrival I was switched rooms, because of a mix up in bookings, but it turned out to be no problem at all. I'd stay again.
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Good location for shopaholic guys. Very close to MTR Mongkok exit E2. Clean but very small bathroom. I didn't see the owner all my stay. if you need any helps must contact him via email/phone.

This is my repeated stay at the same place which I find it to be very conveniently located and surrounded with plenty of good food,  The room is clean as published and equipped with basic necessities. Strongly recommended to those who is looking for a decent place.
Is always my chosen place to stay whenever I visit HK. Jimmy has been helpful though there was a confusion over the room that I booked but finally got a replacement. Highly recommended.

Clean and right in the middle of the action in mongkok, there was construction going on at that time so sleeping in was out of the question, seems like there will be construction in that building for a while longer
Room as in picture. Clean and conveniently located near MTR. Good communication via (Hidden by Airbnb) .

My stay was Jimmy was absolutely great. The place was easy to find, the apartment was clean and as I stayed for over a month, the cleaning lady would also clean it and change sheets. Whenever I had a question, Jimmy was fast to respond, and did everything he could to help out. There was some construction going on, but at the end of my stay they seem to have moved further up/other side of the building so the noise was not am issue anymore. The place is also close to the mtr (a few minutes) and it's so easy to get around. Would definitely stay a second time.

Two of us stayed one weekend in the flat. The place is small as one would expect of Hong Kong but clean and nice.  Jimmy was super helpful in providing instructions and responding on questions. We had a good time!

The room is very well located in a vibrant area with perfect infrastructure. The room is extremely small, even smaller than the pictures tell. So is the bed: if you are taller than 1,75m head and feet will touch the walls, in our case just the feet did ;-) The space to put your feets on the ground is about 30cm x 1,50. The room was clean enough to be fine. Check in worked very well, even after midnight. Thanks Jimmy!
这次香港行主要在油尖旺区活动,房间的地理位置很方便了,楼下就是最热闹的区域离地铁很近,房间虽小但很整洁,下次去还会住这里｡

The place is exactly like what it was descried. The room is clean and quiet. The size is small but this is as I expected for Hong Kong. The only drawback was the renovation for the outer wall of the building, they put a net cover the whole building from the roof to the ground, so we can't open the window.  But this is temporary, once the renovation complete, the window can be open.  The location is perfect, super convenience, one block away from MTR and one block to numbers of Kowloon and cross harbor buses. Women Street, Sneaker Street, SaSa, BonJour just right next doors.   I would recommend to anyone who which to come to Hong Kong for shopping and foods.

The room is small but has everything you need. The location is the best part of this apartment, right in the middle of Mong Kok and with MTR just a few meters away. We didnt hear any noise at night and slept very well. We never met Jimmy but the communication was always very good. A point to improve could be the cleaning of the room that in our opinion wasnt perfect.
The room is clean and comfort. The room is small but well equipped with facilities as it was described. Jimmy and Sharon are very helpful. When I have any request, they will try to help out.
Jimmy is very nice and very responsive to my queries. My plan changed straight after I booked the (Website hidden by Airbnb) waived the balance owing despite the strict term.

The room was like expected, very small but comfortable and very clean. If I had a question or a request, Jimmy answered or solved it very fast. I stayed there for around 11 weeks and I was really statisfied with the provided service. I can only recommend it! 

Thanks Jimmy!

We stayed at Jimmy's place for 3 days. The place is small but comfy and clean. Location is in the center of Mongkok so it is the ideal place for people who love shopping and enjoy great authentic cantonese food. 
It is a great place to stay. I would stay there again :)
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very very small
But very very great location!
Will come back again

Loved staying at Jimmy's place. The building feels very safe and the area is very centrally located; easy to get around. It was originally quite hard to find it, but in the end we found it easily. Checking in and out was very easy. Jimmy provided us with all info necessary!

The place is indeed very near to Ladies Market, just a few steps away. We initially got lost going to Jimmy's place as we didn't receive the map. Sharon/Ben provided the map and pictures when we notified them that we're lost. You can get exact instructions using (Hidden by Airbnb) Maps -- just search for Yuen King building (between Shantung and Sai Yeung Choi Street). Towels and toiletries are provided. However, if you're a big person, it is recommended to bring your own. The room is small but clean. Hot shower is also available. Bathroom is small also but accurate as shown in the pictures. Wifi is fast and air-conditioning unit is cold. The place is conveniently located in the center of Mong Kok -- near to a lot of streets/exits. Overall, I enjoyed my stay and would choose Jimmy's place again.

Jimmy and Sharon were great hosts. Good communication from beginning to end. Although, we had some trouble finding the place (pictures of nearby venues would be helpful), it had everything we needed during our stay. Very central and close to MTR and A21 bus to/from airport. Lots of restaurants and stores nearby. The room was small, but equipped with all the necessities (hair dryer, towels, hangers). There was plenty of storage space under the bed for our suitcases and shoes, which was a big plus. Private bathroom. A/C worked great. Comfy bed. Would stay again!
地理位置十分方便,好干净,订房回复好快｡但房间比较细,不过系寸金迟土噶香港,可以理解!房间都听唔到隔离噶声音,反而隔离房开水龙头噶时候声音好大,一早就比隔离水喉声嘈醒｡总噶黎讲,性价比好高,下次仲会考虑入住!
房间很棒,位置很好,自助式入住也很方便,喜欢呢~

Jimmy's place is in a good location and very convenient to the MTR. Jimmy was very helpful and responsive in all communications and the room was as advertised. HK rooms in general are small but it is adequate for a single traveler. I would recommend staying here for the location, value, and because Jimmy is a great host!
Comfy room in a very nice area, good decoration, plenty of restaurants and shops around, compared to what other HK hosts have to offer this one is very good quality/price

We stayed more than a month. 
The room is very small but clean and confortable for few nights and short stay. The bed and the bathroom are a little bit too small especially if you're a big person. The room isn't fit for long stays.

We had some difficulties to find the room at first. Mong-Kok is a very lively and the most crowded place in Hong-Kong, it could be noisy and hard to find your way at the beguinning.

It's a very nice flat for a very good price. I stayed there at the end of the year and it was getting cold in Hong Kong (probably around 10 degrees Celsius in the night) and the flat was still warm even though the air con doesn't have heating option (many aircons in HK don't have it).  The bed was very comfortable for me (I like to have a hard mattress - and again, many beds in HK are like that) even though the bed is not very tall (i'm 183cm tall and I could feel the end of the bed). Jimmy is a great host, very quick communication. There is a big washing machine there and basic kitchenette tools to cook like induction cooker. I would stay in that place again.

name: YÜZME HAVUZLU VE DENİZ MANZARALI
summary: Adalar ve Marmara Denizi manzaralı, stüdyo,1+1 ve 2+1 tarzındaki 60 misafir odası ve 200 yatak kapasitesi ile odalarında hızlı internet erişimi, HDTV ve Vazo Özel Uyku Deneyimli yatakları ile lüks ve şık bir İstanbul deneyimi yaşatmayı vaat ediyor.  Vazo Suite Anadolu yakasında iş merkezlerinin yanı başında olan Maltepe bölgesinde otoyol bağlantısı, boğaz köprüsü, Sabiha Gökçen Havalimanı, Maltepe Sahil, E-5 ve Metro İstasyonuna yakınlığı ile sizlere bölge ulaşımlarında kolaylık sağlamaktadır.
space: Ev konforundaki dairelerinin yanı sıra, açık ve kapalı yüzme havuzları, spor salonu ve bay bayan buhar odalarında günün keyfini çıkartabilirsiniz. Kafe ve restoranımızda açık büfe kahvaltı eşliğinde keyifle başladığınız gününüzü, nefis bir akşam yemeğinin ardından İtalyan tatlıları ve güzel bir kahve ile taçlandırarak dairenize çıkabilir, günü adalar ve deniz manzaralı dairenizde İstanbul’u seyrederek sonlandırabilirsiniz.

host.host_about:
Ne türde bir seyahat planlıyorsunuz? İş seyahati, turistik gezi, şehir gezisi…. 

Evinizden uzakta geçireceğiniz seyahatlerinizde sizin için en iyi seçim Vazo Suite olacaktır. Vazo Suite konum olarak İstanbul adalar, alışveriş merkezleri gibi birçok yaşam alanlarına komşudur.

Hayalinizdeki ev konforunu yaşayabileceğiniz Vazo Suite, özgün mimarisi, deniz ve adalar manzaralı odaları, açık ve kapalı yüzme havuzu, sauna, jakuzi ve fitness salonları ile isteklerinize cevap vermek için sizleri bekliyor.

reviews.comments: Otel olarak güzel bir mekan, eğer kendi eviniz gibi hissetmek istiyorsanız tavsiye etmem. Karşılama ve diğer hizmetlerin tümü otel gibi hizmet verilmekte.
orta üstü
Tres bon hotel avec belle vue !! Emplacement pas mal pour avoir accès au moyen de transport, seul remarque est que le service menage laisse a revoir !

name: House next to the beach and metro station to Porto
summary: Completely renewed house at the heart of Matosinhos, close to everything, restaurants, bakery, shops, supermarket, metro and the beach! The will to leave may be interesting, but staying at the house enjoying the garden will also be tempting. Esta casa totalmente remodelada fica no coração de Matosinhos, próxima de tudo, restaurantes, lojas, bancos, metro, praia. O apelo e a facilidade para sair são constantes... mas ficar por casa a desfrutar do quintal e espaço exterior será também tentador.
space: New house, fully equiped with great acesses, location and privacy. Moradia nova, totalmente equipada, com óptimos acessos e muita privacidade
description: Completely renewed house at the heart of Matosinhos, close to everything, restaurants, bakery, shops, supermarket, metro and the beach! The will to leave may be interesting, but staying at the house enjoying the garden will also be tempting. Esta casa totalmente remodelada fica no coração de Matosinhos, próxima de tudo, restaurantes, lojas, bancos, metro, praia. O apelo e a facilidade para sair são constantes... mas ficar por casa a desfrutar do quintal e espaço exterior será também tentador. New house, fully equiped with great acesses, location and privacy. Moradia nova, totalmente equipada, com óptimos acessos e muita privacidade TV, internet, Wi-Fi, garden with barbecue Available to help and advice. The food! Specially seafood and fish!  A comida! Em especial o marisco e o peixe! Metro, bus, close to the airport, the seaport and the marine. Metro, autocarros, próximo do aeroporto e do porto de Leixões e Marina de Leça da Palmeira
neighborhood_overview: The food! Specially seafood and fish!  A comida! Em especial o marisco e o peixe!
transit: Metro, bus, close to the airport, the seaport and the marine. Metro, autocarros, próximo do aeroporto e do porto de Leixões e Marina de Leça da Palmeira
access: TV, internet, Wi-Fi, garden with barbecue
interaction: Available to help and advice.
house_rules: Que preservem o que encontram

host.host_about: Portuense de gema com Matosinhos no coração, amante de desporto (em especial surf), de cinema, pessoas e viagens.

reviews.comments: El anfitrión muy atento antes de llegar, y después de marcharos, en fin muy amable y muy servicial

La casa es una auténtica pasada. Una preciosidad.
Las habitaciones súper amplias. Todo muy limpio, nuevo y moderno.
Muy cerca de la playa y buen conectado en metro o bus con el centro de Oporto.
A Andre no lo conocí en persona, pero estuvo en todo momento en contacto conmigo recomendándome cosas.
Tiene una habitación en la tercera planta-ático llena de juguetes de niños....los míos se lo pasaron en grande!!
Yo ya estoy pensando que si volvemos otra vez nos quedaremos otra vez en la casa de Andre!!!
Great stay in the Matosinhos area of Porto. André is a very nice host and his house is frankly awsome !

We spent one week in April 2017 in André's house : 3 adults, 2 young childrens.
Everybody enjoyed the house. Everything was perfect : the kitchen, the bedrooms (one with bathroom = suite), the kids playroom on last floor, the garden ! The agencement of this house is a success !
Besides, the house is very close from the beach (5 min by walk) and from any commodations you need during your holidays. For example, a supermarket is located less than 200m from the house.
To be noticed : You can also rent this house without renting a car : metro and bus station are close too. You can reach Porto city center easily with metro.
It's  definitely a perfect house if you want to do in the same day : surfing, chill and shopping.
Then, André was very convenient before our coming, trying to do his best to help us. The welcoming was really warmful.
For sure, we recommend André's house.
Casa bastante bem localizada com decoração moderna e muito agradável. O André foi bastante prestável para todas as situações. Sem dúvida que recomendo esta casa.

Andre house is perfectly placed for exploring Matosinhos and Porto. In an historically interesting quarter which each day revealed a new delight. The flat is comfortable and well laid out and we loved staying there.

André's place is even more beautiful than the pictures. It has a modern, clean, yet cozy feeling to it. We had our 2 year old with us and he loved the playroom on the 3rd floor. In fact, he never wanted to leave. He also enjoyed the many toys that were in his bedroom. If you have a toddler-elementary age child, I can say with confidence that they would love to stay here. Keep in mind there are 3 floors so there are a good bit of stairs but that did not bother us and our kid learned not to climb them without us. The place also has a great little backyard. We got to enjoy it on the last day and it was nice to sit out there with coffee and pastries and enjoy the breeze. It is about a 7-8 minute walk to the beach and the closest beach area is the widest part in Praia de Matosinhos and has the most cafes. Downtown Porto is about a 15 minute uber ride which was very convenient. Overall, we really loved the place and if we were to come back we would most definitely choose André's house again.

La maison d'André est très agréable à vivre proche de toutes commodités... un vrai plaisir d'y séjourner.... nous étions 2 adultes 1 enfant Et 1 bebe de 6 mois et nous revenons enchanté de se séjour et nous vous recommandons vivement la maison d'André...
The house is a great place to stay. Andre is the perfect host, easy and quick  to communicate with. Everything was even better as expected.

Our stay at André's house was really good. It's an ideal place for families, the kids really enjoyed their stay. 
The area is not very touristic so makes it nicely quiet and interesting and has lots of amenities like its proximity to the beach. It's also well connected with the city centre and the airport. 
André has been always very helpful and easy to communicate with him. 
Highly recommended!

The house is just fantastic, a classic Matosinhos House with a full recent and quite modern update . Andre is an excellent guest , always available. We will repeat if we came back to Porto. La  casa es fantástica. Una casa tradicional de Matosinhos con una reforma reciente y muy actual. Andre nos trato fantásticamente , si volvemos a Oporto repetiremos! 

Everything was new and clean,

A estancia na casa de André foi estupenda. Ben ubicada (preto de supermercados, restaurantes, metro, praia etc) e moi estilosa; disfrutas do fogar que é. Ampla, perfecta para familias con nenos pequenos dispón de todo o preciso e en cantidade, incluso un amplo ático luminoso cheo de xoguetes. André foi moi atento respondendo a todas as nosas dúbidas e preocupouse porque estivesemos agusto; sen dúbida, conseguiuno. Obrigada André! Sempre serás benvido na Galiza,na nosa casa de Laxe.

O imóvel sito no centro de Matosinhos é excelente. A casa é muito bem localizada e muito confortável. O logradouro é muito giro e a decoração da casa é muito prática e bastante aprazível e, adicionalmente, dispõe de garagem. A cozinha estava equipada com tudo o que é necessário. O André é um excelente anfitrião, sempre simpático e muito disponível. Recomendo vivamente o imóvel, que proporcionou uma óptima estadia.
Je recommande cet hôte à 100%... lieux idéal et très propre.   Proche de tout et logement impeccable... très bien et spacieux même pour 4.

Great house well located in Matosinhos. The garden and « game » room is a paradise for kids.
I would definitely recommend !

We’ve spent very nice time at Andre’s place, our children loved it! The house is big, very clean, cosy, well equipped. The garden is also very well kept. Andre is a great host. It was a pleasure to visit that place.

name: HOME AWAY HOME
summary: Mekanım şuraya yakın:  Ortak kullanım alanı olan teras, eski İstanbul ve Haliç manzarası ile çevrilidir. Starbucks Coffee,  Tünel Square, Metro, Galata Tower. Benim mekanımı şu yüzden seveceksiniz: rahat yatak, ışık, semt, ortak kullanım için teras. Yerim çiftler, yalnız maceralar, kurumsal seyahate çıkanlar ve aileler (çocuklu) için uygundur.
