name: Downtown Montreal Fully furnished apartment WIFI
summary: - Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator, air conditioning , heating, hot water and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Université de Montréal, Lassale College, HEC, UQAM, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand
space: This wonderful and spacious appartement is located in the best area of downtown Montreal. It is fully equipped and has a modern look since it has been decorated with the latest trends. This apartment contains everything that you need like, kitchen amenities, hair dryer, towels, clean bed sheets etc. You will also have access to a laundry room (don’t forget to bring some change). You will also have access to a high speed WIFI internet connection.
description: - Fully furnished apartment in the heart of downtown Montreal - WIFI (high speed internet), stove, refrigerator, air conditioning , heating, hot water and necessary furniture are included - Near Concordia University, Mcgill University, Université de Montréal, Lassale College, HEC, UQAM, Metro Guy Concordia, hospitals & restaurant  - Indoor parking available on demand This wonderful and spacious appartement is located in the best area of downtown Montreal. It is fully equipped and has a modern look since it has been decorated with the latest trends. This apartment contains everything that you need like, kitchen amenities, hair dryer, towels, clean bed sheets etc. You will also have access to a laundry room (don’t forget to bring some change). You will also have access to a high speed WIFI internet connection. I usually am on the premises to welcome you. If not, somebody from our team will give you a warm welcome and show you all the amenities of your apartment. We will answer any questi
neighborhood_overview: The appartement is located downtown near the arts district. The apartment is 5 minutes away, by walk,  from the ‘’beaux-arts’’ museum, best restaurants and bars, nightclubs, shopping centers,etc.  Activities -Old Montreal (Restaurants, Bars, Fireworks, Science museum)  -Jacques-Cartier’s place (entertainment) -‘’Quartier des spectacles’’ (festivals, outdoor shows) -Sainte-Catherine street (Shopping) -Crescent street (Pubs) -Notre-Dame West street (Atwater Market, Lachine Canal) -Saint-Helene’s Island (Grand-prix race track, La Ronde, beach, casino, outdoor music festival during the summer) -Olympic stadium area (Saputo stadium, Biodome, planetarium)
notes: Rules - Non smoking - No animals are permitted - Party`s are not allowed
transit: There are a lot of options near the apartment like the Guy-concordia’s metro which is 5 minutes away and bus stops that are right in front of the building.
interaction: I usually am on the premises to welcome you. If not, somebody from our team will give you a warm welcome and show you all the amenities of your apartment. We will answer any questions you may have about the neighbourhood as well

reviews.comments: I stayed here for 3.5 months and had a great experience! It had all the necessities and was very comfortable. Great location!

Muito bem localizado, ônibus 165 na porta do edifício, 5 min a pé do metrô Guy Concordia (linha verde), apartamento bem limpo e organizado, cozinha pequena, mas, equipada. Aquecimento muito bom e internet rápida. Um pequeno defeito é que não tem TV.
Samuel responde aos e-mails muito rápido, podendo auxiliar no que for necessário!
Recomendo.

I stayed in downtown apartment for more than a month and It was nice. Apartment is really huge and gets sunny. Best part is its away from street so no dust and traffic noise. Things which bothered me was smoke smell, noisy neighbors at times.

Very good apartment! Studio very well located, close to metro and Sant Catherine avenue! Samuel always answered my messages and always helped quickly! I recommend this apartment as it is very close to everything and very well equipped
Friendly host. Good location, however it could be cleaner.
Logement en plein centre-ville. Tout équipé et spacieux. Samuel répond vraiment très très vite, séjour très apprécié! Merci
Great responsiveness and perfect for a long stay!
This place is in a great location , very close to the main downtown offices, about 1 km walk to Bell centre etc..
Logement très bien situé.

name: Waikiki Studio (Two blocks from the Waikiki beach)
summary: Aloha ! This is a small studio but has ALL you need, Simmons queen bed and fast WiFi.  Our studio is good for 2 adults .  2 blocks walk to Waikiki beach, restaurants and shops .  The rate are already including 15% tax . Sorry, no parking available for this unit.
space: My place is close to nightlife, public transport, and parks. You’ll love my place because of the coziness and the location. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. *Note: The picture you see is a web bar ,not a kitchen.*

house_rules: -Check-in 3pm -Check-out 11am -Please no last minute late checkout notice - No pets allowed - No events, parties or large gatherings - Please respect the privacy of other guests in building, quiet time between 10 pm to 8 am) -No smoking inside and outside of the courtyard

host.host_about: Hey I'm Kai

reviews.comments: Kai's place is exactly as its shown in the pictures. Great location, you can do an afternoon walk along Ala Wai Canal, friendly neighbors, walking distance to Waikiki Beach. Not easy for parking if you are considering renting a car, closest is the Zoo parking. Kai is very responsive and allowed me to check out late. Will be back!

This place was great. location was perfect. walking distance to the beach and all that Waikiki has to offer, great restaurants nearby too (misubi cafe iyasume, marakume udon). the studio is tucked away in a gated residential alley that gives comfort and security. the studio itself offers everything you should need for a getaway in Oahu, name the amenity and I bet you this has it. also found out that the appliance next to the microwave is a dish dryer. The studio doesn't come with parking but I never had a issue with that. I was always able to find parking in the surrounding area or on ala wai blvd but be careful not to park there Mon and Fri morning learned that the hard way. If you don't like the hassle of looking for parking Honolulu zoo offers convenient parking at a dollar an hour and let's you add more time from your phone and is only a five minute walk from the studio. if youre staying for a week or longer I recommend the Waikiki banyan parking it's right across the street from the studio but be cautious if you have a tall vehicle you won't fit ( had a wrangler and didn't fit). I highly recommend for anyone wanting to stay in Waikiki to check this place out. only negative thing I have to say is lack of stove top for home cooking, but it won't be needed with all the onolicious food in the island.
Plenty of communication in advance. Detailed arrival info was very helpful. Room exactly as described.
Kai was an amazing host! Very responsive and accommodating.  The studio is perfectly setup, very comfortable and just a few minutes from the beach.  I hope to stay at the beach studio again!
Amazing place! 100% satisfied. I will try to stay here next time I come back if it is available.
Alles ging via email en sms. Foto van kamer klopt precies.

We had a lovely stay - apartment exactly as described - perfect location and space for exploring Waikiki area! Kai was a really good host - ensured we had all the information required to check ourselves in/out with ease and messaged during our stay to ensure everything was ok. We would definitely recommend Kai's condo!
Good location. It was very clean room. Kai send us very precise information. We were satisfied. Thank you.

Fantastic! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Kais place, it was so close to the beach, shops, public transport and restaurants. Kai made it very easy and stress free to get in and it is immaculately clean. We had issues with the wifi dropping out however Kai got on to it the second I mentioned it and arranged the password for the 5g wifi which worked perfect after! The only thing I could note is the place could do with a few more cutlery/kitchen items but it was not a major issue.
Check-in was a breeze. Everything was exactly as advertised. The host also provided us a parking space for our rental car.

very nice,clean, bed was very comfy,wi fi is good,the place is great for budget oreinted family,responds to question quickly,overall great experience and will recommend to others!

Mahalo!
Place was great! Kai had great communication before arrival. Place was clean andcloseto all the action. He even provided us with a parking space.

Kai's place was accurately described. It was well-put together, super clean, and located at a very safe and convenient spot in waikiki, 2 block from the beach. She is very quick to repond with very detailed instructions. She was very nice to let us stay for a few extra hours because our flight was late in the day. She also let us barrow her parking space which i guess happened to be available at the time. Overall, it was such a great and seamless experience, and I would definitely stay here again when I'm back in waikiki! Thanks Kai for everything :)
The place is great and is exactly as pictured. The location is perfect, about a ten minute walk to the beach.

My boyfriend and I stayed overnight only to have a closer drive to the airport in the morning. We ended up loving the space and location. You're only a short drive or even walk from everything downtown. We did have a rental car, so the parking situation was a little tough, but Kai even offered to let us park in her spot overnight. Cute little studio place that had everything we needed for the night!

We had a great stay at Kai's place in Waikiki. The location was perfect--we walked pretty much everywhere. The room had everything we needed--even soap and shampoo. The bed was very comfortable too. We would definitely stay here again!
Excellent communication, readily available. Location was convenient. Apartment was clean and well-equipped. Exactly as described.
Great place! Kai was very helpful and accommodating! Would definitely stay again

This is a perfect little studio apartment in a great location in Waikiki. 
Easy walking distance to the beach, bus stop and heaps of shops and food places. 
Kai was easy to contact and gave us clear instructions on how to get there ect. 
Everything was clean and tidy and exactly as described.
We really enjoyed our stay and would happily stay again.

This was a great little find! As described, it is central to the beach and shopping area yet removed just enough to also be quiet at any time of day. We found it easy to walk (10 min) to just about any where in Waikiki.

Had a great stay here at the beginning of our trip and then returned for a final 2 nights at the end before returning home. 
Really loved the place and I am so glad we came back at the end. 
The studio is perfect for a couple and the location is great. Easy walking distance to everything you need. 
The aircon is also a life saver in the Waikiki heat. 
Also enjoyed being able to do washing cheaply and easily while on holiday.

Kai from the time I booked this trip was in contact regarding my needs and expectations. This little studio felt like my home for the last 9 days and I was heartbroken to leave. Within walking distance to everything in Waikiki and the location to the rest of the island is prime as well. The room is nothing spectacular in itself so if you're going to Hawaii to watch tv then find somewhere else. But if you just need a place to sleep and take a shower this is the spot for you. The security gates left us two young girls feeling so safe and the neighbors who reside there were humbling and full of love welcoming us back soon. Thank you again Kai. We will be back. Thank you for sharing your amazing home.

The communication with Kai was fantastic. We unfortunately had to cancel our trip very last minute, but Kai was super uncomplicated - if we make it to Hawaii another day, we'll be sure to book again with them.

We had a  great experience at this location.  We were in walking distance of the entire Waikiki district, which made the beach, eating, shopping and catching the bus very easy.  The Bus was great.  We got to every place we wanted to see including the War in the Pacific museums from the bus stop on block from the apt.  The shower is made to accommodate  tiny people but we managed.  The neighborhood was quiet and safe.  Mahalo nui loa ia eo for sharing your studio with us.

Kai's place is truly a hidden gem, it is cozy and quiet. The neighbourhood is very safe and friendly.

Close enough within an arms length to the central bustling city life, but still quiet enough to retreat when wanted.

Ideal for those who plan for long day trips and come home to rest after a day in the sun.

Kai's place was great! You can't beat the location, it is central to everything Waikiki has to offer.  The place is small but has everything you need, including beach towels! I'd recommend Kai's place to anyone wanting to explore Honolulu!

Great location, very close to shopping, dining and Waikiki beach. Kai answered our texts within minutes and was very helpful and kind. The studio was just as it appears on Airbnb, clean and nicely decorated. The bed was very comfortable and the building was quiet and peaceful, just a couple of blocks away from the main street that has shopping and dining. Check in and check out was quick and easy.
 Laundry machines on site were also an added plus! Great place to stay!
This studio has everything we were looking for: no noises during the night, airconditioning and wifi worked good all the Time, great position, .... this is for sure the place to stay in Waikiki!!
This is an adorable studio, perfect for our needs, and very affordable. It was very clean and the host is friendly and easy to work with.
Kai was incredibly accommodating and the place worked out great!

Great little place to stay. The owner was very friendly and offered detailed instructions about the place. Would highly recommend for couples to stay here. Much better value than overpriced Waikiki hotels
Great location! Walking distance to Waikiki!

The room worth its price but has its drawbacks. It has a large fridge, I believe it is too large for the small room. When it is working, it is loud and disturbing, which shouldn't be a problem if it wouldn't be right in front of the bed. I would change it for a smaller and quieter one. The room gets really hot even in winter, but if you open the door, neighbors might walk in front of your bed, as the room is on the ground floor, next to the private coin laundry situated at the back of the building. It has an A/C unit, but it cannot substitute fresh air. Maybe a curtain on the door would solve that airing problem. You might need your own beach equipment, beach towels, chairs, etc. The kitchen equipment is very basic, there were only bowls, no plates for example. The unit has a combined microwave/oven, so even if you pack full your large fridge, you won't be able to cook too much. There were no sponge for dishwashing. But for its price, you will hardly find a better place in downtown Waikiki. Besides these things, we enjoyed our stay, and it is really close to everything. If you plan to spend your whole day visiting Waikiki and nearby places, and only return to the room for sleeping, it is going to be fine. It was clean, and Kai was really good at communication. Always answered to every messages in minutes. Wifi was fast enough. We didn't have a car for a long period, so we didn't have to hassle with parking, but it could be a problem, although as I have seen, in nearby streets there were usually few free places, so I believe you will find one spot eventually, in few minutes walking distance.

We had a wonderful stay at Kai's place. It was exactly as described and very central to everything. It's close to a bus stop, ABC stores, restaurants, and the main strip. Kai is a great host, he checked in on us and was very responsive to our questions during our stay. We definitely recommend his place to anyone looking for a cozy and clean stay that is within walking distance to the beach. Mahalo Kai!

Kai's place was great. Had everything we needed and in the perfect spot - close enough to walk comfortably to the main strip in Waikiki but far enough away from the noise and busyness of the main Street. Would definitely stay again!

Just finished a great stay at Kai's place.  Everything was as described and communication was top notch.  The place was exactly as pictured and had everything that we needed for out stay.  Location was great, just a short walk straight to Waikiki beach.  Will definitely be on a short list of places I would gladly stay at again.  Thanks again Kai!
Great location,  Kai's instructions were clear and easy to follow. Communication was easy. The room was really nice and cozy.
Had a great stay here at Kai's place. Easy check in, great location close to everything Waikiki has to offer. Easy to walk to beach, bus stop close. Area is quiet at night. Would highly recommend!

中心部から少し離れていますがﾊﾞｽを使えば直ぐに行ける範囲でした!ﾁｪｯｸｲﾝの時間をはやめていただいたり､ｺﾝﾀｸﾄも素早く返していただいてとても安心感がありました｡お部屋はﾀﾞﾌﾞﾙﾍﾞｯﾄが1つ真ん中にあり､あまり広くはありませんでしたがｶﾗﾌﾙで可愛く清潔感もあったので満足です｡
thank you so much!!

Our stay was wonderful. Kai went above and beyond making us feel welcomed and at home. We were provided beach towels and little provisionary items that made our stay that much better. The location was perfect. We were able to walk everywhere we needed without any problem, and Kai checked in with us frequently to make sure we had everything we needed. I will definitely rent from them again the next time we are in Hawaii.
Tiny place but very clean and has everything you need.   Easy walk to Waikiki beach area.   Kai was very responsive and helpful.
Kai's place was great!! He was very helpful and great communication. Place was perfect for 2 people and good budget option. Really cute decor as well!
Beautiful location. 5 min from Waikiki beach. The flat is small, but very well equipped. Kind of noisy sometimes because its situated next to the stairs.
The place is so nice and close to beach.

Kai's place was just perfect for my boyfriend & I! we loved staying there & it was easy for us to walk around & get to near by restaurants & local stores! Although we got to Honolulu late @ night & it was a little hard finding the alley to get to the studio, everything else was an A+! Definitely recommend kai's place (:
房間雖然小卻很乾淨,淋浴水壓充足熱水也夠熱,有微波爐可以熱點食物, 距離歪雞雞海灘步行約五分鐘, 附近也剛好有一個Pink Line trolley的下車點, ABC商店也很方便. 只是停車比較麻煩, 免費的河邊常找不到位置, 停動物園24收費制步行約10分鐘. 房東人很好溝通, 這次我們從大島轉機來, 房東還有貼心的提供我們洗衣球跟一些零錢呢~真是一次愉快的旅程

Nice place to stay. Great location close to public transport ( 1 block ) and Waikiki beach. Communication with Kai was very good and he was very helpful to host us last minute. Clear and precise instructions how to find the place. It's a bit noisy some times cause of its location but overall no complaints. The place is clean and with good facilities. Recommended stay!
Very clean and comfy studio. Bed was super comfortable. Great communication with Kai and we were given excellent instructions for easy access.

Ce fût un véritable plaisir que de loger dans ce petit studio, parfaitement correspondant à ce qui est annoncé. 
Proche de Waikiki Beach, dans un petit quartier résidentiel, c'est parfait pour quelques nuits. Tout ce dont les hôtes ont besoin est là, même des serviettes de plage. :-) 

Kai est disponible et répond rapidement, tout en restant à l'écoute de ses hôtes si besoin. Merci encore pour tout ! Nous sommes ravis d'avoir trouvé votre logement, et si de passage à Honolulu de nouveau, nous ne manquerons pas de revenir chez vous ! ;-) 

Aloha !

Highly recommend this place! Well kept, very clean and has all the amenities an adventurer would need. A wonderful place to stay after a great day exploring everything the area has to offer! Great price too!
Really enjoy my stay here, was the best value for money I could have hoped for.

Kai's place was my first experience on Airbnb and he was a great host.  I very much enjoyed my stay there and would like stay at his place again in the near future.  I appreciated his quick response time to my questions.  A really good experience.

My boyfriend and I had a wonderful stay at Kai's studio! It was the perfect size for the two of us and walking distance to popular spots in Waikiki. The studio was nicely furnished and decorated and very clean and comfortable. We will definitely consider staying here again during our next trip to Oahu. Mahalo Kai!
Perfect location. Not too close to the madness of Waikiki but not far at all. Very small but it was all we needed for an action-packed weekend.

Le studio est tres bien placé et proche de la page, des boutiques et des restaurants. Nous avons tout fait à pied. L'endroit est tres sécurisé et tres propre. Kai est présent et à l'écoute. C'était une belle expérience .

As listed ... tiny but perfect in what you need . Out the front door for a walk on the canal. Or a left at corner and three blocks to perfect beach. Restaurants ... bike rentals ... bus to downtown and Diamond Head just a few blocks away. Quiet at night and we cooked in many nights. ... microwave. Communication was A plus. Enjoy

Kai's place was perfect for a weekend stay for two in Waikiki. It's in a great location to walk to the beach, restaurants and shops, and even Diamond Head if you want a little extra hike. :) We had everything we needed here, including beach towels. Check in was very easy.
The boys enjoyed their stay very much. Had all the comforts of home. Only negative was there was no assigned parking and they had difficulties finding parking nearby.
Kai's place is great. It's very close walking distance to the beach and the main strip.

Such a cool little spot to stay! My friend and I stayed here for 5 nights. Gates and doors are keypad operated which we loved because we didn't have to stress about losing a key at the beach! Kai was awesome and let us check in early because our flight came in early. He responded to questions pretty much straight away. It's an easy walk to the shops and beach. We would love to come and stay here again!

Fantastic stay, thanks for having us!
A wonderful location- within walking distance of the beach but set a couple of blocks back from the busiest streets. The room was comfortable and clean and communication excellent.
Great place to stay, easy to find thanks to great instructions provided, clean and everything we needed
Small but a good value for its location. Very clean. Excellent communication.
Nice place for 1 or 2. Great location, short direct walk to beach. Coin washer and dryer in back of building. Quiet, off main path. Gated building, felt safe, comfy bed.

My wife and I took an extended stay at Kai's place- and it was everything you would want for a "local" style stay in Waikiki! The place is exactly as shown, clean and modern. Wifi was great and Netflix helped put us to sleep each night. The location was PRIME walking distance (8min walk) to the Waikiki Beach and shopping strip. With safety locks on the door we didn't have to worry about carrying around any keys, which is great! The size of the studio was perfect for two adults, and the laundry access really helped us out as far as how much to pack! We used under the bed for some extra storage as well! Kai was very attentive to us and any extra need we had. Communication was quick via text, and even when he did stop by the place (we asked for some soap for our laundry) he was very respectable about our privacy and space. Overall, the place is GREAT for a quick, or long stay for two adults!
Emplacement parfait pour se promener à Waikiki et malgré tout au calme.
Fantastic place in a great location!!
Good located, clean and very good / easy communication. Mahalo!
Kai's place was exactly as advertised, and the bed was super comfy. It's close to the beach and major bus routes, and you can walk to many of the attractions in Waikiki.
Great place. I would recommend parking at the Waikiki Banyon parking garage. $20 for 24hrs.

This small studio is perfect for a short break in Waikiki, it's a 5 minute walk back from the beach so nice and quiet, but super close to shops, restaurants and the beach itself. It's modern & clean with a very very comfy bed. Kai communicated well and was very helpful. Would recommend.
Fantastic and very cozy. Thank you so much!
The little spot works wonderfully for a single person or couple. Really close to all the Waikiki shops and restaurants. Get yourself a car to travel the island though! Easiest way to see it all.

Kai's space is really nice. It's clean, well-ordered, independent, nice location. If there is a oppurtunity to visit Ohau again, It will be glad to stay here one more time. Thank you for everything, Kai
Super central to everything, great locations. Kai was very available to get in contact with, and very responsive. I would stay here again.
Amazing little cozzy place in a great location. We loved it!!! Highly recomended.
Great studio, perfect location in Waikiki. Very clear instructions from Kai.

Walking distance to the beachfront and main street.  Parking is somewhat difficult, so we just parked several blocks away by the basketball court at the main intersection, 10 minute walk away.
Modern design.  Clean.  Everything we needed.  Had a kitchenette which helped us save on meals as we made breakfast.
I would stay again here if I came to Honolulu.

Awesome place, great location.  We were able to get in easy and hassle free with our quick trip of one day.  We also enjoyed walking down to the beach for the sunrise and breakfast.  Only note is if you have large car, you may want to park out on Main Street and walk up alley to unit...parking was a bit tight for our compact car, but great place.  Thanks so much for making our day in Honolulu fantastic!

Clean and cheerful studio. Great or solo or couple. Great communication with Kai. The studio is very conveniently located -- walking distance to beach, shopping and restaurants.  Just a note: you may want to change pickup location to a side street for ride-share drivers who seem to have a hard time stopping directly in front of the building.
Kai's place is a perfect place to spend a few days in Honolulu. Just enough size for a couple and everything you need. Good aircon, comfy bed, clean room, central location.
It was a great place to stay for a few nights! The location couldn't have been better and the room was small-but had the essential amenities! I would highly recommend for 1-2 people!

We enjoyed staying at Kai's cozy studio. The location is great. You can walk to the beach, major restaurants and shops. The room looked just like the photos. The bathroom was very cute and clean. I loved  hand shower as well. Only thing was that the shower was installed very high that I could not reach it, but if you are around 5' 4", you are just fine. Kai's check in instruction   was easy to understand. Thank you for letting us stay at your place.
Perfect location and super cute! Perfect for two people and far enough away from the Waikiki strip that it wasn't overwhelming! Easy communication and overall great experience!
Great Studio, we had a great time there.

The communication to Kai was fast and very friendly. I felt very comfortable and safe in the studio and the studio is stylish and great equipped. Much love in detail. The studio is very closed to waikiki beach, Restaurants and everything you need, but it was quiet during the day and at night. The recommendation for car parking places was very good.
I would recommend it without hesitation and would gladly come again.
Great place to stay, kai is very accommodating and her replies are instant.
Location and value! 2 blocks away from the beach and dining options! Shopping area is also close by. We can’t wait to return!! Kai is a wonderful host.

Kai’s place did not disappoint.  It was very clean and set up for efficiency. There were no surprises, we found the place to be just as advertised. Kai was even kind enough to let us park in his spot, which turned out to be key for us. I would definitely recommend Kai’s place.  Side note: the price is unbeatable and the bed was one of the most comfortable beds I have ever stayed in while on vacation.
Perfect location and amenities, very close to Waikiki beach and lots of restaurants. Communication with Kai was quick and easy, will definitely stay again in the future if we get the chance!
Everything was smooth and the place was nice and cozy! He offered a stroller rental and it actually saved our life! We really appreciate his hospitality.

Très Cosy, très propre. Cuisine très minimaliste,ne pas penser à faire la cuisine. Céréales le matin seulement, pas de grille-pain,mais petite cafetière et mini-frigo. C’est plus une chambre d’hôtel qu’un studio. Emplacement bien situé, près de la plage et arrêt de bus. Le fait de ne pas avoir de stationnement nous limite un peu dans notre liberté d’explorer l’ile à notre guise. À 10 minutes de la plage de Waikiki et des magasins. On aurait apprécié avoir un parasol et des chaises de plage à notre disposition comme dans les autres îles, la location de ces articles coûtent 50 USD /jour! J’en ai fait la suggestion au propriétaire . Bref séjour agréable malgré que Honolulu n’a pas le charme des îles voisines!
Great Location!!

This is a small studio that was perfect for my husband and I. It was clean with all the essentials that we needed. Kai was great at communicating with me and gave clear directions to the unit. As clearly stated, there is no parking near the premises, but we were able to park a few blocks away at the Waikiki Banyan Hotel for a reasonable price. It was a short walk to the unit. We had a good stay and highly recommend this place.

I really enjoyed my stay at Kai’s place. It was an easy walk to the beach, dining and shopping.  

The studio was very clean and had all the necessities I could have needed.  There was even water in the fridge and coffee for the guest!  

I would definitely recommend Kai’s place for solo travelers or couples.  I ended up meeting him in the driveway and he was a very nice guy!

Thanks Kai!
Our stay at Kai's place was awesome. We had everthing we need and what we could wish for. Kai is such a great host, if we had question he would answer it right the way. We had such a great time
Excellent location, small studio but clean, cozy and well organized. It has everything two people might need. Highly recommended!

Great place to say for couples, everything we needed seeing as we were only there to sleep because we had so much to do during the day. Lovely little space, nice air con to come back to, wifi, bathroom was good and bed was sooo comfortable. Would love to stay here again.

Kai’s place is amazing and Kai is even more amazing! My husband and I decided to rent a car at the airport and Kai offered a parking spot for us when we had difficulty finding a spot! The location is great (close to Waikiki Beach and lots of food options) and quiet. The bed is incredibly comfortable! I absolutely recommend Kai!
This is the perfect place to stay. Much nicer than a hotel with personal decor touches. Checking in was super easy. The location is great and I highly recommend it.
My top stay on airbnb :)
Great location!

100% recommendation! Perfect located in Waikiki. Only few minutes walk to the beach and bars. Calm location in the backstreet. Easy check-in and -out. Perfect for short stay in Waikiki! The kitchen is very well equiped for such a small apartment!

Perfect place right by the beach& pub transport/eateries. Kai was efficient with replying to messages & he let us check in super early as we had a morning flight. Comfy space fit for a couple or small family of 3! we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely recommend kais place to family members. Has all the amenities one could possibly need! Cheap washing machine and dryers are available as Well  which was really handy! Child friendly space that looks just like in the pics. You won't be disappointed! highly recommend booking with kai! he's lovely to deal with and was available whenever we needed help with anything. thanks again!

Great for a couples stay. Not too much space but it has everything you will need to feel at home. Very great area if you love the beaches, club, restaurants and zoo, all in walking distance of 5 - 10 minutes. The only down side was the parking. Other then that it was a great stay.
Close to everything we needed and great location. Very quiet and would stay there again

Kai’s studio is super central in Waikiki - close to the beach and any part of the tourist areas. Studio is small and cozy, but perfect for a weekend. Super clean too. Kai was great to communicate with and very responsive. I’d stay again!

Kai is a true professional host.  He sends pictures of the Airbnb with photo shopped codes and instructions which describes the self-check in process and self luggage storage really well.  He responds to most questions on Airbnb within minutes and answered the phone immediately when we thought we were locked out.  The place was clean and suited our needs for our week long vacation.  We also appreciated the fact that we had unexpected access to a compact parking spot (which we only used for 1 night).  The place is super convenient to bus stops, restaurants, car rentals and the beach.  I would highly recommend Kai's place if you want to stay at Waikiki!

Kai was wonderful to deal with. Helpful and considerate. Quick responding to messaging. Location was perfect, very close to Diamond Head, Waikiki Beach, bus stops and all that Honolulu has to offer. Kai had the air con on for our arrival which was very considerate. I would highly recommend staying here as nothing seemed like too much trouble for Kai, especially allowing us to check in 3 hours early after a lengthy flight. Kai offers clear directions and photos to help you in locating his property and entering though securely locked gates. We felt very safe day and night walking to and from. I will definitely stay again and would recommend this property! 10/10
Great value and extremely easy check-in and check-out. Thank you, Kai!

This was our second stay at Kai’s. Perfect quiet location amongst friendly residents within the apartment block. Kai was always helpful and very quick to respond.  We were able to check in early on both occasions, which is great especially after long flights. Keyless entry was super handy especially when we went swimming at the beach as we only had to take a towel and not worry about something happening to the room key whilst we swam. I highly recommend this property and will stay here again on my next holiday to Waikiki, Hawaii.

Kai was super commutative and informative and his place rocks! Very near to the bus stop and shops in Waikiki. Bed super comfy and I love that there’s a washer and dryer out back as well. Will stay here again.
It is really easy to navigate the check-in.  The space was chill.
Kai was very responsive and clear with direction which made the best of our trip.  The location was great and the though it was small, it was perfect for the 2 of us.  Thanks so much Kai!

Kai’s place was amazing. I wish we could have extended our Hawaii and stayed at his studio. It is a close drive to the beach and walking distance to the restaurants. The room itself is amazing, neat, and stylish. I would love to come back to his place!
Great place!

Great place to stay. Small but very comfortable! We knew we wouldn’t be in the studio apartment much so we didn’t need the space. However, when we were there it felt homey. Kai includes a few dishes and utensils which were helpful as we made breakfast in the microwave. Very clean and nicely decorated. Kai responds very quickly to questions.
Great location, close to everything in Wakiki. Would stay here again!
Kai's place was as advertised, great location, a bit small for a couple, but had all the amenities needed for a comfortable stay.  Thanks Kai!
This stylish AirBnB is less than 10 min walk to Waikiki Beach. It was sparkling clean. The host was very responsive. I would highly recommend staying here!
100% would recommend staying here! Perfect location! Absolutely perfect little apartment! I will be staying in the future again!

We had a great time at Kai’s place. It is small but comfy, enough for two people. Everything was nice and clean, we had extra towels, even beach towels. 
The place is very central and close to the beach, easy access to all the shop and beaches.
Thank you Kai for this awesome stay in your apartment
Great location! Thanks, Kai!!
Super easy and great location. Super comfy!

Nice place to stay in the heart of Waikiki! I recommend trying to find a free parking spot along the canal across the street. Kai's space was clean, comfortable and updated. Lovely bathroom with a really cool sliding barn door. The location makes it easy to walk downtown for dinner/shopping, or a short Uber drive. Would recommend this spot to a friend!

Kai did a great job responding right away to any questions that we had. The apartment was clean and within walking distance to a lot of stores and resturants and only a couple of blocks from the beach.
This place is great and very conveniently located to everything! Kai is always quick to respond if you ever have any questions or problems.

Kai’s cozy little studio was our first ever experience using AIRBNB and he has really set the bar high. Kai was responsive to all our requests/ messages and phone calls and we really felt safe and supported during our whole stay. Place was clean, cozy and located in such a fantastic area. I travelled with my best friend and being two girls I felt really safe in the location, walking about late at night. Will definitely stay at Kai’s place again if I visit Hawaii. 5 STARS!

Perfect little studio for a quick business trip to Honolulu! It’s right off a main boulevard and very accessible to major roadways and running trails. Kai was outstandingly attentive to my arrival details and amenity needs - 10/10 for the host, 8/10 for the location. Very touristy area, but you can easily break away to Diamondhead for the good haunts. Best sushi I’ve ever had is walking distance from the apartment, though! So that was a plus :) This is not a spacious place by any means but if you’re planning to bump around town instead of lounging at your crash pad then I would absolutely recommend Kai’s spot. Many Mahalos!
The space was as advertised and perfect for our needs. You can’t beat the price for the location!

This was my very first Airbnb and to be honest, I was quite leary simply because I am used to major hotels, etc. however I am very happy that this was my first Airbnb experience. Kai was very easy to get in contact with from beginning to end. His place is perfect for a couple looking to be VERY close within Waikiki, but not quite in the dead center. He offered us a parking spot for free, which made it stress-free to have to find parking.

The room itself was very clean and organized.  I felt like I was at home and every amenity worked just fine. The area is nice and quiet at night and traffic is very light in the area. I have been to Hawaii many times before and I am thrilled I found this amazing room for an amazing rate during this my visit. Thank you Kai!!!

Had a fantastic stay here. Made my stay in Waikiki stress free and enjoyable. Arrived to a spotless and beautifully furnished studio. So close to the beach and great amenities. Laundry facilities available for a small price which was much needed after one month of travel. Communication with Kai was flawless. Would happily book here again when I return to Waikiki. Mahalo, Kai!

This was a great place! Really good location - walking distance to shopping, restaurant, and beach, and easy bus ride or drive to things like Diamond Head. The air conditioning was GREAT! Very clean, host was super responsive and helpful. The email I got with step by step picture directions of how to get in was perfect. It is small, as advertised, so don’t try to get more people in there. For one or two people, it’s fantastic. Not a lot of space to hang out, but you don’t go to Hawaii to hang out in your room! For a small space, it had absolutely everything you need. I would stay there again and highly recommend it!

This place was great. Small but cozy. It was within a reasonable walking distance to the beach, hotel pickup points for tours, many restaurants (Hula Dog) and other attractions. The hosts were very quick to respond to questions or concerns. The host even left change and soap for the washing machines. We loved staying here and will consider staying again if we return to Hawaii.

Great place to stay in a super convenient location. Everything was as advertised. Free parking nearby or a parking garage down the block is also an option. Great communication by Kai with detailed access instructions.

Kai's place was perfect! It was exactly what we needed for our brief stay on Oahu. It was incredibly well located - we walked everywhere we wanted to go, from Diamondhead to the Honolulu Zoo, to every meal and outing in between. Not to mention Kai was an incredibly helpful and communicative host - the check-in instructions were crystal clear and made getting into the studio a breeze. We loved it here!

Central location - Waikiki is walking distance but far enough for peace and quiet! Small space but has everything you need - Kai even provides beach towels and umbrellas. Parking is also available - stall is a bit tricky to get out of but not impossible. Communication is excellent and he is quick to address any issues. Excellent host!
Place is small but is perfect for a spot to recoup from days of touristing around. It's a couple minutes walk to central waikiki, so handy to everything.
Excellent accommodation. Everything was as advertised. Seamless check in and check out

A cute space for 2 people with all the necessities you need to feel at ease. Easy access to Waikiki beach- 5 min walk. Make use of local buses- literally take you everywhere. Also use small groceries for more reasonable prices. Must check out Mac 24/7 for a great breakfast in Hilton hotel- 3 min walk. Cindy the neighbour always willing to advise you on anything local with her lovely dog Frankie. We hope to return someday soon.

Kai’s apartment is very well situed : only few blocks from the sea, from ABC store, from everything. It was very clean, and practical !
If you need to spend few days in town, come here !
Kais place worked out great. Very close to beach and shops. Would use again.
Excellent service and great host.

kai's place is small, as pictured, but it has everything you would need and more. his attention to detail is amazing - the layout, no shortage of hooks in the bathroom, ample towels, umbrellas for rainy days, beach towels, shelves and space for storage etc - we were impressed! communication is prompt and detailed and location is ideal for those looking to relax and have fun in waikiki beach area. i would highly recommend kai's compact place. mahalo kai!

We had an amazing stay on Oahu. The location allowed us to walk to TheBus (bus stop was 2 blocks away), KCC Farmer's Market (go hungry!), Diamond Head (about 5 miles round trip including the hike around the monument), and Waikiki Beach for Sunset and swimming! The space was comfortable, well designed and thought out, and had everything we needed from beach towels to coffee to dish soap. We look forward to future stays!
Very nice space! Close to everything! Would definitely recommend staying here!

The place is small but with everything you need. It’s clean and very close to the Waikiki Beach and to the shops. 
We enjoyed it a lot.
Great place close to the beach but not too noisy, specific instructions to get there, clean, plenty of towels, super comfy bed. Small place but great for two people traveling together!
Great place, especially the location! Only 5 minutes from the ocean and close to heart of downtown.
Had a lovely time at this place, would recommend it to anyone!
Kai's cute studio was just what we were looking for. She provided prompt answers to our questions and provided perfect instruction for our stay.
Great spot to spend a few days in Waikiki. Kai was great! would definitely stay again.
Nice place and very close to Waikiki! Easy communication with Kai any time! Recommended!
Well-kept condo walking distance from the beach and the tourist area.  The space is small, but enough for 1-2 people.  Clean with microwave, dishes, small fridge/freezer.

The appartement was way more than we had expected. Everything made our stay perfect...towels, Beach towels, soap, hair dryer, washing mashine, Hawaaien coffee ready...Waikiki Beach was just a walk away! Thank you so much for everything!!

My parents stayed for four days in Kai’s studio and they absolutely loved it! The location was great, check in was easy and the studio itself was clean. 

I highly recommend Kai’s studio for anyone staying in Waikiki. Kai was readily available for any questions and communicated ahead of time with all the needed information. 

I’m looking forward to booking my own trip and stay in Kai’s studio in the near future! Thank you again Kai  for making my parents anniversary special!

Kay’s studio is located in the heart of Waikiki, very short walking distance to the beach. Sparkling clean and comfortable, even though it is a small studio. We are already looking forward to our next stay at Kay’s studio.

Kai’s studio is a perfect spot for a solo traveler or couple. SO conveniently located but off the beaten path enough that you don’t feel you’re in the middle of all the commotion. Can’t recommend Kai enough as a host - great communicator. Will definitely come back!

This location is wonderful if you want to explore the beautiful Waikiki area. It is literally two blocks away from the beach and we were only back in the studio to sleep. Great recommendation for a vacation!

This was the perfect start to our honeymoon. The first thing we noticed and appreciated was having the AC already on and full blast so the room was nice and cool after having to travel in humidity (we’re from the PNW, so we aren’t used to Hawaiian humidity). The decor was super cute and it was nice to have netflix on the TV so we could binge watch our favorite shows while we unwinded from the day. It was nice and close to the beach, which was a huge plus. It was perfect for two people and was clean and easy to get to.
Great location, great place, great price. Perfect for a solo traveler.

This was such a great space. It had everything we needed, was very clean, and it was within walking distance of the beach and other activities/restaurants. Highly recommended. You wont get this nice of a space and location at this price.
great little space for our one night layover in Honolulu. fit our needs perfectly. we got in early and Kai let use check-in at 8am instead of 3pm which was a lifesaver after a long 10hr flight.

Das Studio war perfekt für uns und die fünf Tage, die wir in Honolulu verbracht haben. In wenigen Minuten direkt am Waikiki Beach und mitten im Rummel. Hat gepasst. Auch die superschnelle Kommunikation u d Hilfsbereitschaft von Kai war einfach klasse... können wir nur weiterempfehlen.

Kai’s place is within walking distance to Waikiki.  The unit is as described, cutely decorated and cozy.  I appreciated Kai’s communication (always a plus for me) and easy instructions (provided written and photos) to his place.
nice place to stay on a budget
Fantastic little studio, walking distance to everything you need in Waikiki. Good facilities. Kai was an excellent host and informed me promptly of anything I needed to know. Well recommended!
Cute little studio with mini fridge, tv, comfy bed, and a beach near by! What more could you ask for? And Kai was great responding quickly with any questions!
Excellent location, clean and comfortable space and helpful communication with host. Recommend it!

Very nice accommodation! Kai was super prompt on responses, and was really good at giving us all details. 
This accommodation was at a perfect location and was close to everything.
Only thing I wish can be different is that the bed was a little uncomfortable, which caused my husband to get a back ache. 
Overall I would definitely go back here!

Kai's place is in a fantastic location within walking distance of all that Waikiki has to offer (near the Hilton Waikiki so convenient for transport - trolley and bus). The studio is perfect for a couple or single(s) travellers.  Bed is super comfy and the air con works well to keep out the heat. Kai is very responsive and provided options to store our luggage since we arrived early. Highly recommend Kai's studio.

Place is very small but fine if you are just there to sleep. Area is a bit farther from the beach then we would have liked and the place is in an alleyway so in the dark it was a bit scary to walk back to at night but overall the place was fine if you were just there to sleep.
Kai was a great host and he provided us with whatever we needed. Also, he is very responsive.
Super endroit pour séjourner à Waikiki ! Proche de tous les emplacements, on peut tout faire à pied. Studio très bien agencé et très bien équipé. Je recommande fortement !

We had a great stay at Kai’s place. The location was great, walking distance to all of Waikiki Beach. Kai provided super helpful check in instructions and made sure we got in easily. The place was small, and left a little to be desired in terms of aesthetic and comfort. But it was very clean and overall a good value for the location. Thank you!

This place was just great for a couple! The location was incredibly convenient: 7 minutes to Waikiki beach, 2 minutes to the closest grocery store and 3 minutes to a bike rental place! Kai’s apartment has everything you’ll need and plenty of towels (thanks so much for that!)! We would happily stay here again and highly recommend it! Thank you Kai:)

We found Kai to be very responsive and thorough in his communication. The place was very clean and cozy. Perfect for 1 or 2 people.  We appreciated the extra amenities like beach towels,  shampoo, blow dryer and coffee.  It is in a decent location with easy walking access to Waikiki shopping, restaurants and the beach. We would definitely stay again.

Kai's place is cute and quaint and is just enough for two. The area is not noisy, neighbors were super friendly and we had just what we needed. It's hotspot for food and shopping and everything you need is pretty much in walking distance. Love this stay and definitely recommend! Kai was also a great host and had a very quick response time.

This was the perfect home base for exploring Waikiki and the surrounding areas in Honolulu. The location was close to all of the excitement, but quiet and peaceful. Maybe it was a combination of travel exhaustion and a lingering cold, but the bed was so comfortable and i had the *best* sleep during our stay. It was a wonderful first experience in Hawaii.
Great place! Clean and comfortable. Close to all of the action in Waikiki. Kai was a great host.

I don't think we could have found a better place for the cost.  Sure there is no view, but the place is walking distance to Waikiki beach!  And I am not talking about a hike, I am talking about a flip-flop walk away.
Kai was over the top responsive to all of our needs.  Extremely welcoming, and you felt "aloha" the minute you got there.  Judge for yourself how many can stay here, it was just my wife and I. I could imagine taking two young kids with us, but not more than that.
The studio had every detail one would need for a trip. I particularly loved the fact that there were power outlets EVERYWHERE!  No need to share an outlet, or have to plug your phone on the other side of the room.
A/C worked great (we were there in January, so we actually turned it off most of the time).  Furniture is small (which is GOOD) so as to not take up too much space.
The neighborhood is nice and the walk to the beach is short and easy.
Ride sharing is everywhere and convenient, no need to rent a car here.
Kai's instructions are VERY clear, don't get overwhelmed with the amount of information, he just wants you to know all the details.
While there, we had a power outage (an idiot probably had too much to drink and ran into a pole), I contacted Kai, and he had contacted the power company and got back to me within minutes with an estimated wait time!  I can't get that kind of service at home!!!
Kai, you are TRULY a great host.  Mahalo, mahalo... MAHALO!!!
Perfect place and location.  Close to everything.  Place was super clean and had everything one needed.  Would stay here again.
Quaint little room close to the hustle and bustle of Waikiki. Would definitely recommend this place for a single person or a couple looking to do Waikiki without doing the big hotel experience

Awesome place to say right near downtown Waikiki! Getting to the beach only took about 2-5 minutes. The pictures are very accurate and the space was perfect for a few nights for my significant other and I. Thanks Kai!
친절하고 빠른 호스트입니다. 방은 작고 깨끗하진 않지만 위치나 전반적인 것을 고려할 때 만족합니다.

We had a great time in Waikiki and Kais place definitely helped with that. Cozy, but everything you need and a few extras we didn't expect which was great! Excellent communication and was flexible with our travel arrangements which was a great help. Would happily recommend to anyone!
谢谢让我们提前进入房子,让我们下了飞机还有很多游玩的时间!房子的位置非常清净,能让我们很好的休息,同时方便出行,是游玩威基基很好的位置!推荐给俩人同行的游客!
Cozy studio within walking distance of Waikiki.  Perfect for our short stay, we were able to walk to the beaches, restaurants, and fireworks at Waikiki and up to Diamond Head (two-mile walk).
Nice studio in a great location. I definitely enjoyed my stay.

name: LUXURY SOHO 2 Bedroom Apt
summary: Ideal location!  Spacious and tastefully decorated In the heart of Nolita. Near great restaurants and shops.  Steps away from Soho--NYC's most popular spot for shopping, dining and sightseeing. Close to all subways.
space: I am looking to rent my luxurious and spacious (1000sq. feet), two bedroom apartment in Nolita, a very high-end and luxurious neighborhood in New York City, steps away from Soho.  The area is one of New York's most desirable locations and is filled with shops, restaurants, art galleries and museums.  It is in walking distance of Little Italy, Chinatown, Greenwich Village and The Lower East Side. It is also close to many subways and a short taxi ride way to Times Square and Central Park.   The apartment is beautifully decorated and newly renovated. It also has wireless internet connection, a 47" Plasma HDTV with cable, exposed brick, wood floors, skylights, etc., along with a beautiful outdoor garden area. It is also equipped with every amenity one could need in the kitchen and/or home. Its really a find for the city and is just a beautiful place.  Please let me know if you are interested and would like to learn more. Cheers!
description: Ideal location!  Spacious and tastefully decorated In the heart of Nolita. Near great restaurants and shops.  Steps away from Soho--NYC's most popular spot for shopping, dining and sightseeing. Close to all subways. I am looking to rent my luxurious and spacious (1000sq. feet), two bedroom apartment in Nolita, a very high-end and luxurious neighborhood in New York City, steps away from Soho.  The area is one of New York's most desirable locations and is filled with shops, restaurants, art galleries and museums.  It is in walking distance of Little Italy, Chinatown, Greenwich Village and The Lower East Side. It is also close to many subways and a short taxi ride way to Times Square and Central Park.   The apartment is beautifully decorated and newly renovated. It also has wireless internet connection, a 47" Plasma HDTV with cable, exposed brick, wood floors, skylights, etc., along with a beautiful outdoor garden area. It is also equipped with every amenity one could need in the kitchen

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: President at a music company.  Young, professional, clean, fun.

reviews.comments: Allison was organized, responsive and a wonderful host. Her apartment is in a fabulous neighborhood steps away from great restaurants and boutiques so we were never at a loss for people-watching opportunities. Stay here and you'll really feel like you're in the heart of the city. A great experience.
The reservation was canceled 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Allison was very helpful and her apartment was lovely. It was also extremely clean when we arrived. It is right in the heart of things so there is lots of shopping, eating and drinking to be done right outside the door. The only slight issue is that it can be very noisy at night-time because of the location. I didn't find it a problem, but if you are a light sleeper it is something to think about.

Completely positive experience. This is a very good apt in a great neighborhood. It was clean, spacious and very comfortable for 4 adults. Allison was helpful and accommodating. I only wish our visit had more time for exploring the neighborhood!  I will stay here again.
The Apt was great - comfortable, clean, with all the amenities we needed.  Allison was extremely responsive and helped ensure we had a great stay!
Nice apartments, charming owner Allison! A lot of shops and restaurants around.

We arrived at Allison's apartment at 10pm where she was good enough to have arranged keys to be picked up at an amazing cafe across the road. 

I was travelling with my partner and another couple and were sold on the apartment before even walking in. The location is perfect. In the heart of soho and walking distance to everything. From east village to Katz's deli, to shopping on broadway, everything is around the corner. If you're game you can even walk to Central Park and 5th avenue! (Just make sure you wear comfortable shoes!!)

Great sized apartment for the area. Plenty of space to stay in and chill if you need a night to relax. 

Thanks Allison on a great stay!

The neighborhood is the best. The apartment was comfortably and clean.  It had a great vibe. Allison was easy to contact and responded quickly to all questions. I recommend to anyone looking to stay in SoHo.  It is a 4th floor walk up which we didn't mind at all.   The interior of the apartment is open and airy. The kitchen had all the essentials. I liked that there were a couple of full length mirrors to check your outfit before going out.  Closet space to unpack was great. We took some laundry to Brown Bag Laundry ( around the corner) for $1.25/lb they washed and folded our clothes the same day.  Used the WiFi, had a tv but didn't turn it on because there was too much to do out in the neighborhood. NYC was a really enjoyable part of our trip. You are lucky to get this place!  I highly recommend you stay here.

We had a great stay at Allisons apartment in Soho. Location is just perfect. In the middle of everything - shopping, subway, cafes, restaurants and a huge Whole Foods aroung the corner. The apartment was clean and comfortable - and we were glad for the AC when a heat wave struck. There is a bit of street noise but to be expected in NYC!  Allison touched based regularly via email and answered all questions promptly. Highly recommended if you are looking for a 'neigborhoody' apartment in the middle of the city. We felt like locals!

Had a great stay at Allison's apartment.  She was very helpful and communicative to ensure that arriving there and getting in was no problem.  Great apartment as well - two double beds and a large couch.  
Few minor downsides - the wireless internet was very temperamental and slow, and the apartment doesn't have an iron - but having said that there are loads of free wifi places around and a cheap same day laundry over the road.  
The area is fantastic - lots of bars, cafes and walk about places to people watch and drink beer or coffee.  This does mean that it gets noisy at night though - be aware that if you want a straight 10 hours sleep you aren't likely to get it - but then, that's why you should be happy to be in Nolita!
So - all in all would recommend the apartment and would be more than happy to head back there.

The apartment is in a great location.  We loved feeling like locals and having our own spaces to retreat to after a busy day in the city.  The apartment was clean and comfortable and perfect for the three of us.  Allison was very accomodating and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again.

We stayed in Allison's apt for three days in mid August and had a great time. The location is perfect for sightseeing, shopping, dining and entertainment, whether one prefers to walk or take the subway. Communication with Allison was at all times expedient and we got all the information needed in time. She even let us stay into the evening of our departure day ( night flight) for a small service in return (delivering and pick up of laundry in a shop around the corner), thanks, Allison!
It was nice to be in one of those smallish "old" buildings of southern Manhattan, in a well kept, neat apartment with comfortable beds. Due to its location in a prime dining & bar area one has to cope with a decent noise level during the nights (we were not surprised by that, though), but you cannot have it all ...
One has to get accustomed to the steep and narrow stairs, however ... we were fortunate to have two youngsters with us who offered to carry our suitcases up to the fourth floor ...; no problem without heavy luggage, of course.
Leaving the place on a friday evening 6 p.m. we should have been prepared for a longer taxi ride to JFK airport ... took some time to get a cab, and at least half an hour for the first 1/4 mile (75 min for the whole ride), so the 90 min we had considered plenty of time turned out to be narrow planning.
Good apartment and good location. Perfect for four people. Allison is very clear and quick, so thanks Allison cause we stay great in your house.

We came to NYC for a family wedding in Soho and Allison's apartment was perfect. This neighborhood was exactly where I wanted to be. You have everything you need and want within a 3 block radius. I loved having Allison's apartment as an oasis to return to after dealing with the crowds.
I liked the 4th floor walk up because it makes it quieter. I honestly hope Allison's apartment will be available for my next trip to NYC. I would definitely stay here again. We were 3 adults and two children, so Allison didn't mind that we childproofed the apartment for her. Of course, if you have babies, you have to be prepared to carry the pack n play & stroller up four floors.
Beautiful apartment. Allison was good about keeping in touch.

We had a great stay at Allison's apartment,  Loved the apt,
the décor, cozy beds, everything we needed! Great location in a great neighborhood.   Allison was very easy to call and text when we had questions and flexible with our arrival and departure.  My first experience with airbnb and will look forward to our next business trip to NY and hope to stay at Allison's NY apartment!

The apartment is in an awesome location! It's right across the street from the legendary Cafe Habana (try the corn), convenient to all the SOHO shopping, great restaurants and bars in the area, and also a few blocks from the Subway.  My friends and I couldn't have been happier with the location and atmosphere around us.  The living space accommodated four adults comfortably.  My next trip to NYC, I'm definitely looking trying to get the same place through Allison again.

Very nice place in a great location near Soho.  Roomy and clean, with all the essentials, and appropriate for up to two couples.  Alison was very responsive, though we didn't really need anything.  It is a 4th (top) floor walk-up and there is no elevator, but it wasn't an issue for us.  The rooms' windows face the street and there is typical street traffic, deliveries, etc. in the morning.  Nothing wrong with that if you're used to city apartments below 6 stories.

We visited while the temperature was very mild, and it was comfortable using just the overhead fans.

The neighborhood is really, really great - lots of places to eat and shop nearby, subway very close.

Overall recommended for a downtown experience.  Would rent again.

Underwhelmed! The apartment looks ok but it is a bit run down. The TV didn't work, there was no toaster and having a shower was a mission. We would get 1 minute of hot water followed by 15-20 minutes of freezing cold then hot again, so taking a shower was a half hour process. I also thought the apartment was dirty, the bath and shower curtain especially was disgusting and slimy, and there was a sticky stain next to the bed, yuk! Also the hosts' correspondence was prompt but her main concern was that we drop off and prepay for the laundry (as we agreed in advance) of the towels and bedding on our last day, as she made sure to remind us about 5 times. I wouldn't stay here again, I don't live in luxury but I'm so glad to be home.

name: Spacious Apartment + patio. Minutes to Manhattan.
summary: This rental is an entire 2 bedroom & 1 bathroom apartment that is located inside a boutique apartment building.  It is a fully legal short term residence. On a tree lined block, 5 minutes from the L train  (Manhattan in 20 min), sits this brand new, luxury garden apartment.    It is the entire 1st floor of a 3 story building.  It features a secluded garden area, washer and dryer, central AC, alarm system,  42" TV with Netflix, marble counters, stainless appliances, and comfortable furnishings.
space: This is a great apartment for short or extended stays.   It's a 2 bedroom, with one bedroom being flexible as a office.   The building has a landscaped back yard, rare in NYC, which is a awesome place to enjoy a drink or read a book.  In the neighborhood there are several bars, coffee shops and restaurants.  This part of Bushwick is the very up and coming, and is easy access to Williamsburg, Greenpoint, and all parts of Manhattan.   It's also a quick trip from both JFK and LGA.  Please reach out with any questions.
description: This rental is an entire 2 bedroom & 1 bathroom apartment that is located inside a boutique apartment building.  It is a fully legal short term residence. On a tree lined block, 5 minutes from the L train  (Manhattan in 20 min), sits this brand new, luxury garden apartment.    It is the entire 1st floor of a 3 story building.  It features a secluded garden area, washer and dryer, central AC, alarm system,  42" TV with Netflix, marble counters, stainless appliances, and comfortable furnishings. This is a great apartment for short or extended stays.   It's a 2 bedroom, with one bedroom being flexible as a office.   The building has a landscaped back yard, rare in NYC, which is a awesome place to enjoy a drink or read a book.  In the neighborhood there are several bars, coffee shops and restaurants.  This part of Bushwick is the very up and coming, and is easy access to Williamsburg, Greenpoint, and all parts of Manhattan.   It's also a quick trip from both JFK and LGA.  Please reach out
neighborhood_overview: The location in Bushwick is unbeatable.  There are many cafes, bars and restaurants.   Nowadays, a huge indoor/outdoor beer-garden, is a favorite in the neighborhood.   Or ride the L a few quick stops to explore Bushwick and Williamsburg.
notes: 1.We may ask you to verify the account by providing a photo of your government ID. 2. There are no security cameras inside the apartment. 3. There are security cameras located outside the front and rear of building. 4. Patio furnishings are made available seasonally and may be removed to prepare for bad weather.
transit: 5 minute walk to the L train at either Halsey Street or Wilson Ave. 13 minute walk to the J train at Halsey Street.   1 minute walk to bus service on Wilson Ave.  Street parking is easy to find in the neighborhood.  JFK airport is 20 minutes by car.  LGA airport is 30 minutes by car.  Uber and Lyft frequent the area.
access: New washer & dryer in basement, access through common hall of this 2-unit building. Garden/backyard has dedicated space for the apartment and also a shared space with 1 upstairs neighbor + their very friendly dog who is only in the yard occasionally and when supervised.   Private entrance with space for Indoor bike or scooter parking.
interaction: We are always available by text or email.  Please feel free to ask for help with directions or suggestions at any time.
house_rules: - Smoking permitted outdoors only  - Please do not entertain more than 4 non-staying guests at the apartment. - lost keys $100 fee - please bag all garbage and place in the black bins outside.  - separate cardboard and plastic/glass/metal recycling in the blue bins.

reviews.comments: We had a great time at Sam's place, everything was as described. Sam has a great clean, spacious and comfortable set up that makes you feel right at home as well as a nice relaxing backyard that we enjoyed. In regards to communication Sam was very quick and responsive if we needed to message him and i found him to be pleasant and friendly. The location is also close to the subway which makes it a convenient location. You won't be disappointed, we will definitely stay again.

This apartment is perfect!!!! Its very spacious and beautiful!!! You can tell its new. I absolutely loved my stay here!! Sam was very friendly and very accommodating!!!  This is by far best airbnb ive ever stay at in New York!! Theres a beautiful backyard, bedrooms are nice size, and everything was very clean.. out of the 45 airbnbs i stayed at this is my top choice.  Number 1 in everything... i highly highly recommend  people stay here. If you looking for a clean,safe, comfortable, great price apartment,  yet lively neighborhood this is it!! Best part is at night its very quiet, so you  will get  a good night sleep... i will deff be staying here in the future.  Thanks sam for an awesome stay!!!!! People  rent this place, i guarantee your stay will be more than what you expect lol!!! Again  thanks Sam!!

Sam's and Brittney's place is perfect. The flat is very cosy for 4 people. Clean and practical. Close to the tube and really easy to go everywhere in Manhattan or Brooklyn.
The owners are very kind. 
I recommend this place for a short or long trip !

Sam's place was one of the nicest places I've stayed at. Very clean, modern and equipped with everything you would need! 

The backyard garden is a wonderful area to relax in (make use of it!) 

The L train is a 5 minute walk away and gets you to the city in 30 minutes.

Definitely would return!

This apartment was everything I needed for my family's 1st stay in NY. Near the train, close to stores and eateries, and nice neighborhood. We made ourselves right at home and my kids didn't want to leave. Sam is a great host, anything we needed for our stay, we got it. Thanks again Sam.

I stayed here for two weeks 
It was the best, wish I didn't had to leave
Definitely my only option when traveling to NY Again 
It's quiet and very clean, close to a variety of shops
And a short walk to the subway and bus stops 
It's location makes transportation very easy
Sam and Britney are both great hosts  and were quick to respond to any questions
If you're going to Brooklyn ,NY
Book this place, I promise you won't be disappointed
Sam & Brittney's place was amazing! It is so nice and big, very stylish and the AC was GREAT! Thanks so much for the beer in the fridge and an unbelievable stay! We will definitely be back!
Great, cozy place with excellent communication from the hosts. You should definitely stay here!

Nous avons beaucoup apprécié notre séjour chez Sam! L'appartement est agencé avec beaucoup de goût et la propreté est irréprochable. Mieux qu'un hôtel, nous avons eu l'impression d'habiter a New York. L'accès au métro est rapide et simple, et il faut compter 15/20 min pour rejoindre Manhattan. Le quartier est vivant et on y trouve commerces et restaurants. Sam a été très agréable et réactif a nos demandes.

Sam & Brittney were perfect hosts. Quick to respond to any queries and made us feel comfortable. The apartment was super clean and had all the amenities anyone could need. The location was perfect, super close to the Halsey St. subway and L line, perfect for that New York trip but with the ability to escape the hussle and bussle of Manhattan. The outdoor area out the back was perfect too. We would recommend for anyone to stay here. There were 4 of us and there was more than enough space in the apartment. I would definitely return!
Very clean and tidy apartment great place to stay.

Great, clean apartment exactly as appears in the photos!! Great location near several subway lines; however, quite a way from Manhattan so although it's easy to get to, it takes a while. As long as you recognize this, would definitely recommend staying here!
We really enjoyed the space. It was clean and modern. The rooms were all spacious for a New York apartment. The only issue that we ran into was that the walls are thin and I have a loud voice. Oops.
Great location. Just as described, very comfortable.

L’appartement est propre et très bien agencé, le métro est à 10 minutes à peine parfait pour se déplacer dans New York.
Le quartier est calme et il y a plusieurs commerces à proximité. 
 Nous avons séjourné pendant 10 jours dans l’appartement tout s’est très bien passé.
Sam et Brittney sont très réactifs et ont répondus à toutes nos demandes.

This was a great stay for us and our couple friend. Plenty of space great location. Brittany was quick to respond and it was easy to check in even when our flight was late. Loved the neighborhood and she allowed us to leave our luggage so we could see more of neighborhood before we had to go to airport! Would highly recommend!
Great place! I’m a native New Yorker and this is a gem especially for the value!
Great place to stay!

My family and I recently stayed at Sam’s and Britney’s place. We loved it and really enjoyed our stay. The apartment was clean, organized, and had everything we needed, including access to their Wifi and Netflix which were a big plus. They also left some snacks, drinks, and a city map for us which was very thoughful and nice of them. Check-in was smooth. The apartment comfortably accomodated a group of 5 with one person sleeping in an air mattress in the living room. There was free street parking available too. Their place was a 5 minute walk from the Halsey subway stop and about a 20 minute subway ride to Manhattan. Their was a bodega less than 5 minutes away on foot which was perfect to buy snacks and fruit. Overall good value, great hosts, definitely worth staying there again. Thanks again for letting us stay at your home!

Camilo

Our stay at Sam and Brittney’s apartment in Bushwick was perfect. They were wonderful hosts who always replied quickly to any questions we had. We had a small problem with the dishwasher leaking which was dealt with very well by Sam, checking on it, getting a professional in to fix it  and leaving us plenty of extra towels in the meantime. The apartment was clean and spacious, even with four of us staying there, and even nicer than it looks in the photos. The beer and board games left by the hosts were much appreciated.

The street itself was nice and quiet with a number of corner grocery stores nearby. The location was close to the convenient L Train which gets you into Manhattan easily. 

We would definitely stay here again. Thanks again Sam and Brittney for being such great hosts.:)
Great place!

My girlfriend and I had a truly wonderful stay. The apartment was gorgeous with every amenity you could ask for. Sam and Britt were awesome! Very friendly people who were more than accommodating. I would definitely stay again!
This place is great. Really clean, really comfortable, and for NYC really very quiet. It’s fairly far from manhattan but if you’re ok to stay in and around Brooklyn this place is a treat.
I had a very comfortable stay at Sam&Britt's airbnb. I was able to effectively communicate with them at all times as well
Excellent, very clean, very comfortably place in a convenient location. Helpful hosts who make sure you have all the information you need to have a great stay.

Beautiful apartment, with good public transport links less than a ten minutes walk away. The place is really clean, and it’s modern and trendy. Sam and Britt were always very quick to reply to any queries we had during our stay. Would definitely look to stay here again the next time I come.

El apartamento está en la planta baja del edificio, cerca de dos paradas de metro y varias de autobús, con lo cual te plantas en Manhattan en unos 25 min. Aunque en Brooklyn tambien hay mucho por ver y hacer.
El apartamento tiene todas las comodidades y Sam y Britt son unos grandes anfitriones. Fue una experiencia fantástica.
Spacious and modern ground floor where to benefit of the garden and terrace.
Alojamiento 100% recomendable :) Sam y Britt son unos anfitriones geniales. Sin duda lo recomendaría a amigos y familiares.

it was perfect all around!
the space, it was clean, convenient in location, and great value.
everything you needed for cooking was in the apt.
thank you Sam & Britt

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme aux photos.  Très agréable,  avec un petit jardin très bien arrangé et que nous avons bien apprécié le soir en rentrant.  Nous y avons séjourné avec nos deux enfants qui étaient conquis et ravis de le retrouver.  Situé à 7-8 minutes du métro pour Manhattan  (environ 20 minutes pour rejoindre Union Square ). C'est un logement idéal pour découvrir New York en famille. Sam et Britney sont des hôtes très sympathiques ;  ils nous ont gardé nos valises après le check out et même appelé un taxi pour l'aéroport.  Vous pouvez réserver les yeux fermés.

The apartement is great. My only suggestion is to bring snacks, water for late nite munchies since there are no many places open and close by. You will be away from the big city but you are in a quiet vecinity if you are to rest. There are to close stations and can take aprox 40 mins to hit the city. Beds are super comfy.  My only concern was that there is nothing to do around if you just want to walk around. But in general, it is a good place to stay.
This apartment was immaculately clean, modern, quiet, and close to the subway.  We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Clean, modern, close to the subway for quick access to Manhattan. Very nice place and hospitable owners at a very reasonable price for NY. Added bonus is the little oasis of a back yard. We would definitely stay again.

Sam & Britt's space is EXACTLY like the photos! Spotless, spacious and modern! The unit was filled with everything you would need during the stay. The backyard is a beautiful space to enjoy your morning coffee. We walked to the corner bodega every morning for an affordable Spanish style breakfast. Communication with them was simple and responses were timely. Sam & Britt were awesome hosts! The train station is walking distance from the apartment, however, it takes some time to get into Manhattan. Otherwise, the space is perfect! I would definitely come back!
