The house is amazing, very clean and with a great location (next to L train, that goes directly to Manhattan). The bed and the shower were wonderful and we really had a very comfortable stay there! When we come back, surely we'll want to stay there again!

Off the beaten path, Sam and Britt's is a great place to stay if you don't want the noise of the city every night. The place is clean and the check- in and out were simple. It is very easy to contact them if you need anything. Thanks again!
Stylish ground level apt lovely backyard very private quiet & relaxing i enjoyed my stay will def book again

Sam and Britt were superb hosts.  Extra accommodating and flexible based upon our travels.  Allowed an early check-in and we’re super responsive to our request.  Their places is in the perfect location, subway, nightlife, laundry services and a park all within one to two blocks.  They are by far the best hosts that I’ve stayed with yet!!!
Great space clean and homey got exactly what I paid for and good friendly response from them glad to help and made my stay that much better

Amazing appartment, spacious, clean and stylish. After a long day strolling through the city you'll enjoy  watching the fireflies in the garden and a good night of sleep in the comfy beds. You might hear the airco system from one of the bedrooms,  a background noise that might help you sleep like it did for me, otherwise pack your earplugs. Sam was really helpful and reactive to all our requests. Don't miss out on this gem!  The flat is well located but not close to Manhattan, bear in mind the city is HUGE and so are the distances from a point to another, similar to London.

A very nice, complete and clean appartment! The garden was marvelous!
Close to the metro station a supermarket nearby and for the heavy stuff like watercans there was a shop around the corner.
When I asked Sam for some extra service, hè immediattely replied and helped us out.
I can really recommand Sam and Britts place!
The place was very nice and clean. It was convenient to the L train within walking distance from the place.

My family and I enjoyed our stay in this apartment. It was a short walk to the L train so it convient for visiting Manhattan. The neighborhood was very quiet at night, perfect for getting a good night sleep. The apartment was specious for NYC and as a bonus the garden area a hidden gem. We would definitely consider staying here again next time we visit the city

séjour très agréable en famille dans l'appartement de Sam. Descriptif parfaitement conforme avec un petit jardin très agréable et la clim qui nous a été précieuse en juillet ! Nous avons apprécié de vivre dans un quartier populaire et non touristique. Nous recommandons cet appartement à tous les voyageurs ! !

Loved the apartment. The neighbourhood is vibrant and very safe. Great pizza at Jimmy's on Wilson Avenue. 

Subway station at Halsey Street is 8 mins away and the L train can reach Manhattan in 20 mins.

Great stay and would definitely recommend Sam and Britt's place.

Really cute place in Brooklyn, the people in the neighborhood were friendly and helpful. Felt very safe there. Street parking was easy to find, had a spot right in front of the place the whole time. Sam was nice and super helpful, gave us a lot of tips on different places to check out while we were there. Their dog is the cutest!!

Sam and Britt’s place was very nice and clean. They let us check in early, which was great! There was a laundry room for us to use, but the hot and cold water were backwards so we accidentally washed and rinsed our clothes in hot water unexpectedly. It was spacious enough for two couples. It was close, within walking distance to 2 different subway stations that we used daily. And there was a nice grocery store within walking distance. The neighborhood was a little sketchy though so coming home at night, walking through the neighborhood, made me a little nervous.

Je tiens à remercier Sam & britt pour leur accueil, leur gentillesse. Ils nous ont toujours donnés toutes les informations nécessaires et étaient très réactifs. Des hôtes adorables en résumé. L’appartement était très propre et conforme aux photos. Beaucoup de petites attentions avec par exemple du café, du thé, des pâtes, des petits gâteaux à notre arrivée ainsi que des boissons. Vraiment parfait. Le quartier est clame et safe. Loin du bruit de la ville. Mais pour cela il faut accepter les transports pour rejoindre le centre. Je n’hésiterai pas à y retourner . J’en profite pour faire un clin d’œil à Basil !!!

Sam and Britt were wonderful hosts and extremely accommodating with our check in and check out. Communication was very quick and helpful. The space is nice and cozy and I LOVED the kitchen space. Just a lovely apartment.

Super appartement très propre, les photos sont fidèles à la réalité. La petite terrasse derrière est super, très chaleureuse et agréable! Nos hôtes ont été très claire dans leurs indications et leur rapidité de réponse était impressionnante. Le coin est un peu défavorisé mais nous nous sentions en sécurité. Les principales attractions de la ville sont facilement accessible en métro, la station de métro la plus proche de l'appartement est à quelque minute de marche.

This apartment was very comfortable for a group of 4. Check-in was seamless and Sam + Britt were quick to respond when needed. The backyard and the modern layout of their place are nice touches as well! Definitely would stay here again and would recommend to book.

Superb experience. Accurate directions, smooth (early)check-in, fast responses to our numerous requests for places to eat, and things to do. we were 4 family members, wanted to neighbourhood living and got just that. 

The apartment is private, separate entrance, centrally air conditioned (excellent), elegantly furnished, sparkling clean, full kitchen, smart TV, washer & dryer in basement with full access. The garden in back is a wonderful private space, icing on the cake. 

5 minute walk from subway, close to many dining and deli options. We walked home late nights from the subway station, felt safe. in the neighbourhood. 

Brooklyn is full of great bars, restaurants,  Prospect park, Brooklyn bridge park are among our enjoyable experiences. 

Its a 20/30 minute subway ride into Manhattan. 

Sam and Brett were very helpful at all times. They kept our luggage in a secure sections while we did a last minute jaunt into Manhattan before our flight at 9 PM. 

I'd give it more than 5 stars!

The place was amazing. It’s tucked away as a basement apt, but it doesn’t feel like it. It’s in the heart of BK so the area around it feels like it should. Lots of delis around and the L train is only a few minutes away.

Sam and Britt are wonderful hosts. We were four People and felt very comfortable in the apartment. Everything was clean and very nicely decorated. The train is only 5 minutes walk away. The leisure tips of the two are highly recommended. And on questions you get an answer very quickly. We can only recommend the accommodation.

Whenever we come back to NY we'll stay in Sam and Britts apartment again. It is farely close to JFK airport and a 35 minutes ride away from Midtown Manhattan. The subway station is within a 10 minutes walk. Sam and Britt were very helpful and flexible regarding check-in and check-out times. We enjoyed staying at their place. We were very glad about drinks and food and sufficient towels they provided. The little garden is lovely. The place is quiet and safe particularily with regard to a city like New York. Close by are some restaurants and bars and a take away Pizzeria.
The house is in a good spot.  Street parking was available every time we left and came back.  Some nice restaurants/bars within walking distance.
Perfect location for sightseeing new york, easy travel with subway in 30 min downtown, equipment and location of the appartment is perfect, price is good for new york.
great place to stay.

Sam and Britt do have a stylish, quiet and clean place. We felt very safe as well. The apartment is large, roomy, and nicely furnished.  There were only 2 of us, but the apt would easily accommodate 4.  Bathroom is updated as well. We didn’t get to use the pretty garden in the back due to the weather. Loved their quick responses to everything we asked! From recommendations on restaurants, grocery stores, to transportation and places to visit. We will stay there again! 

The amenities are all there and nice!  A great bottle of wine topped it off!

We loved this airbnb! Sam and Britt were great communicators, and check-in and check-out was easy! The place is great for 4 guests, which is what we had during our stay. The place is wonderfully clean, and offers plenty of places to sit, and a beautiful kitchen to cook in. We went to the Key Foods a couple of subway stops away for a big grocery haul and then stopped at nearby bodegas for fresh fruit and bagels as needed when we ran out. The area is safe, and the street is quiet. The back patio is awesome as well! All in all, we would recommend this place, and we would love to stay here again. Our only thought is the closest subway line and provides the quickest access to Manhattan, the L, was shut down the weekend we were there. We ended up getting creative with connecting buses to different train lines, or just taking a lot of Lyfts, but this may not be convenient for everyone. Regardless, this place really is a gem, and it made our trip to visit family and all hang out in our airbnb the perfect experience!

Thanks a lot for your good and fast informations,
we enjoyed our stay at your apartment very much and will recommend it to friends
Nice, clean apartment. Very quiet. I would stay here again.
Great apartment and super friendly hosts!
Great people clean place everything right where you need it
Verry nice
Clean, cosy, comfortable.
Awesome place and host!
great place

Very nice, clean and confortable house.
Sam and Britt are very kind.
We've felt ourselves at their home like It was ours. thanks very much.
There the best

Apartment was exactly as pictured and felt warm and cozy. Everything worked fine and was extremely clean. All the amenities away from home. Plenty of closet space for a longer stay. Host even provided some snacks, keurig coffee pods, cold soda, oatmeal, and hot cocoa that the kids loved. Cute backyard patio, though we didn’t enjoy due to cold weather. The neighborhood had restaurants/deli shops/bars/good markets within a few minutes walking distance. We felt like locals. We were a short walk away from the L line that took us everywhere into the nyc tourists spots and also back to JFK airport. We felt safe walking late at night from metro and some local bars back to the apartment. Definitely recommend Father Knows Best for breakfast and for late late night drinks. Also around the corner is Bushwick Taco Company. My son even got a nice haircut at the local barber shop. So if you are looking for a nice place to relax after a day full of sightseeing and get that true New York feel this is the place for you. Also realized that customer service at the local eateries was 100% better than the customer service we experienced in Manhattan. Will definitely come back again. 
Oh, there was also a washer and dryer but we didn’t use it as well as Free Netflix. The WiFi we used and it was reliable and fast.

Sam and Britt's apartment was spot on. Excellent. Very comfortable beds, Netflix, which was a god send for my youngest son. Great communication and wonderful tips for restaurants and places to visit. All very clean and in a quiet area. Thanks again, and hope to come back soon.
We would recommand this adress

Sam & Britt were awesome!! Their place was absolutely spotless and stylish at the same time. We enjoyed how cozy the place was and were extremely grateful for the small touches like snacks and fresh towels right next to the bathroom. Would absolutely stay 1000 times again. Thanks!!

Sam and Britt were excellent hosts being flexible, helpful and quick to respond. 
We would recommend stay here!
Sam and Britt have a very clean modern place. Check in couldn’t have been easier. Awesome location! Spacious and extremely inviting. Will be back.

This was our second time staying at Sam & Britt’s. Their place is incredibly spotless and cozy. Love the fact that they are always readily available to answer all of our questions. Would recommend their place and them as hosts 1000 times. The price is reasonable and is in a great location. Thanks once again!!

Sam & Britt’s place is great. Very comfortable and, most important to us, VERY CLEAN:) And They accommodated us last minute when our original Airbnb had to cancel bc of a busted water pipe. 
We would definitely stay here again!

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt. Alles wie beschrieben. Ebenso konnten wir unser Gepäck am Abreisetag noch bis zu unserem Flug abends bei Sam und Britt lassen. somit konnten wir ohne Gepäck den letzten Tag noch super in NYC verbringen.
Great Space! Super clean and modern. The Space had everything we needed. It was safe, centrally located and surprisingly spacious.
Perfect!
Very Clean, Spacious & Quiet. Great area in Brooklyn to stay in.

name: Cozy Room in Astoria
summary: Our nice and comfortable 3 bedroom apartment has one small cozy room perfect for 1 person friendly people at home 10 minutes away from N and W train ditmars blvrd. Quite and nice neighborhood.I m also tourism professional can help for your trip :) Wifi and Apple TV is availeble..
space: Quite,friendly host, clean, nice living room, Apple TV in living room
description: Our nice and comfortable 3 bedroom apartment has one small cozy room perfect for 1 person friendly people at home 10 minutes away from N and W train ditmars blvrd. Quite and nice neighborhood.I m also tourism professional can help for your trip :) Wifi and Apple TV is availeble.. Quite,friendly host, clean, nice living room, Apple TV in living room Kitchen , Comp coffee :) , bathroom (shared with one person) I like to give the guests their space i want to make them feel comfortable. It's quite and close to restaurants and bars in ditmars blvrd It's 10 minute walking distance to Astoria ditmars blvrd N,Q train 20 minutes to Manhattan. They will feel like they are home
neighborhood_overview: It's quite and close to restaurants and bars in ditmars blvrd

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.comments:
I was very proud and happy to be Ramazan's first guest! I rented his room for Labor Day weekend while attending a music festival at Randall's Island Park. 

My review will be as detailed as possible. I gave him a perfect review based on whether what I expected was provided. As a man that doesn't need to much and is happy with what I am given, Ramazan's apartment did just that. The shower worked just fine (he even provided me some travel shampoo/conditioner/lotion), and he lent me a shower towel (which was incredibly soft, just how I like) for the weekend. I don't need anything too fancy/complex when I sleep, so the bed in the apartment was satisfactory. It was, of course, furnished with sheets and a thicker blanket, as well as a pillow. It was a bit on the hot side in terms of the weather, but luckily there was a fan in the room that worked wonders, so that made my sleep much easier. Basically, the room is just as pictured, and was just what I needed. If you're a picky resident, you might find an issue or two, but as I said, I'm a man of simple taste, so this was just perfect for me. 

The apartment looked pretty nice as well! I didn't use much of the general lounge space, but it looked very well set-up, and Ramazan was always happy to offer me usage of his TV if I so wanted (which I didn't, as I was pretty busy with my trip). 

I came to the city this weekend specifically for the music festival, so each night I had to come back home late. There was no issue with that, he was okay with my late returns, access to the apartment was easy, and I could take my exhausted self right to bed after a late night without any issue. 

Ramazan himself was an incredibly kind and thoughtful person. When he was around while I was about to go off on my adventures, he was always happy to answer any questions I had about the area. He always made sure I was enjoying my stay, and was happy to talk to me about my experiences in the city. Checking in and out was also an incredibly simple process, which helped me in my ever-changing travel schedule. 

I will be sure to try and book his apartment again the next time I come to the city.

TL;DR: Very nice, cozy, simple apartment with a very kind owner and fully functioning bedroom/bathroom. Perfect for a quick stay and for someone who's got a busy travel schedule.
I found it to be a very bare minimal stay but all essentials were there the host was very friendly and the room was clean and comfortable. i enjoyed it will book again

I had a nice stay ! Ramazan always made sure I was enjoying my stay and cooked a delicious meal too.  The room was clean and comfortable. The apartment is at 15 minutes walking from the subway and there is also a laundromat nearby.

Everything was as described. Great location and quiet neighborhood. Lots of restaurants and bars in the area. The apartment is at walking distance from the train so it was easy to get around. Ramazan and his apartment mate Boris were great hosts and treated me very nicely. I would for sure recommend this place to other people!
Place was awesome and so close to market snd groceries .. very affordable and good host

I travelled to New York for Fashion Week. Ramazan was able to accommodate me on such a short notice, I had a very busy schedule so I didn't see him as much, Ramazan is super friendly and super nice and will tell you everything about NYC. As a frequent New York traveler I've always stayed in Manhattan and it was my first time staying in Astoria and I absolutely loved the neighborhood, it's not that far from the station and close to shops and restaurants. Astoria is a booming neighborhood with my trip working 12/13 hour days at fashion week his place is a perfect place to come home to because of how quiet it is...I highly recommend staying with him. Queens is a nice borough there's more to New York than Manhattan.. Him and his roommate were both super friendly, I checked in and he welcomed me with cookies and coffee. Ramazan is not only a good host but he is a very friendly person!
The apartment was very nice and as shown in the photos. It is ideal for a short stay. Ramazan was a good host and always responded quickly. I enjoyed my stay.
Ramazan and his roommates were super friendly and accommodating, and the neighbourhood was lovely, but the room was small and not super clean and loud music was playing in the flat each morning.

Ramazan was an incredible host who was always willing to help and answer  any and all questions. He gave you the privacy you would need if you like  along with being incredibly helpful. The place was exactly as listed located in beautiful Astoria. Great local shops and eats as well. Would most definitely recommend

Ramazan and his roommate are very nice people.
They were easy to contact and always available.
Great and quiet neighborhood.
The room was close to everything I needed, including my work during the stay.
Great and quiet neighborhood.
It was a great experience, and I will stay again if future work brings me anywhere nearby.
Ramazan was helpful and quick to repspond  to all my questions. It is a  nice place quite and relatively convenient for Astoria. Lets of nice places around for food and drinks
Ramazan and his friend are good hosts! They were very flexible with me for the check-in and check-out times. I appreciate them let me come in late at night during by stay with them.
Ramazan has a nice place...good shower...He has everything you really need! 5 Stars
Ramazan is a great host, he made me feel welcomed from the first minute, great location and quick response, 5 star host
Ramazan was a great host, a recommended host to stay. 5 star
Ramazan is a great host & his roommate is friendly too. I’d stay here again, highly recommend. Very good people.

The place is perfect for a single person, had no problems. The hosts are always willing to provide you with coffee and breakfast and stuff, although I never had the time to take it due to my schedule. The experience at the house was good, would definitely recommend it to others.

Was absolutely not expecting such an incredible stay, came in thinking I'll just have a place to sleep, but ended up spoiled in hospitality, Ramazan is an amazing person, very kind, knowledgeable, and just overall a wonderful host, his roommate Boris is also super nice and friendly, it's just such an awesome atmosphere, you can't go wrong with Ramazan. 

Ps: their massage chair might as well be sent from heaven.
Ramazan is , just flat out, a good guy. He is very helpful, super kind and very welcoming. He goes out of his way to be cool. The place is cozy and I would absolutely recommend it to anyone.

Ramazan is such a nice host , super friendly and very easy to communicate with before arriving, everything was as expected but I wasn’t around much due to work commitments. Only a short walk from the restaurants and bars Ditmars Avenue has to offer but also quiet enough to get a good nights sleep at the end of the day.
Ramazan is a super host! Highly recommended

Ramazan is very friendly and great with communicating! He checked on me several times throughout the visit and made sure things were going well. Check-in went smoothly and  his place was very warm and inviting. Navigating public transportation to Manhattan and back takes a little time, but his place is in a great, safe location and very close to the airport. It was a pleasure to stay with Ramazan and thank you for hosting me!

Highly recommended! Location is great and for the price it can’t be beat. Ramazan was very approachable and super accommodating. The place was extremely clean and in great shape. If you’re taking a trip to NYC be sure to keep an eye on this.

name: Tropical unit pool/spa walk to Kailua Beach A/C
summary: Located 0.8 miles from Kailua Beach, has two comfy chairs on a lanai that overlooks the pool and spa. A King Bed with a top of the line A/C wall unit and flat screen TV in the bedroom. The bathroom features a tropical shower. This unit has a full kitchen, granite countertops, stove, fridge, microwave and shared BBQ. The salt pool & jacuzzi are set amidst a beautifully landscaped backyard. Free WIFI, bikes & shared laundry on site and one off-street parking stall. Nightly rate includes taxes!
space: Bask in the sun on the white sandy beaches of Lanikai Beach, named one of the top 10 beaches in the world by 2014 Travelers Choice on Trip Advisor! Only a 5-minute drive from our stunning one-bedroom, newly constructed on our quiet neighborhood street with no traffic or road noise on a 10,000 sq ft. professionally landscaped property. Breathtaking Kailua Beach is also only 0.8 miles away and will only take you 2 minutes to drive or 12 minutes to walk. Charming Kailua Town is also two minutes away where you will find Whole Foods, many top restaurants and shops, try a shave ice with local flavors at Island Snow or grab a coffee from Kalapawai Beach Café and walk the beach.  	Besides the great location, Lanikai Love’s best features include two comfy chairs on a lanai that overlooks the pool and spa. The sound of the waterfall soothes you as you relax in a tropical paradise. After a long day in the Hawaiian sun, you can rest your head on a sublime King Bed and cool off with a top of the li

The bathroom features a tropical shower. This unit has a full kitchen, granite countertops, stove, fridge, microwave and shared BBQ. The salt pool & jacuzzi are set amidst a beautifully landscaped backyard. Free WIFI, bikes & shared laundry on site and one off-street parking stall. Nightly rate includes taxes! Breathtaking Kailua Beach is also only 0.8 miles away and will only take you 2 minutes to drive or 12 minutes to walk. Charming Kailua Town is also two minutes away w
neighborhood_overview: We live on a quiet neighborhood street that is conveniently located to both Kailua Beach and charming Kailua town! It is really a wonderful location!
transit: We have 1 off street parking stall available and there are bikes on site that you can use for free. A bus stop is located on the main road, roughly a 3 minute walk.
access: You will have a private unit with a full kitchen, outdoor seating area and bathroom. You have access to the salt pool/jacuzzi, shared laundry, bikes, boogie boards, beach chairs etc.
interaction: Yes, I will be around during your stay to assist with anything you might need during your stay!
house_rules: - Property is shared with 2 other units. Must be relatively quiet and respectful of other guests.

reviews.comments:
Perfect location to visit the island.
Close to beautiful beaches.
Very calm in a quiet neighborhood.
Beautiful backyard with pool and spa was also very much appreciated.

The loveliest thing about this rental was the beautifully designed and maintained back garden. It's a gorgeous, green, graceful Hawaiian world with a pool and hot tub which would delight anyone. The comfortable outdoor furniture made lounging there very luxurious. The unit itself was comfortable and decorated with Susanne, the host's, local-themed paintings. Great location, close to both town and the beach. The downsides were, for the price, the unit was not well maintained----big hole in the screen, broken upper window,  broken door. Maybe I irritated the host by complaining about these things, and the wrong directions, but I felt her responses were unnecessarily rude and impatient.

This place is just beautiful! We spent every morning making breakfast and having mimosas while enjoying the amazing backyard. This was really our favorite aspect of the space. Another advantage was the location- it was really close to town and the beach, which made everything really nice to travel to. Susanne was also around a lot (yet not intrusive at all and gave us our space) and that made it very comfortable since we knew that we could go to her with any questions! It was also really nice to have a parking spot on the premises. Overall, we would definitely come back to stay here again!

name: Quiet Stylish Mosman Apartment
summary: My 3br ground floor apartment is close to Balmoral beach, buses, city, parks, harbour foreshore walks. You'll love the room as it has its own private courtyard. Lift access.. Comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers.
space: has its own private sunny courtyard.
description: My 3br ground floor apartment is close to Balmoral beach, buses, city, parks, harbour foreshore walks. You'll love the room as it has its own private courtyard. Lift access.. Comfy bed. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. has its own private sunny courtyard. Guests will have access to the whole apartment apart from main bedroom. There's lovely outdoor seating and a wrap around courtyard and a BBQ. I'm in and out but love talking to people so if I'm home happy to interact or if guests would prefer to be left alone that's fine with me. I'm always happy to give advice on how to get around, things to do in the area and tips on places to eat and of course where the best coffee is. I love being close to the city and what it has to offer but also love having lots of nature around. The harbour foreshore  walks are magic and it's so nice being close to Balmoral beach. There are also shops, restaurants, banks, cinema etc. close by. There's a variety of buses
neighborhood_overview: I love being close to the city and what it has to offer but also love having lots of nature around. The harbour foreshore  walks are magic and it's so nice being close to Balmoral beach. There are also shops, restaurants, banks, cinema etc. close by.
notes: I have a cat so if you are allergic this is probably not the space for you. Breakfast provisions supplied. Fruit, bread, milk and cereal.
transit: There's a variety of buses nearby as well as the ferries. I am about 10 mins walk to main road for buses to city and northern beaches and a connecting bus to the ferry. About 10 mins on the bus to the city.
access: Guests will have access to the whole apartment apart from main bedroom. There's lovely outdoor seating and a wrap around courtyard and a BBQ.
interaction: I'm in and out but love talking to people so if I'm home happy to interact or if guests would prefer to be left alone that's fine with me. I'm always happy to give advice on how to get around, things to do in the area and tips on places to eat and of course where the best coffee is.
house_rules: Only the person or people who book are allowed to stay in the room.

host.host_about: I am a retired property valuer. I love to travel. I usually do houseswaps but Airbnb is also a good way to connect with the community and far better than staying in a hotel.

reviews.comments:
Keythia was a wonderful Host. 
She made myself and partner feel very at home. 
The apartment was very clean and tidy with all necessary amenities. 
The bed was extremely comfortable and the sheets were 5 star. 
Keythia left out a beautiful selection of breakfast treats. 
I would highly recommend this apartment. 
Many thanks 
Mark & Rebecca

Again we had such a lovely experience staying with Krythia. She is such a wonderful host. 
Krythia make you feel like your right at home. 
Highly recommend this apartment. 

Many thanks 
Mark and Rebecca

My wife and I had a really fantastic stay with Krythia. The apartment is super homely, cosy and private. The bedroom we stayed in was really nice and had a private courtyard attached to it. We also had access to our own private bathroom. Everything was really comfortable and clean, and we were able to do our own cooking too. Krythia herself is a lovely hostess. We had several interesting conversations with her and she made us feel welcome right from the start. The apartment is just a few minutes walk from the bus stop, with it being very easy snd convenient to get into the city from there. Highly recommend this apartment, especially if you're a cat lover - Krythia's cat Cindy is super friendly!

We stayed at krythias apartment for four nights. The apartment and the room is as you can see it on the pictures. Modern and nice looking. Everything was clean and the bed was very comfy. Krythia is a really nice lady and we had some great short conversations with her. We felt very welcomed. The only thing we like to mention for the apartment that is located in a really nice area of Sydney, is that you can only reach it by bus (5 stops) - so there is no tram nearby. The last bus we were able to find to the direction of the apartment left the city at 8:30 pm. That was sometimes a little bit early for us and we had to take an uber (which costs around 20AUD). Everything else was really awesome and we can recommend to stay there for sure. Thank you Krythia for the amazing stay in Sydney.
We received a lovely welcome, everything was as described and perfect for our requirements. Thanks so much Krythia, for sharing your home with us.
Very good house, very clean room and private bathroom, very lovely cat and one very kindliness host. Spend a nice week with Krythia
Super comfortable bed and Krythia is very friendly and welcoming.
Krythia room was just what we looked for. Quiet location. Great price. Easy walking to places. Kriathia was a gracious host.  All was as we hoped.
Very comfortable bed, lovely bathroom. Krythia very welcoming.
Very clean and comfortable,
Very pleasant location, spacious apartment, extremely clean bathroom and kitchen. Excellent WiFi reception. Very friendly and helpful host
Highly recommended. No problems at all .

Great apartment located at a nice area. Good public transportation to the city. Car park available and very easy to get around. Lots of cafes and restaurants around the area. The room is nice and clean with a nice private bathroom. Cindy the cat is very friendly too.

Krythia's apartment was clean, quiet and comfortable and close to beautiful Balmoral.  Krythia was very understanding about our late arrival into Sydney and ensured we could access the property in her absence.  Krythia ensured we had everything we needed to make ourselves comfortable for our brief stay (tea, coffee) and was a generous host.
Great place, host and value

The apartment is in a small, modern complex, very close to a bus route direct to the centre of Sydney (10 minutes). Shops and beach are close but a LONG walk.
The bedroom is A-C, very private with very comfortable bed.
Amazing place, friendly host and good in value

Vi spenderade en natt hemma hos Krythia och det var bra. Vi gillade Mosman. Ävenom det är lite längre bort från stan så tyckte vi att det var värd.
Tack Krythia!

Krythia's place is central to Sydney and close to some beautiful beaches. The room is soacuous and the courtyard offers a nice private area to chill out. Krythia was a great host and very accommodating.
Krythia was a lovely host. The unit was central in Mossman and a short walk to buses which were only 10 minutes to the city. The bathroom and bedroom was lovely and we had a fantastic time.

Mosman is a lovely part of Sydney.  The CBD is easily accessable by public transport and beautiful Balmoral Beach is not far away.  There are many wonderful scenic walks in the area.  Krythia is a kind and helpful. host.  Comfortable bed and great private bathroom.

Krythia definitely earned her superhost. She was lovely and friendly. Her place was clean, comfortable and bright. Best part was the location, so easily accessible to city by public transport. Would absolutely choose her place again if I have to visit Sydney one day.

This is my second ten-day stay with Krythia.  The space is
very comfortable  with great private bathroom and the
area is lovel.y within walking distance of excellent public transport to the city and also  beautiful Balmoral Beach.  Krythia is always most helpful & accommodating. Highly re ommend.
Comfortably away from, but still close to everything in just a fee minutes. We were able to explore all the nearby cities by driving and walking, and kept busy.

This was my third stay with Krythia.  She is an easy
and very helpful host.  Highly recommend.
Great location, very friendly host, very clean accommodation, lovely stay.
Modern bathroom and kitchen. Convenience place.
A great place to stay if you want access to the Northern Beaches and to hop on a bus into the city.
The whole apartment was very nice and clean. Beautiful room and private bathroom. The bed in the room was out of this world comfortable. We enjoyed our stay very much :) Definitely recommend!
My partner and I had a wonderful stay at Krythia's place. Spotlessly clean, easy to access and very comfortable. Krythia is a great host.
We enjoyed our stay with Krythia. The accommodation was very clean, comfortable and spacious, especially with the little outdoor terrace. Krythia made us feel most welcome.

The room is much better than it’s advertised. So modernized. The bathroom floor can be heated so that you feel very warm when taking a shower. The kitchen is well equipped with everything. The living room is spacious. Krythia leads a very healthy lifestyle and she goes out regularly to attend different activities. She goes to the gym regularly. We had a good chat and felt so comfortable in her house.

Thank you for having us on such short notice! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Felt very safe and the carpark was secure. Lovely space, super comfy bed and particularly fantastic bathroom. Highly recommend to all

Clean and decent place. Newly renovated bedroom and bathroom with comfortable bed. Easy communication. Krythia is a nice host who can give you all the useful information around the city. We really enjoy our stay with her!

Great place to stay if visiting the bars/cafes/restaurants of Cremorne and Neutral Bay. Entry if from a major road which is handy and as it is in battelaxe block it is quiet at night. Would certainly stay there again.
Krythia was a wonderful host.  She was very welcoming, helpful with suggestions of what to do in Sydney and how to get around.  Her home was very clean with a comfy bed.

Modern apartment in good location for access to Mossman and Balmoral.
recommended.
Very comfortable room.
Nice bedroom and bathroom.
Krythia's place is super clean and comfortable. I have never sleep on a bed like this, super soft. Krythia is thoughtful.
This place was close to Balmoral beach and nice places to eat. Having a car spot was handy to travel to the northern beaches of Sydney. Lots of hills in the area too. Krythia was a pleasant host.
This is the second time we have stayed here which is probably the most telling point - we love it and would certainly stay again.
Lovely host , great position , very clean , convenient and as described .

I felt really comfortable and relaxed to stay there because it was a very tidy place, and had an air-con and a laundry.
She was so kind. I wanna recommend to stay there.
Great place close to shops in a great area.  Host is accomodating and frindley and will give you space when u want it.
Clean, comfortable and welcoming host.

Krythia is a fabulous host, her place is fantastic, clean, beautiful, comfortable, well located, it has everything.
I openly recommend it!

Krythia is a very thoughtful, unobtrusive hostess of a very sparking clean and stylish apartment.  It was marvelous to come back after every rainy day to a warm, welcoming bedroom and the steady, hot water of the shower of a beautifully designed bathroom.  It suited our needs exactly.  I have no hesitation in recommending Krythia and her place!
Spacious, clean and a great location. Being able to have access to a garage was an added bonus.

Krythia place is  super comfortable. I had the privacy of my own bedroom, the court yard and bathroom with a gorgeous bath tub. 
The location is superb if you want to be in the right spot for a peaceful stay but also go out and have everything at your finger tips.
5 minutes walk to cafe and bus stop right outside the cafe to city,  10 minutes walk to local fresh produce and grocer shops, the main strip of Mosman life. I would highly recommend Krythia's place for your next stay in Northern Beaches, Sydney. Thanks so much Krythia, you are an exceptional host too. Krissy.

Room was as described. A short stroll to public transport, Krythia communicated perfectly and also provided space for private time.  Local tips for transport were appreciated . I did not use wifi but password was also provided . Thanks, would stay again.
Krythia is a friendly host, and the apartment is very close to the bus line directly to the city centre.
Krythia is a lovely host! The place is fantastic! 10/10 would recommend
Alles perfekt, kann ich nur empfehlen! Krythia war sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit in jeder Situation.

Neat clean good location 
Near new facilities

We were in Mosman for a wedding so the room was ideal for our purposes being close to the venue.
Room and bathroom were very clean and there was also a hairdryer available.
Great for what we wanted
Very clean and stylish space! Loved the washroom and overall layout of the flat. Great location as well, being approx. 5-10mins walk from various restaurants and shops. Highly recommended!

Great location for me as I was attending a conference at Taronga Zoo - the buses were close and also convenient to get to the ferry. The place is nice and the host friendly. Bed is comfy and a great bathroom.

neighborhood_overview: Central Kihei is awesome. 2 blocks from Kihei Cafe for breakfast, Paia Fish Co. for dinner or downstairs for surf lessons you are literally in the heart of it all. Stunning beaches line the coastline of South Maui including the intimate and stunning coves across the street. Also, with Kalama Park across the street you can play volleyball, tennis or just watch the sunset from the shoreline night after night. 5 minutes from Wailea and 10 minutes from Makena where the string of beaches continue. 'Secrets' and 'Big Beach', 2 of my favorites, have the softest golden sand. Whale watching, boogie boarding and sunbathing at these 2 beaches are some of the many reasons why people return to Kihei year after year.  The Road to Hana, Twin Falls, The Bamboo Forest, Zip Lining, Whale Watching, Sunset Cruising, Hiking the Lava Fields or just lying by the pool downstairs you will have so many options during your stay.
notes: Restaurants:  Breakfast- Kihei Cafe and Nalu's  Lunch- Joys(downstairs) and Nalu's are my favorite for lunchtime. Dinner- MONKEYPOD, COCONUTS, PITA PARADISE and KOISO (best local sushi) are my favorites.  Surf lessons and scuba diving lessons are downstairs PET FEE- $75 Per stay
transit: Kihei Town is mostly walkable. You will need a car to see most of the island. Renting Scooters or bicycles are a fun way to get around locally too.
access: FREE PARKING!!! MY GUESTS WILL HAVE ACCESS TO ALL THE BEACHES ON MAUI, THE POOL AND THE CONDO ITSELF.
interaction: I interact with my guests as much as need be. I am very detailed oriented and love providing anything and everything my guests desire.
house_rules: My guests are free to enjoy themselves. A commonly used Hawaiian word PONO(to do what is right with others and respect of the land) is my basic house rule. We also have a tradition here of removing our shoes and sandals at the doorstep before entering to keep the dirt outside. Quiet time is 10pm-7am and to be mindful of our precious resources here on Maui like electricity and waste. Everything must be brought to Maui by ship and leaves by ship so it is very energy consuming. Tax ID Number AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST  *** PLEASE NOTE A 14.8% HAWAII STATE TAX WILL BE COLLECTED AT THE END OF YOUR STAY***

host.host_about: Stylist from New York City designing and making things beautiful.

reviews.comments:
Todd was an excellent host and such a nice person! He made sure the condo was very clean before we arrived, was able to meet us to explain how the condo worked, answer any questions we had, and left us with restaurant recommendations. Todd was quick to respond to all communication before and during our stay. We truly enjoyed staying in his condo; the layout was great, decor BEAUTIFUL, and location was really nice. The condo was equipped with extra bedding, towels, dishes and utensils, plenty of storage space, and beach equipment. This place definitely felt like a home away from home (bonus: just steps away from the beach!). One note: Please keep the kitchen counters clean or sugar ants will find your crumbs, they weren't an issue though. 
My mum and I were more than comfortable, and would love to stay here again on a future trip!

Todds apartment is just as beautiful as in the pictures and you really do have the most fantastic ocean view from the balcony which is nice and shady during the hot midday hours. The kitchen is very well equipped if you want to do some cooking or even prepare your own smoothies with fresh island produce. A lot of restaurants and cafes are in walking distance and Todd gave us some very good recommendations. A highlight for me was also that all beach equipment (towels, chairs, sunshade and snorkeling gear) is available for two (especially handy when only arriving with carry-on luggage. Overall we could not have asked for a better apartment to enjoy our Maui vacation. For those interested, there is a surf school who rents out boards right across the street and you can always watch some surfers at the beach in front of the building.

Todd was great! He's place is very unique and stylish. Has decorations from all over the world. Our favorite was the 1902  coffee table (very old beautiful wood). He gave us good tips on where to eat. Great location, walking distance to beaches, shops, and restaurants. Highly recommended. Thank you Todd

Even though I didn't meet Todd, he was an exceptional host. He checked on me repeatedly in the lead up to my stay and while I was there to ensure I was ok and to see if he could help in any way. He was very responsive as well and made great recommendations. The condo was stocked with kitchenware for cooking, towels (beach and high-thread bath), and linens. It quite spacious, comfortable, modern, clean, and decorated VERY nicely. The view of the ocean from the balcony was amazing. Overall, I had a fantastic stay considering the area and the condo. I visited friends in Wailea who stayed at a resort and condo, but still I preferred Todd's place and Kihei because of the ambiance, amenities (e.g. beach gear!), proximity to beaches, restaurants and vibe. I highly recommend Todd's place. Thanks for a memorable stay, Todd.

We booked our stay at Todd's place pretty late in the game.  He was quick to respond and super amicable too!  Great place- cool vibe-hip decor-stellar view-chill and all-around comfy-super easy to arrive into and navigate around. Mahalo Todd  \m/

We loved our stay at Todd's. The apartment was clean and very stylishly appointed, the bed was super comfy and it was in a good location with a beautiful view. Todd was an excellent host and ensured we were comfortable. I really recommend booking if it's available!

We had a really great time on Maui! We ( 2 persons) stay in the condo for 6 days. It is very well equipped (bodyboard, gear for snorkeling, beach towels,...). So everything you need! It was very clean, good located,...
Todd is friendly and really helpful! I can definitely recommend to stay here.

Everything about this stay was great, the place was super clean and neat, it had everything we needed to be comfortable and also, well equipped with beach stuff. 

Great experience, definetly would stay there again.

The condo is situated directly across the street from a popular beach that we took surf lessons at for a few mornings. Food markets and good places to eat are close by, walking distance. Todd's condo is perfectly clean, well decorated and perfect for my family. Todd is a great host. He is kind, helpful, available and organized. He allowed us to take in a friend at last minute, and accommodated an early check in. He gave us spot on ideas for day trips and restaurant reservations. I highly recommend a stay at this condo.

Todd's place has an oceanfront view out of his private balcony and is across the street from a nice public beach.  The apartment is very clean and centrally located to many activities.  There are multiple paddleboard/surfboard/snorkeling/scuba rentals just downstairs by the street and Todd's place is located to several excellent food trucks including the most highly rated Poke on Maui.  Besides this, a 15 minute drive to Wailea will get you to the great shopping districts and short drives north will get you everywhere else on the west side of Maui.

Todd is an excellent host who really cares about cleanliness and making effort to help.  He has some of his own body boards and scuba gear as well. We will be checking on his place the next time we are in Maui.

This is definitely one of the better units in the Kihei area for the view and price.  I have stayed in many buildings/apartments over many years in the area and was very impressed with the amenities of this unit - everything is clean and in good working order, plenty of small details that make the stay even better (eg. laundry,dishwasher/dish soap, great bathroom lighting & shower, shower soap & shampoo, hair dryer, even coffee and sugar for the morning).  A/C worked well, fans in living and bedrooms and a great cross-breeze made the temperature quite comfortable.  The bed was also VERY comfortable with memory foam mattress and great quality linens.  Fantastic view of the beach and ocean from the lovely lanai.  I highly recommend this unit.  Todd was also very polite and easily reachable for communication.  Mahalo, Todd!

Todd was such a gracious host and went above and beyond to make our stay comfortable. The location of the property was perfect for a quick stroll the the beach or tasty bites (both literally in plain sight from the balcony). Inside was comfortable, very clean and welcoming. We would recommend this (and Todd) to our closest friends and family and of course anyone who wants a great time in Maui.

This is an incredible spot!  There is so much to do right out your front door. Great activities, great food and great views.  Todd was an excellent host and makes sure you've got everything you need to enjoy Kihei.

We LOVED our stay at Todd's condo. We had the great fortune to meet him personally and made our stay extra special. The space is beautiful with all you need for a Maui vacation. All new beach gear too. The lanai was perfect overlooking the water and the hub bub of beach life below. I loved all the comfy spaces to lounge in the condo from the couch to lanai chairs. It was hard to leave. Felt like home. We would stay here again for sure.
Couldn't ask for a better location, or view, on Maui. The Condo exceeded all our expectations.  Thanks for making it a wonderful week, Todd.

Awesome place! Great location with tons of great food, water sports, and relaxing. Todds place is super clean and hip well stocked with boogie boards, snorkel gear and beach towels. The place is right in the heart of Kihei and where everyone wants to be for sunset. It really was a great place to stay and I'd recommend it to any friends or family. My girlfriend and I loved it!

WOW! Everything about this Lanai was perfect! Let me start with Todd. He was very friendly, accessible and gave great recommendations for the area. The location was unbeatable! Everything from water sport rentals downstairs to wonderful eats and bars within a 5 minute walk. The unit was clean and the bed was so comfortable! On top of all that Todd provided snorkel gear and beach towels. I would definitely recommended this place to anyone. Mahalo Todd!

Condo is at a great location. Lots of restaurants and bars nearby. Plenty of small shops to rent swimming equipment also. Only issue was a small drain clog but otherwise everything was clean and in great shape.

Todd’s place is the perfect Maui rental and made our trip so much more enjoyable. A lot of rentals I find myself saying “Shoot, they don’t have it” and I have to take a trip to the store. You can tell Todd paid attention to every detail when setting up his place. For example, he has three different types of pillows on the bed. Firm, soft and feather. Coffee machine with coffee, cream and sugar. All the beach gear you will need, soft cooler, two beach chairs, several sets of snorkel gear, two boggie boards, umbrella and beach towels. He also has plenty of regular towels and all the shower stuff you will need. In-unit laundry with all the detergents hairdryer, first-aid kit, the list goes on. The place is new remodeled, cozy and clean. The bed is super  comfortable and the chairs on the lanai are perfect for lounging and watching the waves.  Checking in and out and the free parking was effortless and Todd was an excellent communicator. He even accommodated our late checkout with short notice. A++ Stop looking around and just book Todd’s place it will make your Maui stay that much better. Thanks again Todd!

We highly recommend this beautiful condo. It is very clean, comfortable and exceeded our expectations. Such a great location and walking distance to beautiful beaches, restaurants and shopping. We loved having the opportunity to BBQ at the condo's private pool as well.

Todd was such a thoughtful and helpful host. He provided recommendations and was in communication with us before we even arrived which was very helpful in preparing our outings. Todd goes above and beyond to help his guests feel at home. We can't wait to come back!
Exactly as described. Great interior design and attention to details. Very comfortable bedding. Excellent!

The perfect airbnb you could hope for. The attention to detail was impeccable. Wonderfully decorated, feels like home. Todd was great to communicate with, always there when needed. 5 stars, will be back!

Todd was just as wonderful as the other reviewers said! Super helpful and accommodating for early check in / late check out. The location was perfect. Walking distance to restaurants, groceries, and the beach, and just a short drive to great snorkeling. Everything about this place met our expectations, and we'll definitely be back.
Nice place!

Perfect location in Kihei! In the heart of the downtown location. We went for walks along the beach which is right across the street! Walked to cafes, eateries, and shopping all within 5 minutes from the condo. It was super convenient and made the stay so worth it. The drive to Lahaina and Wailea was not bad! And Todd is an excellent host! We went to several of his suggested places. His home is equipped with beach gear. And can't forget to mention the lanai (balcony) with the beach views. We are at least 5 meals just admiring the action of the beach and people nearby. His place is clean and modern! Todd is super responsive and a pleasure to communicate with!

My girlfriend and I stayed at Todd's condo recently for a week. ABsolutely perfect location, right off the beach in Kihei. Directly across the street from a surf shop where you an get surf lessons and rent surf gear. Lots of restaurants, shops, beaches, some bars within walking distance.

Condo itself was very adequate for two people. Full kitchen, washer, dryer, lawn chairs, boogie boards, snorkel gear, beach towels, free parking, all very convenient.

Only complaint would be the rooster that seemed to live next door to the building, not sure if it's always there or if we got unlucky. As a light sleeper, the damn thing woke me up very early most days. Hard to hold this against Todd himself, but just trying to remain as truthful and informational as possible.

Would stay again.

We loved staying at Todd's place- not only is it clean and comfortable inside, but it is also in walking distance of multiple beaches and restaurants. Todd was always responsive with any questions we had, and provided clear details about the apartment as well as a list of activities tailored to our interests. We would recommend Todd's place to anyone!

Todd and his place are both phenomenal! Todd is so accommodating, his condo is gorgeous! It is in an awesome location right by the beach. His place has everything from dishes, to snorkeling gear and boogie boards. There is tons of closet space and the king size bed is super comfortable!  I will always stay here when I come to Maui.

Todd's place is in a great location within walking distance of beaches, restaurants and within driving distance for most touristy activities on the island. This place was an awesome stay for our honeymoon!  Thanks Todd!

The condo was centrally located, incredibly convenient for walking to most near by restaurants and shops. The place itself was perfect for what we needed as a party of two. Everything about the stay was fabulous. Though we did not personally use the recreational items, Todd had plenty of items to borrow from (chairs, umbrella, boogie boards). He was always quick to respond and communicate every step of the trip. Todd is a communicative, friendly and helpful host and his place was perfect for a week in Kihei. Thanks again for sharing your slice of Maui with us!

Todd's place was very nice. Clean bathroom, clean kitchen and a nice bedroom with a king sized bed. Not to mention the balcony that had an ocean view for anyone that likes to have a tea and watch the waves in the morning. He was very responsive with any questions we had and it made our stay all the more merry. I recommend staying here!

Don't look any further, this condo is gorgeous and what made our trip so special was Todd's communication with us. He made everything possible so that we could check-in earlier, always made sure we were having a great time without being overwhelming! The location is great too with restaurants and supermarkets nearby, and surf school just across the road. Great value, I would definitely book again!
Everything as pictured! Great location with close beaches and easy access to all of Maui! We'd stay again!

Everything about this place is awesome! The location can't be beat. The view is better then the pictures shows. The condo itself is clean and nicely decorated and comfy with all the amenities! Todd was awesome to communicate with and responded super promptly to us when the internet wasn't working. I'd definitely stay here again!

First off I wanted to say that this Owner has to be the most helpful person I've dealt with on Airbnb. The place was really nice and clean with everything you need inside to enjoy your trip. Had a slight problem with the AC unit but he came over that day and installed a brand new one with no problem at all. He made everything super easy. The overall view is amazing on the Lanai. The AC works extremely well to stay cool while being inside. It's centrally located in Kihei so it makes everything really easy to get too. 
I would recommend this place to anyone and would love to stay in it again on my next visit to Maui.
Thank you

Everything was super clean and thoughtfully provided! I really enjoyed the balcony especially at night and the bed is super comfy as well.  Todd is a very gracious host and responsive to whatever is needed.

This was the perfect place to stay in Maui! Beautiful decor, amazing location. We got to wake up every morning and see the beach and watch people taking surf lessons. Cook meals with a view of the ocean. Plus, Kihei has everything you could want, and is conveniently located. Could not be more pleased with my stay here and with Todd's help and service. Don't think twice about booking this place!

Todd's place was exactly what we needed as we adventured the island.  It was also a street away from local restaurants (delicious, try the food trucks!), shops, and the beach. He's also got beach stuff. Great views of the beach from the lanai. Most importantly, a comfy bed and a clean bathroom.  That's what we really needed, and we were pleased.  Thanks Todd!
Wonderful experience! Todd is very helpful and a quick communicator. Beautiful place with a great view.

Not enough could be said about Todd and his perfect home away from home!! EXCELLENT location, SUPER CLEAN & COMFY, THOUGHTFUL & FUN extras (beach chairs, boogie boards, sun umbrella, cooler, towels...), QUICK & HELPFUL communication, the list goes on and on. We will be back, this is the perfect place!!

We had a wonderful stay in Kihei! The apartment is located right on the water next to many shops and restaurants. Check in and Check out was super easy, and Todd was very responsive and helpful. Would stay again!

Staying in Todd's apartment was a near-perfect experience for my husband and me. It has a very convenient location, only steps away from the beach, a large supermarket, a sporty park (beach volleyball etc.), and great food from a variety of restaurants as well as food trucks. The balcony boasts a beautiful view of the beach and sunset, and from there you can take in sea breeze and the sound of waves in the evening when traffic has become slight. Todd being a stylist, his apartment is well laid out with tasteful furniture, romantic lighting, and eye-pleasing decorations. Though we didn't get to meet him in person, we felt the existence of a beautiful soul by staying in Todd's apartment.

If you are thinking about staying here, don’t hesitate and book right away! We loved our time at Todd’s place. Central location on the island and has all the comforts of home. You won’t be disappointed!

What an incredible stay! The condo is in an amazing location, easy walking distance to many beaches, restaurants, bars and shopping! We only stayed two nights, but wish we would have stayed longer! You should have absolutely no hesitation booking this place.. Todd was a great host and the condo was amazing. Can’t wait to come back!
Todd’s place is perfect - we couldn’t have asked for a better host. The recommendations were great and the breeze in the apartment is incredible. Perfect getaway in Kihei - I highly recommend!!!
Todd's condo is in a great location in Kihei and has a nice view of the water from the lanai. We really liked having the provided boogie boards and beach umbrella for a trip to nearby beach.

The most well equipped Airbnb I’ve over stayed in, unique neighborhood that is less touristy than other parts of the island. Walkable to great beaches and food destinations. Read the guidebook Todd and other travelers have added to, useful tips you will not find in your online research. 
Well appointed decor, great patio, all of the beach supplies you’ll need.

It is a very cute small  1 bedroom apartment with some  cool decorative touches. It is supper clean and has all what you may need for a daily day stay.  Todd, the host, is very responsive and pleasant pearson.  The ocean view is practically unobstructed (the palms make it spectacular) because the condo is located on the 5th floor.   The building is located on the busy street thus is a bit noisy there, but hey, if you like  to be close to shoppings and restaurants and you are up to for nightly life  that is the place. Just crossing that street and you are in the beach park with a strand. The ocean side is rocky but sandy beaches are very close by.  The cool things are the surf shop just under the balcony and  its  activities.  They are renting surfing and paddling boards;  I took the class and loved it!!! You will see people enjoying surfing and paddling right from the seat on the balcony.  In summary it is the cool, cute place.

First-timers to Maui and first timers with Air BnB and we absolutely loved our stay here. The condo was perfect, beautifully decorated, and cozy for me and my wife. We felt like we had the comforts of home plus more. We loved that it’s central to most places on the island and even better that it’s close to beaches. We even walked to the grocery store one day (two blocks away).  There are too many great things to say about this place. The lanai was our favorite part. We made it a point to wake up early every morning to sit on the lanai, drink coffee, watch the people at the surf school below, and listen to the ocean. The next time we are in Maui we hope to stay here again.
Stunning condo with amazing views! Next to delicious restaurants and within walking distance to great beaches
Todd is a great host, great communication, very accommodating, nice and clean place. Highly recommend!
The stay was great and the location is unbeatable!
Lovey location and view. I’ve been to Maui a dozen times and this is my favorite place to stay! We can’t wait to come back!

Really solid choice for your stay in Maui. This was our first time to Maui and we didn’t know much about the different parts of the island — we fell in love with Kihei and Todd’s place is right in the middle of the action. Across the street is a great park and beautiful oceanfront walking path, and he’s also right next to a really fun bar and restaurant area which we stumbled upon our first night. His place was super clean and great quality (nice sheets, nice towels etc) and had free parking, so made for the perfect “home base” for our trip. Kihei was also a convenient spot to stay as it made trips to West and East Maui equally convenient. Would definitely recommend this spot to friends coming to the island who want to stay in a more local / less touristy area that is both beautiful and convenient!

Todd is a fantastic host and I had a blast staying at his place. The listing doesn’t do it justice - this is a prime location, and most Kihei destinations are within walking distance. The central location was fantastic for exploring Maui by car as well. I hope to stay here again!

The place was nice and tidy. Really close to great local finds and super convenient if you want to explore on foot. Fully enjoyed our stay there and really liked the speedy communication as Todd was always prompt to respond.

Todd’s place was amazing. So well situated (right across the street from a surf shop where we rented boards, within walking distance to places like Paia Fishmarket), had great amenities like beach chairs, full snorkel gear sets and a boogie board. We met Todd when checking in and he gave us great local tips. We loved our stay here! Would definitely return. Thanks Todd!

Perfect place for couples and families!
It’s always sunny in Kihei, where condo is located, even if it’s raining in the rest of the island. Place was clean and well designed. Cozy bed, awesome amenities allowed us to cook delicious local seafood every day. Todd was very responsive which made the check in and overall communication very easy. 
Will come back again!

Todd’s place was outstanding. He leaves a notebook which we forgot to write in but it has his other guests experiences. We actually used that notebook as a reference. It’s a great location. Ocean, bar and grills, luaus are all really close. Watching the sunset and the waves hit beach from his balcony will be missed. Thank you Todd!

Todd's place was in the most perfect location! He has plenty of great suggestions for the entire island and was happy to direct us when we had questions. We appreciated the small touches like snorkeling gear and beach supplies! He really thought of everything. Thanks so much we cannot wait to get back to Maui!!!!!

Todd's place is amazing!  It is even better than the description.  Beautiful and clean apartment, amazing view, comfortable bed and linens, and convenient to everything you'd ever need.  Host is very communicative and accommodating.  We loved staying here and will definitely be back.  Many mahalos, Todd!

Great, updated, stylish, and sparkling clean condo within walking distance to fun stuff! Our faves: Kihei Cafe breakfast, snorkeling at Kamaole 2 beach and sunsets at Charley Young beach. Todd provides beach gear including snorkel gear which is super helpful! An amazing condo! We hope to come back.

Todd was an excellent host. Anytime we needed anything it would magically appear at our door within moments. The location was great for us being so close to great places to eat, shop and chill on the beach. We will definitely stay there again when we come back to Maui.

Todd’s condo is amazing, so much better then staying in a resort. You really get the local feel! He put so much thought into all of the little details, it’s so cute! The bed is amazing and the location is perfect. Oh, and we got engaged while staying here!!! Lots of good vibes :) aloha !
Great view and location. Close to lots to do! We sat on the porch everyday and loved the view.

Todd’s place was the perfect spot in Maui! The description and photos of the condo were exactly what we got. The location was really central and easy to access. It’s right across the street from a cute little beach, and right below is a tour company that does stand up paddle board and surfing lessons. There’s a full grocery store just a few blocks west, and a fantastic little natural/ health food store (with great sandwiches and such) just to the east. It’s a few blocks from what I was told is the “BARmuda” triangle, which is where a few popular bars are, but not so close that it’s bothersome. The condo has a great little private pool, and Todd provides beach towels and other beach gear in case you didn’t bring any. There is a bit of road noise during the day, since it’s located right off a very popular area, but if you close the sliding door you can’t hear anything. It didn’t bother us a bit, but I know some are more sensitive than others. It’s pretty quiet at night, and you can’t even hear the neighbors. The condo was super clean and Todd was very quick to respond. This was one of the best Airbnb experiences I’ve ever had! I want to also shamelessly plug Bio-Beetles car rentals in Maui. If you’re planning on renting a car there (and you probably are!) check them out. We had a great experience with them, as well, and it saved us a ton of money versus renting from a larger company.  Now I can officially say: MAHALO!
Fantastic host. Clean apartment, comfy bed, lovely shower, well equipped kitchen and thoughtful touches throughout.  Excellent.

This is an awesome Airbnb in Kihei, Maui. The location is super convenient to supermarkets and restaurants. The apartment comes full of all extras such as beach chairs, umbrella, and other beach essentials. The balcony is so enjoyable to lounge and feel the ocean breeze while enjoying the sunset. It is a great apartment.

Loved the place, designed beautifully... it felt like a home, not a rental. It is on a busy corner, so it is a bit loud, but the benefit is that you are in a very central location of Kihei! I would absolutely recommend Todd’s lovely condo! Mahalo Todd

Cove Parkから一本道路を挟んで建っているｺﾝﾄﾞﾐﾆｱﾑで､ﾋﾞｰﾁにも商業地域にも至近で､とても気持ちよく､快適に過ごすことができました｡ﾊﾞﾙｺﾆｰで夕暮れ時に飲むﾋﾞｰﾙは格別でした｡私の滞在時はｻｲｽﾞがあがらず入りませんでしたが､Cove Parkに波が入っているときにはｻｰﾌｨﾝ目的の滞在にもおｽｽﾒです｡Toddは滞在中何回も必要なものがないか確認してくれたり､ﾚｽﾄﾗﾝやｱｸﾃｨﾋﾞﾃｨも熱心に薦めてくれたり(薦めてくれたﾚｽﾄﾗﾝはどれも良かったです)､とても親切なﾎｽﾄでした｡

조금 비싸긴 하지만
위치, 청결도, 시설 모든 면에서 완벽합니다
A beautiful space in a great location. Pics don't do it justice!

If you’re looking for a secure, comfortable and conveniently located place to stay in Maui, this is it. There’s beach access very close, and the pictures very accurately represent the space. Also, the bed was very comfortable and fragrance-free—some of the best nights’ rests I’ve had in an AirBnb listing. We’d come stay here again the next time we’re in the area.

On previous trips to Maui I've always stayed at a hotel. This time I wanted more privacy and full amenities of my own place so I could keep groceries on hand and have more space to relax. Todd's condo is perfect for this. From the start, his communication was fast and friendly. Everything was presented up front so there were no surprise charges or misrepresented amenities. The view of the water is outstanding, and the location is perfect for walking to restaurants, the water, gift shops, coffee shops, and a grocery store. Parking behind the building is very easy. The building is very quiet overall. The first morning was kind of noisy thanks to some roosters who were excited to let the neighborhood know it was morning. To remedy this we closed the windows and turned on AC in the living room to keep the place from getting to warm overnight (we stayed during a very warm week in early Sept so this was nice for a couple of reasons), and there were no other noise issues for the remainder of our stay. Overall this was a great place to stay and I'll stay here again in the future if it's available.
Great location with many eating options in easy walking distance, inside of apartment is super nice and clean. Bed is comfortable as well!

If this place is on your ‘final options’ list (which it should be), you should save yourself the time deliberating between the small details that all listings provide and just pick this one. It’s a great place to stay, in a great location, at a great place. We found everything about Todd’s condo to be welcoming and accommodating.

Todd’s place is the best! The location is awesome and the view is perfect. The condo was very clean and the decor was on point. The bed is like a big pillow and so comfy. We decided we would definitely stay here again!

Todd is courteous and pleasantly welcoming. He anticipated many of our needs with detailed messages and answered any questions we had promptly. His condo is a thoughtfully decorated and meticulously maintained home with plenty of supplies for every impromptu tropical activity: snorkeling gear, beach chairs, etc. For those who enjoy surfing or SUPing, the location cannot be beat. We would not hesitate to book with him again!

Great place to stay! Very convenient and great food all around. Kihei cafe, just down the block, is absolutely delicious. 

Definitely would stay again.

Todd’s place was so perfect for our stay in Kihei. We were so close to everything. Joy’s place is a must for lunch and surfing lessons right out of our door. We would highly recommend Makena Beach (make your way to little beach across the rocks for a little something extra). The condo was stylish, cozy, and clean. We had everything we needed. Highly recommended!

If you like your interiors to be a beautiful as the view, then look no further. We loved our stay here. While it's interior design is spectacular, it is also comfortable, which is a hard combination to find. The view and the lanai cannot be beaten, it's the best place for your early morning coffee and late night glass of wine.

The kitchen is fully stocked with everything you need to cook, great prep space, deep farm style sink, and full of little amenities that Todd graciously has provided. Washer, Dryer, and Dishwasher work great and we were thankful to wash our clothes since it meant we could pack less. 

Besides being gorgeous, the shower in the bathroom is awesome.  We loved the peppermint body wash which felt amazing after a day in the sun. So cooling!

Plenty of storage in the bedroom with hangers provided. The bed is very comfortable and I have spinal cord damage so when I say it's (Website hidden by Airbnb) is comfy. The couch is also comfortable, good for a nap after a long day at the beach and my husband loved the armchair.

Joy's Place downstairs became our favorite go-to spot for breakfast or lunch. You can also walk to the local grocery store, it's that close. This is the perfect location for a home base, right in the middle of it all. Easy drive to the other popular locations on the island like Paia, Wailea, and Lahaina.

Stop debating and book this place!

All the other reviews have captured our thoughts about Todd's place.  It is as described...very clean, updated, very well supplied, close to grocery, restaurants, beach, etc.  I appreciate the photos Todd has posted...the shot taken from the balcony (the space is on the 5th floor) is exactly what you see!  I have observed that many hosts claim an ocean view from the balcony, then post a photo that is zoomed in on a patch of water, giving the impression it's a clear view, when in reality there are trees, utility poles, buildings, etc that take up the bulk of the view. Not so with Todd's place!  I also appreciated the copy of "Maui Revealed" in the room!  There are also a number of condiments and spices in the kitchen, which was great. We would stay here again!

It was an amazing place to stay. The views were spectacular. The apartment was very clean and conveniently located near lot of food options. Todd responded very quickly to any queries. I would highly recommend.
Todd's place was a joy to stay at, not only was the location amazing but Todd has done everything to make the condo comfortable - it felt like a home away from home!

Wonderful place conveniences all around 
quiet spacious clean well-kept
Clean and excellent host. All amenities available. Thank you for your hospitality

Todd’s place and photos are exactly as described and I couldn’t agree more with all of the positive reviews. He was quick to respond to questions and also gave thorough instructions for check in and out process. Things we especially loved were the location, all the essentials for the beach, and the comfortable bed.

Amazing condo- Todd literally outfitted it with everything you need, from kitchen scissors to a first-aid kit to lawn chairs! He’s also incredibly responsive and even gave us recommendations for things to do on the island. Unfortunately we didn’t really get to use the balcony, but it’s absolutely beautiful and faces the water. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a place to stay in Maui!
fantastic location with all the amenities you could ask for!

Todd’s place is stylish, wonderfully located and well stocked with all the extras. Even the balcony is tiled and furnished well, not to mention the view. While the exterior of the building is non-descript, the interior of Todd’s apartment is a cozy retreat. Kihei cafe, Joy’s, Paia Fish Market were delicious and walking distance.

We loved staying at Todd’s place! Very conveniently located and the balcony views were amazing. It felt so homey there, and was easy to just enjoy the space after a long day on the beach. There were also a bunch of cats that live in the parking lot, so that was a huge bonus for us cat lovers. It was super clean, I especially liked the  huge shower as I’m 6’2 and usually showers are too small for me. If you’re looking for a place to stay in Maui, I’d 100% recommend Todd’s. We will be coming back next year! Thanks again!

name: This, your Stunning Ocean View! Oceanfront Resort!
summary: Aloha and welcome to our TOP FLOOR, gorgeous amazing OCEAN VIEW Islander on the Beach, Unit 341, studio condo in Kauai.       Our unit offers the exact STUNNING DIRECT OCEAN VIEW you see in the big picture above.   This picture is taken from the lanai.  No cranking your head to the left or right to get a view!  Many guests have told me this view is better than oceanfront views because of the top floor and expanse of the view.
space: *Condo - 10 mins drive from Lihue airport *GREAT VALUE -top floor, beachfront amazing ocean view condo studio with kitchenette *CONVENIENT LOCATION - midway on the eastern coast of kauai.  30 minutes to north or south Kauai.    *DINNING and SHOPPING - Restaurants and dining all within walking distance of the condo. Coconut Market Place, an open shopping mall is directly next to the condo complex *BEACHFRONT RESORT - steps to white sand beach  *SAFE, QUIET, PEACEFUL, IMMACULATELY MANICURED GROUNDS
description: Aloha and welcome to our TOP FLOOR, gorgeous amazing OCEAN VIEW Islander on the Beach, Unit 341, studio condo in Kauai.       Our unit offers the exact STUNNING DIRECT OCEAN VIEW you see in the big picture above.   This picture is taken from the lanai.  No cranking your head to the left or right to get a view!  Many guests have told me this view is better than oceanfront views because of the top floor and expanse of the view. *Condo - 10 mins drive from Lihue airport *GREAT VALUE -top floor, beachfront amazing ocean view condo studio with kitchenette *CONVENIENT LOCATION - midway on the eastern coast of kauai.  30 minutes to north or south Kauai.    *DINNING and SHOPPING - Restaurants and dining all within walking distance of the condo. Coconut Market Place, an open shopping mall is directly next to the condo complex *BEACHFRONT RESORT - steps to white sand beach  *SAFE, QUIET, PEACEFUL, IMMACULATELY MANICURED GROUNDS Pool, Hot Tub, Pool side bar, BBQ grills, white sand beach, 5 acres
neighborhood_overview: Islander on the beach complex is a Beachfront property, you walk onto a white sand beach withing a few steps of the pool area. The complex is next to Coconut marketplace, an outdoor shopping mall, lots of restaurants and shops within walking distance.
notes: Islander on the Beach is a low rise complex fashioned after the Old Hawaiian Charm style of décor. In keeping with that décor, this complex does not have elevators. My unit is on the top, third floor which offers the best view. The steps to the condo are not at all steep and pictures will be forwarded to you upon request. Guests must be ok with no elevators. You do not pay an amenity fee and you get a tremendous savings on the rental rate when you book through me. As such, the laundry room and front desk will not be available for your use.
