Everything else on the complex such as the pool, hot tub, barbecue grills, common areas are available to you. All rates subject to 14.42% state tax 100% of payment due at time of booking Check out cleaning required Check in time is 3:00 PM, check out time is 10:00 AM Check in and check out times are not adjustable. If you have a late departing flight, please consider renting an additional night to accommodate really late check out times. If you hav
transit: You should rent a car on Kauai as public transportation isn't readily available.  You can bike or walk along the beach next to the condo.  Parking is free in the condo parking lot or else streets right outside the parking lot.  Driving up north to Hanalei/Princeville is about 30 minutes and the same distance south to Poipu.
access: Pool, Hot Tub, Pool side bar, BBQ grills, white sand beach, 5 acres of immaculate grounds, beachside pathway for bikes and walking
interaction: I am always available by text or email or facetime. I have on island contact person if you have any questions or problems.
house_rules: - Check in time is 3:00 PM, check out time is 10:00 AM. Check in and check out times are not adjustable. If you have a late departing flight, please consider renting an additional night to accommodate really late check out times. If you have an early flight arrival time, please respect the check in time of 3 PM. - $50 deducted from security deposit if guest is not out of condo by 10 AM - Lost key fee of $40.00 is applied. - Any beach towels or bath towels taken upon check out, $15/towel fee will be charged. - Islander on the Beach is a low rise complex fashioned after the Old Hawaiian Charm style of décor. In keeping with that décor, this complex does not have elevators. My unit is on the top, third floor which offers the best view. The steps to the condo are not at all steep and pictures will be forwarded to you upon request. Guests must be ok with no elevators. - No Refunds after booking - A refundable $150 damage security deposit is required with every booking. The $150 is used to

host.host_about: I'm a mom. I love dogs, tropical fruits, I'm almost vegan, love Hawaii.  I treat my guests as friends.  I would like my guests to treat my condo as their home.

reviews.comments: Esther's place met our needs for a great long weekend getaway perfectly! She is very good at communicating and helps you to feel very wecolme there. It was so wonderful to have such nice ocean views out the window and lanai. Great central location to see everything on the island!

The condo unit is modern, clean and attractive. The view from the balcony is just like the photo, and lovely to sit on for breakfast and a drink at night. The hot tub and pool were nice, never crowded, plenty of chairs and lounges, even two covered gazebos, and the grounds pretty and well maintained. The outside bar looked nice though we never used it, and the small central lobby was attractive and getting the parking sticker from the receptionist was no difficulty. All was very clean and not one bug did we see even with the screen door open constantly. The temperature and ocean breeze were so perfect we never needed the fan or air conditioner (winter season—December). We loved sleeping to the sound of crashing waves! Garbage and recycling is convenient—at the foot of the stairs. The unit is on the third floor but that’s no problem for anyone in normal health.  A basic kitchen with coffee pot, fridge, utensils, mugs, glasses, knives, microwave.. was all we needed, though there is an electric fry pan and barbecue grills on the property near the pool. Mostly it was quiet and serene, though the crowing roosters get annoying. However, they’re all over Kauai! The condo complex is right on a beautiful ocean beach and we happily swam there, though some advise not to because of the possible current. We stayed close to shore and felt safe. There are many stores and great restaurants really close by, and Kapaa is an excellent central location to tour all of Kauai.  The complex itself has a dinner grill and breakfast restaurant that was so convenient— a minute from the room. There was also a bar with music that seemed popular with young people and was never loud or annoying. Esther is pleasant and responds immediately and the lockbox worked well. I definitely recommend her place and would certainly stay here again.

We had an absolutely great stay at Esther's condo! She was a wonderful hostess and checked up on us to make sure everything was going great. The location couldn't have been more perfect, with Kapaa being central to everything on the island. The condo had all the amenities we needed and more to make a long trip comfortable, and there were beautiful beaches, great food, and shops an arms reach away. We will definitely be staying here again the next time we come, didn't want to leave. Mahalo Esther for a great experience!
Location is fantastic for the price.

The view is lovely! The location between north and south shores was great for us to drive to snorkeling sites, kayak sites. We found good nearby restaurants. The condo area itself was quiet, pretty to look at, and unpresumptious with a variety of international and mainland guests.
Centrally located to south and north end of island. Close to stores and coffee shop right there at complex. Did like the fact they drained hot rub every morning with fresh water.
This place is right on the ocean..beautiful condo..

The view alone is worth the price of staying there, and what makes it even better is that the place is only a couple yards away from a truly breathtaking beach. It’s close to stores while still being very quiet. It has pretty much every appliance you could need for your stay, and is clean and organized. The host is very responsive and checked in with us every so often to ask how we were doing. It was an amazing experience and I could not have asked for a better place to stay.

We had a lovely stay at Esther's place!
The room was spacious and comfy with a beautiful view of the ocean and a nice balcony to enjoy it.

I would definitely stay at this place again and again! The view was incredible and the hot tub and pool was really nice to have. Inside, the AC was nice and cool and the room was super clean. 

Kapaa is the perfect place. It is nearby the airport and places like Walmart, Foodland (the grocery store), Longs Drugs and some really delicious local restaurants (like the DELICIOUS Coconut Cafe) . Kapaa is placed kind of in the middle of all of the popular places like the Na Pali Coast and Hanalei, so it is easy to travel everywhere. Overall, this was one of the best trips we have taken and Esther's place made it 100% more enjoyable. Esther was also really kind and followed up with us through text to make sure everything was okay. She is such a wonderful host.

We hesitated about giving a harsh review for this AirBnB, but after staying there we believe that some issues need to be addressed.

First, let me say that the location is great : lots of nice restaurants nearby, the beach is close, nice pool, etc.

The first (minor) issue we had was finding the place: there are lots of building around, and we ended up walking around with lots of luggage before ending up asking the front desk, which we later were told we shouldn’t interact too much with because they have nothing to do with the owner. 

As for the unit itself, it has everything the ad indicates. We were a bit surprised by the heavy chloride smell, which didn’t give us the impression that the place was super clean. I myself am usually fine with any type of bed, but this one was rather uncomfortable. 

The biggest issue to us was that the AC stopped working around 9:00pm on our last evening there. It was excessively hot and humid in Kauai at that time, so that made the place really uncomfortable for us (and we live on Oahu, so are used to the heat). I was told by the owner that it was not possible to send someone before the morning (which is understandable, but still we were the ones who had to deal with the heat). I spent about an hour looking through the instruction manual online, did a manual reset, changed the batteries of the remote, but nothing worked. We decided to leave and book a hotel in Poipu for the night.

I wouldn’t make a big case out of this if I didn’t get a text the following morning by the owner claiming that she sent someone to the unit and the AC was working perfectly fine. It might be the case, I don’t know, electronic apparels sometimes stop working and then work again for no reason, but I felt like I was accused of being dishonest.

I don’t mean to be obnoxious, but I have a Ph.D. in mathematics and am a university professor, so I believe I would have managed to make the AC work in an hour of trying if there was something that could be done.

Wir hatten eine wunderbare Woche in der Wohnung von Esther. Die Lage ist traumhaft und in der Wohnung ist alles da, was man zum Wohlfühlen braucht. Esther ist eine sehr gute Gastgeberin, die sich sehr umfassend Wohl ihrer Gäste sorgt und die versucht, den Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich zu machen. Wir können sie nur weiterempfehlen.

We had the best time during our holiday. Esther was such a kind and helpful host. We were always able to ask if we needed help. 

The condo included everything you need to enjoy your holiday. Location was also great. All the services were nearby.

We can recommend Esther and her condo for everyone who are planning to visit this amazing island.

Thank you Esther!

I have stayed at this hotel several times.  I found this unit on Airbnb and it saved me money going this way. The location and view were great. The unit itself wanted for nothing. I totally recommend.
Esther’s place is in a great location and place have a really nice view with walking distance to the beach, restaurant and gift shops.
Very nice and central location.  The view was amazing.
Beautiful location that offered amazing views and beachfront. Great host and spot!

Amazing location...view from lanai worth many words. Very well maintained and cozy  studio conveniently located  only 15 minutes from airport. Nice market plaza with big grocery store and local farmer market (Tuesday and Thursday) across the parking lot at the entrance. Beautiful beaches for swimming and snorkeling (few steps in South direction). Driving to the farthest places on North or South shores within 1-1.5 hours.

name: Newly renovated studio in hip Bushwick near subway
summary: Our place is 15 minutes to Williamsburg, 20 minutes to Union Square in Manhattan. You’ll love our place because it is close to the subway, modern, clean, newly renovated and located in happening Bushwick. It's on a quiet, tree-lined street where you can find parking if needed.  Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers.   There is a very comfortable queen-sized bed, and a comfortable couch that can turn into a full size bed that sleeps 2 if necessary.
space: This is a spacious, renovated studio in the basement of a brownstone.
description: Our place is 15 minutes to Williamsburg, 20 minutes to Union Square in Manhattan. You’ll love our place because it is close to the subway, modern, clean, newly renovated and located in happening Bushwick. It's on a quiet, tree-lined street where you can find parking if needed.  Our place is good for couples and solo adventurers.   There is a very comfortable queen-sized bed, and a comfortable couch that can turn into a full size bed that sleeps 2 if necessary. This is a spacious, renovated studio in the basement of a brownstone. You have your own separate entrance to the basement studio.  It's completely private with a private entrance.  We would never enter without telling you first and without as much advance notice as possible. We would only enter if we need to access the utility room -- which is rare. For your (and ours) safety, there is a security camera outside of the building with a view to our entrance and the entrance to the studio. You can always text or call if you have any
neighborhood_overview: Our street is quiet but we are minutes away from galleries, unique bars, restaurants and clubs in a trendy and up-and-coming neighborhood.  Check out the Guidebook: we have recommended a number of places that are all within 20 minutes walking distance or less, and 10 minutes or less on the subway.
notes: We have a French press and an Italian (Bialetti) coffee makers, and single-cup manual drip filter, - but no drip machine. We have basic kitchen tools and supply pantry staples such as salt, pepper, sugar.
transit: We are a 5 minute walk from the Myrtle - Wycoff stop on the L and M subway lines.
access: You have your own separate entrance to the basement studio.  It's completely private with a private entrance.  We would never enter without telling you first and without as much advance notice as possible. We would only enter if we need to access the utility room -- which is rare. For your (and ours) safety, there is a security camera outside of the building with a view to our entrance and the entrance to the studio.
interaction: You can always text or call if you have any questions, need anything, or need any recommendations.
house_rules: We appreciate cleanliness.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: We are Jessica and Carlota, lawyer and artist.  Jessica is from Maine, living in NY for 20+ years, Carlota is from Barcelona, living in NY 7+ years.  We moved to Bushwick in August 2013 and renovated a 1901 brick row house.  We love to travel.

reviews.comments: Beautiful, cozy space in Bushwick. Jessica was more than helpful and gracious towards my brother and I during our stay. If you're looking for a lovely, clean and private space in Brooklyn, I recommend these hosts! Thanks again!

I absolutely loved staying at Jessica and Carlota's place! They were so welcoming when we arrived. Their place looks even better in person than in the pictures (Didn't think that would be possible). It's nice and clean and the bed is comfortable. My friend and I were obsessed with the shower head in the bathroom (hahaha) It's a quick walk to the L train and on a beautiful block in Bushwick. I would recommend a friend to stay here if they ever needed a place while in NY!

Our flight arrived late in the evening and Jessica was extremely gracious and friendly. She recommend the best 24 hour deli in the area selling fresh food and snacks, which we frequented throughout our stay.  The neighborhood is safe and quiet and a couple of blocks from the subway station.  The space is spacious and beautifully kept. Since it is a converted basement the space does get hot and there is no air conditioning unit, but there is a fan. Our overall experience was great and our hosts were available if we needed them but gave us our privacy.

We had a fantastic stay with Carlota and Jessica. We loved staying in Brooklyn and the property's location is great very close to the train station and a number of places where you can eat. Property is really great it felt like being in our own home. Would definitely consider staying here again. Highly recommend!

We stayed with Carlota and Jessica for four nights this past week and they did absolutely everything to make us feel at home. The place is lovely and clean, just as the photos show, very spacious, and in a great area of Bushwick. Carlota and Jessica themselves are awesome, they were available to answer any questions we had as well as to stop and chat on the stoop as we went in and out throughout the day. They gave us great recommendations about places to eat and get coffee and always went out of their way to help us. Upon check out, my boyfriend and I had a few hours before we could move into our new place and Carlota and Jessica graciously let us keep our things (including some very large suitcases and a bike box) in their living room. They truly presented themselves as friends which was such a wonderful way to enter into a new city. They even offered us deliciously cold beer, which we eagerly accepted, after check out as we waited in the heat for our cab. They did everything perfectly and I would 100% recommend this place to anyone and will probably stop by to say hello if I'm ever in the area. 10/10 and thank you guys so much for everything!

We had a great stay! The apartment is newly renovated and even nicer than it looks in the pictures. Carlota was very helpful and welcoming. It is also quite close to the subway so getting around NYC was very easy. I'd definitely stay there again!
The hosts were exceptionally helpful on getting me settled in.  They were very nice and made some very nice recommendations.  Did I mention the free espresso!  I highly recommend!

My friend and I had an amazing stay at Carlota's suite. Even though she was unable to greet us at the time of check in, she gave very clear instructions on how to set our selves up and gave us a very warm welcome as soon as she was available! Very friendly and accommodating and the space was perfect. I would 100% stay here again! :)

We absolutely loved our stay in Carlotta and Jessica's apartment. They both made us feel very welcome and were super helpful. The apartment was great and the location was great too - nice area and fantastic base to get around the rest of the city from. We would definitely recommend staying there.

Amazing studio, the place is great and so clean. It has everything you need. The host is very kind. Thank you! 
Superbe studio,  cet endroit est super et si propre . Il y a tout ce dont vous avez besoin . L'hôte est très gentille . Merci !
Carlota and Jessica are wonderful. Their home is a perfect place to stay with everything one would want for a stay in NY.

Carlota and Jessica are wonderful and very easy to communicate with. They are the perfect hosts! We really enjoyed our stay in their lovely house. It's absolutely clean, tidy and new. The subway and everything else is nearby. So it's the perfect place to stay once you are in NY.

Everything was just as described! This placs is a great hidden gem in Brooklyn. The subway station is super close and you can get anywhere you want with ease. Carlotta was extremely accommodating to our redeye flight time and let us check in super early! Amazing place!
Great hosts!

My 11 year old son, husband and I stayed here the last 3 nights. It was perfect! Bed soo comfortable,shower renewed me, and plenty of room for us. Jessica & Carlota were exceptional hosts, so refreshingly normal they got it! We totally would stay here again and highly recommend to others! Thank you ladies! 
Annie & boys

The studio is clean and spacious, location is quite convenient and it's quiet at night. The overall experience of our stay was excellent. 

Room condition - 5/5
Location - 4/5
Overall experience - 4.8/5

For it being our very first visit in Brooklyn, staying in this beautiful downstairs loft was truly a great experience and idea of what it is like to live in NY and were truly impressed. Carlota is a very nice and accommodating to all of our needs and even let us keep our bags upstairs early. I highly recommend staying here as it is a lovely and comforting stay. It gave me more of a reason to move here.
Carlota & Jessica are very friendly and helpful. The space is beautifully decorated and very close to the subway lines.

We loved Carlota's and Jessica's studio!  The design is beautiful, the space is totally roomy, and we love the Bushwhack neighborhood; walkable to so many places, or the L Train is walkable if you want to explore other parts of the city.  We felt very welcomed, with fresh water and a local beer in the fridge for us!  The shower amenities were fabulous (from Bliss!), the bed was super comfy and the bath towels were spa quality!  We got to meet Carlota and Jessica and they are lovely people as well.  We'd love to stay here again when we come back to NY.  Highly recommended!
We had a very nice stay in the modernly furnished and clean appartment of Jessica and Carlota! The subway connection was good to the rest of the city.

El estudio de Jessica y Carlota es muy cómodo, está muy bien equipado, independiente del resto de la casa y tiene un fácil acceso al metro.

Carlota es muy simpática y ha sido atenta con nosotros en todo momento.

Desde JFK, se puede llegar en el AirTrain + metro por unos 8,00US$ o un taxi por unos 35,00US$ (tarifa de día).
Se llega a cualquier parte de Manhattan en unos 30/40 min con las líneas L y M, hay un gran supermercado y varios lugares para comer cerca del estudio.

En resumen, muy recomendable.
Helder

This place was perfect! My boyfriend and I were visiting NY for the first time and one of our best choices was staying where we did! Carlotta was very helpful and accommodating. The place is adorable and in a perfect neighborhood. The L train that takes you straight into Manhattan is a couple of blocks a way. Safe neighborhood (we got home after 2am most nights). Definitely recommend this gem!

We really enjoyed our stay and Carlota and Jessica's studio. My friends and I stayed here for 6 nights and we all thought that the studio is really clean, stylish and very convenient to everything. They were very prompt in responding to my messages and they kindly facilitated parking for me as we had a car with us. I highly recommend staying with them and will do so again when we're in town :D

Open space with a comfy bed and nice shower. Everything was very clean! It's only a short walk to the subway that leads to straight into the city. 
The neighborhood was quite and we felt pretty safe walking back late at night. 
There are many places in walking distance for food and other essentials. 
It's a great place to experience something different than the typical tourist stuff. Definitely would stay again.

We had a great stay at Carlota and Jessica's. They were very friendly and accommodating.

The studio was clean and spacious for two people. It was close to the L train which made getting to Manhattan very convenient. There was also a huge grocery store and several shops located near the stop. The neighborhood was quiet and street parking was easy. Overall, a great experience.

Carlota and Jessica were fantastic hosts. They were responsive, respectful and generous. Getting in the apartment was very easy, the photos are accurate and the place is clean. Close enough to the subway. Awesome place really! Nothing to complain about.

A great place to stay!! The apartment is great for a couple (I would not recommend staying with 4...), very clean, spacious! Ans Bushwick is just awsome!! Don't go running of to Manhattan but spend a few days in Bushwick!!
Carlotta and Jessica's palce was so great. It was so convenient to get in and out of Manhattan on the L and M train, plus Bushwick is an awesome place to B. The place itself was cool and clean.
A bright, refreshing home base to enjoy Brooklyn, with convenient MTA access to Manhattan. Super clean, private entrance, wonderful comfy bed.

We had an excellent experience staying at Carlota and Jessica's place. Accurate to the photos, very spacious, modern and private place. The bed was so comfy we had to fight to get out of it to do our sightseeing. The communication with them was excellent, they not only gave us suggestions of the places in NYC but also gave us suggestions for our next visit to Spain.
The area is very safe with easy access to transportation which can take you to anywhere in the city. The location has a wide variety of places to eat whatever your appetite desires.
Overall this was an excellent choice for our  stay in The Big Apple. We give it 5 Stars! We definitely recommend this place!
Beautiful place. Close to the subway. Close to everything you need. Would recommend to anyone.

This is a beautiful and exceptionally clean downstairs loft. The hosts were gracious enough to allow for a very late check-in to accommodate my flight. Unfortunately, they were not very communicative such that I was unable to get responses from them regarding simple amenities (e.g. an additional towel). While the neighborhood is nice and quiet, it can get pretty loud because of the hosts' conversations in the morning and their foot traffic. I appreciated the place, but it is unfortunate that I didn't have as welcoming of a stay as previous guests.

I had an amazing stay! This was my 1st time in NY and i'm glad I chose to stay in Bushwick. I loved the area and it was also super easy to travel to Manhattan, with the subway being a few minutes away. The house was easy to check into, and was perfect inside. It has everything you need + the bed is super comfortable. I would certainly recommend staying here!

Probably the best Airbnb experience I have had. This studio was everything my friend and I needed. Very cozy and clean. Carlota was very sweet and welcoming, and even made the effort to check in with us during our stay.  Will definitely book again in the future!
Sweet host, awesome studio. She had the coolest amenities and everything you need for the stay. Everything was kept very clean and presentable, I would definitely stay here again.
Overall great!

The place is extremely clean and is dipicted accurately from the photos. The ladies were extremely accommodating and made our stay better. I recommend this place if you plan on staying in Bushwick. The size if the studio is perfect for two people.

L'appartement est exactement comme sur les photos et totalement conforme à sa description. Il est également impeccablement propre. Nous n'avons manqué de rien durant notre séjour car l'appartement est très bien équipé et Carlota et Jessica toujours disponibles. La température dans le studio est idéale. L'arrêt de metro se situe à 500m et les deux lignes qui y passent sont très pratiques pour se rendre à Manhattan. Il y a également de quoi faire ses courses juste à côté de l'appartement, mais aussi la possibilité de se faire livrer ou d'acheter à manger dans le quartier. Nous recommandons ce logement si vous souhaitez loger à Brooklyn, dans un appartement spacieux, propre et bien équipé!

We had an amazing time at Carlota's studio. The place is modern, clean and comfortable. The subway is a 3 minutes walk. Carlota is a very good host, easy to communicate with :-) We definitely recommend this place!!

Carlota and Jessica's place is a great place to stay if you are visiting New York. 

Check in was well communicated, simple, clear and professional. The accomodation was clean, comfortable and spacious and the kitchen has abundant cooking facilities. 

Super easy to get the L into Manhattan but there are also some awesome bars and clubs within walking distance, as well.

Would highly recommend.
Perfect and easy communication, nicely furnished and clean apartment, close to the subway and supermarkets, good travel guide/recommendations. Definitely would stay here again!
Jessica was a great host and her place it's awesome! It is really close to the underground and really well connected with Manhattan. We really recommend this cosy studio to whoever loves Brooklyn!!!

Jessica and Carlota's apartment is everything you need. Excellent location for the short subway into Manhattan but Brooklyn more than holds its own.

Bushwick and Williamsburg are both really great places with so much going on! Highly recommend spending a couple of days of your trip here.

Apartment was clean, close to the subway and everything listed in the advertisement. We had a lovely welcome from Jessica, Carlotta and the little one. 

Would definitely recommend to anybody wanting a trip to NYC.
This place is exactly as advertised.  Well appointed for our short stay, clean beyond belief, and the hosts ever attentive if needed.  Absolutely recommend Carlota and Jessica's place!

C'est parfait!
Le logement est refait à neuf et  très propre. L'environnement est calme, ce qui donne un peu de repos après les longues journées de visites.
Il est situé très prêt des lignes L et M, ce qui est pratique pour se rendre rapidement au centre de Manhattan.
Grand supermarché et super marché Chinois pour les produits frais à 2 pas pour faire les courses.
Accueil sympathique et discret.
Je recommande ce logement.

My friend and I had a great time in NYC. Carlota and Jessica's apartment is small but it has everything you need for a short trip. The hosts were both super friendly and helpful and easy to reach anytime. The apartment was very clean, the only drawback is that walls are a bit thin so you can hear people walking around upstairs. But it's not really a problem unless you're a very light sleeper."
Amazing!

If you're looking for a spacious studio, 20 minutes from Manhattan then this is definitely the place! We had a great time, and felt very relaxed in the space. The bed was super comfortable, as was the sofa. It has all the amenities, i.e. toaster, kettle, oven, microwave etc. A nice shower and is renovated to a high standard. Carlota and Jessica were very accommodating and helped us out with clear instructions and friendly advice. Would definitely recommend this place!

Very clean, comfortable and efficient space! Quiet at night! Carlota and Jessica were very prompt and helpful in their communication with us! Great bargain for Brooklyn and NYC! Definitely would stay there again!
a perfect stay!

We had a wonderful stay at Carlota and Jessica's studio! The place was clean, fresh and comfortable with all the amenities you need. Well located in Bushwick with only a short walk to the nearest subway station and the L and M trains to Manhattan. The hosts were very friendly, accommodating and prompt in responding to messages. Would highly recommend Carlota and Jessica's place!

My girlfriend and I stayed here and it was awesome. Looked exactly like the pictures and the neighborhood was awesome. You're super close to the sub station and bus stations which is convenient and there's plenty of food and drink options in the area. The place also had everything we needed like a coffee maker, towels and the bed was great. If you're looking for a quiet hip place to stay in Brooklyn then I'd stay here!

Carlota and Jessica are exellent hosts. Very kind, helpful and communicative. The neighbourhood is nice, refreshing, a lot going on. The traveltime to the center of Manhattan was a little bit longer than we had expected. (ca 30 min.)

What a great studio this is. It is comfortable and clean. A short walk from subway, groceries, laundry and more. 20 minutes on the L train and you are in the city. Very convenient location and modern inside. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

La ubicación es buena cerca de una estación del metro y de un supermercado. Carlota una anfitriona muy atenta y el Studio no le pide nada a algún otro. Entrada independiente, todos los servicios necesarios para disfrutar la estancia.
Love this place! Reasons why I came back again. Still clean, it's a great location and she's such a sweet host.
All was perfect...

Auch wenn Brooklyn noch nicht ganz soviel zu bieten hat und man zum Abendessen etwas suchen muss, ist man mit der SUB schnell in Manhatten. Das Flat ist genau wie beschrieben- wir hatten eine super Zeit!

These women were amazing. The place was even better in person than the actual photos, the gots were gracious and kind, and everything was incredibly close. Starbucks, a super market, clothing stores, laundromats, and the train station is five minutes away. This is an amazing space!

Jessica and Calota's place was absolutely fantastic! A very short walk to the subway which, if you take the L line, takes you directly to trendy Williamsburg and further on into Manhattan. The loft is clean, spacious (incredibly rare for New York) and comfortable. The check in system is super easy and the directions to reach the apartment itself were super easy to follow. There are grocery shops and restaurants nearby although we preferred to catch the subway closer to Williamsburg/Manhattan for this. A great place to stay & Jessica and Carlota were always there to lend a hand with whatever we needed and always available to contact! Would 10/10 recommend!

Carlota & Jessica's basement flat is great and as advertised. They are also very friendly and welcoming. It is a short walk away from the subway (L) and there is a large store right around the corner. We had a very nice stay and would definitely recommend!

Very nice apartment, clean and with all the basics (coffee, hair dryer, shower gel,..). Pleasant and friendly neighbourhood. Subway and supermarket only 5min walk away. Hosts Carlota and Jessica were very friendly, came to check if everything is ok and if we need anything, and they also let us leave our suitcases past the check out time on the last day (we are really grateful for that). Would definitely recommend.

Great neighbourhood.  Very comfortable, modern and well apppointed studio.  Everything you need and more.  Very accommodating hosts.  Noise from upstairs does travel throughout though.  Otherwise a quiet and safe neighbourhood.

We loved Carlota and Jessica's place!  It was spotless and a really lovely little studio.  The neighborhood was really unique and we found some great restaurants within walking distance.  The subway into Manhattan is also very convenient.  The sofa bed was surprisingly extremely comfortable as well!  The hosts were communicative and available.  Would definitely stay here again.

Great clean studio in a nice neighborhood with very friendly hosts!
A short walk to the subway which has a direct line to Manhattan every 10 minutes. 
We really enjoyed our stay and recommend everybody to stay here while visiting New York.

Great hosts. Always at hand for any information and help that we needed. The property is in a safe and secure area of Brooklyn. It's very clean and perfect for 2 people to stay in. 
There is a crap supermarket round the corner and several Deli's and fast food restaurants within close walking distance. 
The closest subway stop is just 5 minutes walk away so very easy to get around the rest of the city. Location wise there isn't a lot to to within walking distance of the house however we wouldn't have swapped this for the security the house provided.
Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend to couples who just want somewhere clean and secure to sleep in while they're out exploring the city.

Carlota and Jessica are really nice and communicative people! The studio was located nearby the subway, was very clean and had everything we needed. They also provide a lookbook with nice restaurants in the area. Carlota and Jessica are available for questions and very responsive! They also offered to call us a taxi service to the airport and let us leave our luggage longer the day of the departure. We really enjoyed our stay!

Great place to discover New York! Good location, near the subway and supermarket. You can take the L train to Manhattan and from there explore the city center. The studio was clean and had everything we needed. The street was quiet, which was nice after walking the whole day in crowded Manhattan. 
Carlota and Jessica allowed us to stay a little bit longer on our last day, so we didn’t have to leave the studio early since our flight was in the afternoon.

Well positioned flat (30 mn to Manhattan by train, 5 mn walk to trains), pleasant and convenient accommodation. Carlota makes sure you feel happy and well-informed.
Appart bien placé (30 mn de Manhattan en train, 5 mn à pied du métro), logement plaisant et pratique. Carlota s'assure que ses visiteurs se sentent contents et soient bien informés.

Logement propre et très bien équipé. Hôtes très accueillantes et arrangeantes. Les petits points négatifs : le bruit de l’étage du dessus (hôtes) par manque d’insonorisation et le temps de métro pour rejoindre Manhattan (30 min). Le quartier est plutôt calme et on y trouve de quoi manger sans soucis ainsi qu’un supermarché à proximité.

The perfect spot! Privacy is hard to come by in New York, but we were lucky to find it at Carlota and Jessica’s! Modern, clean, cozy and cute, the apartment was everything we’d hoped it would be and more. Close to the trains, in a great neighborhood with delicious food, and Carlota and Jessica were available and within reach should we have needed them. We will definitely recommend it to friends in the future! Thank you!
We had a lovely stay at Carlota’s place! It was a very Nice and clean place and the hosts were very hospitable. we highly recommend this place.
Just what we needed for our stay

L’appartamento è molto pulito e confortevole, a 5 minuti a piedi dalla metro L da dove puoi raggiungere facilmente Manhattan in 20 minuti! 
L’ host è molto gentile e risponde subito alla richieste dando consigli utili per girare NY! 
Un esperienza fantastica!
Grazie
Close to the subway and shops, amazing hosts, only downside is you hear everything above you in the house

Beautiful and spacious basement studio apartment. Aircon totally works to keep it warm in the winter! 7 min walk to the subway and really easy to get into manhattan, plus a grocery store like 2 mins away. Great location! 

Everything was easy here - we loved it.
Everything was fine. They were really flexible with our late check-out.
We had a great stay! Easy to find, clear communication, and in a convenient location. Carlota and Jessica were very accommodating.

Very noisy, it should not be allowed to be in the “entire home/ Apartment” category. It felt like I was staying in the basement of a large family’s house during the holidays — crying baby, toddlers designated running area apparently right above the unit. The hosts all but admitted to me they kept tabs on my coming and goings during my one awkward  interaction. I stayed at other Bushwick AirB&Bs before and after and theirs was the worst value. On a positive note, design of unit was excellent.
Hidden gem in Brooklyn and extremely polite. Nice short walk to the train as well!

This spot is absolutely adorable and an excellent location. Not far from food, bars, trains and fun! The hosts were super nice and responsive. Only downside to the place is the walls are thin so it was easy to hear, but it didnt stop us from having a great time!! Would definitely come back.

Lugar limpio, cómodo y renovado recientemente. El barrio muy residencial, limpio, cerca del metro y con buenos locales cerca. Carlota fue muy atenta y servicial. La zona donde esta la casa es muy interesante, también hay cosas cerca. Nos hubiese encantado quedarnos más tiempo para ver más. Definitivamente lo recomendamos.

My wife and I stayed here for the weekend while in town for some music and we loved the space.  The neighborhood is great, the space is really clean and cozy, everything is new, and the bed is really comfy.  As some others have mentioned, there is some noise because the studio is essentially located in the basement, but we weren't bothered at all.  The neighborhood itself is really quiet, so we still felt like the space was quiet and comfortable and perfect for relaxing in between city activities.  Carlota and Jessica were very responsive and went out of their way to accommodate us.  We would absolutely recommend this space to others and will stay here again if we need a place in Brooklyn.

Great little basement room studio. Cool vibes and very clean! 10 min walk to the station where we could get anywhere central in 20 mins or so. We were left to our own devices and trusted with the space which was appreciated. Comfy bed.
Wonderful place and excellent communication!

El departamento estaba en excelentes condiciones, con todas las comodidades necesarias, limpio, distancia accesible. El barrio muy bueno, variedad de lugares para comer y supermercados. Carlota fue muy atenta y respondió enseguida a nuestras inquietudes. Recomendamos el lugar y volveriamos a ir.

Carlota und Jessica haben eine wunderschöne Wohnung in einer sehr schönen Gegend von New York. Alle Angaben stimmen 100% überein mit dem, was man vor Ort vorfindet und auch die Fotos täuschen nicht. Das AirBnB ist sehr schön, man befindet sich in einer netten und vor allem ruhigen Straße und hat gute Anbindungen zum Verkehrsnetz. Die Küche ist ausreichend ausgestattet, sollte man es mal bevorzugen, zuhause zu frühstücken. Im Umkreis weniger Minuten (Fußweg) findet man auch alles, was benötigt wird (Cafés, Supermärkte, Apotheken etc.) 
Ich persönlich habe bereits einige AirBnBs genutzt und kann die Bleibe von Carlota und Jessica wärmstens weiterempfehlen!

Fantastico pisito, muy comodo muy bien comunicado, anfitrionas muy simpaticas, a 15 min de manhattan.
Para repetir

Appartement très propre, refait avec goût!
Pratique car situé à 5 min d’un métro, et d’un supermarché.
Hôtes très sympathiques et arrangeantes. 
Je recommande vivement ce logement!

Nice place to stay.  Clean, and accurate to the description.   A bit noisy with the small child upstairs, however this was explained in the description, and wouldn't deter me from selecting this location again.   Honestly, if you come to New York for peace and quiet, you may be in the wrong place.

Great, affordable place to stay in Brooklyn. Easy walk to the train to get basically anywhere and you can also walk within 10-15 mins to try out some local restaurants and breweries. We had a great stay and it was perfect for the two of us.
My boyfriend and I had a great time at Carlota and Jessica’s place. They were very accommodating and the location felt safe!

An amazing private, super clean, artsy, stylish place with a private entrance. Close to train stations and a huge market. 30-40 minutes to the city and Coney Island, a great central location. Neighborhood is friendly. Carlota and Jessica respond quickly and have great recommendations. We highly recommend this place.
Tolle Unterkunft, alles vorhanden, Metro nach Manhattan fussläufig, sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberinnen

With all the options I saw scrolling through air b&b, I'm really happy we chose to stay in Carlota's and Jessica's studio. The studio was stylish and spacious and comfortable.  Nice place to sit around the island and have coffee in the morning.  A comfortable couch to flop on after a day of wandering the city, and a really comfortable bed to rest in at the end of the night. There was enough space for 2 women to over pack at home and unpack there.   The value of the space was beyond expectations.  Communication was great when I had questions, they got right back to me.  

The location was great.  Just a short distance from 2 different subway lines (M & L) which was really convenient for getting around the city.  There's also plenty to do and see around the neighborhood.  Beautiful street art and delicious food all in a short walk

All in all, I don't think we could have found a better space for our vacation!

Carlota and Jessica's place is one of the coolest AirBnBs we've ever stayed in! Stylish, minimal and super clean. It was a very short walk to the nearest subway stop, and if you're willing to walk a little bit it's close to lots of cool bars and restaurants in Bushwick.

Thank you for a great stay!

This was a great place to stay!  Lots of well laid out space and very clean.  We did not cook, but if we had wanted to, the unit is well supplied to do so.  The weekend was very hot in Brooklyn, so it was wonderful to enjoy the mini-split air conditioner in the evenings.  The neighborhood is diverse, friendly, and feels safe.
I didn’t get the chance to meet Carlota and Jessica since they were out of town but their place is very clean and has all the amenities you’d need! Very close to transport and food
Génial sous-sol pour le prix, emplacement à 30 minutes de Manhattan, propre et beau!

Amazing space!!  Bed was comfortable to the point we found it hard to get out of it! Super hip bathroom, very nice kitchen.  For the summertime the AC was INCREDIBLE to come back to after walking around in the heat and humidity all day.  We didn't use the kitchen space much but it's a proper amount of space and has everything you need to make a good meal.  Most importantly Carlota and Jessica were always quick to respond to any questions or concerns we had and were very gracious hosts.  Highly recommend them to anyone wanting to stay in the area, which is also fantastic.  Thank you both!!
Very nice and clean! Hosts quick to respond!
Lieux très bien situé pres des metro et épicerie.
It was clean and in a good location.
Place was really clean, comfy and close to train stop! Perfect location

The place was very cozy and lots of open space. Easy to have access to all the amenities that were available for us. Beautiful home and very friendly and welcoming host. We'll definitely be staying with them again on our next visit!

This was a perfect place to stay at during our NYC trip! It was in a safe and quiet neighborhood. It was also just a 5-minute walk away from a market, Starbucks, Dunkin Donut, CVS, and subway station which was convenient. The place itself was clean and spacious. The bed was comfy, the shower was nice, and they recycle(Go green!). The hosts were sweet and sometimes you can see them walk their cute puppy in the morning. We would definitely stay again!
Carlota and Jessica are super hosts and the studio has everything you need for a really great stay! Full recommendation!
Very cute spot, had everything we needed & more. Great location. Highly recommend!

Die Wohnung ist für 2 Personen angenehm groß. Die Lage ist gut- nicht nur ein Supermarkt in nächster Nähe und die U-Bahn Station in 5 min zu Fuß zu erreichen. Die Anbindung an Manhattan ist angenehm mit nur einmal umsteigen zu den großen Sehenswürdigkeiten. Die Küche ist zum Kochen ideal ausgestattet, es ist wirklich alles vorhanden. Man hört die Kinder im Stockwerk drüber tatsächlich morgens von ca 8 -8.30 Uhr, was für uns aber kein Problem war, da wir zu dieser Zeit sowieso wach waren. Carlota kam am zweiten Tag sehr nett zu uns runter um zu fragen ob alles soweit in Ordnung ist und hat bei Fragen ihre Hilfe angeboten.
Sehr schöne Unterkunft !
Perfect studio, very clean and owners are helpfull
Great hospitality and such a lovely place to stay. Would recommend to anyone

What a great Airbnb! It’s in a prime location, has great accessibility and is a clean and well-cared for spot. Great communication, and quick feedback. Would stay in this thoughtfully designed place again anytime!

We had an amazing trip to New York and so pleased we picked Carlota and Jessica’s place to stay! We had everything we needed and it was great to come back to a nice apartment on a beautiful street after a busy day in the city
Muy bueno!! De acuerdo a lo que buscábamos y si hablas español inmejorable!!

This place is super sweet! Carlota and Jessica’s studio is everything you will need for a comfy trip. We felt so at home, it was hard to leave. 

The best parts: super comfortable bed and pillows, clean bathroom with great, modern design, kitchen outfitted with everything you’ll need and super secure entry with a coded lock so we felt really safe.
A great place to stay. Clean and comfortable studio, nice hosts and an interesting district. Our recommendation!
Very nice place! Very clean and stylish! The neighbourhood is practical and the street is beautiful. The hosts let us check in early and responded quickly. Great experience!

Carlota and Jessica’s apartment is absolutely spotless, well-equipped and very well-located for the L and M trains into Manhattan (around 30 mins to the centre). Our hosts responded extremely quickly when we accidentally locked ourselves out! When we return to New York we’ll be checking to see if this place is available again.
This place is the best most conveniently located 10/10 great experience

Jessica and Carlota's place was perfect for our stay in New York. It was a short distance from the subway station and that particular station isn't busy at all so it was easy to figure out which train to get on. The place itself was spacious and had everything you could need, it even had a full kitchen if you wanted to cook a meal. I would definitely recommend staying here if you are looking for something close to the city

Carlota and Jessica's place was amazing. Located only a few blocks away from the subway and only minutes away from Brooklyn's hippest neighborhoods, it was definitely a treat to be able to have the full New York experience with such ease and convenience.

One of my favorite Airbnb’s so far. The location was perfect, everything was close by including supermarket and public transportation. I really made myself at home, the place was super clean, the bed cloud 9 comfortable, the shower head made me feel I was in a spa. One of the days, I was so comfortable I just decided to stay “at home” instead of going to the city! It is not only that the place is newly renovated which means everything is sparkly new but they did a wonderful job creating a cozy place. Carlota and Jessica are great hosts with superb communication, which I really appreciated. I hope every time I visit NYC in the future I can stay here.
Casa ordinatissima pulita e con ogni confort. A poca distanza c e la metro e un grande supermercato. Il letto comodissimo me lo sarei portato a casa!

Carlota and Jessica’s studio is warm, clean, and comfortable. Just a short walk down from the Myrtle-Wykroff subway, it’s surrounded by little deli’s, takeaways, restaurants.

I was able to explore the city at my leisure and the studio felt secure and well laid out.

Definitely would use again.
Great space very clean and modern and a great location! Would stay again!
Everything was really great!
Carlota and Jessica's place was great. Very clean, great location, and the bed was super comfy!

Very comfortable bed and couch.
Very good location. 
BYOT Bring your own towel.
Very Modern 
Can hear footsteps upstairs early in the morning.

Carlota & Jessica’s place has just what we needed! We could start with a morning pour-over or espresso before heading out for the day. The bathroom was cute & updated. Location is great as it is very close to the train, just a few minutes' walk!

A very welcoming family. Thank you for making our New York stay comfortable!
Great host

name: The Porto Concierge - Baron Omega
summary: O meu espaço fica perto de o centro da cidade e arte e cultura. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de o ambiente, o bairro, a iluminação, ea cama confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, famílias (com crianças), egrandes grupos.
description: O meu espaço fica perto de o centro da cidade e arte e cultura. Vai adorar o meu espaço por causa de o ambiente, o bairro, a iluminação, ea cama confortável. O meu espaço é bom para casais, aventuras individuais, viajantes de negócios, famílias (com crianças), egrandes grupos. There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment: - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals):    -  4  to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes - Metro (you should leave on Carolina Michaelis stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 2 minutes walking Service is provided by a business partner therefore is subject to availability.
transit: There are some options for you to come from the airport to the apartment: - Private transfer to the apartment (Lux car): 9€/person 2 to 3 people (private driver pick up at Arrivals) - takes 20 minutes (can be used for 1 person but will cost 18€) - Transfer service in a private bus from Airport to the apartment (private driver pick up at Arrivals):    -  4  to 6 persons: 9€/person - takes 25 minutes - Metro (you should leave on Carolina Michaelis stop) - 2,45€ / each person - takes 35 minutes + 2 minutes walking Service is provided by a business partner therefore is subject to availability.

host.host_about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

address.government_area: Cedofeita, Ildefonso, Sé, Miragaia, Nicolau, Vitória

reviews.comments:
La casa es exactamente como aparece. Tres dormitorios dobles y dos sencillos más dos camas en el salón. La cocina estaba completa y además hay una terraza grande. El barrio no está en pleno centro lo que lo hace más tranquilo (y con comercios y restaurantes sensiblemente más baratos). Desayunamos 6 personas por menos de 8€ y comimos por menos de 40. En todo caso el metro está a menos de 4 minutos andando. La casa es amplia y cómoda aunque la estructura del edificio es antigua. A nuestra llegada teníamos sábanas y toallas para cada una de las camas aunque no íbamos a usar todas las habitaciones, también teníamos productos de limpieza, y vajilla completa. 

Nos parece una casa perfecta para pasar unos días en Oporto, sobre todo para ir varias parejas o grupos grandes.
La casa está muy bien situada, a 15-20 min caminando del centro, dando un agradable paseo. Sencilla y limpia. Adecuada para una familia

El apartamento es genial. Enorme, bien ventilado e iluminado, decorado con buen gusto, cómodo, dotado de todo lo necesario para vivir unos días en Porto. La ubicación no es del todo céntrica, pero en 15 minutos paseando se llega al centro de la ciudad y, además, está al lado del metro.
El agua a veces dar con muy poca fuerza y el telefonillo desde arriba no abre el portal.
All in all was the service good. I already described the parts which wern't amusing. I would definitely come back.
Good location, big place with nice spaces. Short walt to downtown

We had a really nice stay with a group of 9 students. The appartement was very big and we had all the space we needed. There were 10 beds available and even an extra mattress. The dishwasher was a nice surprise too! Even tho we had some delay in reaching the appartement, the owner tried his best to give us the keys as soon as possible.

Definitely would stay here again! Frederico uses the Porto Concierge who is a company that helps you check in and answers any of your questions. They were very helpful and sent us a list of things to do and transportation options before we arrived. They let us pick up our keys earlier than check-in time. They even offered to keep our bags until we could check-in or to get the keys and go to the apartment earlier to drop off our bags even though the housecleaners were still cleaning the apartment! We arrived to a very big apartment. The beds were very comfortable and the apartment was very clean. The neighborhood is a little loud because of a neighbor's dog but the apartment itself was perfect. Fairly close to public transportation and center of Porto.

The apartment does really correspond with photographs. It is big, renewed, very confortable for 6-8 people. Very clean and well equipped. With big Tv, wifi, netflix, etc. Bathrooms (2) brand new and clean. Kitchen enough and well equipped with cocking tools. Location close to the center at walking distance and very quite neighborhood very representative of the city. There are many nice & cheap restaurants nearby and a supermarket. We had a very nice time at Porto, and we definitely will recommend this apartment for friends or a family trip.
Piso muy grande con muchas habitaciones. Antiguo pero reformado. A 20 minutos andando del centro.

Piso muy amplio y cómodo en una zona tranquila a unos 15 o 20 minutos a pie del  centro, y con el metro a la vuelta de la esquina. Es un 2º piso sin ascensor, bien equipado aunque sin lujos, y con un portal de entrada algo deprimente. Pudimos aparcar en la calle dos coches durante una semana sin ningún problema.

Nice and very spacious apartement with a cute balcony to eat. Quite close to the city center (about 10-15 minutes walk).
Everything was uncomplicated but we did not meet the host and the handling was done by a concierge service. 
A lot of additional services have been offered - nice if you need a ride from the airport, for example.

Frederico is a great host. Super cool and always available. Everything was perfect like the pictures. The rooms are big and perfect for big families or groups. We are definitely coming back. Thanks for letting us stay. Cheers, Gustavo ( Casa das Olarias)
Apartamento muy cómodo y con todo lo necesario para varias personas. Estacionamiento gratis en la calle. Muy buena Internet. Muy buena estadía. Sin dudas Lo recomiendo.
This place was beautiful and not far from the train station and local spots. Absolutely enjoyed our experience. Will definitely recommend to others.

Appartement spacieux pour 10, bonne literie, à proximité immédiate du métro, dans un quartier calme.
Par contre, niveau propreté notamment la cuisine il pourrait y avoir des améliorations. La communication est également à améliorer.

Malgré une gestion par un service de conciergerie, le logement n’était pas propre voire sale. 
La literie est moyenne.
Heureusement le prix n’est pas excessif étant donné le nombre de personnes que ce logement peut accueillir.

Eine tolle Wohnung mit viel Platz! Die Lage ist auch sehr gut, Stadtmitte sehr schnell zu Fuß  erreichbar, U-Bahn Station in der Nähe.  Wir waren 5 Personen aber die Bettwäsche und Handtücher wurden trotzdem für 10 Leute bereitgestellt.  Die Betten sind bisschen hart, wir haben dann die übrigen Decken benutzt als zusätzliche Unterlage.  Die Zimmern von der Straßenseite sind laut, auch nachts, man hört die Autos hoch und runterfahren auf dem Pflaster. Eine Kaffeemaschine haben wir vermisst in der Küche, aber das ist vermutlich nur bei den Deutschen Touristen wichtig :). Der Consierge war sehr hilfsbereit, reagierte sofort auf die Anfragen, ein dickes Dankeschön an ihn für die Nützlichen Tipps für die Ausflüge! Ein Tipp für die Reisenden: nützt die Zimmern die in den Hinterhof gehen, da hört man die Autos nicht, nur ab und zu den Hund von dem Nachbarn oder das Geschrei der Möwen. 
Netflix ist auch verfügbar wenn man einen Account hat.
Great location. Very good host. Place is comfortable.
Apartamento bem localizado, tinha muita mosca, tem que dar uma melhorada na cozinha e a varanda estava muito suja.

name: the shoebox, west chelsea
summary: At 180 sq ft, "the shoebox" is aptly named, but as they say in real estate "location. location. location."  Close to the highline, the whitney, the javits center, restaurants and west chelsea galleries, entertainment and business is at our door. Subways and buses are also nearby. The bed is comfy, the shower is hot (there is NOT a bathtub), there is an elevator (i'm on the 4th floor), vibe is cozy, and yes the ceiling is high.  My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers alike.
space: a few more details.... there is no bathtub but the shower is strong and hot. please note you may need to let the water run a few minutes to get hot water. there is WiFi but there is NOT a TV
description: At 180 sq ft, "the shoebox" is aptly named, but as they say in real estate "location. location. location."  Close to the highline, the whitney, the javits center, restaurants and west chelsea galleries, entertainment and business is at our door. Subways and buses are also nearby. The bed is comfy, the shower is hot (there is NOT a bathtub), there is an elevator (i'm on the 4th floor), vibe is cozy, and yes the ceiling is high.  My place is good for solo adventurers and business travelers alike. a few more details.... there is no bathtub but the shower is strong and hot. please note you may need to let the water run a few minutes to get hot water. there is WiFi but there is NOT a TV upon entry of building there is an open staircase. do not fear, continue to the right and down a short hallway is a passenger elevator.  comes in handy and greatly appreciated by those guests with a suitcase!! I am very responsive and just a text message away. IMO there is no better neighborhood in Manhattan
neighborhood_overview: IMO there is no better neighborhood in Manhattan. entrance to the Highline is on our corner. the best galleries in NYC are all within a few blocks. the new Whitney Museum in a 10 minute walk as are subways, buses and Penn Station. Restaurants, cool shopping, the Chelsea Market... oh I could go on and on!
notes: the hours for arrival and departure are a guide. i am always happy to be flexible and do my best to accommodate your travel needs. sometimes there's another  guest on either side of you that will dictate what is possible, but i try, so always ask! cheers, karen
access: upon entry of building there is an open staircase. do not fear, continue to the right and down a short hallway is a passenger elevator.  comes in handy and greatly appreciated by those guests with a suitcase!!
interaction: I am very responsive and just a text message away.
house_rules: please be discreet. Airbnb is controversial in New York and while my building is friendly to the usage, I ask guests to simply say they are my (Karen's) guests and nothing more. it is rare and unusual that anyone would ever ask.

host.host_location: New York, New York, United States
host.host_about: my home reflects my love of art, design and all things mid-century. i collect vintage ceramic, glass, objects and books.  i love to cook and entertain at home. south america has been my favored travel destination of late, and it is reflected in my home.

reviews.comments: The "sho‎ebox" is just that, really small and suitable only for a single person not staying too long. There is no TV. The host, Karen, is pleasant, the apartment is clean and the location perfect for the Highline and Chelsea Market. And the big plus for a fourth-floor apartment: there is an elevator.

Had a great stay at Karen's apartment. It was clean, organized, comfortable and was a great size for one person. The location was perfect walking distance to many great places in Chelsea and the meatpacking district, not to mention very close to the High line. Would definitely stay again!

My late flight in and early departure were accommodated. The apartment was beautiful, clean, and in a great part of town. I am a light sleeper, so the street noise and wind rattling through the older windows was a little tough. Overall though, I had a really great stay! Would highly recommend.

Karen was a great hostess, I didn't meet her but she set up everything precisely.
 I do recomend this place for singles or  couples.
The pictures shows exactly like this charming, I would say , small estudio , looks like. Pretty charming, cleaning and renewed. Much bigger than most of the rooms in NY's hotels.
The bathroom is tight but very clean but since I went to NY to spend most of the time out, its size didn't matter for me.
And besides that the neighborhood is perfect ! The street is quite and safe, walking distance to Meatpacking , the High Line is just few steps away and is full of art galleries , cafes, restaurants around .
I had a delightful stay in the "shoebox". 
PS: Karen has good taste for art and furniture, loved the chairs ...;)
Wonderful! Best location ever! Clean, comfortable and really flexible!

Karen's apartment is fantastic value for money- small but very well maintained, clean, tidy and in one of the best locations in NYC. From the first moment I reached out to Karen right through to check out, Karen was very responsive and did everything to accommodate me. I highly this apartment to anybody wishing to have a genuine and comfortable NYC experience.
Comfortable, convenient place.  Great stay, everything was easy.
Lovely place in a great location!

Karen was terrific, she was responsive and accomodating at all times. I was met by her friend and welcomed to the apt. which was extremely cute and had a wonderful view of the Empire State which made me feel at home. Brilliant to have an elevator and it is in a cool building in a great area close to the Highline. Thank you Karen.
Amazing location, comfortable place and fast communication. Small, but good for two, little kitchen (but packed with all the necessary items), big table, nice bathroom.
Great little place. Super clean. Karen was a great communicator.
Great location
Karen's stay was extremely economical and in a great area close to the chelsea and flatiron area. Great for comfortable business travel ! Easy communication.

The Shoebox has everything! It's right in the heart of Chelsea, a really short walk to restaurants, delis, bodegas, bars, the train... literally everything you need is no more than a 5 min. walk away. And you can see the Empire State Building from your window!

As far as the room, it's New York-sized and has everything you need for your stay. I was here for a week on business and found it absolutely perfect for everything I was looking for. Bed very comfortable, desk nice and big to spread out, large refrigerator, comfy chairs, etc. 

Mirek met me right on time for check-in and was so friendly and kind. He even stuck around to answer my many questions and by the end, felt like an old friend. Karen was great, as well: She checked in a few times before my travel day, once I was settled and just before checkout, to make sure I didn't need anything. My emails were answered lightning-fast and Karen was so nice!

As far as the surroundings, I'm 35 and a single female, and never once did I feel the slightest bit awkward walking around, whether it was 3 pm or 3 am. Chelsea is a fantastic, friendly and clean place, long one of my favorites. 

Couple things to remember: This IS New York, so even though you're on the fourth floor, you will hear the traffic (fire engines, construction, passersby) from your window. I left my window open to embrace all the neat sounds, but if you need complete silence during your stay... well, New York isn't the place for you in the first place!

There is no TV here. Karen *does* mention it very clearly in her description, but I thought I should throw it out there again. 

I travel here fairly often for business and I've yet to find a more affordable, clean, beautiful apartment that's so close to everything and close to work at the same time. Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a genuine New York-Chelsea experience. You will NOT be disappointed!

This studio was amazing. Close to the Highline and all public transportation and accessible to all the good restaurants. The host was amazing and was a great communicator. The place was clean, the bed comfortable and had everything I needed. The wifi was fast too. Will definitely stay there again! Also the studio is on such a pretty street.

The Shoebox was a pleasure! Right in the heart of Chelsea, affordable, and neat. Karen was a great communicator, anticipating our arrival and departure and giving clear instructions. Would definitely stay here again!

I came to New York for my daughter’s graduation and I really enjoyed staying here. The studio is located in the Chelsea District and it was clean and had all the amenities I needed to for a comfortable stay. There are quite a few restaurants and shops all within a short walking distance. I also found the neighborhood at night to be quite and safe to walk in (There is a police station a block and a half up the street). Last but not least communicating with Karen was very easy. I would definitely stay here again.

Yeah, it's a little small, but don't let that fool you. Great location steps from the High Line, Whitney and lots of great galleries and restaurants. I stayed by myself for a little over a week, and it was just perfect! 100% endorsement here.

Karen's place was awesome. Right next to so many great restaurants, Chelsea market, steps from the Highline, and an amazing little French cafe with the best almond chocolate croissant EVER. Walking distance from Meatball Shop, Amorino Gelato (the one that makes a gelato cone into the shape of a rose), and close to the 2 and E trains. The space itself is, as described, very tiny. That shouldn't really bother anyone though, and we found it to be more than enough space for my girlfriend and I. Check-in was super easy and communication was great. Elevator was a very welcome feature! Last thing I'll note is that the street this apartment is on is so, so beautiful. Right out of a NY movie set. Would love to stay here again!

Karen's place was so perfect. It's very small, but it doesn't feel cramped at all, and it is incredibly clean and nicely furnished. The neighborhood is a lovely street of brownstones, and the  location is fantastic, right in Chelsea a half block from an entrance to the High Line in one direction, a half block to a great French cafe in the other. The Whitney is a short walk along the High Line. Karen's communication was fantastic - the smallest of repairs needed to be done while I was there, and even though it was no bother at all, she was very apologetic and went out of her way to make sure I was not inconvenienced in any way. I will keep my fingers crossed that her place will be available the next time I visit New York!!

petit studio adapté à une personne seule ou un couple qui veut un pied-à-terre à Manhattan dans un endroit tranquille assez proche de tout
Équipements nécessaires et suffisants 
 j'ai beaucoup apprécié pour mon séjour seul d'une semaine

Great stay. Unit is small as others mentioned but hey that's NYC and it has all that you need. Great location. Very walkable. High line entrance is 3 blks away. 

Karen was highly responsive to our needs and questions. 

Would stay again.

Karen's apartment was a great Manhattan crash pad. Right by the amazing high line it's in a great location and exactly as described. Mirek who greeted me had some good restaurant recommendations too: try Tressel on Tenth!

Muy buena ubicación en una de las cuadras más lindas de Chelsea. Muy buenos anfitriones, el avión se demoró y Mirek nos esperó hasta las 11 pm con una sonrisa y buenas recomendaciones de restaurantes. Gracias!!

Loved my stay at the Shoebox.  Everything is as described, and quite comfortable and personal.  Karen's friend Mirek has a ton of great suggestions for the neighborhood, everything within five blocks.  It's super convenient location, but on a very quiet block and building.  Great place for someone on their own to stay.

The shoebox was the perfect place to stay for my work trip! Karen was easy and so accommodating, especially as we arrived in New York in the early hours of the morning!
The shoebox itself is clean and tidy, gives you everything you need. The bed was extremely comfortable.
An amazing yoga studio is down the road which I used daily before working. There are great restaurants in walking distance.
 I highly recommend the shoebox and would happily stay there again. Thank you Karen!

The shoebox location was perfect for exploring the city, attending shows, being touristy but also walking through Chelsea to the Chelsea market, the Highline is not even a block away and feeling safe and not crowded (for NYC). The apartment is exactly as described in the pics and has everything you need. Check in was super easy with Karen's friend Mirek. I stayed 3 nights and it felt like my home away from home in a matter of minutes. (One minor thing: takes a bit for hot water to the shower. This is very minor and should not deter anyone nor would deter me from returning- which I will.) Great stay, great apartment.
Nice place in a trendy area. In walking distance of most landmarks, but still comparatively quiet for Manhattan. Recommended.

Karen's place is small, but lovely. It's in an amazing location less than one block from the High Line and very close the Whitney and other galleries. The walls are a bit thin, so some noise traveled from neighbors, but I guess this is to be expected in NYC. The picture of the bathroom sink is a little deceiving, the sink is tiny and the faucet over-sized for such a small sink that makes it a bit awkward to use. There is also no full length mirror, for those who are wondering. Overall though, I enjoyed my stay in the shoebox because of how easy it was to get around and how close it was to so many amazing sites/places. Thanks, Karen!
Apartment, location — just beautiful. Highly recommended.

Cute and affordable apartment located close to the High Line. Our flight to NYC was delayed several hours, but Karen remained flexible and possitive despite our late arrival.  The apartment is quite small, as Karen clearly states in the description, but it should be sufficient for someone that just wants to spend a few days in NYC and use the apartment just to sleep and take a shower.

I love tiny homes and Karen's place is maybe the nicest I've ever found through airbnb, perfectly formed with nice pictures and furniture in a quiet, classy neighbourhood full of great restaurants, a half hour walk from Midtown. It's places like this that make paying half as much again for a hotel room half as nice something I will never again do as long as I live. Long live airbnb, and long live Karen's shoebox.

This apartment was clean, located in a good area, and check-in/out was easy. Karen was a great communicator - clear and fast.
The apartment had everything I needed including fast WiFi, iron, comfortable bed, air conditioning, desk to work at. For NYC, the apt was pretty quiet. The building has an elevator, although I used the stairs.

Close to Chelsea Market, the High Line, and many, many great Chelsea and West Village spots.

The place is really small, as advertised... but OK for solo/couple who do not plan on staying in for long stretches (no TV  as well) - but that's not something I wanted. Its a bit of walk to the subways - but not a problem for those in good health and lots to see along the way.

Wonderful, cozy quarters on a quiet street in a great neighborhood.  Just a block from the High Line, with easy access to the subway and appealing restaurants. Karen accommodated my late arrival very graciously and responded to every message I sent her within minutes.  An excellent value for NYC.

Great place for a solo visit, or for a couple who doesn't need much space.  The Shoebox is very clean and comfortable, and its location near the Highline and the Hudson River is perfect.  I felt very safe coming home late at night in the neighborhood and once inside the building.  I would probably stay again if I return to NYC.
What you see is what you get! Location is really stellar and Karen couldn't have been more of a breeze to deal with. Highly recommended :)
Great place to stay for visiting New York. The apartment is small but functional, and with a good location in a quiet neighborhood.
Perfect place to stay, I walked everywhere and felt like home
Cute little spot on a quiet block. Easy access to high line.

This is a fabulous location. Everything is a few steps away. 
The art work is a bonus. It makes you instantly feel at home.

Great 4-night stay for work! The space is exactly as pictured and was clean. Bathroom is charming and in better condition than expected. A perfect apartment for a solo traveler who doesn’t need a ton of amenities. Easy check-in and communication with the host. Would definitely recommend or stay again!

Bed is comfy. Host is responsive. The neighborhood is excellent; it’s quiet and close to great restaurants and galleries. The window does not close completely, I had to stuff the opening with extra pillow cases. There are no electrical outlets in the bathroom and not many in the main room, so bringing an extension cord would be wise. Overall a pleasant stay.
very good stay at the shoe box
Clean and comfortable. Think college dorm or size of a master bedroom. Convenient to everything. Tight shower space but good water pressure.
Thanks for a great stay!

Karen's apartment is as shown in photos: comfortable, clean, located in a nice neighborhood and perfect for a short stay for one or two people. We had a special problem: the heating pipe rang made a strong noise while our stay every one or two hours, which didnt let us sleep at night. Karen was always attentive and predisposed to repair the problem with the building manager, but the problem was never solved while we were there. She reimbursed us $ 200 for a one-week stay as compensation for the problem that complicated the holidays. Beyond that, we appreciate your attention and your predisposition.

Awesome location!! Close to the E train and SO many great restaurants within blocks of the apartment. Not to mention the High Line which is a mere few yards away. Small- but just what I needed for an extended business trip. Comfortable and efficient. Karen was always available if I had any questions- Thanks for a great stay!

Karen was an amazing host. Any time I had a question, she responded quickly & kindly. Her apartment is exactly as shown and is the perfect little getaway for a visit to NYC. I absolutely loved the neighbourhood - with so many amenities and fabulous restaurants and super-easy shopping. And, of course, effortless access to the Hi-Line. Totally recommend Karen & her apartment.
Adorable place in a great location !  Tiny but mighty -  an excellent value!  My host was nice to work with and checked in to make sure all went smoothly --which i appreciated..  Highly recommended!

The listing is very accurate in terms of the apartment and the neighborhood. If I were going to buy a place in NYC, it would be on this block! It is quiet, beautiful, a perfect location. The adjacency to the Highline is a bonus. The feel of the neighborhood and the people on the street made me feel like a local for the few days I was there.
Just as described. Amazing place, amazing location, easy communication. Karen was very gracious about my late arrival. Would stay there again.
Awesome stay!
Karen's place has great location and view on the wonderfully peaceful parc .nice place to rest and to escape the crazy crowded city
Awesome place!! Great location next to the Highline

Karen's place is one of a handful of airbnb apartments I've stayed in in New York, and now that I've discovered it I don't think I'd ever stay in another! Karen is an excellent host and the apartment, while tiny, is set up with everything you could need and is spotless and decorated with cool art. The location is fantastic - right in Chelsea, a one-minute walk to a High Line entrance, tons of great food options. I recommend it very, very highly.

Close to the High line, great eats, but on the 4th floor and in a quiet for NYC spot.  Very comfortable.  I highly recommend it for singles or a couple who want a very comfortable place to crash but are planning on being out and about most of the time (it's a shoebox!)

Logement propre, très bien situé, à côté de la Highline et du métro. L’arrivée est simple et rapide, on te donne les clefs, le wifi et on te laisse te reposer après le vol, ce qui est parfait.
Le lit est vraiment confortable et c’est un plus après les journées de visite.
La salle de bains est petite mais propre et la fenêtre ancienne laisse passer du bruit de la rue mais j’ai dormi comme un bébé pendant toute la semaine dans ce charmant studio.
Great location; close to easy transportation and plenty of things to do.  Very clean; friendly interactions!

Such a good location!!! I walked each morning along the Highline to the Javitz Center, about a half hour walk. Didn't miss the traffic or the expense of transport one bit.
