Entrance to the Highline less than a block away. Loved the little Italian place SO close for dinner and gelato (Peppe Giallo (Website hidden by Airbnb) This studio is a great space!  Compact, but useful and elegant. Beautiful buildings just outside the window.  Nice set-up in small space. I could use end of the table for breakfast (made my own in the tiny kitchenette), the middle for setting out my luggage to rummage through, and the rug between the bed and table for my morning yoga/stretching.  Big bed made it all feel spacious. The shower is tight and the bathroom sink small, so go in knowing that and you'll be fine. All in all, really really delightful!

This apartment is great! Awesome decor and such a fun neighborhood. Very close to Chelsea Market, the Highline, and a great restaurant on the end of the block called Cook Shop. There is even a view of the Empire State Building from this apartment. I would stay there again in a heartbeat!

Karen's place is in a fantastic location. It's easy to walk to tons of great restaurants, bars, and public transportation options. The apartment was clean and comfortable and it was easy to check in/out. It was the perfect place to stay for a work trip and a fun weekend. Thanks for a great stay!

This was such a great surprise—will be back for sure!
LOCATION: Cannot be beat. Across the street from the High Line, and across the other street from fabulous coffee in the leafy garden of The High Line Hotel. Street is beautiful as well. Walk short blocks to numerous restaurants, etc.
APARTMENT: Super-comfy queen bed and excellent A/C and WiFi. Also appreciated the full-length mirror and the sizeable tabletop space.
COMMUNICATION/CHECK-IN: Perfect. Karen was fast, accurate and charming. Mirek (who let us in) was lovely and gave us a tip about the nearby rooftop bar that was one of our highlights!
This place is a shoebox, but these two shoes loved it.

Karen's apartment is a rare find in NYC--small but clean and comfortable, on a beautiful and quiet street, just steps from great restaurants and the Highline, and a few blocks from Chelsea Market and the subway.
This is a lovely place in a nice quiet neighborhood and close to restaurants. I had a nice stay.
A charming well- thought out studio apartment in a fantastic neighborhood.  5 stars all the way around!  One of my favorite Airbnb stays of all time!

The location of Karen's place is perfect - a quiet street with main streets just a block away on either side. Wonderful coffee shops and restaurants nearby with easy access to the rest of the city. Karen was flexible with check-in after my red-eye flight and checking out is super simple. My next trip to the city - I will definitely plan to stay here again!

I visited the shoebox for work travel, and feel so lucky to have found this place! It’s stylish, comfortable and convenient - and the location is AMAZING. It’s on a storybook-like street, is right in between Chelsea and Meatpacking, and has awesome natural light. Having lived in NYC, I do not take location and lighting for granted :) Karen is friendly, thorough and prompt.  I could not ask for a better place and service when visiting NYC.
Great space with all that you need. Elevator was awesome with my huge suitcase. Super communication! And really comfy bed :)

We loved our stay in the “shoebox”! The studio is laid out perfectly so that you never feel cramped. It is very clean, well-lit, and the shower does get nice and hot. The street is very quiet but the studio is still close to a lot of transit and of course, the high line! We’d love to come back!

Apartamento genial ubicado en el gran barrio de Chelsea, con bares y supermercados cercanos. Detacar la limpieza y la comodidad de la cama, muy luminoso y con aire acondicionado. Es pequeñito pero precioso. Estuvimos muy agusto.
Perfect Place! Karen was so helpfull and nice to us! If i come back to New York it would be cool to stay in the Karens flat again!
Repeat visitor here!  Absolutely perfect location, style, size.  Karen is a top tier host, and it’s an ideal NYC experience for business travel, a long weekend and more!
Exactly as advertised! Cute apartment in a stylish neighborhood!

Such a fab location! Perfect for business travelers and those on a quick jaunt to the city. Make a point to get coffee at the Intelligentsia truck at the high line hotel! Will definitely stay here again.

The apartment is exactly as the description, if not better. My sis and I stayed here for a couple of days and it is definitely enough for two people. 
About the location - it is convenient to go everywhere from here either by walking, bus or subway. Every morning we would take a walk from Highline to Chelsea market to have breakfast, which is an advantage of this place. During the night, it feels pretty safe walking in this area.
About the host - Karen is a great host. She always responded to my questions promptly. When we asked to check in earlier she was willing to do her best to coordinate. During our stay, she actually sent a message to remind us to leave the AC on so we would not suffer from the heat when coming back.  

I really think my trip to New York this time is the best one compare to previous and staying here is a big reason why.

I‘m traveling all over Manhattan and Brooklyn during my visits, and the West Chelsea/Meatpacking location of The Shoebox could not be more convenient for my work/play routine!  This stylish, comfortable place is instantly accessible to major streets (while being located on a quaint one), and 5-10 minute walks to major transit hubs, including 1,2,3,A,C,E,L subway lines.  Not to mention Hudson Yards, West Village and Flatiron areas are 10-20 minute walks. Always a “better than expected” stay here. Thanks, Karen!!
Great space in a great location. Truly made me feel like a local during my stay.
Charming place, much more bigger than a shoebox. I was alone for this stay but sure it’s perfect for 2 also. Karen is wonderful

Karen’s place was great for our first stay in New York! It is perfectly located : we loved the atmosphere in Chelsea and it is very convenient to take the subway (there are 3 different stations nearby). Yes it is tiny as mentioned but we stayed 8 days and it was not a problem! The smell of fresh laundry when you enter the apartment after a long trip feels so good! The bed is very comfortable and the view on the Empire State when you wake up is amazing. 
Karen is a very responsive, helpful and accommodating host. 
We definitely recommend this place !
Home sweet home in NY ;)
Wonderful space & great location.  Shoe Box felt like a home away from home!

Karen’s place is well located in Chelsea (close to the High Line, Chelsea Market, and excellent bars and restaurants). Karen was responsive and helpful in coordinating my check-in time. Her friend who met me when I arrived had great local restaurant recommendations. The apartment is clean and the bed is very comfortable.

The apartment was very clean and as-advertised.  It is small, but if you plan to spend your time exploring the city, it is all you need.  Karen was very easy to communicate with.  The location is excellent, located on a beautiful tree-lined street, with a subway stop within walking distance.
Always a treat to stay here! Perfect size and location for work travel and weekend visits.

Apartment very well located a few meters from the high line and overlooking the top of the Empire state building. Metro stations are a few hundred meters away. Ideal for a couple wishing to discover New-York and who wishes to stay in the pleasant neighborhood of Chelsea. The accommodation is small but functional. The bed is very comfortable. Finally Karen was very available and flexible for our arrival and departure. Thank you.
L appartement est très bien situé permettant de découvrir NY à pied et proche de Chelsea market
Karen’s place is such a gem to visit every month for work. Perfect size and location for Manhattan work travel.  Always clean, cozy and stylish!

Nuestra estancia ha sido muy buena, el apartamento y la zona es silenciosa y pudimos dormir bien, apagábamos el radiador de vapor por la noche porque hacía un poquito de ruido la válvula de alivio. El apartamento es tal cual se describe, es pequeñito pero tiene todo lo necesario, la ubicación es muy buena y bien conectado con metro al resto de la ciudad, la comunicación fue fluida y el check in y check out muy rápido.

This is my third stay at Karen's place and hopefully it will always be available for my New York trips. Love the location, everything about checking in goes really smoothly.  There are restaurants nearby, drug stores, and best of all the High Line! You can walk the High Line to the Whitney in about 10 minutes.
Always a great stay at Karen’s! Every visit offers a consistently cute, clean and convenient experience. Visiting for work, the suuuuper comfortable bed helps me to get in a great night’s sleep, too!

Perfect location in Manhattan on the sky line and close to indie eats and shops of West Village. The cafe on the corner was perfect for breakfast/brunch and generally opens earlier than advertised so you can get in before the crowds on the weekend. Sadly most of the art galleries were on exhibition change over that close to Christmas but the area is lovely and it’s a perfect excuse to come back
The apt corresponds to the description. It's very nice and cosy and, moreover, the location it's perfect to visit all nyc's areas.
Always a wonderful stay!  Great kitchen amenities and home touches to help get through my work travel week.

This is the loveliest shoebox I've ever stayed in! Clean, very comfortable, well-located, and stylish...felt as if I was staying at my best NYC girlfriend's place while she was away. I would definitely stay here again. Thank you Karen and M!
Consistently cozy, clean and stylish! Karen’s communication is always A+ as well.
Great location, cozy and clean apartment
Very pretty place, crazy location, easy communication with good persons. We don’t need more

Great place to stay! The studio is located at the 4th floor, but don’t worry there is elevator, which is so amazing for a New York building. 

Chelsea area is my favorite are in NY! Its right in the middle. You can go uptown to see times sq, central park, etc and go downtown to all the cool places in east village, lower east side, etc! 

Place was clean! Great for two guests! And it has everything in the studio; small kitchen, refrigerator,&
Kitchen appliances. 

Bonus: you can see the empire State building from the window :)

name: Appartement lumineux , Terrasse privée sur le toît
summary: Notre logement est accessible en transport en commun via deux lignes de métro (orange et bleu),  du centre-ville de Montréal. Dans un quartier vivant, près de la plaza st-Hubert, du cinéma beaubien, du parc Molson, vous trouverez à proximité tout ce donc vous aurez besoin pour vous divertir et vous accommoder: pharmacie, épicerie, restaurent, bar, bixi, etc, et vous pourrez jouir des commodités offertes par notre logement et la ville de Montréal.
space: Situé au 3ième et dernier étage d'un triplex, le logement est très lumineux et possède une terrasse privé sur le toit. Il a de grandes fenêtre qui accueillent la lumière du soleil toute la journée et dans chaque pièce (puits de lumière dans la salle de bain). Vous aurez accès à la cuisine toute équipée, au salon, au bureau  et aux au 2 balcons. Situé Au cœur de "la petite patrie" , vous serez au centre d'un typique quartier montréalais chaud , vivant et jeune: café locaux, bistros de bière artisanale, cinéma répertoire , parcs et multiples restaurants. Nous sommes à 15 minutes du métro à pied , près d'une station bixi et des autobus vers le centre-ville . De la terrasse , vous pourrez admirer les nombreux clochers de l'île, la tour du stade olympique, les feux d'artifices (en saison) ainsi que les couchers de soleil.
description: Notre logement est accessible en transport en commun via deux lignes de métro (orange et bleu),  du centre-ville de Montréal. Dans un quartier vivant, près de la plaza st-Hubert, du cinéma beaubien, du parc Molson, vous trouverez à proximité tout ce donc vous aurez besoin pour vous divertir et vous accommoder: pharmacie, épicerie, restaurent, bar, bixi, etc, et vous pourrez jouir des commodités offertes par notre logement et la ville de Montréal. Situé au 3ième et dernier étage d'un triplex, le logement est très lumineux et possède une terrasse privé sur le toit. Il a de grandes fenêtre qui accueillent la lumière du soleil toute la journée et dans chaque pièce (puits de lumière dans la salle de bain). Vous aurez accès à la cuisine toute équipée, au salon, au bureau  et aux au 2 balcons. Situé Au cœur de "la petite patrie" , vous serez au centre d'un typique quartier montréalais chaud , vivant et jeune: café locaux, bistros de bière artisanale, cinéma répertoire , parcs et multiples res
neighborhood_overview: Bien situé au coeur d'un tipique quartier Montrealais "la petite patrie" . Nous sommes entre deux stations de métro (Beaubien et Fabre), l'appartement offre toutes les commodités nécessaires aux voyageurs casaniers comme aux voyageurs plus aventuriers. Des espaces calme, une cuisine bien équipée ainsi que les balcons et la terrasses privée sur le toit permettra aux gens en quête de quiétude d'apprécier la ville dans un nid douillet. Les épiceries, fruiteries, pharmacies, parcs et cinéma sont tous à une distance de marche. Pour ceux qui préfèrent la fête, bars, terrasses et restaurants sont situés tout près, vers le parc Molson ou la petite Italie.
transit: Deux lignes de métro passent à 10 minutes de marche de l'appartement: station Fabre sur la ligne bleu ainsi que Beaubien sur la ligne orange. Des autobus vous emmènent dans toutes les directions au coin de la rue. Des bixi sont à votre disposition à moins de 5 minutes de marches. Des places de stationnement sont disponibles dans la rue, devant l appartement, sans vignette.
access: Vous aurez accès à tout le logement sauf à la chambre de Jonathan qui sera présent pour vous accueillir et répondre à vos questions.
interaction: Jonathan sera présent sur place pour répondre à vos question.

host.host_about: Painter, textile artist, costume designer, traveller, I love cooking, reading and yoga. I am also down to earth, social and respectful.

reviews.comments:
Jonathan and Catherine's place was really comfortable, clean and nice. Catherine was attentive, she made us feel at home and she even recommended us some places to visit.
We loved the private rooftop, you can read a book, drink a beer or enjoy the view.

Catherine made us feel right at home! She replied very quickly to messages and was very helpful with tips about what to do in Montréal. The place is lovely and the rooftop terrace is a great addition! The flat is in a very lively and vibrant neighborhood. Overall a great stay!

Super séjour. Catherine (la colocataire de Jonathan) est très sympa, souriante et à l'écoute. Ce fut un vrai plaisir d'être en vacances chez eux. Le logement est propre, confortable et bien équipé (bonne connection internet; lave linge & sèche linge; bureau pour travailler...). La chambre  est plutôt spacieuse. Le rapport qualité prix est très bien selon moi. J'ai pu profiter de la terrasse sur le toit avant qu'il ne fasse trop froid. L'appartement est bien situé, il y a des parcs et des rues marchande pas très loin, les autres rues marchande ne sont pas très loin non plus, j'y allais souvent à pied (Mont Royal que j'aime bien est à 30min de marche). Il y a de bon restaurant et de très bon café à moins de 5 minutes de marche. Le metro est à environ à 10-15 minutes. Il y à aussi une station de vélo et une bonne épicerie à quelque minutes.
Le quartier est sympa, la rue est calme. Pour ceux qui veulent faire du shopping ou du lèche vitrine il faudra surement prendre le metro pour aller un peu plus loin. Mais facilement accessible avec le metro.
Très bonne première expérience airbnb.
Friendly and easy-going hosts. The arrival and departure was adapted to our own schedule, perfect. Great room, nice location, friendly hosts, nothing's missing

This is was a great place to stay for my trip in Montreal. You have a great coffee 2 blocks from the apartment called Etincele. Really friendly place and great coffee and home made Madeleine. If you want to buy some cheap fruits and vegetables; go to the shop at corner of Papineau and Beaubien. You also have a great shop at Beaubien and La roche on the way to the metro. 
You will be able to enjoy the rooftop for sunbaking or a apero at the sunset.
Hôte très gentil , place super tranquille , j ai beaucoup aime
Appartement charmant et hôte très chaleureux

À mon arrivée, Catherine, la coloc de Jonathan travaillait, elle  m'a laissé des indications pour avoir accès rapidement à la chambre. L'Appartment est chaleureux et la terrasses sur le toît est tout simplement géniale. Il y avait des petites bouteilles de savon et shampoing sur les serviettes laissé à disposition. Ce qui a été très appréciées. Catherine est très accueillante et facile d'Accès.  Si vous chercherz un coin mignon et âs trop bruyant de Montréal, petite-Patrie est parfait pour vous. La seule chose qui pour moi serait a améliorer est la poussière sur le plancher dela chambre et la cuisine. Somme toute, l'expérience générale est positive.

Well it was the first time that I use airnbn and going to someone's house! I can say it was totally amazing living in jonathan place! He treats me like we were friends before! The house is clean and well located also! I would say it was a brilliant experience and we are even friends now!
This really nice airbnb is close to a Bixi station and to the metro. I enjoyed my stay, Jonathan is a very nice person to live with. I'd definitely stay here again.
Un super hôte et un appartement très agréable. Hautement recommandé.
Great place, very nice roof top terrasse, Jonathan is very friendly and hospitable! :) thank you!
Appartement bien situé, Jonathan était bien gentil il vous mets à l'aise dès votre arrivée.

Clean, spacious, welcoming and warm space.  Jonathan was a great host, offering help with navigating the city, places of interest as well as honest conversation.   I cook, so it was wonderful to have everything I needed.  All in all zero complaints.  I hope to be welcomed here next time!

Jonathan is a very good host. The room is beautiful and the roof terrace is an additional plus. The apartment is very clean and located in a beautiful neighborhood of Montreal. There are nice restaurants and bars nearby. I'd stay there again.

Très bon emplacement, proche du centre ville.
Un logement simple mais très chaleureux pour passer quelques nuits.
La terrasse est très agréable pour finir la fin de journée

J’y suis allé en vacanes et ai beaucoup aimé mon experience à Montréal et chez Jonathan!

I was there on vacation and enjoyed a lot my experience at Montreal and at Jonathan’s. 

Estuve en vacaciones y me ha encantado la experiencia que viví en Montreal y donde Jonathan. 

Estive de férias e gostei muito da experiência em Montreal e no apartamento de Jonathan.

Très bon séjour chez Jonathan. L’appartement était conforme à mes attentes, au calme et très propre. 
Même si je n’ai pas rencontré Jonathan qui etait en vacances, il a tout fait pour faciliter mon arrivée. Merci encore !

Jonathan was very kind, considerate, and helpful. He's very easy to talk to and was available by phone if you needed anything whether information about the appartement or what to do/where to go in the area. The place itself is clean and cozy. It's in a calm, quiet neighbourhood, but easy to walk or bus anywhere else you need to go. The rooftop patio is amazing! I would definitely stay here again :)
Would totallly recommend Jonathan’s home, it’s clean and spacious. Jonathan was really helpful. And the rooftop just adds something special to the apartment.

Très bon séjour. Apart très propre, cuisine très bien équipé, belle chambre et la cerise : le rooftop. 
Jonathan est très gentil et consilian.
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: 2 Outdoor Pools | Tennis Court | Near the Beach
summary: Overlooking Anini Bay with lush landscapes that affirms Kauai's nickname "Garden Isle" the Ka 'Eo Kai resort offers a variety of water, golf and tennis pleasures. Enjoy beautiful views, exotic surroundings that pay tribute to Kaua‘i’s environment, picturesque pools, intimate nature trails, clubhouse activities and a golf lover’s dream spot between the number 3 fairway of the Makai Golf Course and Princeville’s historic tree lane.
space: Just look out your window or step out onto your lanai. You'll love what you see, whether you are gazing at the misty Hanalei Valley Mountains, breathtaking Bali Hai waters, or fragrant gardens and golf course vistas. Check out the resort's two gorgeous swimming pools. A secluded quiet pool...a charming spot for a quick dip. The second is far more elaborate: this large sculptured pool is a family treat with cascading waterfall, kiddie wading pool, and hot tub. Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at our elegant clubhouse: dancing, golf scrambles, bingo, luaus, and more.
description: Overlooking Anini Bay with lush landscapes that affirms Kauai's nickname "Garden Isle" the Ka 'Eo Kai resort offers a variety of water, golf and tennis pleasures. Enjoy beautiful views, exotic surroundings that pay tribute to Kaua‘i’s environment, picturesque pools, intimate nature trails, clubhouse activities and a golf lover’s dream spot between the number 3 fairway of the Makai Golf Course and Princeville’s historic tree lane. Just look out your window or step out onto your lanai. You'll love what you see, whether you are gazing at the misty Hanalei Valley Mountains, breathtaking Bali Hai waters, or fragrant gardens and golf course vistas. Check out the resort's two gorgeous swimming pools. A secluded quiet pool...a charming spot for a quick dip. The second is far more elaborate: this large sculptured pool is a family treat with cascading waterfall, kiddie wading pool, and hot tub. Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at
neighborhood_overview: You’ll find botanical gardens dotting wondrous Kauai, yet those lovingly nurtured grounds are a mere hint of the island’s breadth. The landscape changes at every turn, meaning you’ll move from thick green foliage to otherworldly foggy landscapes to sunny beaches around every bend in the road.
notes: No air conditioning; units cooled by trade winds, ceiling fans in every room. All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in. Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days.
transit: A rental car is highly recommended as there are limited public transportation options and most attractions and activities are not within walking distance.
access: Amenities     2 Outdoor Swimming Pools     Organized Activities Program     Outdoor Hot Tub     Outdoor Children's Pool     Tennis Court     Clubhouse
interaction: We strive to make your vacation planning and stay a great experience and give you great customer service. Feel free to email ResortShare with any questions.
house_rules: The reservation will be booked into the guest’s name as it appears on Airbnb. If this name does not match your photo ID or if a guest by a different name will be checking in, you must provide the first and last name at the time of booking.  Must be 21+ years of age at the time of check-in. All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in and the Studio is $1.84 per night.  This is a Wyndham Timeshare resort all sale presentations are optional.

host.host_about:
Here at ResortShare we strive to create a seamless transaction for our guests, allowing them to enjoy a relaxing vacation at over 50 of the top destination resorts in the US.

We manage a premium selection of the best units at these resorts, most of our units include kitchens, laundry capability and separated living and sleeping quarters. You will have all the comforts of home, with the resort/hotel amenities you need while on vacation.

reviews.comments: The Wyndham Ka Eo Kai is the perfect place to stay on the North Shore. Centrally located, friendly staff, clean rooms, comfortable bed, jacuzzi tub. It was like staying in a hotel at a fraction of the price. We didn't get a chance to experience all of the amenities (tennis courts, swimming pool, etc) but what we did use was terrific. Only minor annoyance was a rooster outside who liked to wake everyone up at dawn.
Staying at this Princeville studio was an absolute delight. We were happily surprised with all of it amenities and how beautiful the property was. We would love to stay here again!
The condo was very clean, much smaller than it appeared in the pictures.
This is a time share, a lot like a hotel room. Our suite had everything that was promised.
It was a nice place to stay. The pool and hottube was great.
Very roomie and clean. Great location!! I would recommend to anyone I know.

The Wyndham Ka 'Eo Kai is in a great location for exploring the north shore.  The room was clean and as described/pictured.  Check-in was easy.  The kitchenette (microwave, minifridge, plates, silverware) were very helpful for snacks and keeping drinks on hand.  One minor downside is that they were a bit pushy with selling the time-share and promoting a welcome/island introduction event with vendors of different activities
Very quiet and reserved place. Very good for families vacation. Very safe and clean

Great location  near Hanalei Bay and St. Regis Hotel;
Room is very clean.

Room was exactly what I was hoping for, but there was one problem-the room is essentially an extra bedroom for the main living quarters next door. It has its own outside entrance, but also a lockoff door inside, and that door lets in ALL THE SOUND from the neighboring room. I had a family of 5 next door. I could even smell their cooking (wish I could have had some too!).

We love the location of this place! We stayed in a studio and it was perfect for us. Beach towels and toiletries are provided! It was a great experience and would definitely recommend it for the location and price!
Great place to stay on the north shore. Highly recommend-- we especially loved the hot tub on rainy days!
Place was just what we needed! An easy drive or uber to anywhere you'd like to go on the north shore!

The resort is very nice and we enjoyed the pool and hot tub (whirl pool) every evening. The room was clean and the size is perfect for 2 people. Our studio was part of a larger apartment (the door to the rest of the apartment locked) - so the only negative part of our stay was that we could hear the people who rented the other part of the apartment. Luckily they were not very loud. Nice place, with nice facilities.
The resort is close to an area with supermarket and some restaurants/pubs. People are really kind, they helped us in all what we needed.

Great location and size for a studio! Great check in and welcome experience. Being a Wyndham property they do offer an information session on timeshare properties but all round a great experience. 

There is a ceiling fan but it was warm when travelling in early May.
The location is great and the resort is beautiful.

Nice space for 2 people and we enjoyed our stay but as many reviewers note, you can hear every word of every conversation next door (and we are not typically picky about this). The balcony pictured is not the balcony for the unit we stayed in (27BE) - ours overlooked the tennis courts. Not a big deal to us, but might be important to someone else.
This was such a great place to stay to enjoy the North Shore!

Amazing place and location. The place is better than the pictures suggest and is extremely neat and clean. The resort concierge were extremely helpful and helped us plan our stay very well and were available on the phone through the day to help us reschedule excursions as needed. Fresh beach towels were available as needed and they provided us with an ice cooler as well. Extremely  happy with our stay and I would come back and recommend it to others as well.
Great place to stay in Princeville for a relaxing holiday.

Great spot close to everything on the north shore. It's a perfect spot for people who are active and want to explore the island and have a safe comfortable spot to crash. The bathroom was huge with a tub to soak after a day of hiking. This is a lock off studio unit from the main unit so only a door separates the units so you can hear conversations, but it wasn't a problem as at night the guests next door were quiet. But for someone looking for very quiet and private, it might not be the best, but it was perfect for myself for 2 nights
Nice place in nice resort. We found it a bit on the small size (with two weeks of luggage) although the bathroom is quite large.

Came here for our honeymoon and everything was perfect... except for a couple of cockroaches and ants that made our room their home as well. Not sure that can be helped, and we weren't too bothered since we were off doing hiking and other adventures on the island the whole week. Otherwise, perfect landing pad, quiet, and great amenities.

Tolle Anlage ruhig und sauber mit einem fantastischem Blick auf Meer  
Wir hatten ein Upgrade bekommen und hatten somit ein riesiges Apartement. Riesiger Wohn- Essbereich mit offener top ausgestattete Küche, Waschmaschine, Trockner und Bügeleisen im  Apt. sehr angenehm, schönes Badezimmer -Dusche und Eckbadewanne- und ausreichend großes Schlafzimmer mit 2sehr bequemen Betten. Schöne gepflegte Poolanlage mit sep. Kochbereich Gasgrill. Wir haben diesen Kochbereich nicht benutzt. 
Die Anlage ist auf jedenfall weiterzuempfehlen
C'est un Time share. Assurez vous que votre réservation à bien était prise en compte par l'établissement.
The place was clean and comfortable, front desk helpful and facilities nice. conveniently located. Would go back.

DO NOT STAY HERE.

I was 100% let down by ResortShare. When we arrived to check in, the Wyndham in Princeville had no idea who I was or where my reservation was; they were not able to find me in their system. When I called you for help there was NO response. The emergency numbers provided went to voicemails that weren't set up. For all I knew I was scammed. I was forced to book a hotel at the last minute that took me way over my budget, forcing me to dip into other areas of my trip and cut from other areas. Hotels were all full on the island while we were here so we couldn't be picky and ended up having to book somewhere on a totally different part of the island making several plans very difficult. This was all due to someone's very serious error to not adequately communicate with the Wyndham to get proper names on file even though ResortShare reached out during the booking process to ensure they had the right names on file. 

Princeville looked very beautiful. I wish that we were able to stay there as planned. When we come back to Kauai, we will be staying in that part of the island because it can't be beat. However, I will never book through ResortShare at this location or anywhere else in the world because of their lack of organization, communication at check in, as well as professionalism. 

Save the headache and take your money somewhere else! 

Tip** While talking with the concierge at the Wyndham after they couldn't check us in, she mentioned AirBNB is fairly new on the island and many sites and agencies are struggling with it. You might be better off booking directly through hotels or resorts. We ended up booking at a Hilton Garden Inn on the island and got tons of amenities like free drinks and beach equipment and other things that we wouldn't have gotten staying in this timeshare. Might be bit more money up front but it evens out in the long run. 

Hope this helps!
the staff were friendly and fantastic. thank you
This is an absolutely great apartment to stay at the north shore of Kauai. It had everything I needed! I highly recommend it.

This is a nice small studio to stay at while you're visiting North shore. 
Pro - clean and well maintained. Staffs at Wyndham Timeshare are friendly and helpful. Great location for North shore activities. 
Con- place looks a bit different than the picture. It's way smaller. It's loud because it has NO AC and you have to open all the windows. You can definitely hear your neighbors. 
This place has good value overall. You get what you pay for :) mahalo

We received a free room upgrade which was great. Check it was quick and easy, even got a nice lei from the concierge, coffee was also provided in the lobby. Any problems that we did encounter with the apartment, the staff was quick to fix them. Overall everything went well and would definitely stay there again.
Piscine très agréable et coin calme. Proximité avec hanalei appréciée. Gentillesse de l accueil.
This was a very tidy and cozy location in the heart of princeville. Very near shops, grocery, and restaurants!
The resort is very beatiful and the pool and the hot tube are awesome
We enjoyed our stay there very much. Highly recommended!
Uzasne ubytovani uprostred golfoveho hriste,pri uvitani lei,moznost bazenu,virivky. Krasny pokoj,skvele okoli.Vynikajici!
Great experience! Perfect location, clean and nice amenities!

We didn't have a great experience. The room we were given had a very strong smell of mildew and there was mold on the windows. I messaged whoever manages this listing but never heard back. Eventually I was able to get a different room but it took an hour or so of wrangling at the front desk. All in all, the place was fine once the mold issue was taken care of. The lack of response by the host was the most concerning aspect.
Really nice resort area near the Napali coast and other attractions

The room we stayed in had ants in it. Every night we had to bring our food to the car so the ants wouldn't get in it. The management company does not operate from Hawaii so their ability to solve anything is very limited. Basically they call the hotel and complain for you which ultimately does not get anything done. For the price of this place (although I realize options are limited for princeville) I was disappointed and would never stay again. North shore is great and definitely stay around there.. just not here unless you like annoyances on your vacation.

Das Resort ist sehr nett gelegen und man fühlt sich wie in einer Club-Anlage. Es gibt einen Pool und ein Öffentlichen Whirlpool. Das Zimmer ist ausreichend groß, das Mobiliar sehr geschmachvoll eingerichtet. Kann man jederzeit ohne Einschränkungen weiterempfehlen...
Great!
This place was fine, but is much smaller than it looks. Also, there’s no AC, so you have to open windows, and you can hear everything that everyone is doing. Other than that it’s fine though.
The space was just as advertised and was the perfect spot (and reasonably priced) to hang my hat while exploring the north Island.
Very clean and pristine. Love the large jacuzzi tub, the air conditioning, clean carpet, mini kitchen and the manicured grounds.  It was perfect. Thank you.
Listing is not accurate.  It was not an apartment /studio it was a small hotel room. One small closet, small refrigerator and small microwave.
Loved staying here! Our condo was right on the golf course with views of the Pacific. The resort was nice with a pool and hot tub we enjoyed. We'll be back!
Wonderful experience and lovely location. Just a 10-minute walk to the shops at Princeville. The staff was very helpful and had great tips about the area. Would definitely stay again. Mahalo
Staff was great, clean space and great value
Nice little place to stay at on a vacation. Great amenities and location!
Easy check in, no room service but that meant extra privacy
We had a lovely stay, the resort was very centrally located. Great amenities and staff were very friendly and helpful!
Excellent and efficient service, it all ran like clock work. The rooms are nice and private but with access to great amenities
We were able to book last minute efficiently and the staff was very helpful. Thanks!
Sehr sauber, mit Whirlpool und Hottube.

The room was clean and cozy. Very close to Queen’s Bath and Hanalei, very far from most other attractions. To make the most of your trip sight seeing wise, stay on the southern side of the island. If you are looking to relax, stay in Princeville!

A great location, and nice and quiet! Very close to multiple beaches, and other fun things to do and see in Princeville. Also a great pool and hot tub for when you’re back from the beach but still want to hang out in the water.
Great place!

Great location loved that it was only a few minutes from the Princeville shopping center where there were cute little shops and eateries. Best part was it's only a few minutes away from Hanalei town where we went to explore and found cute little boutique shops and mom and pop restaurants to dine at.
This is a great resort for exploring the north side of the island. It was a great location. Staff were very friendly. The pool and hot tub are very nice. Overall, a great experience.

Schönes Resort im Norden von Kauai. Das One-Bedroom war sehr groß, sauber und schön eingerichtet.  Des weiteren ist es nicht weit entfernt von Hanalai Bay. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt. Zusätzlich war das Personal äußerst zuvorkommend. Ich würde definitiv dort wieder buchen.
thank you!
Clean and great hospitality by everyone.

Good place to stay, room is similar to photos but not the same. Super clean, amazing pool and hot tub area that were never too crowded. Good location to use as a springboard to explore the north shore. Construction/repaving going on so it was difficult to find a parking spot at times. Laundry area was pretty disappointing with only one working machine and not well at that.

This unit is attached to another unit. The door that separates the two units has a gap at the bottom that allows you to see the light on in the other unit at night, and you can hear the people over there.  
Overall the place was fine, we spent very little time there as we were usually out and about enjoying the island.
Think of it as a hotel room rather than a condo, and you'll be fine.
Great place to stay. We had a big appartment with everything we needed. Very quiet place, the staff was very friendly. We had a very great time!

Absolutely incredible property,
Was much better, large and better equiped than I expected.
The hosts communication was quick and precise,
Would definitely recommend to anyone travelling to Princeville

Easy check-in, like a resort with proper and very helpful concierge. The staffs were very friendly. Nice unit. Swimming pool and the hot tub are lovely. The location is near Hanalei, cool and hip area. However with the road to Hanalei Bay closed, it is pretty far to get to many attractions such as Waimea Canyon (c. 1.5-2 hour drive) or Poipei beach.

The communication with the host is great!
We had a good stay at this apartment. Nice view, lovely people, clean room.
Nice room in vacation resort on the North Shore. Close to beaches and Restaurants. Enjoyed the pool a lot!

This resort is beautifully located, on the golf course in Princeville. The views are stunning and the resort is great. The check-in was smooth, the room clean. The small kitchen unit would make it extremely difficult to cook, but possible if you plan to only use the microwave or the community BBQ.  The fridge had an ice maker, which was AWESOME! We also had a big corner tub, and I loved that!! 

The reason I chose to downgrade the star rating....  fellow travelers just BE AWARE: It’s a timeshare, so there is no maid service during your stay. They will give you a presentation if you’d like, but we did not, and we didn’t feel pressured. We stayed for 10 days and so we requested new linens, but the resort won’t put them on the bed, only deliver them. The bed was so firm I hurt everywhere after the first night. I ended up sleeping on pillows the whole time.  The bed was an big issue for me, because no one wants to sleep like crap on vacation. There is also no place for baggage in the small lockout room we were in. No closet for hanging items. The table and chairs ended up being a mess of suitcases, shoes and clothes.

Great place to stay in Princeville. Everything you need is here, and the pool and grounds are gorgeous. Was very nice having the kichenette for breakfasts. This is a time share property, so we unplugged our phone as they contacted us at 8am the first day to invite us to come listen to their presentation. Comfortable accommodation with everything you need. We did request to move rooms (wanted a higher floor for the balcony) and they obliged. Each room is slightly different one had a/c! (Although with the breeze, we found we didn’t need it). One had a much better balcony and bed.
very good location in princeville, great service overall.

Pros- very clean accommodations,  nice spacious bathroom with shower and tub, peekaboo ocean views from unit, easy check in/out, close to pool and hot tub. Location is close to Hanalei town, but not much else up that way due to road closures. 

Cons- Golf course separates you from the ocean which you can’t access, parking for any nearby beaches is practically non existent in princeville and a really long walk. Location of condo is noisy, not for light sleepers- near trash, balcony looks out to trash, parking lot and clubhouse. And the unit runs a little hot (and this was winter) and has no AC only ceiling fan (which was warned ahead of time in description so no complaints just something to consider).

name: Tropical Stay near the Beach ★ 2 Bedroom
summary: Overlooking Anini Bay with lush landscapes that affirms Kauai's nickname "Garden Isle" the Ka 'Eo Kai resort offers a variety of water, golf and tennis pleasures. Enjoy beautiful views, exotic surroundings that pay tribute to Kaua‘i’s environment, picturesque pools, intimate nature trails, clubhouse activities and a golf lover’s dream spot between the number 3 fairway of the Makai Golf Course and Princeville’s historic tree lane.
space: Just look out your window or step out onto your lanai. You'll love what you see, whether you are gazing at the misty Hanalei Valley Mountains, breathtaking Bali Hai waters, or fragrant gardens and golf course vistas. Check out the resort's two gorgeous swimming pools. A secluded quiet pool...a charming spot for a quick dip. The second is far more elaborate: this large sculptured pool is a family treat with cascading waterfall, kiddie wading pool, and hot tub. Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at our elegant clubhouse: dancing, golf scrambles, bingo, luaus, and more.
description: Overlooking Anini Bay with lush landscapes that affirms Kauai's nickname "Garden Isle" the Ka 'Eo Kai resort offers a variety of water, golf and tennis pleasures. Enjoy beautiful views, exotic surroundings that pay tribute to Kaua‘i’s environment, picturesque pools, intimate nature trails, clubhouse activities and a golf lover’s dream spot between the number 3 fairway of the Makai Golf Course and Princeville’s historic tree lane. Enjoy a quiet stroll down the historic tree lane to pristine Anini Beach. Fun activities await you at
neighborhood_overview: You’ll find botanical gardens dotting wondrous Kauai, yet those lovingly nurtured grounds are a mere hint of the island’s breadth. The landscape changes at every turn, meaning you’ll move from thick green foliage to otherworldly foggy landscapes to sunny beaches around every bend in the road.
notes: No air conditioning; units cooled by trade winds, ceiling fans in every room. All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in. Wireless Internet is free for up to 4 devices, ideal for emails and basic web browsing. For more streaming and surfing options on unlimited devices, Enhanced High-Speed Wireless Internet is available for $9.95 per day, $49.95 for 6-10 days, and $59.95 for 11-30 days.
transit: A rental car is highly recommended as there are limited public transportation options and most attractions and activities are not within walking distance.
access: Amenities     2 Outdoor Swimming Pools     Organized Activities Program     Outdoor Hot Tub     Outdoor Children's Pool     Tennis Court     Clubhouse
interaction: We strive to make your vacation planning and stay a great experience and give you great customer service. Feel free to email ResortShare with any questions.
house_rules: The reservation will be booked into the guest’s name as it appears on Airbnb. If this name does not match your photo ID or if a guest by a different name will be checking in, you must provide the first and last name at the time of booking.    Must be 21+ years of age at the time of check-in.  All reservations are subject to Hawai'i's Transient Occupancy Tax upon check-in and the 2 Bedroom is $11.47 per night. Unit sleeps 6 guests but the bed will vary in size.  King, Queen, Queen Sleeper or Queen, Queen, Queen Sleeper.  This is a Wyndham Timeshare resort all sale presentations are optional. The resort will be undergoing an exterior renovation project to repair wood and paint throughout the property June 1, 2018 - Feb. 28, 2019. During this time noise, dust, odors and workers on-site may be experienced. Additionally, some parking spaces may be blocked for staging purposes and unit views may be obstructed at times. Dates subject to change.

host.host_about:
Here at ResortShare we strive to create a seamless transaction for our guests, allowing them to enjoy a relaxing vacation at over 50 of the top destination resorts in the US.

We manage a premium selection of the best units at these resorts, most of our units include kitchens, laundry capability and separated living and sleeping quarters. You will have all the comforts of home, with the resort/hotel amenities you need while on vacation.

reviews.comments: We booked the Wyndham last minute after showing up to another Airbnb the day before and being unhappy with the cleanliness of it (and the cats we were supposed to leave the door open for).  Luckily the other listing had a flexible cancellation policy and this listing was available to be booked last minute - our host was able to work quickly with the resort as we had already cancelled our other Airbnb and were on our way.  We were extremely pleased with our stay and it was only marginally more expensive than our other Airbnb we booked.  It was ten times better and we had tons of space for the five of us and would definitely book again!
Nice, clean, and well equipped place.  Thank you for hosting us.

My husband, his family and I stayed at the condo at the Wyndham in Princveille, and it was absolutely perfect. It was plenty spacious for 6 adults. The location was super convenient to Hanalei Bay, the St. Regis, beaches and hikes. We would absolutely stay here again!

It was a beautiful condo , the staff was so helpful helping us plan activities as well as showing us places only natives go to overall the condo had every little thing we needed from a laundry room to every amenity needed to cook , the bathrooms also were amazing with a built in it was 4 of us but the condo can easily sleep 8
Very noisy condo with radios and TVs blaring. Neighbors are not very considerate or courteous. Not a relaxing place at all.
Place was spacious & clean with great amenities and very helpful/friendly staff.
This place is amazing, if you wanna hike pr go to the beach, this is the place to stay. Their rooms are so big and spacious.
Perfect large apartment

Loved that the pool was right next to our unit for the kids, we went right after the big flooding so many of the beaches and waters were closed due to contamination levels, loved that we always had a cool breeze with all the windows open, we never had to turn on the AC. Great stay and good location!
It was the last place at which we stayed in Hawaii and we loved it! It was a nice surprise receiving a Lei during check-in.
Great price for the location and amenities.
We had a great time. Lots of space and a well-equipped kitchen for cooking. Close to the groceries with a jacuzzi make this a great spot for a group of friends.
Lovely quiet area, beautiful scenery! Didn’t know it rained there so much though

Great place. The staff is fantastic, they explain you all the activities they have and solve all your questions. In the lobby you have complimentary  coffee all the time and Mai Thais in the afternoon. The resort is in a very good area, near the supermarket and the main road. I would definitely come back.
Nice, clean, fun pool and jacuzzi...
Expect a great layout with 2 bedrooms, living room and a fun kitchen-dining layout with a wrap-around porch and a pool with a view of the ocean!
Great value and quick turnaround. Good location on the north side. Very clean unit and kitchen. Amenities were great. Would recommend and visit again.
very very spacious and cozy and beautiful. so close to foodland and other shops. clean and easy to cook and relax...feels luxurious.

The resort itself is nice yet its important to know that the bottom units are very noisy and each unit is designed differently.  They are very spacious and well stocked with everything you would need.
Nice resort for adults not great for young kids. Don't let the resort put you in 8A/B or 9A/B unless you want to be In a high traffic busy intersection.

name: Manly Harbour House
summary: Beautifully renovated, spacious and quiet, our 3 Bedroom, 3 Bathroom home is only a  10 minute walk to beaches in Fairlight or Forty Baskets,  or a 30 minute walk to Manly via the coastal promenade, or an Express bus runs every 20 mins at your door.
space: Our home is a thirty minute walk along the seashore promenade to Manly, one of Sydney's most beautiful beaches, with its village restaurants, cafes, and shopping.  If you prefer more variety, the Manly ferry will take you to the Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.   The residence is sited in a sought-after family-friendly street only a short stroll to nearby North Harbour reserve and Forty Baskets cafe and beach. It's a short walk further to express CBD buses, ferries, and Manly entertainment. Or there is a bus (#131 or #132) around the corner that drops you in Manly in 8 minutes.  Our home features a stainless steel galley kitchen, including Ilve oven and gas cooktop. We have two separate living areas on the ground floor. The front lounge enjoys P&O window surrounds with a fireplace, Grand piano and wall mounted TV.  The separate family/ dining room at the rear has two long white leather lounge sofas and a 65” wall mounted TV. The dining room table extends to seat 8 comfortably.  There is a cov

Our home features a stainless steel galley kitchen, including Ilve oven and gas cooktop. We have two separate living areas on the ground floor. The front lounge enjoys P&O
neighborhood_overview: Balgowlah Heights is one of the most prestigious areas on the Northern Beaches.  Filled with seaside character and a boutique way of living, this suburb offers everything you could need.   Located approximately 11km from the CBD, and only 2 kms from Manly, Balgowlah is surrounded by pristine water frontage including North Harbour, Forty Baskets, and Sydney Harbour.  Filled with a vast array of public parks, pools, marinas, beaches, sporting facilities and Sydney Harbour National Park. Local Amenities •Forty Baskets Beach, Reef Beach, North Harbour Park, 40 Beans Cafe, Clontarf Beach, Castle Rock. •Nearby Spit to Manly walking track that leads left along the promenade to Manly or right through scenic Sydney Harbour National Park around to Clontarf. •Balgowlah Heights shops, offering a supermarket, delicatessen, boutique shops, cafes and more •Nearby Stockland Mall offers a vast range of cafes, supermarkets, eateries, boutique fashion stores, home wares shops and Fitness First Gym •Array
transit: Balgowlah - Manly bus # 131 or #132  (Bus stop is 3 doors down, around the corner) takes you to Manly Ferry in 8 minutes.  Manly ferry gets you to Sydney CBD in 15 minutes.
access: Guests have access to whole house except locked basement and storage room. (Rear ground level studio not included.)
house_rules: Standard Terms and Conditions of Temporary Holiday Accommodation Note: Variances can be agreed on but only by arrangement with the owner in writing. Payment of booking constitutes the clients acceptance of these Terms and Conditions. Balance of the rental amount must be received in full according to AIRBNB policies. If not the owner has the right to cancel the booking and attempt to re let it. The owners will make every effort to ensure the property is available as booked. However the owners reserve the right to make alterations to bookings due to unforeseen circumstances. To maintain a good standard for our guests we require certain conditions to be complied with. We appreciate most will respect our property but the occasional abuse requires that we state the following conditions. Number of Guests should not exceed 6 adults or subsequently agreed in writing or email, and no more than 8 people in the house at one time. Fees will apply for excess guests not agreed with the owners in adv

host.host_about: I am a Canadian who has made Australia her home for over ten years. I appreciate a good place to stay, having had many travel adventures myself.  My home is in Balgowlah, a pretty harbourside village next to Manly with easy access by bus or ferry to Sydney CBD.

reviews.comments: We did not meet Heidi but she was very friendly on the phone and always available for any questions that we had. We adored our stay in her beautiful house. It was exactly how she stated, clean, tidy and perfect for what we needed. The neighbourhood was very quiet and the neighbours were friendly. The location was perfect for us. Close to the bus, shopping centers, cafes, supermarkets and ferry station. Thanks for a wonderful stay in your gorgeous house Heidi.
Good location and access to public transport. Host Heidi was helpful and communicative. Nice walks around the area. OK value. Need to like cats.

name: Luxurious Tropical Beach Front Home in Lahaina
summary: The No Ka Oi Hale is the Tropical Beachfront home of your dreams. This idyllic plantation home is located on a beautiful white sand swimming beach on the North end of Lahaina Town. No Ka Oi Hale offers the best combination of quality, comfort, and luxury amenities for your Maui vacation. This tastefully rebuilt Historic Plantation home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, vaulted ceilings, tile floors, granite finishes, and breathtaking oceanfront vistas.
description: The No Ka Oi Hale is the Tropical Beachfront home of your dreams. This idyllic plantation home is located on a beautiful white sand swimming beach on the North end of Lahaina Town. No Ka Oi Hale offers the best combination of quality, comfort, and luxury amenities for your Maui vacation. This tastefully rebuilt Historic Plantation home features 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, vaulted ceilings, tile floors, granite finishes, and breathtaking oceanfront vistas.

reviews.comments: Amazing location. Beautiful views of the ocean and nearby island of Lanai from inside and outside the home. Beach front access to baby beach was great to snorkel with the kids and check out all the marine life right in our own "backyard". Best trip ever
